34a6(mdo sde): 'dod chags dang bcas pa/zhe sdang dang bcas pa/gti mugo dang bcas pa/skye ba dang /rga ba dang /na ba dang /'chi ba dang /mya ngan dang /smre sngags 'don pa dang /yid//
34a7(mdo sde): mi bde ba dang /'khrug pa dang bcas pa na yang nga la gcig pu sems mngon par dad pas gtso bo shi bar mthong ba mi bzod nas dus byed do//'dod pa'i khams thams cad las
34b1(mdo sde): yang dag par 'dus nas/tshangs pa'i 'jug rten du skyes pa de nyon cig/dge slong dag sngon byung ba 'das pa'i dus na/byang phyogs na rgyal po'i pho brang rdo bzangs shes bya ba/'byor ba rgyus/
34b2(mdo sde): pa/bad ba lo legs pa/mi dang skye bo'i tshogs mang pos gang pa/tshur dpag tshad bcu gnyis/kun nas gru bzhi par gyur te/shin tu rnam par 'byes pa/rta babs dang /skar khung
34b3(mdo sde): dang /skar khung dra ba can mthon po dang /rab tu ldan pa dang /tshong tshong dang /rin po che sna tshogs kyis kun tu gang ba/rgyal po dang /blon po dang /khyim bdag dang /tshang dpon dang
34b4(mdo sde): yul 'khor gyi mi rnams kyi yongasu gang ba/mi rnams gzhung lug la gnas pa/pi bang dang /gling bu dang /rnga dang /sgra bzangs dang /rnga bo che dang /rdza rnga dang /rnga rings dang
34b5(mdo sde): dung gi sgra rnams kyi sgra nges par sgrogs pa'o//dge slong dag rgyal po'i pho drang da na/ta ga ru'i dri dang /a ga ru'i dri dang /tsan dan gyi dri dang /phye ma'i dri dang /gur gum gyi dri dang /
34b6(mdo sde): me tog gi dri zhim pa rnams te/dus thams cad du 'di lta ba'i dri sna tshogs pa rlung gis bskyod nas lam dang /srang bar dang /bzhi mdo dang /sum mdo rnamasu ldang zhing rgyu ba dang /
34b7(mdo sde): glang po dang /rta dang /dpung bu chung gi dpung gi tshigs dang yang dag par ldan pa dang /bzhon pa dang /theg pa dang /srang dang /lam po che nye bar mdzes par byas pa dang /gdugs
35a1(mdo sde): dang rgyal mtshan dang /ba dan bsgreng ba dang /rta bangs da /skur khud dang /sgyurab dang dru ba can dang /zla ba phyeng bas btags pas//b+hU gnas
35a2(mdo sde): bzhin du nye bar mdzes par gyur pa dang /klu'i dbang po dang /ri'i rgyal po las mngon par mthon pa'i mtsho dang /rdzing bu dang /lteng ka dang /chu mig dang /'bab chus nya
35a3(mdo sde): bar mdzes pa dang ldan pa dang /ud pa la dang /pad+ma dang /ku mu ta dang /pun da ri kas kun tu khebs pa/shing sa la dang /ta la dang /ta ma la dang /thong ka dang /a
35a4(mdo sde): sho ka dang /ti li ka drang /pur na ka dang /tsam pri ka dang /ba ku la dang /a ti mug ta ka dang /ba tA la'i me tog gis kun tu khebs pa dang ldan pa dang /nags tshal
35a5(mdo sde): gyi phyogs na/ka la bing ka dang /ne tso dang /shi ri ka dang /khu byug dang /rma bya dang /shang shang te'u sgra sgrogs par gyur pa dang /shing sna tshogs kyis nye bar mdzes
35a6(mdo sde): pas nyams dga' bar byas pa dang /bskyed mos tshal nyams dga' ba mdun na yod de/dge slong dag rdo bzangs de ltar shin tu nyams dga' bar gyur to//dge slong dag
35a7(mdo sde): rgyal po'i pho brang rdo bzangs de na rgyal po zlo 'od ces bya bar gzugs bzang ba/blta na sdug pa/mdzes pa/skye ba dran pa/lha'i mig dang ldan pa/gling gcig pa'i
35b1(mdo sde): 'khor los sgyur ba/chos dang ldan pa/sa kyi rgyal po 'dzam bu'i gling du mos kyi dbang phyug la dbang byed par gyur to//dge slong dag rgyal po klu 'di rang la 'o yod pas/'dren
35b2(mdo sde): yang mun pa med par gyur te/ner bu rin po che'i 'ad dam/mur mi 'od dam/sgron ma mdun du mi khyer gyi/dge slong drag gzhan du na rgyal po zla 'od rang nyid kyi lus 'od byung bar
35b3(mdo sde): gyur te/dper na zla ba'i dkyil las 'od 'byung ba bzhin du 'di'i lus las 'od byung ste/rgyu 'dis na rgyal po zla 'od ces med du gyur te//yang de'i tshe de'i dus na 'dzam bu'i gling 'dir
35b4(mdo sde): rgyal po'i pho brang rdo bzangs la sogs pa/grong khyer drug khri brkyang stong byung bar gyur te/'byor pa rgyas pa/bde ba lo legs pa/skye bo mang po dang /mi mang pos gang bar
35b5(mdo sde): gyur to//dge slong dag gzhan yang rgyal po zla 'od kyi 'dzam bu'i gling gi mo rnams la dpya dang /sho gam dang /gru btsas med de/zhing gi 'byor pa dang ldan pa/skye bo rnams
35b6(mdo sde): zhi ba dang /khyim bya'i sgra dang /ldan pa/grong drang grong khyer dang /gling rdal gyi skye bo'i tshogs dang rgyal po dang /rgyal rigs dang ldan par gyur to//dge slong dog yang
35b7(mdo sde): de'i tshe de'i dus no 'dzam bu'i blang gi mi rnams kyi tshe'i tsha de lo bzhi khri bzhi stong par gyur to//dge slong dog rgyal po zla 'od ni byang chub sems dpar gyur te/thams cad ster ba
36a1(mdo sde): thams cad yongasu gtong ba ste/des rgyal po'i pho brang rdo bzangs nas grong khyer gyi shar phyogasu gdugs dang /rgyal mtshan dang /ba dan bsgreng ste/gser
36a2(mdo sde): gyi rnga bo che yang dag par brdungs nas/sbyin pa ni gtong /bsod nams ni byed do//de bzhin du grong khyer gyi lho dang /nub dang /byang du yang sbyin pa ni gtong /bsod nams ni byed
36a3(mdo sde): sum mdo'i dbus su yang sbyin pa ni gtong /bsod nams ni byed do//'di lta ste/zas 'dod po rnams la ni zas/skom 'dod pa rnamal ni skom/bza' ba dang /bca' ba dang
36a4(mdo sde): 'phreng ba dang /mar me dang /dri dang /byug pa dang /mal dang /spyan dang /rgyab rten dang /skye ba rnams kyi gnas dang /shing rta dang /sdud pa dang /rgyan dang /gser snod
36a5(mdo sde): dngul gyi phye mas yongasu gang ba rnams dang /dngul gyi snod gser gyi phye mas yongasu gang ba rnams dang /gser gyi rwa btags pa'o ba lang rnams dang /khar ba'i gzhi snod rnams
36a6(mdo sde): dang /gzhon nu ma rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan par byas pa rnams kyang sbyin pa ni gtor/bsod nams ni byed do//gos kha dog sna tshogs pa yul sna tshogs pa las byung ba rnam
36a7(mdo sde): pasna tshogs pa la 'di lta ste/da ral dang /n+ya dar dang /rin po che'i gos dang /du kul dang /mri go pan dang /bag le baM dang /la ba dang /rin po che dang /gser
36b1(mdo sde): dang /gos gser gyi rgyun can dang /ka sha si ka'i dar dang /gso dar la sogs pa rnams kyang sbyin par ni gtong /bsod nams ni byed do//dge slong dag rgyal po zla 'od kyis sbyin pa ji
36b2(mdo sde): skyesnyed kyis 'dzam bu'i gling pa'i ma thams cad phyug pa dang /nar che ba dang /longs spyod che bar gyur pa de snyed rab tu gtong ngo //dge slong dag rgyul po zla 'od kyis gang glang ba dang /rta dang /shi
36b3(mdo sde): dang /gdugs la sogs pa'i sbyin pa ni ji snyed kyis 'dzam bu'i gling pa 'di na mig go cig kyang rkang gis 'gro ba med po/de snyed rab tu gtong ste/'dzam bu gling ba'i mi thams cad kyang glang
36b4(mdo sde): po'i rgyab dang rta bzhi dang ldan pa'i shing rta stang nas gser dang /dngul gyi gdugs 'dzin pa dang /ldan pa dang /bskyed mos tshal nas bskyed mos tshal dang /yul 'khor nas
36b5(mdo sde): yul 'khor dang /grong khyer nas grong khyer du rje su 'gro bar gyur to//dge slong dag de nas yang rgyal po zla 'od 'di ltar sems par gyur te/ngos sbyin pa 'di tsam zhig byin pa tsam
36b6(mdo sde): byos ci zhig bya ste/gos dang rgyun dang /chas gzhan rnams nga nyid ci 'dra ba 'dzam bu gling pa'i mi rnams kyang de dang 'dra bar rab tu byin na/'dzam bu gling pa'i mi thams cad rgyal po'i
36b7(mdo sde): rtsa 'jos rtse zhing ral bar 'gyur ro//de nas rgyal po zla 'od kyis 'dzam bu gling pa'i mi thams cad la gcod pan dang /dar dang /gos dang /rgyan dang /chas gzhan rnams byin
37a1(mdo sde): pa ni 'di lta ste/mgul gdub dang /gdu bu dang /dpung rgyan dang /do shal dang /se mo do dang /mu tig gi chun 'phyang dang /rgyal po la 'os pa
37a2(mdo sde): rnams sbyin pa rab tu sbyin no//dge sbyong dag rgyal po zla 'od kyis rgyal po la 'os pa/gos dang /rgyun dang /cod ngan dang /dar rnams rab tu byin pa gang gis ji ltar 'jam
37a3(mdo sde): bu gling de'i mi thams cad cod pan thogs shod/der dbyangs 'chings par gyur te/rgyal po zla 'ang rnam pa ci 'dra bar gyur pa/'dzam bu gling gi mi thams cad kyang de dang
37a4(mdo sde): 'dra bar gyur te/de ltar rab tu byin no//dge slong dag rgyal po zla 'od kyis rgyal po'i pho brang rdo bzangasu dril bsgrags te/'dzam bu gling gi mi khyed thams cad nga ji srid 'tshe/
37a5(mdo sde): bar du rgyal po'i rje 'jos rtse zhing rol cig ces bsgrag so//dge slong dag de nas rgyal po zla 'od kyis dril bsgrags pa/'dzam bu gling gi mi thams cad kyis thos pa dang /tha~Md
37a6(mdo sde): rgyal po'i rtse 'jo'i rje ba la zhugs te/bi bang dang /gling bu dang /khar rnga dang /sgra bzangs dang /pi bang rgyud gsum pa dang /rnga rings dang /rdza rngu dang /dung stong phrag drung /
37a7(mdo sde): sil snyan brgya snyed kyi sgra'i ri la mo rdung zhing dpung brgyan dang /do shal dang /sa mo de dang /nor bu dang /mu tig gi rgyan rnams dang /rna cha thogs pa dang /rgyan gyis
37b1(mdo sde): brgyan la/bud med kyi tshogs kyis yongasu bskor nas/rgyal srid kyi dpal la rjesu spyod par gyur to//yang de'i tshe de'i dus na rgyal po'i pho brang rdo bzangs na/mi rnams rgyal po
37b2(mdo sde): 'jos rol te/pi bang dang /gling bu dang /khar rnga dang /sgra bzangs dang /po bo rgyud gsum pa dang /rdza rnga dang /rnga rangs dang /dung gi sgra grong khyer drug khri brgyad stong du sgra
37b3(mdo sde): bsgrags pa dang /gang yang rgyal po zla 'od kyi sbyin gtong gi gnas bzhir gser gyi rnga bo che rnams brdungs pa dang /'di lta bu'i yid du 'ong ba'i sgra byung bar gyur te//'od lta ste/sum
37b4(mdo sde): cu rtsa gsum gyi lha rnams kyi nang na/lha'i grong khyer dran gru dang gar dang /rol mo'i sgra bsgog so//dge slong dag de bzhin du de'i tshe de'i dus na/'dzem bu gling de'i mi thams cad glu dang /
37b5(mdo sde): gaugor dang /rol mo'i sgras ci bde ba la 'jog cing shin tu dga' bar gyur to//yang de'i tshe rgyal po'i pho byad rdo bzangs na/bye bdudang phyur bdun cu rtsa gnyis kyi mi rnams gnaso//yang
37b6(mdo sde): dge slong dag rgyal po zla 'od chos kyi gzugs bzung ba blta na sdug pa mdzes pa ste/gzhan yang 'di skye bo'i tshogs chen po'i yid dga' bar gyur to//gzhan 'di skyes pa dang /bud
37b7(mdo sde): med rnams kyis mthong ba ni/ngoms par mi 'gyur ba'i dga' ba thob bo//dus gang gi tshe rgyal po zla 'od grong khyer nas byung ste/sbyin gtong gi gan su song ba na/srog chags
38a1(mdo sde): bya ba brgya stong dpag tu med pa rnams lta zhing 'di skad kyang smra ste/kye ma rgyal po zla 'od 'di ni lta zhig 'ongs nas/'dzam bu'i gling 'dir rgyal ba
38a2(mdo sde): byed pa yin te/rgyal po zla ba'i 'od kyi gzugs dang /kha dog dang dbyibs de lta bu ni 'dzam bu'i gling ba'i mi rnams la yod pa ma yin no//de gang dang gang du ltos pa de dang /de
38a3(mdo sde): dag du bud med stong phrag gis bltas te/bud med gang 'di khyor rnyed pa 'di skal pa can yin no//gzhan zhig gis smras pa/sems dag pa rnams kyis rnyed kyis gzhan dag
38a4(mdo sde): gis ma yin te/rgyal po zla 'od 'di ni lha dang 'dra bar blta'o//dge slong dag rgyal po zla 'od kyi blon po stong phrag phyed dang bcu gsum yod de//de rnams kyi nang na blon po
38a5(mdo sde): gnyis ni blon po thams cad las khyad par du 'phags pa yin te/blon po zla ba bzang po dang /sa 'dzin zhes bya ba gnyis mkhas par grags pa blo dang ldan pa las thams
38a6(mdo sde): cad la dbang byed pa/rgyal po'i grwaces spras byed pa/rgyal po yongasu skyong ba rgyal po'i las kyi mtha' thams cad la sems las chung ngur byed pa dang /blon po'i mchog
38a7(mdo sde): zla ba bzang po ni 'dzam bu gling pa'i mi khyed rnams ji srid 'tsho bi'i bar du dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam 'di yang dag par blangs la gnas par gyis shig ces 'dzam bu gling pi'i
38b1(mdo sde): mi thams cad dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam la yang dang yang du sbyor bar byed de/dge slong dag blon po'i mchog zla ba bzang po'i gdams ngag rjesu ston pa 'di lta bu byed par gyur to//dge
38b2(mdo sde): slong dag 'di lta ste/'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po zla 'od ni blon po'i mchog zla ba bzang po la sdug par gyur pa dang /dga' ba dang yid du 'ong bar gyur te/gzhan yang der kha dog dang
38b3(mdo sde): dbyebs la 'dis bltas pa na ngoms pa med do//skad cig kyang de mi spong bar gyur to//de nas dus gzhan zhig gi tshe/blon po'i mchog zla ba chen po'i rmi lam du/du ba'i mdog
38b4(mdo sde): can gyi sha za rnams kyis rgyal po zla 'od kyi cod pan phrogs par rmis te/sad nas de 'jigs skrag pas rengs par gyur cing /spu zang zhes byed de/nges par rgyal po zla 'od kyi
38b5(mdo sde): dbu slong ba zhig 'ong bar mi 'gyur ram/lha ni thams cad stsol ba/thams cad yongasu gtong ba yin te/'di la ni sman pa dang /mgon med pa dang /phongs pa dang /sdug
38b6(mdo sde): bsngal ba dang /slong ba rnams la mi stsol ba dang /yongasu mi gtong ba ni gzhan ci yang mi mnga' bas na/rgyal po zla ra la rmi lam 'di mi zhu'i gzhan du nA rin po che'i mgo rnam
38b7(mdo sde): byas la/mdzod dang /bang bar bcug la bzhag ste/gal te 'ga' zhika lha'i dbu slong ba 'ongs par gyur no/de la rin po che'i mgo 'di rnams kyis brid par bya'o snyam nas
39a1(mdo sde): rin po che'i rgyu las byas pa'i mgo byas te/mdzod dang bang ba rnam su bzhag par gyur te/de nas dus gzhan zhig gi tshe blon po'i mchogs 'dzin gyi rmi lam du
39a2(mdo sde): rgyal po zla 'od kyi rin po che rnams kyi mgo rnam pa brgyar lhags pa rmis pa dang /yang 'jigs shing skyug la kun tu skyo nas rgyal po zla 'od rgyal srid las nyams pa 'am/srog gi
39a3(mdo sde): bar chad du mi 'gyur grang snyam nas/yang bram ze ltas mkhan mkhas pa rnams bos nas/bdag gos 'di lta bu'i rmi la mo rmis rmi lam do'i 'bras bu ji lta bu yin pa lung ston cig
39a4(mdo sde): ltas mkhas rnams kyis smras pa/rmi lam mthong ba 'di ji lta ba la pa ni/ring po mi thogs par lha'i dbu stong pa 'ga' zhig 'ong bar gyur te/'di 'dra bar ston pa yin no//de skad
39a5(mdo sde): thos pa dang /yang blon po'i mchog sa 'dzin lag pa 'gram pa la gtad te/shin tu sems pa la zhugs pas gnas par gyur to/rgyal po zla 'od byams pa'i bdag nyid can
39a6(mdo sde): snying rje dang ldan pa/sems can thams cad la mnyes gshin pa/mi rtag pa nyid kyi stobs nye bar gnas pa ni te cang myur choso//de nas dus gzhan zhig gi tshe/blon po
39a7(mdo sde): stong phrag byed dang bcu gsum po rnams kyis rmi lam 'di ltar mthong ste/rgyal po zla 'od kyi sbyin gtong gi gnas khang bzhi ru gnod sbyin lag na thod pa thogs pa rnams kyis
39b1(mdo sde): gdugs dang /rgyal mtshan dang /ba dan rnams bsgyel ba dang /gser gyi rnga bo che yang bcag par rmis pa dang /yang 'jigs shing skrag la sems skyo nas/rgyal po zla 'ongs chen
39b2(mdo sde): bo skyong ba/byams pa'i bdag nyid can snying rje dang ldan pa/sems can thams cad la mnyes pa shin pa/mi rtag pa nyid kyi stobs kyis byin pa ri mo 'gyur rom/bdag cag
39b3(mdo sde): rnams lha dang lhan cig pas/gnas las tha dad par 'gyur ba dang /so so ba dang /bya ba dang /bral bar mi 'gyur ram 'dzam bu gling ba rnams skyabs dang /da bung gnyen
39b4(mdo sde): med par mi 'gyur ram/de rgyal po zla 'od kyis kyang thos pa dang /yang grong khyer drug khri brgyad stong du dri la bsgrags te/'dzam bu gling po'i mi khyed rnams ji srid 'tsho ba'i bar du
39b5(mdo sde): rgyal po'i rtse 'dzes rtse zhing rol cig/khyed rnams sgyu ma lta bu'i rmi lam la sems pas ci zhig bya/rgyal po zla 'od kyi dril bsgrags pa thos pa dang /'dzam bu gling po'i mi thams cad
39b6(mdo sde): sel snyan chen po dang /pi bang dang /gling bu dang /khyer rnga dang /sgra bzangs dang /pi bang rgyud gsum pa dang /rdza rje dang /rnga rings dang /dung stong phyag snyed kyi rol mo rdung zhing
39b7(mdo sde): bar brtsams pa dang /gser gyi dpung rgyan dang /do shal dang /se mo de nur bu'i rna rgyun thigs shing rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan nas bud med kyi tshigs kyis bskor te/rgyal
40a1(mdo sde): po'i dpal la rjes spyod par gyur to//yang de'i tshe de'i dus na 'dzam bu'i gling na glu dang /glur dang rol mo'i sgra dang /grong khyer drug khri brgyad stong du gling bu/
40a2(mdo sde): nges par 'bud pa dang gang yang sbyin gting gis gnas chen po bzhir gser gyi rnga bo che brdungs pa la snyan cing yid du 'ong ba'i sgra byung bar gyur te/des 'dzam bu gling thams
40a3(mdo sde): cad sgra sgrags par gyur te/dper na sum cu rtsa gsum gyi lha rnams kyi gzhal med khang gi nang na glu dang /gar dang /rol mo'i sgra grags po bzhin no//yang de'i tshe de'i dus na ri
40a4(mdo sde): spos kyi ngad ldang na/bram ze drag po'o mag ces bya ba mig 'phrul gyi bya shes pa zhig gnas pa dang /bram ze drag po'i mig gis rgyal po'i pho brang rdo bzangs na/rgyal po zla 'od rje
40a5(mdo sde): bya ba thams cad ster bar thos so//thos nas kyang bdag nyid kyis bsams pa/bdag song la mgo bslang na gal te/thams cad gtong bar gyur pa yin na ni bdag la yang
40a6(mdo sde): mgo ster bar 'gyu ro//gzhan du na gang sdug pa dang /'phangs pa dang /yid du 'ong ba dang /mngon par dga' bar bya ba yan lag gi mchog mgo yongasu gtong ba 'di ni dka'
40a7(mdo sde): ba dang /'di ni gnas med pa dang /'di ni go skabs med do snyam nas ri spos kyi ngad ldang las bab so//de nas spos kyi ngad ldang na gnas pa'i lha mo zhig ngu bar rtsams te/kyi hud
40b1(mdo sde): rgyal po zla 'od byams pa'i bdag nyid can snying rje dang ldan pa/sems can thams cad la mnyes pashin pa/mi rtag pa nyid kyi stobs nye bar gnas de sdug bsngal lo//yang de'i tshe dadu
40b2(mdo sde): dus na 'dzam bu'i gling thams cad du byas mun nag tu gyur te/'khrugs shing kun tu 'khrugs par gyur pa dang /skar 'da' ltung baM dang /phyogs smad pa dang /bar snang la lha rnams mya ngan
40b3(mdo sde): byed par gyur to//yang de'i tshe de'i dus rgyal po'i pho brang rdo bzangs dang /hUM cing mi ring ba zhig na sna tshogs pa shes gnyen zhes bya ba'i drang song mngon par shes pa lnga dang ldan pa/byam
40b4(mdo sde): po dang snying rje'i bdag nyid can sems can thams cad la mnyes pa shin pa zhig 'khor brgyas bskor nas gnas te/de nas drang srong des 'dzam bu'i gling thams cad 'khrugs shing //
40b5(mdo sde): kun tu 'khrugs par mthong ba dang /'khor rnams la smras pa gang 'dzam bu'i gling 'di thams cad ltar du bas mun nag du gyur te/'khrugs shing kun tu 'khrugs par gyur
40b6(mdo sde): pa dang /nyi ma dang /zla ba gnyis kyang lam me ma yin/lhang nge ma yin/lhan ni ma yin pa bu khyed rnams kyis shes sam/nges par skyes bu chen po 'ga' zhig 'gag par 'gyuraro//
40b7(mdo sde): 'di ltar mi 'am ci'i tshogs dang nags kyi lha rnams ngu/namakhar gnas pa'i lha rnams kyang ni smod par byed//zla ba gzi med nyi ma dag kyang 'od zer med par gyur//deng ni rol mo
41a1(mdo sde): brdungs kyang sgra ni grag ma gyur//me tog 'bras bur ldan pa'i shing tshogs 'di dag kyang //rlung gi ma bskyod bzhin dus la ltung bar gyur//ji ltar 'jigs
41a2(mdo sde): pa'i sgra 'di kun tu thos pas na//grong khyer du ni sdug bsngal mi bzad 'byung bar gsal//rgyu des grong khyer gnas pa'i skye bo ma lus pa//sems la sdug bsngal kun tu gtugs
41a3(mdo sde): nas 'jog pa dang //cho nges 'debs shing lag pa snying le rdebs par byed/shar+m+ma/rnams rab tu grol zhing tshig ni rnam kha ro 'gag zla za'i gdol can sud med rnams ni rab tu dzu/
41a4(mdo sde): grong khye gnas ba kun klung b+h+ring rjes du bar byed//sbyin 'di rnams kyang mar ma 'bab par sgra sgrogs lnga//chu'i gnas rnams nye bar skams pa nyid du gyur//ri dang dgas rnam
41a5(mdo sde): kyang ni mi bzad me yis sregs//mi rnams so so'i khyim na shin tu 'khrugs pas ngu//chu la rlung gis bskyed pa'i gru bzhin sa rnams g.yos pa dang //shin tu rngub pa'i rdul
41a6(mdo sde): dang 'dre ba'i rlung ldang gyur//bkra mi shes pa'i mtshan ma ni//da wAr 'di na rnam mang ste//de na 'dag cag shes pa'i//phyogasu 'gro ba shin tu rigs//gzhan yang bu
41a7(mdo sde): rnams rgyal po zla 'ad kyi sbyin gtong gi gnas bzhir gser gyi rnga bo che brdungs na yang yid du 'ong ba'i sgra 'byung bar ma gyur pas nges par rgyal po'i pho brang rdo bzangs der nye bar
41b1(mdo sde): 'tshe ba chen po 'byung bar 'gyur ro//de nas bram ze drag po'i mig gis rgyal po'i pho brang rdo bzangasu phyin to//de nas grong khyer na gnas pa'i lha mos bram ze drag po'i mig bya'i bo nyid nas mthong
41b2(mdo sde): ba dang /rgyal po zla 'od ga la ba dang song ste phyin nas/rgyal po zla 'od la 'di skad ces smras//gang 'di lha mkhyen par mdzod cig/de ring lho'i dbu slong ba 'che ba rnam par rtsom pa/
41b3(mdo sde): glags lta ba zhig 'ong bar gyur te/de lho'i dbu slong bar 'gyur gyis/de la lhas sems can rnams la thugs brtse ba'i slad du/bradag nyid yongasu srung bar mdzod cig/de nas
41b4(mdo sde): rgyal po zla 'od kyis mgo slong bar thos pas/yang rab tu dga' zhing ngo mtshar gyis mig gdangs pa dang /lha mo la smras pa/sti mo ma 'jigs par song zhig/gal te 'ong bar
41b5(mdo sde): gyur na/ngas 'di'i yun ring mo nas mngon par 'dod pa'i yid la re ba yongasu rdzogs par bya'o//de nas lha mo des rgyal po zla 'od rtsol ba tshul de lta bu shes pas/sdug bsngal zhing
41b6(mdo sde): ya de mi bde bar de nyid du mi snang bar gyur to//de nas rgyal po zla 'od 'di snyam du sems to/gang bdag gis dribyig dang /gser dang zas 'dod pa rnams la zas sbyin pa ni po
41b7(mdo sde): mtshar ci zhig che/gang yang bdag gis slong ba rnams la rang nyid kyi lus kyang yongasu gtang bar bya'o//de nas bram ze drag po'i mig grong khyer gyi lho phyogs kyi sgo nas zhugs pa dang /
42a1(mdo sde): grong khyer gyi lha mos bzlogs te/bram ze sdig can ma zhugs par slar song shig/skyes bu gti mug can khyod da ltar rgyal po zla 'od byams pa'i bdag
42a2(mdo sde): nyid can/snying rje dang ldan pa yon tan dpag tu med pa/phun sum tshogs pa 'dzim bu'i gling yongasu skyong ba ro byed pa/nyes pa med pa/gnod pa med pa/mgo drag po'i
42a3(mdo sde): sems kyi ji ltar gcod par byed/bram ze sdig can ma zhugs par song shig/rnam pa 'di dag rgyal po zla 'od kyis thos so//thos nas kyang de'i slongs mo ba lha mos grong khyer
42a4(mdo sde): gyi sgo na bkag go snyam nas/yang blon po'i mchog zla ba chen po la smras pa/gang 'di zla ba chen pos shes par gyis shig/nga'i slongs mo ba lha mos grong khyer gyi sgo na bka/go gis//
42a5(mdo sde): song la nga'i thad du rings par khyer la shog shig/lha de ltar 'tshal zhes blon po'i mchog blon po chen pos rgyal po zla 'od kyis tshig mnyan nas/grong khyer gyi lha mo de bzlog tu
42a6(mdo sde): gang 'di lha mo shes par gyis shig/lha bram ze 'di 'gugs kyis bram ze 'di thong shig/de nus grong khyer na gnas pa'i lha mos zla ba chen po la 'di skad ces smraso//gang yang
42a7(mdo sde): zla ba chen pos shes par gyis shig/bram ze 'di ni gtum pa'i sems dang /snying rje med pa'i sems dong /mi bzad pa'i sems kyis rgyal po zla 'od rlag pa'i phyir pho brang rdo
42b1(mdo sde): bzangasu 'ongs na/khyed la rang bzhin ngan pa 'dis ci zhig bya/rgyal po zla 'od kyi thad du song nas mgo slong bar 'gyur ro//de nas blon po'i mchog zla ba chen pos lha mo la smras pa/lha mo grang gis/
42b2(mdo sde): bram ze 'dis lha'i dbu len par mi 'gyur ba'i thabs shig bsams pa de la yod do//de nas blon po'i mchog zla ba chen pos bram ze drug po'i myig khrid de/de grong khyer du zhugs nas rin po
42b3(mdo sde): che'i mdzod pa la smras pa/khyod kyis rin po che las byas pa'i mgo rnams khyer la song shig dang /bram ze 'di la ngas sbyin par bya'o//mdzod pas kyang rgyal po'i rin po che'i mgo rnams kyi
42b4(mdo sde): phung po chen po byas pa dang /blon po'i mchog zla ba chen pos bram ze drag po'i mig la rin po che la byas pa'i mgo rnams nye bar bstobs te/bram ze chen po rin po che'i mgo mang po long shig
42b5(mdo sde): dang /dbyig dang /gser rnams kyis kyang ci tsam dgos pa khyod la sbyin gyis khyer cig/'dis ni khyod kyi bu dang /cha bo'i bar gyi 'tsho bar 'gyur gyi/lho'i dbu glad pa dang /rus pa
42b6(mdo sde): dang /ngar snabs drang /zhag gris yongasu grang ba byas ci zhig bya/de skad ces smras pa dang /bram ze drag po'i mig gis zla ba chen po la 'di skad ces smraso//gang 'di zla ba chen pos
42b7(mdo sde): shes par gyis shing /da la ni rin po che'i mgo rnams dgos pa med de/gser dang /dbyig kyang dgos pa med kyi/gzhan du na sa chen po skyong ba thams cad gtong ba 'di'i mgo
43a1(mdo sde): slong ba'i phyir 'di'i thad du 'angs//de skad ces smras pa dang /blon po'i mchog zla ba chen po dang /sa 'dzin gnyis lag pa 'gram la gtad de/da ni du
43a2(mdo sde): kyis phyin to snyam nas/shin tu sems pa la zhugs pas gnas par gyur to//de nas rgyal po zla 'od kyis rnam pa de dag nye bar thos nas/blon po'i mchog zla ba chen po dang /sa 'dzin
43a3(mdo sde): gnyis pho nyas bos nas 'di skad ces smras//bram ze de'i gan du khyer las shog shig/ngos 'di la yun ring po nas mngon par 'dod pa'i yid la re ba yongasu rdzogs par bya'o//de skad
43a4(mdo sde): ces smras pa dang /blon po'i mchog zla ba chen dang /sa 'dzin gnyis po de yul rmus pa lta bu'i mchi ma'i gdong gi snying rje rje skad du smre sngags 'don cing smras pa/lha byams drim
43a5(mdo sde): bdag nyid can snying rje dang ldan pa/sems can thams cad la mnyes bzhin pa/yon tan dpag tu med pa/phun sum tshogs pa dang ldan pa/ye shes la mkhas pa/
43a6(mdo sde): lha'i mig dang ldan pa/'di mi rtag pa nyid kyi stobs nye bar gnas par gyur to//bdag cagra rnams deng lha dang lhan cig pa las tha dad par gyur pa dang /so sor 'gyur ba dang /
43a7(mdo sde): bral ba dang /bye bar 'gyur ro snyam nas/rgyal po'i rkang pa la gtugs te phyogs gcig tu 'dug go//de nas rgyal po zla 'od thams cad yongasu gtong ba/shin tu khyed
43b1(mdo sde): par can gtong zhing yong su gtong bar 'dod nas/ring po nas bram ze de la smras pa/bram ze chur shog/khyod gang slong ba de khyer cig/de nas bram ze drag pa'i mig rgyal po zla 'od gang na/
43b2(mdo sde): ba der song ste phyin nas/rgyal po zla 'od la rgyal ba dang /tshe spel ba brjod nas/rgyal po zla 'od la 'di skad ces smras//byang chub sems dpa' dngos po thams cad gtong la des
43b3(mdo sde): dga' 'gyur//byang chub sems dpa' dag khyod dri med chos la gnas//dam pa kun mkhyen mngon par bzhed pa'i thugs kyis ni//thugs rje bdag nyid thugs ldan bdag la
43b4(mdo sde): dbu stsol cig/de nas rgyal po zla 'od kyis bram ze las de lta bu'i tshig brjod pa thos pa dang /yid rab tu dga' ba dang /dga' bas mig gdangs te bram ze drag po'i mig la
43b5(mdo sde): smras pa/ji ltar yab kyis bu gcig gang yin yang //de lta na yang nga'i mgo 'di khyer//khyod kyis bsams pa 'bras bur bcas 'gyur cig/mgo bo byin pas byang chub thob
43b6(mdo sde): par shog/nga'i mgo glad pa khrag dang zhag 'di yis//khyod kyis 'dod pa'i bya ba ci yang mi byed kyang //khyer te khyod la nga'i mgo gang dgos gyur pa'i//yid la ri ba 'bras
43b7(mdo sde): bcas khyod ni dga' bar shog/bram ze chen po khyod kyis nga'i yan lag gi mchog mgo 'di bar chad med par logs par khyer cig ces smras nas/rang nyid kyis cod pan
44a1(mdo sde): phud do//dge slong dag rgyal po zla 'od kyis mgo la yod pa'i cod pan phung ma thag tu 'jam bu gling pa'i mi thams cad kyi mgo la yod pa'i cod pan rnams kyang/
44a2(mdo sde): lhung bar gyur to//rgyal po'i pho brang rdo bzangs kyi phyogs bzhir skar mda' rnams ltung bar gyur te/grong khyer gyi lha mos rgyal po zla 'od 'di'i mgo bram ze sdig can gyis gcod
44a3(mdo sde): par 'gyur ro zhes sgra skrag so//de nas blon po'i mchog zla ba chen po dang /sa 'dzin gnyis rgyal po zla 'od tshul 'di lta bu rang rang nyid kyi lus yongasu gtong bar shes nas/nga
44a4(mdo sde): yul rmus pa lta bu'i mchi mi'i gdong can gyis rgyal po'i rkang pa la gtugs te/gang lha yang mthong ba 'di ni 'jig rten nu skyes bu skal pa can no zhes smras shing /de gnyis
44a5(mdo sde): de la sems mngon par dad pas lta zhing /yu bus bram ze drag po'i mig la byams pa'i sems bskyed pa dang /lha'i mi rtag pa nyid la blta bar mi nus so snyam du bsams
44a6(mdo sde): nas/skad cig ma de nyid la dus byas te/'dod pa'i khams thams cad las yang dag par 'das nas/tshangs pa'i 'jig rten du skyeso//de nas rgyal po zla 'od kyi 'bad pa'i
44a7(mdo sde): tshul 'di lta bu shes nas sa la gnas pa'i gnod sbyin rnams dang /bar snang la rgyu ba'i gnod sbyin rnams cho nges 'debs par btsams te/kyi hud da ni rgyal po zla 'od kyi
44b1(mdo sde): sus yongasu gtong bar 'gyur te/sdug bsngal lo//de nas rgyal ba'i pho brang sgor srog chags brgya stong du ma 'dus par gyur to//de nas bram ze drug pa'i mig gis skye bo'i tshogs chen po 'dus
44b2(mdo sde): pa de mthong nas rgyal po zla 'od la 'di skad ces smras//gal te lhas gnang bar mdzad na/skyo ba'i tshogs chen po'i mdun du lha'i dbu len rje mi thog go/gal te khyod dbu yongasu gtong
44b3(mdo sde): bapar mdzad na/khyed dang bdag dben pa zhig du gshegs 'tshalo//de skad ces smras pa dang /rgyal po zla 'od kyis bram ze drag po'i mig la smras pa/bram ze chen po de bzhin
44b4(mdo sde): du byA yis//khyod kyis kun tu rtog pa 'byor cing //rang gi yid la re ba rnams yongasu rdzogs par gyur cig/dge slong dag rgyal po'i pho brang rje bzangs kyi nang na/nor bu dang /rin
44b5(mdo sde): po che'i snying po zhes bya ba'i skyed mos tshal shing sna tshogs kyis nye bar mdzes pa/nya mas dga' ba/na cingadang /sha ri'i klo dang /khu byug dang /rma bya dang /shang shrang twe
44b6(mdo sde): dang /kA la bying ka rnams yid du 'ong ba'i sgra sgrogs pas/nags tshal gyi tshogs nyams dga' ba'i bskyed mos tshal de'i dbus kyi stegs bu de'i dbus su tsam pa ka'i shing zhig
44b7(mdo sde): skyes pa yod do//de nas rgyal po zla 'od rgyal po'i stan las langs te/ral gri rnon po thogs nas/nor bu dang /rin po che'i snying po'i skyed mos tshal gal ba der song ngo //de nas
45a1(mdo sde): rgyal po zla 'od 'bad pa'i tshul 'di lta bu la zhugs pa mthong ba dang /rgyal po'i pho brang rdo bzangs kyi grong khyer na srog chags brgya stong du bas cho nges 'debs
45a2(mdo sde): shing /rjes bzhin rjes bzhin du 'brang ba dang /rgyal po zla 'od kyis skye bo'i tshogs chen po 'dus pa de tshe nges 'debs pa mthong ngo //mthong ba dang yang dbugs dbyung ba'i phyir smras
45a3(mdo sde): ba/khyed rnams dge ba'i chos rnams la bag yod par gyis shig/ces mdor sdus nas chos bstan te/bram ze drug po'i mig khrid nas nor bu dang /rin po che'i snying po'i
45a4(mdo sde): skyed mos tshal du zhugs nas/rgyal po zla 'od nor bu dang /rin po che'i skyed mos tshal du zhugs ma thag tu rgyal po'i pho dang rdo bzangs kyi dbang po'i rgyal mtshan dang /ba den rnam
45a5(mdo sde): nor bu dang /rin po che'i skyed mos tshal ge la ba der 'dug par gyur to//de nas rgyal po zla 'od kyi nor bu dang /rin po che'i snying po'i skyed mos tshal gyi sgo bcad nas/bram ze
45a6(mdo sde): la smras pa/bram ze chen po nga'i yan lag gi mchog 'di khyer cig/de skad ces smras pa dang /bram ze drag po'i mig gis 'di skad ces smraso//lha'i dbu bdag gis gcod
45a7(mdo sde): par rje mi thog go/de skad ces smras pa dang /rgyal po zla 'od ral gri rnon po thogs nas skyed mos tshal der gang na lus thams cad pa'i tsam pa ka'i shing yod pa der song ngo nge/de nas skyed
45b1(mdo sde): mos tshal de'i lha mos rgyal ba zla 'od tshul 'di lta bur rang nyid yongasu gtong ba la zhugs par shes nas/cho ngas 'debs par brtson zhing 'di skad ces kyang smra so//bram ze sdig can
45b2(mdo sde): khyod de ltar rgyal po zla 'od nyes pa med pa/gnod pa med pa/yon tan dpag tu med pa dang ldan pa 'di'i mgo ji ltar gcod par byed/de nas rgyal po zla 'od kyis skyed mas tshal
45b3(mdo sde): gyi lha mo de'i phyir bzlog ste/lha mo de'i mgo slong ba la bar chad ma byed cig/de ci'i phyir zhe na/lha mo sngon byung ba na nga'i yan lag gi mchog slong ba la lha mo zhig gos bar chad bya
45b4(mdo sde): pas/lha mo'i bsod nams ma yin pa mang po skyes la/ngas kyang bla na med pa'i ye shes yun ring po zhig gis thob par 'gyuraro//lha mo de'i nor bu rin po che'i snying po'i skyed mos
45b5(mdo sde): tshal 'di nyid du mgo stong snyed yongasu gtong ba byas nas/nga la sus kyang bar chad ma byas de bas na lha mo khyod kyi nga'i yan lag gi mchog slong ba la bar chad ma byed cig/lha mo gang
45b6(mdo sde): du ngas stag mo la bdag nyid yongasu btang ste/lus yongasu gtong ba cig gis byang chub sems dpa' byams pa skal pa bzhi bcur zhugs pa/phyir 'dums par byas pa'i sa
45b7(mdo sde): phyogs ni 'di yin no//de nas lha mo de rgyal po zla 'od kyi rdzu 'phrul chen po de mthong nas/rgyal po de la sems mgu ba chen po skyes te/cang mi spro bar gyur to//de nas rgyal po
46a1(mdo sde): zla 'od yang dag pa'i smon lam byed pa la zhugs te/gang skyed mos tshal gyi tshogs na gnas pa'i lha dang //klu dang gnod sbyin dang /dri za dang mi 'am ci khyed
46a2(mdo sde): rnams gson cig/bdag skyed mos tshal 'dir rab tu gtong ba'i yang shin tu gtong ba rang gi mgo yongasu gtong ba byed de/bdag gos mgo yongasu gtor ba de yang rgyal po'i phyir ma
46a3(mdo sde): yin/mtho ris kyi phyir ma yin/bdud kyi phyir ma yin/tshangs pa'i phyir ma yin/'khor los sgyur ba'i yul gyi phyir ma yin gyi//gzhan du na 'dir ji ltar bla na med pa
46a4(mdo sde): yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas/sems can ma dul ba 'dul ba dang /mo rgal ba bsgral ba dang /ma grol ba dgrol ba dang
46a5(mdo sde): dbugs ma phyin pa dbugs dbyung ba dang /yongasu mya ngan las ma 'das pa yongasu mya ngan las bzla bar bya'o//bden pa dang bden po'i tshigs 'dis ngal ba 'bras bu dang bcas
46a6(mdo sde): pabar gyur cig/yongasu mya ngan las 'das nas kyang yungs kar gyi 'bru tsam gyi sku gdung byung bar gyur cig/nor bu dang /rin po che'i skyed mos tshal 'di'i dbus su yang
46a7(mdo sde): mchod rten chen po mchod rten thams cad khyad par du 'phags pa byung bar gyur nas/sems can gang lus ngal ba mchod rten la phyog 'tshal du 'ong bar gyur cig/de
46b1(mdo sde): rnams kyi mchod rten thams cad las khyad par du 'phags pa'i sku gdung 'jog pa de mthong bas ngal ba med par gyur cig/ngal ba med par gyur nas/nga'i mchod rten la skye bo'i tshogs//
46b2(mdo sde): 'ongs nas mchod pa byed na mtho ris dang thar pa la gzhol bar yang gyur cig ces smras nas/tsam pa ka'i shing la gtsug phud bcings nas bram ze la bos te smras pa/bram ze chen
46b3(mdo sde): bo chur shog/bgogs mu byed par nga'i mgo bregs la khyer cig/de nas rgyal po zla 'od rang nyid kyi lus kyi mthu dang stobs yang dag par skyes nas bram ze de la skyong rje chen po lhan cig/
46b4(mdo sde): tu 'gro ba dang /'byung ba'i byams pa'i sems bskyed nas mgo bcod da/bram ze drag po'i mig la byin no//dus byas pa dang /tshangs po'i 'jig rten las shin tu 'das nas/phul
46b5(mdo sde): du byung ba'i dge rgyus kyi nang du skyes//dge slong dag do nas mgo yongasu btang ma thag tu yang stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di 'gul rab tu 'gul/ldeg rab tu ldeg
46b6(mdo sde): g.yos rab tu g.yos te/nam pa'i dkyil na mngon par gnas pa'i lha rnams kyang a la la zhos sgra bsgrag so//bar snang gi lha rnams kyang lha'i ut+pal dang /pad+ma dang /ku mu ta dang /
46b7(mdo sde): pun+da ri ka rnams 'thor zhing /a ka ru'i phye ma rnams dang /tsan dan gyi bye ma rnams pa lha rnams kyi me tog man da ri ba da /mnad ra~M ba chen po rnams 'thor ba dang /gis rnams
47a1(mdo sde): kye char yang 'bebs//lha rnams kyi rol mo'i sgra yang yang dag par rdung du An nas bram ze dag pa'i mig mgo khyer te/nor bu dang /ran pa cha'i snang ngu
47a2(mdo sde): skyed mos tshal nas byung ba dang /srog chags brgya stong du mas kyi hud lha bsad de sdug bsngal lo zhes sgra phyung ste/de nas kha cig ni sa la 'ge ldog go/kha cig ni lag pa skang tshe
47a3(mdo sde): nges 'debaso//bud med rnams kyang skra ba shig nas ngu'o//sreg chags brgya stang du ma yang 'dus te ngo na cig tu gnas te/de nyid du gnas na/bsam gtan rnams bskyed
47a4(mdo sde): de nyid du dus byas nas/rgyal po zla 'od dang bskal pa mnyam par dge rgyas kyi lha rnamasu skyeso//kha cig ni bsam gtan bskyed nas gnas te/de nyid du dus byas
47a5(mdo sde): 'od gsal gyi lha'i rigasu skyeso//gzhan rnams ni dus bas nas rgyal po zla 'od kya lus de thams cad dang ldan pa'i ro bseg pa'i shing byas te bsegaso//rus pa de rnam
47a6(mdo sde): kyang gser gyi bum par bcugo ste/lam po che'i bzhi mdor sku gdung gi mchod rten rab tu bzhag ste/gdugs dang /rgyal mtshan dang /ba da ni btsugs te/dri dang
47a7(mdo sde): 'phreng ba dang /spos kyi phyi ma dang /rol mo rnams kyis me chod pa byas nas/rgyal po zla 'od la cig tu sems mngon par dad pas/de bzhin du skyo bas bsam gtan
47b1(mdo sde): bskyed de/bsam gtan bskyed pa des tshangs pa'i 'jig rten du skyes//la la ni rgyal po zla 'od ma mthong bas/mya ngan gyi zil gyis mnan te dus byas nas 'dod pa na spyod pa'i lha
47b2(mdo sde): drug tu skyeso//gang der dus byas pa de dag kyang mtho ris dang /thar pa la gzhol bar gyur to//dge slong dag de'i tshe de'i dus na/byang phyogs na rgyal po'i pho brang rdo bzangasu gyur pa
47b3(mdo sde): dedri gzhan yin par mi blta ste//rdo 'jog 'di nyid de'i tshe de'i dus na/rgyal po'i pho brang rdo bzangasu gyur to//dge slong dag ji snyam du sems te/gang rgyal po zla 'od ces bya ba de
47b4(mdo sde): ni nga yin te/de'i tshe de'i dus na byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa la zhugs te/de nyid kyi nor bu dang /rin po che'i snying po'i skyed mos tshil du bram ze drag po'i mig la mgo yongasu
47b5(mdo sde): tAng ngo //dge slong dag de ji snyam du sems te/gong bram ze drag po'i mig ces bya ba de ni lhas sbyin te/de'i tshe de'i dus na/bram ze drag po'i mig ces bya bar gyur to/
47b6(mdo sde): dge slong dag de ji snyam du sems/gang de'i tshe de'i dus na/blon po mchog zla ba chen po dang /so 'dzin de gnyis ni dge slong shA ri'i bu dang //mo'u dgal gyi bu 'di gnyis
47b7(mdo sde): yin no//'di gnyis kyis nga yang mya ngan las 'das pa ma bzod nas/nga nyid 'chi ba ma mthong bar thog ma nyid du dus byas so//da ltar yang nga mya ngan las 'das pa ma
48a1(mdo sde): bzod de/gang mya ngan las 'das pa ma mthong bar de thog ma nyid du mya ngan las 'das pa yin no//bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas/
48a2(mdo sde): dge slong de dag yi rangs te/bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do//rgyal po zla 'od kyi rtogs pa brjod pa rdzog so//
48a3(mdo sde): /rgya gar gyi mkhan po d+harma shri b+ha tra dang /zhu chen gyi lo ts+tsha ba dge slong shes rab legs pas bsgyur/sgra bsgyur gyi lo ts+tsha ba dge slong rin chen bzang pos bcos te gtan la pab
48a4(mdo sde): po'o///rgya gar skad du/shrI swe naM a ba d+hA nA mo/bod skad du/dpal gyi sde'i rtogs pa brjod pa/dkon mchog gsum la phyag 'tshalo//gleng gzhi mnyan du
48a5(mdo sde): yod pa na ste/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong rnams la bka' stsal pa/dge slong dag gal te ji ltar ngas sbyin pa'i 'bras bu yang shes la/sbyin pa'i bgo ba shA
48a6(mdo sde): 'bras bu rnam par smin pa yang shes bzhin du sems can rnams kyis kyang sbyin pa'i 'bras bu yang shes la/sbyin pa'i bgo ba sha'i 'bras bu rnam par smin ma yang shes
48a7(mdo sde): zin na ni/de lta ni kham gyi tha ma dang kham gyi 'jug lus pa/gang yin pa de las kyang /gal te yon gnas len pa po rnyed na/de la ma byin nam bgo bsha' ma byas
48b1(mdo sde): kyi bar du za bar mi byed la/de dag gis sems kyang ser sna skyes pas kun nas bkris shing 'dug par mi 'gyur ba zhig na/ji ltar ngas sbyin pa'i 'bras bu yang shes la/sbyin pa'i bgo
48b2(mdo sde): bsha'i 'bras bu rnam par smin pa yang shes bzhin du/sems can rnams kyi sbyin pa'i 'bras bu yang mi shes la/sbyin pa'i bgo bsha'i 'bras bu rnam par smin pa yang mi shes pas ni
48b3(mdo sde): de'i phyir de dag ni kun tu 'dzin pa'i sems kyis ma byin pa 'am bgo bsha' ma byas par za bar byed la/de dag gi sems kyang ser sna skyes pas kun tu dkris shing 'dug/bcom ldan 'das
48b4(mdo sde): kyis de skad ces bka' stsal te/bde bar gshegs pas de skad du gsungs nas/gzhan yang ston pas 'di skad ces bka' stsal to//bgo bsha' dag gi rnam par smin//ji ltar don
48b5(mdo sde): chen gyur pa de//dang srong che rnams gsungs pa bzhin//sems can rnams kyis shes na ni//mi byin par dri ma za zhing //se rA sna can du mi 'gyur la//de dag kun tu 'dzin pa'i sems//
48b6(mdo sde): nams kyang skye bar mi 'gyur na//gang phyir byis pa gti mug gis//bsgribs pa rnams kyis ma shes pas//de phyir kun tu 'dzin sems kyis//rtag tu ma byin za bar byed//de dag
48b7(mdo sde): ser sna skyes nas kyang //sems ni kun nas dkris shing 'dug/gang gi tshe bcom ldan 'das kyis mdo 'di bshad pa de'i tshe/sa rnam pa drug tu g.yos par gyur cing /bcom ldan 'das
49a1(mdo sde): nyid kyi sku las 'od zer rnams byung bar gyur to//de nas dge slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das kyi cho 'phrul bsam gyis mi khyab cing rmad du byung ba 'di
49a2(mdo sde): lta bu mthong ba na ngo mtshar skyes te/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la zhus pa/btsun pa rgyu ma mchis rkyen mchis par ni/de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par
49a3(mdo sde): rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams 'di lta bu'i rmod du byung ba'i cho 'phrul ston par mi mdzad na/btsun pa 'di lta bu'i cho 'phrul gyi rgyu gang lags/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka'
49a4(mdo sde): skyel pa/dge slong dag cho 'phrul 'di byung ba'i rgyu mnyan par 'dod dam/btsun pa de ltar 'tshal lo//dge slong dag de'i phyir legs par rab tu nyon la yid la zung shig
49a5(mdo sde): dang ngas bshad par bya'o//dge slong dag sngon byung ba 'das pa'i dus na/rgyal po'i pho brang a ri shA zhes bya ba/'byor pa/rgyas pa bde ba lo legs pa/skye bo mang po dang
49a6(mdo sde): mis gang ba/'tshur dpag tshad bcu gnyis/zheng du dpag tshad bdun pa/gru bzhi pa rnam par 'byes pa/gdugs dang /rgyal mtshan dang /ba don dang /rta
49a7(mdo sde): babs bsgreng ba byung bar gyur te/rgyal po'i pho brang der rgyal po dpal gyi sde zhes bya ba stobs kyis 'khor lo sgyur ba/gzugs bzong ba/mdzes pa lta na sdug pa/kha
49b1(mdo sde): dog bzang po rgyas pa/mchog dang ldan pa/rang bzhin gyis skye ba dran pa/chos dang ldan pa/chos kyi rgyal po/chos kyis 'dzam bu'i gling gi dbang phyug gi bdag po byed pa zhig byung bar
49b2(mdo sde): gyur to//rgyal po dpal gyi sde'i mthus shing rnams rtag tu me tog dang /'bras bur ldan zhing lha rnams dus dus su ma ma yang dag par 'bebs la/lo tog shin tu phun sum tshogs
49b3(mdo sde): par gyur to//sems can rnams kyang nad med par gyur te/sems can thams cad kyang phan pa dang byams pa'i sems kyis gnaso//rgyal po de'i btsun mo dam pa rgyal ba'i 'od ces bya
49b4(mdo sde): bgazugs bzang ba/mdzes pa blta na sdug pa/yan lag dang nying lag thams cad tshang ba/yul gyi bzang mo/rgyal po dpal gyi sde'i shin tu yid du 'ong ba dang /sdug pa
49b5(mdo sde): dang phangs pa zhig byung bar gyur to//dge slong dag rgyal po dpal gyi sde'i 'dzam bu'i gling gi mi thams cad la dpya dang /sho gam dang /gru btsas med de/zhing gi 'byor pa dang
49b6(mdo sde): ldan pa/skye bo rnams zhi ba/khyim pa rnams dang ldan pa'i yul dang /grong khyer dang /grong rdal dang /yul 'khor dang /rgyal po'i pho brang byung bar gyur to//dge slong dag
49b7(mdo sde): rgyal po dpal gyi sde byang chub sems dpar gyur te/thod ste ga thaMd yongasu gtong ba//chags pa med par yongasu gtong ba dang /gtong ba chen po la zhugs nas tha na rang gi sha yang
50a1(mdo sde): gtong ste/des ma byin pa dang /yongasu ma btang ba ci yang med do//dge slong dag rgyal po dpal gyi sde'i rgyal po'i pho brang a ri shA'i shar phyogs kyi grong
50a2(mdo sde): khyer gyi mthar sbyin gtong gi gnas byas te/sbyin pa ni gtong /bsod nams ni byed do//lho dang /nub dang /byang gi gling khyer gyi sgor sbyin pa ni gtong bsod nams ni
50a3(mdo sde): byed do//su mo mdo'i dbus na yang sbyin pa ni gtong /bsod nams ni byed do//'di ltar zas 'dod pa rnams la ni zas/skom 'dod pa rnams la ni skom/bza' ba dang /bca'
50a4(mdo sde): ba dang /mar me dang /'phreng ba dang /dri dang byug pa dang /gos dang /mal cha dang /stan dang /rgya brten dang /gnas dang /gzugs rnams dang /shing rta dang //
50a5(mdo sde): glang po dang /rta dang rgyan rnams dang /gser gyi snod dngul gyi phye mas yongasu gang ba rnams dang /dngul gyi snod gser gyi phye mas yongasu gang ba rnams dang /ba lang gser
50a6(mdo sde): g+hi ra dang /dngul gyi rmig pa brtags pa/khar ba'i bzhi snod dang /ras zung gis bkab pa rnams dang /gzhon nu ma rnams dang /rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan nas
50a7(mdo sde): sbyin pa ni gtong /bsod nams ni byed de/dge slong dag ci tsam du rgyal po'i dpal gyi sdes ci tsam gyis 'dzam bu gling po'i mi thams cad phyug pa dang /nor mong ba dang /
50b1(mdo sde): longs spyod che bar gyur pa de tsam du sbyin pa rnams sbyin no//yang de'i tshe rgyal po'i pho brang a ris shA'i grong khyer na bye ba phrag dgu bcu rtsa drug gi mi rnams gnas te/rgyal po dpal gyi sde de/
50b2(mdo sde): dag thams cad kyi sdug pa dang /yid du 'ong bar gyur to//gzhan yang 'di skyes pa dang /bud med rnams kyis mthong ba na/ngoms par mi 'gyur pa'i dga' ba thob po//dge slong
50b3(mdo sde): dag rgyal po dpal gyi sde'i blon po stong phrag bcu gnyis yod de/blon po de rnams kyi mchog blo gros chen po zhes bya ba/mkhas pa gsal ba/blo dang ldan pa/thams cad la
50b4(mdo sde): dbang byed pa/rgyal po yongasu skyob par byed pa/rgyal po dpal gyi sde'i sdug pa dang /yid du 'ong ba dang /phangs par gyur pa zhig byung bar gyur to//des 'di'i gzugs dang
50b5(mdo sde): kha dog dang /rtogs dang /dbyibs mthong ba na/ngoms pa med/skad cig kyang 'dri dang mi 'bral lo//dge slong dag rgyal po dpal gyi sdes 'jam bu'i gling gi mi thams cad
50b6(mdo sde): dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam la yang dag par sbyar te//shes ldan dag 'dzam bu'i gling gi mi rnams dge ba bcu'i las kyi lA ma rnams lnga rten cig/dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam
50b7(mdo sde): 'di rnams yang dag par zung shig ces dge bo bcu'i las kyi lam la yang dag par sbyor te/dge slong dag rgyal po dpal gyi sde de lta bu'i gdams ngag rje su ston par gyur to//
51a1(mdo sde): // / nal po ga gnas sa ma gung m+b+ha sa b+h+yas te/ nags r+b+huts+tsha bdUSh+Tar+yAn
51a2(mdo sde): gang phal cher ni sum cu rtsa gsum gyi lha'i rigasu skyes//yang de'i tshe sum cu rtsa gsum gyi lha rnams kyi lha'i grong khyer blta na sdug ces bya ba lha'i tshogs kyis kun tu gang ngo //de
51a3(mdo sde): nas der go skabs med par gyur pa dang /blta na sdug gi/phyi rol yongasu 'du dang /shing rta sna tshogs can dang /dga' bo'i tshe la la sogs pa'i skyed mos tshul rnamasu gnas
51a4(mdo sde): par gyur to//de nas sngon skyes pa'i sum cu rtsa gsum gyi lha'i tshogs kyis yang dag pa'i 'byor pa de mthong ste/rab tu dga' nas lha'i dbang po brgya byon la 'dri skad ces smras//
51a5(mdo sde): ko'u shi ka gang du re'i rgyal po ri rab de nyid/lha'i bu de dag gis gang ste/lha'i tshogs ni 'phel bar 'gyur/lha ma yin gyi tshogs ni 'grib par 'gyur ba'i ngo mtshar 'di dag
51a6(mdo sde): gzig so//de nas lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis lha'i bu rnams las thos nas/ri'i rgyal po ri rab thams cad lnga blta bar bsams pa dang /ci tsa ma na ri'i rgyal po ri rab
51a7(mdo sde): lha'i tshogs rnams kyis kun nas gang bo mthong ngo //mthong nas kyang 'di snyam du sems s+ho/rgyu gang dang rkyen gang gis sems can 'di snyed cig 'dir skyes par gyur snyam nas
51b1(mdo sde): 'dzam bu'i gling thams cad la blta ba brtsams pa dang /tsitsa man+t+ra rgyal po dpal gyis sde'i mthu'i yin par mdzong ngo // nasad+h+rU'i dbang po brgya byin sems rab tu dga' byas sum nan/
51b2(mdo sde): gsum g+hi lha rnams la smras pa/grogs po dag khyed rnams nyen cig/'dzem bu gling dbang phyug rgyal po'i//dpal gyi sde zhes rnam grags po//rtag tu chos la gzhol ba dang /
51b3(mdo sde): rgyal po chen po chos la gnas//thog ma bar dang mthar dge zhing //sems can kun la phan par dga'//gtso bo mi rnams dge ba la//rtag tu yang drug sbyor bar byed//rtag
51b4(mdo sde): tu snying rje'i bdag nyid can//phyi rol dngos por rab gtong zhing /de'i sha yang slong ba la//rje su brtse ba nyid kyis ster//nang ngam yang na phyi rol la//de ni yongasu 'dzin med par//
51b5(mdo sde): rjes brtse nyid kyisku gtong byed cing //byang chub mthar dbyung ba lnga brtson//des ni rnam dag gser bzhin du//'gro ba thams cad rab skabs pas//rgyal po de yis mthu yis ni//
51b6(mdo sde): thams cad mtho ris lnga gzhi la 'gyur//rgyal po blo gros che de yi/mthu yis su yang dmyal ba dang /yi dgas deng ni dud 'gro yi//skye gnas rnams sgra mi 'gyur//de yi
51b7(mdo sde): gzi brjid mthu yis ni//thams cad snang bar 'gro ba dang //sbyin dang tshul khrims dga' 'gyur bar//dga' bi 'tshal na dga' bas rtse//dpal gyi sde la rjes bstan par//
52a1(mdo sde): gus dang bcas par gyur pa 'di//lha yi 'jig rten nyams dga' bar//de yang dga' ba rnam par snang //de nas sum cu rtsa gsum gyi lha de rnams kyis tshig
52a2(mdo sde): thos pa dang /yid dga' ba dang /sems par gyur te/dga' ba'i semasu gyur cing /'di skad ces kyang smraso//gang rgyal po 'di yan lag dang nying lag kyang sbyin par gtong 'dod
52a3(mdo sde): bapar rtsol ba ni ngo mtshar che'o//'on kyang 'di ltar yan lag dang nying lag ster ba 'di ni dka' ba ste/bdag dang mnyam par phangs pa gzhan med pas/de ci ltar na bdag nyid chen po
52a4(mdo sde): 'di rang gi lus kyi sdug bsngal ba la mi sems par yan lag dang nying lag sbyin par gtong bar gyur te/'di ni rjesu dpag par nus pa ma yin no//brgya byin gyis smras pa/grogs/
52a5(mdo sde): po dag khyed rnams de skad ma smre shig/rgyal po 'di ni mthu che ste/rdzu 'phrul cho ba/snying rje che bas tha na rang gi sha yang gtong ste/'di la yongasu ma btang ba ci yang med do//ci tsam ni dus
52a6(mdo sde): gzhan zhig gi tshe/btsun mo rgyal ba'i 'od snyan chen po la nyal ba na/tho ras kyi dus su rmi lam bzhi rmis te/dpal gyi bstan las bdag nyid phub nas slar yang bteg par mthong
52a7(mdo sde): ba dang /rang gis mig phyung ste/slar yang skyes par mthong ba dang bdag nyid kyi dpung pa g.yas pa 'di bcad des la ltung ba yang skyes par mthong ba dang /mi ma yin pa dngul
52b1(mdo sde): gyi rdo bcag pa'i mdog 'dra ba zhig gis rgyal po dpal gyi sde'i dpung pa g.yon pa mod la phyung ste/phrogs nas slar yang skye bar rmi so//gnyid sad pa dang /'jigs par gyur/spu zing zhes
52b2(mdo sde): byed de/nga'am lha la sdug bsngal 'ba'o shig 'byung bar mi 'gyur grang zhes bsams nas/des rgyal po dpal gyi sde la smraso//de rmis ltas la byang ba yin pas 'di snyam du sems te/
52b3(mdo sde): 'dis rmi lam ji lta bu mthong ba las na/ring po mi thogs par chung ma 'di nyid slong ba 'byung bar 'gyuraro snyam nas/smras pa/ma 'jigs shig/sgyu ma lta bu'i rmi lam sems pas ci
52b4(mdo sde): zhig bya/dpal gyi stan la bdag nyid gnas par khyod kyis ma mthong ngam/mig mi nyams par de bzhin du 'dug pa dang /bdag nyid kyi dpung pa g.yas pa de bzhin du yod pa dang /
52b5(mdo sde): nga'i yang dpung pa g.yon pa gnas bzhin pa nyid ces des dbugs phyung ba dang /cang mi smra bar 'dug/ci tsam na mtshan mo gnyis pa la blon po'i mchog blo gros chen po zhes bya ba'i rmi lam
52b6(mdo sde): du rgyal po dpal gyi sde'i rin po che thams cad las byas pa'i khang bzangs mod la zhig pa dang /rin po che de rnams sha za mthong na 'jig su rung ba rnams kyis phan tshun khyer pa dang /slar
52b7(mdo sde): yang khang bzangs so ser sbyar bar rmi so//sad pa dang /'jigs shing skrag pa dang /yi mug ste spu zing zhes byed pa dang /bsams pa sems can thams cad la mnyes gshin
53a1(mdo sde): pa dang /lha dpal gyi sde'i sku lus slong bar mi 'gyur glang /lha yang thams cad stsol ba/thams cad yongasu gtong ba/chags pa med par gtong ste/'di lta ste/
53a2(mdo sde): dman pa dang /long ba dang /bkres pa dang /sdug phongs pa rnams la 'di yongasu mi gtong ba ci yang med do//rgyal po dpal gyi snga la ni zhu bar mi bya ste/shin tu smra ba skye bar ma
53a3(mdo sde): 'gyur grang /de nas des gsang ste mtshan mkhan bos nas/dam bsgo ste zhes smras pa/shes ldan ngas 'di lta bu'i rmi lam rmis pa'i 'bras bu ji lta bur 'gyur ba khyod kyis lung
53a4(mdo sde): ston cig/mtshan mkhan gyis smras pa/rmi lam ci 'dra ba'i dri las ring po mi thogs par lha'i sku las slong ba 'ong bar 'gyur ro//rmi lam bstan pa 'di lta bu de thos pa dang /blon po
53a5(mdo sde): chen po blo gros chen po sdug bsngal drag pos gdungs shing /mig mchi mas gang ba dang /lag pa 'gram pa la gtad ti/sems khongasu chud pas gnas nas/dpal gyi sde byams
53a6(mdo sde): pa dang /snying rje'i bdag nyid can sems can thams cad la mnyes gshin pa/yon tan du ma dang ldan pa la/mi rtag pa'i stobs nye bar gnas pa ni ha cang myur cheso//de nas nub/
53a7(mdo sde): gsum pa la blon po stong phrag bcu gnyis la rmi lam rmis te/khri yis rgyal po dpal gyi sde'i gdugs dang cod pan phrogs te/slar yang byin pa dang /skye bo thams cad kyi
53b1(mdo sde): mgo bcad nas slar yang byung ba dang /'dzam bu'i gling gi mi thams cad kyi mig phyung nas slar yang skyes pa dang /'dzam bu'i gling gi mi thams cad kyi rkang pa dang lag pa rnams bcad
53b2(mdo sde): nas slar yang skyes pa dang /rgyal po dpal gyi sde sang+ge'i khri las babs nas slar yang 'dzeg par rtsom par rmis pa dang /'jigs shing skrag la yi mug nas/rgyal po dpal gyi
53b3(mdo sde): sdes chen po skyong bar mdzad pa/byams pa'i bdag nyid can snying rje che ba/sems can thams cad la mnyes gshin pa la mi rtag pa'i stobs nye bar gnas par mi 'gyur grang
53b4(mdo sde): bdag cag rnams lha dang lhan cig gnas pa las tha dad par gyur pa dang /so so ba dang /bral ba dang /bye bar mi 'gyur grang 'dzam bu'i gling pa'i skyabs dang dpung gnyen med/
53b5(mdo sde): par mi 'gyur grang /de rnams kyis mtshan mkhan rnams bos nas smras pa dang /de rnams kyis ci tsam na thams cad 'di bzhin du 'gyur zhes lung bstan to//'di lta bu'i
53b6(mdo sde): rmi lam bstan pa thos pa dang /grong khyer a ris shwA na gnas pa'i skye bo'i tshogs rnams nyams thag pa'i nga ros ngu bar brtsams//thos pa gcig nas gcig tu brgyud pas/
53b7(mdo sde): 'dzam bu gling ba'i mi thams cad mya ngan drag po'i sdug bsngal gyis ba tsam nas/shin tu smre sngags 'don par gyur to//de ltar gyur pa de rgyal po dpal gyis sngas thos//
54a1(mdo sde): thos nas kyang yang bsams pa de'i lus slong bar 'gyur snyam nas sems rab tu dga' ba dang /mgu bar gyur to//shes ldan dag 'dzam bu'i gling gi mi khyed
54a2(mdo sde): rnams bde ba dang phebs pas dge ba la gzhol bar gyis shig khyed rnams sgyu mA lta bu'i rmi lam la sems ngas ci zhig bya zhes 'dzam bu'i gling pa thams cad du dril bsgrags//
54a3(mdo sde): nas rgyal po dpal gyi sdes dril bsgrags pa de thos pa dang /'dzam bu gling pa'i mi thams cad dbugs phyin par gyur to//yang de'i tshe de'i dus na rgyal po'i pho brang a ris shwa'i
54a4(mdo sde): byang phyogs rgyang grags ce mo gyis si phyogs na ri bo zhig yod de/de na drang srong lnga brgya tsa mu gnas//ci tsam na dus gzhan zhig gi tshe de rnams kyi don du 'jug pa drang srod cig
54a5(mdo sde): don gyi bya ba 'go' zhig gi phyir/rgyal po'i pho brang a ris shAr 'ongaso//yang dus de'i tshe rgyal po dpal gyi sde lha mo rgyal ba'i 'od dang lhan cig tu nang du zhugs nas skyed mos
54a6(mdo sde): tshal gyi sar song ngo //drang srong des rgyal ba dang tshwa ring ba'i brjod pa byas pa dang /drang srong des lha mo rgyal ba'i 'od rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa mthong ste/'di ltar de'i skye ba
54a7(mdo sde): snga ma'i chung mar gyur pa yang yin pas/sngon gyi chags pa dang 'brel pa'i dbang gis tshul bzhin ma yin pa'i yid la byed pa skyes par gyur te/de yid la sems shing lom
54b1(mdo sde): dedri nag sang ste lam de nas 'dus pa dang /ci tsam na drang srong de rgyal po'i pho brang grong khyer a ris shwar bya ba 'am/byed pa thams cad byas te yongasu rdzogs pa dang /bsti gan su song //
54b2(mdo sde): ci tsam na dus gzhan zhig gi tshe drang srong des bram ze'i khye'u gcig rig byed 'don pa yongasu rdzogs pa dang /mkhan po'i rkang pa la gtugs nas smras pa/mkhan po la nor ci lta bu/
54b3(mdo sde): dbul bar bgyi/mkhan pos bka' stsol cig/drang srong gis smras pa/de bas na bu rgyal po dpal gyi sde'i btsun mo'i mchog btsun mo rgyal ba'i 'od slongs la nga'i bsnyen
54b4(mdo sde): bkur bya ba dang /mkhan po la mkhan po'i nor dang /bla ma la mchod par bya ba'i phyir byin cig/de skad ces smras pa dang /bram ze'i khye'u de gnad du bsnun pa'i ri dgas bzhin
54b5(mdo sde): du sdug bsngal drag pos gdungs te mchog tu yi mug pa dang /bsams pa glo nas 'di ni 'byung bar dka' ba dang /rnyed par dka' na ji ltar yang bram ze nyon mongs bdag lta bus
54b6(mdo sde): rgyal po la btsun mo rgyal ba'i 'od 'di byin cig ces ji ltar smra bar nus/'di ltar bslang bar bya ba ma yin pa'i dngos po 'di la kun tu sbyor ba gang yin pa des na/mkhan po des
54b7(mdo sde): por bdag la dmod po byed par 'dod pa yin no//de nas drang srong das de'i bzhin rnam par 'gyur bas nang gi bsam pa rtogs nas smras pa/bu ma 'jigs shig/ji ltar na sems
55a1(mdo sde): 'di ltar khongasu chud/rgyal po 'di ni bdag nyid che ba/thams cad ster pa/thams cad yongasu gtong zhing /chags pa med par gtong bas/tha na rang gi
55a2(mdo sde): sha yang gtong ste/'di la yongasu ma gtang ba ci yang med do//bu des na rgyal pos btsun mo'i mchog ster bar 'gyur gyis/yi mug par ma byed cig/de 'di snyam du sems te/
55a3(mdo sde): gal te ma song na ni/gang dmod pa byed pa'i gnas te yod pas 'gro snyam nas/de dmod pas 'jigs pas smras pa/mkhan po gal te de ltar na mchi'o zhes des de'i rkang pa la/
55a4(mdo sde): btugs nas song ste/rgyal po'i pho brang a ris shwar phyin to//de bzhin du shing shun gyis gos gyon zhing dbyig pa dang ril ba lag na thogs la/sa rdul gyis lus la gos pa
55a5(mdo sde): dang /rgyal po dpal gyi sngo ga la ba der srong ste phyin nas/rgyal po dpal gyi sde la rgyal ba dang tshe spel ba byas nas/bsams pa/ci bslangs dam 'on te mi bslang/ster bar
55a6(mdo sde): 'gyur ram mi ster bar 'gyur/nga'i yid la re ba 'bras bu dang bcas par 'gyur ram/'bras bu med par 'gyur snyam nas/bdag nyid smod bzhin du rgyal po'i mdun na
55a7(mdo sde): sman pa'i bzhin gyis ci mi smra bar 'dug/de nas rgyal po dpal gyi sdes bsams pa/'di ni nga la slong du 'ongaso snyam nas bram ze'i khye'u de la 'di skad ces smros//bram ze khyod
55b1(mdo sde): kyi dgongs pa gang yin pa smros/de rang khyod kyi yid la re ba yongasu rdzogs par bya'o//de skad ces smras pa dang /bram ze'i khye'u de mi 'jigs pa skyes nas/byang chub sems dpa' la smras
55b2(mdo sde): pa/de legs lha rig ge mo na bdag gi mkhan po drang srong 'don tu 'jug pa 'khor lnga brgya dang gnas te/de las bdag gis rigs byed 'don pa yongasu rdzogs pas/rgyal po chen po
55b3(mdo sde): dathugs rtse bas btsun mo rgyal ba'i 'od bdag la stsol cig/mkhan po la mkhan po'i nor dang bla ma la mchod pa'i phyir bdag gis mkhan po la dbul bar bgyi'o//de skad ces smras pa
55b4(mdo sde): dang /rgyal po dpal gyi sde brtse ba'i dbang gis yid mi dga' bar gyur te/btsun mo rgyal ba'i 'od 'di nga dang bral ni ji ltar srog 'dzin par nus/'khor de dag thams cad rgya mtsho zab
55b5(mdo sde): mo'i sgra mo g.yo ba dang /gnad du bsnun pa bzhin du sdug bsngal drag pos gdungs pas brtabs bag tu 'di ci zhes skyo bas rab tu gdungaso//de nas byang chub sems dpas skad cig cad
55b6(mdo sde): mi smra bar gnas te/bsams pa/bu dang chung ma la sogs pa/byin pa med pas ni bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub 'thob par mi 'gyur ro//de'i phyir bram ze 'di
55b7(mdo sde): la dga' bas chung ma 'di sbyin par bya'o snyam du bsams nas/gnyen sdug pa dang bral bas zhum pa'i sems yang dag par blangs te/'bral du seng+ge'i khri las babs nas byang chub tu
56a1(mdo sde): smon pa'i sems kyis btsun mo rgyal ba'i 'od lha'i bu mo bzhin du rnam par mdzes pa/khyo dang bral ba'i gdung bas shin tu dbugs ring po phyung ste/mchi mas gang
56a2(mdo sde): ba'i mig dang /mun par g.yang sa chen por lhung ba bzhin du/mchog tu sdug bsngal bas gdong phab pa/lag pa g.yon pas bzung ste/lag pa g.yas pas gser gyi bum pa thogs
56a3(mdo sde): nas/bram ze'i khye'u nga la 'di skad ces smras//bram ze chen po tshur shog/bram ze'i dam pa gzugs bzang ba/sdug pa'i chung ma 'di long shig/sbyin pa 'di yis myur du ni//byang
56a4(mdo sde): chub dam pa thob par shog/ces smras nas/byang chub sems dpas bram ze de'i lag par chu'i rgyun blug so//de nas yang dge slong dag rgyal po dpal gyi sdes chu'i rgyun blugs pa'i
56a5(mdo sde): rjes thogs nyid la/de'i tshe 'phral du sa rnam pa drug tu g.yos par gyur to//de nas bram ze'i khye'u des byang chub sems dpa'i gtong ba dang /gtong ba las kyang shin tu gtong ba/
56a6(mdo sde): shin tu dka' ba de mthong ba dang /mchog tu ngo mtshar skyes//nam mkha'i ngos na gnas pa'i lha brgyad stong rnams kyis kyang ca co'i sgra bton to//de ma thag tu yang skar mda' ltung ba dang /
56a7(mdo sde): phyogs 'bar ba dang /bar snang gyi lha yang rnga rdung bar gyur to//de nas bram ze'i khye'u de rgyal ba'i gyod par ma gyur grang snyam nas/byang chub sems dpa' la mngon par bstod de
56b1(mdo sde): bde leg pu gyur cig ces smras nas/btsun mo'i rgyal ba'i 'od khyer te/rings pa rings par bsti gnasu song ste mkhan po la byin pa dang /btsun mo rgyal ba'i 'od nya chu las bton pa bzhin
56b2(mdo sde): dusdug pa dang bral ba'i sdug bsngal drag pos gdungs shing nyam thag pa dang /byang chub sems dpa' nyid la mngon par sems shing 'gro ba thams cad mun pa mun nag tu gyur pa bzhin du
56b3(mdo sde): shes shing /kyi dud rgyal po zhes mchog tu gdung ba'i sems dang zas btsang pa la zhug so//sa g.yos pa nges brgya byin gyi gnas g.yos par gyur to//chas nyid kyis lha rnams kyi
56b4(mdo sde): shes pa 'og tu mthong ba 'jug gi gong du ni ma yin no//de nas lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis bsams pa/shin tu grags par sa g.yos pa//mtshan ma 'di ni su'i mthu yin//gang gi
56b5(mdo sde): mthu ni ci 'dra ba//shin tu gsal bar 'di shes bya//'dzam bu gling thams cad la blta bar brtsams pa dang /ci tsam na byang chub sems dpa' 'di lta bu mchog tu dka' ba'i las
56b6(mdo sde): byed pa mthong ngo //mthong nas kyang mchog tu ngo mtshor skye ste/sum cu rtsa gsum gyi lha rnams la smras pa/grogs po dag khyod cag rnams rgyal po dpal gyi sde'i ngo mcher dang rmad du byung
56b7(mdo sde): ba'i las la ltos/gang zhig 'di ltar sdug pa dang 'di ltar yid du 'ong ba dang /'di ltar 'phangs pa'i chung ma la mi sems te/rtsa bzhin du yongasu gtong ngo //grogs po dag rnam
57a1(mdo sde): grangs des kyang 'di ltar shes par bya ste/bdag nyid chen po 'di rang gi yan lag dung nyid lagu rnams kyang 'brangs pa med par gnod pa yin no//sna rnams kyis
57a2(mdo sde): smras pa/ko& shi kra bu dang bu mo ni de bas yid su gtong bar byed kyi/'di lta ste/yan lag dang nying lag sbyor ba 'di ni dang bar bya ba yin te/shin tu dka'o//de skad ces smras pa dang /
57a3(mdo sde): lho'i dbang po brgya byin gyis smras pa/grogs pa dag zhog zhog spu'i rtse mo chu'i thigs pas rgya mtsho ma gzhal cig/na mkha' 'dom gyis ma gzhal cig/nyi ma dang srin bu me khyer
57a4(mdo sde): 'ad ma snyam cig/ri'i rgyal po ri rab dang yungs 'brur ma skyem cig/gzhan yang ngas khyed cag rnams kyis mngon sum du bya yis/de nas lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis de nyid kyi rnam
57a5(mdo sde): nangs pa na sum cu rtsa gsum gyi lha rnams la smras paM/kye ma'o grogs po dag shes par gyis shig ces smras te/nang par nyid langs nas/lha'i bu bzhi dang sum cu rtsa gsum gyi
57a6(mdo sde): gnas las babaso te/grong khyer a ri shwA dang mI ring po'i nags kyi tshang tshing du zhugs nas/bram ze rgan po'i cha byang du byas te/rang gi lus kyi lte ba man chad sog les bcang
57a7(mdo sde): pab bzhin ston cing /kun nas khrag 'dzag pa khri la bskyon nas/lha'i bu bzhi bram ze'i cha byad 'dzin pas pa dang bral po'i sdug bsngal gyis nyams thag pa ltar nyam thag pa'i nga
57b1(mdo sde): ros cho nges 'debs shing btegs par mngon par sprul te/nga'i lus 'di'i phyed stag gis bcad de zos so zhes 'di ltar bstan par bya'o snyam nas yid la bsams pa/nyi ma shar ba'i dus su nags
57b2(mdo sde): tshang tshing de nas byung te/grong khyer du mngon par phyogs nas kun tu chas//khrag gi drid la yang steng nas khwa dang chu sbyar dang /bya rgod rnams rje su 'breng ngo //'og nas kyang khyi dang lnga rnams
57b3(mdo sde): rjesu 'breng bzhin du rings pa renges par grong khyer gyi sgor song ngo //de yang 'di ltar snying rje'i gnasu gyur pa/skyes pa dang bud med rnams kyis mthong nas snying rjes gdungs pa'i yid kyis gcig
57b4(mdo sde): la gcig smra ba/grogs po dag bram ze 'di rked par chad nas/'di'i dbang po yang 'khrugs pa ji ltar 'tshe bar gyur/gzhan zhig gis smras pa/'di mi ma yin gyi sha za mi'i cha
57b5(mdo sde): byad kyis bdag cag bza' ba'i phyir 'dir 'ongs kyi/mi rked par chad pa ni 'tshe ba med//de skad ces thos pa dang /skyes bu snga ma ni 'jigs pas bros par brtsomaso//skyes bu dpa'
57b6(mdo sde): gzhan zhig 'di snyam du 'di ni sha za zhig ste/da lta na yang tsher bas nyan bzhin du 'di ltar dbang po rnams bde bar snang na de ji lta bu yin/bdag gis 'di la mi ma yin nam sha
57b7(mdo sde): zar gyur pa yin par dri bar byas na 'dis tshig thon par dka' mod kyi/gal te tshig thon na ni ngo mtshal du 'gyur ro//ci tsam na gzhan zhig ltad mo skyes nas smras pa/bram ze khyod kyi
58a1(mdo sde): mi yin nam 'on te sha za yin khyod kyi lus 'di med par susu bcad na gnas skabs 'di lta bur byas/khyod ni ga las 'ongs/de nas lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis
58a2(mdo sde): bdag nyid 'di ltar khri'i steng du 'dug cig sdug bsngal drag po'i tshor bas nyan pa bzhin du nye bar ston cing /der tshe tshigasu bcang ba 'di dag smraso//shi bi pa khyed ma 'jigs shig/
58a3(mdo sde): bram ze yin srin bu min//sngon gyi las kyi nyes pa yis//gnas skabs 'di 'dra thab par gyur//'di nyid du ni kun bshad na//dus ni kun tu 'da' bar 'gyur//'chi bdag
58a4(mdo sde): myur du 'ongs nas ni//srog ni 'brog par 'gyur du 'ong //chos kyi rgyal po'i spyan sngar ni//'di dag kun kyang bshad par bya//sngon gyi las kyi mtshan nyid ni//de ring nga la 'bras
58a5(mdo sde): bcas gyur//yon tan kun gyis rnam mdzes la//zla ba lta bur zhi ba dang //sbyin dang tshul khrims la dga' ba'i//gtso bo gang du mthong bar 'gyur//rgya mtsho bzhin du zab gyur/
58a6(mdo sde): cing //ri rab lta bur mi g.yo ba//'jig rten kun gyi gtsor gyur pa//chos kyi rgyal po gang na bzhugs//'jigs shing skrag pa rnams kyi skyabs//slong ba rnams kyi bgrong bya'o
58a7(mdo sde): mchog/snyan sgra sbyin dang tshul khrims ldan//bdag nyid tshe de gang na bzhugs//bdag 'dun 'chi ba nyer 'od shig/shi bi pa rnams myur du smos//thugs rje can de ma gtogs/
58b1(mdo sde): par//nga la lus byed su zhig ster//de ltar rgyal po'i lam nas snying rje ba dang //dman pa dang zhum pa'i tshig smra zhing rim gyis rgyal po dpal gyi sde'i pho blang skor song ba dang /srog chags brgya
58b2(mdo sde): stong du ma rnams kyang ngo mtshar skyes nas rjes bzhin 'brangaso//yang bar skabs der lha dang /klu dang /gnod sbyin dang /lA ma yin dang /mamakha' lding dang /mi 'am ci dang /lto 'phye
58b3(mdo sde): chen po'i tshogs rnams kyis/nga rgyal po dpal gyi sde'i phyis 'byung ba'i rlud pa chen po de dang /lus kyi tshor ba drag po de shes nas/sdug bsngal drag pos gdungs te/chongs 'dabs
58b4(mdo sde): pa la zhugaso//kyi hud rgyal po dpal gyi sde byams pa'i bdog nyid dang //snying rje dang ldan pa/sems can la mnyos gshin pa/mi rtag pa nyid kyi stobs nye bar gnas pa ni sdug bsngalo///
58b5(mdo sde): de thos pa dang /skye bo'i tshogs rnams smre sngags 'don par gyur to//yang de'i tshe 'dzam bu gling thams cad 'khrugs shing /kun tu 'khrugs par gyur pa dang /du bas mun par gyur
58b6(mdo sde): pa la skar mda' ltung ba dang /phyogs bsreg pa dang /bar snang la lha rnams rnga rdung bar yang gyur to//yang de'i tshe ra la gnas pa'i drang srong des btsun mo rgyal ba'i 'od 'di ltar khyod dang bral
58b7(mdo sde): ba'i gdung bas dbugs shin tu ring por 'byin cing zas mi ze la/'du shes med par mthong nas snyed rjes sems 'dar nas bsams pa/ma la ngas rgyal po dpal gyi sde la dbul
59a1(mdo sde): bar bya'o snyam nas/btsun mo rgyal ba'i 'od dbugs phyung ngo //'dzam bu'i gling thams cad 'khrugs shing kun tu 'khrugs par yang mthong ngo //mthong nas kyang
59a2(mdo sde): yang bram ze'i khye'u la smras pa/bram ze'i bu 'di ltar 'dzam bu'i gling 'di phyogs thams cad du bas mun par gyur la/'khrugs shing kun tu 'khrugs pa dang /nyi ma dang zla ba
59a3(mdo sde): gnyis kyang lam me ma yin/lhang nge ma yin/lhan ne ma yin pas nges par na 'dzam bu'i gling 'dir yun mi ring ba nyid du skyes bu chen po 'ga' zhig 'gag par 'gyur ro//de nas
59a4(mdo sde): de'i tshe drang srong des tshigasu bcad de smras pa/mi 'am ci'i tshigs dang nags kyi lha rnams du//na mkhar gnas pa'i lha rnams kyang ni smon par byed//zla ba 'od med nyi mas mun pa
59a5(mdo sde): sel mi byed//de ring rol mo brdungs na sgra mi grags pa gyur//shing tshegs me tog 'bras bur ldan pa 'di dag kyang //rlung gis bskyod pa bzhin du sa la lhung 'gyur la//ji lta
59a6(mdo sde): 'jigs shing rtsub pa'i sgra kun grags pas na//grong khyer dag tu sdug bsngal mi bzad 'byung bar gsal//grong khyer a ris shA ni gnas dga'i skye bo 'di kun shin tu sdug bsngal
59a7(mdo sde): zhing //phan tshun so sore mya ngan zug rngus des bcom sgo rnams rab tu grol ba bzhin//zla ba lta bu'i bzhin ldan bud med 'di dag khang pa'i mchog na smre sngags 'don//'di ni mi dge
59b1(mdo sde): drag pos rab tu ngu//de dang der ni dur khrod 'jigs bzhin no//na mkhar gnas pa'i sprin 'di chu med par sgra sgrogs//sa la gnas pa'i chu rnams kyang ni skams par gyur//rma bya rnams kyang
59b2(mdo sde): nags kyis bcom bzhin sgra bsgrags te//mi rnams kyang ni 'khrugs bcas khyim du rnam par rgyu//chu la rlung gis bskyod pas gru bzhin sa rnams g.yos//phyag dar dang 'dres rlung ni mkha'
59b3(mdo sde): la rab tu lding //a ris shwe ni 'jigs skyed mtshan ma mngal bas ni//bram ze khye'u 'di las kyi rjes 'thun yul du dong //bkra mi shis pa'i mtshan ma ni//de ltar 'di na rnam meng ste//
59b4(mdo sde): de bas bdag cag shis pa yi//phyogasu 'gro ba shin tu rigs//bram ze'i khye'u rnams gzhan yang ji ltar shing 'di dag thams cad rgyal po'i pho brang a ris shA ga la ba der 'dud
59b5(mdo sde): par gyur/de bas na kye ma bram ze'i khye'u rnams nges par de nyid rgyal po'i pho brang a ris shwar nye bar 'tshe ba dang /gnod pa'i 'jigs pa chen po 'byung bar 'gyur ro//de nas
59b6(mdo sde): byang chub sems dpa' steng gi khang bzangs kyi gzhi la gnas pas skye bo'i tshogs chun po'i tshe de'i sgra thos pa dang /rings pa rings par rin po che'i byas pa'i khang bzangs las babs nas/
59b7(mdo sde): seng ge'i khri chen po la 'dug ste/shin tu rtangs bag gis shes ldan dag 'di ci yin 'di ci yin zhes dris so//bar skabs der lha'i dbang po brgya byin lha'i bu bzhi po de rnams kyis
60a1(mdo sde): 'phral du rgyal po'i khab tu khyer te/mod la khri sa'i steng du bzhag pa dang /khri la bskyon pa lus kyi phyed bcad pa de las khrag kun nas 'dzag cing rab tu 'dzag pa dang //
60a2(mdo sde): lag pa g.yas pa brkyang ste/snying rje rje skad du byang chub sems dpa' rgyal ba dang /tshe spel ba byas nas mchi mas khengs pa'i mig dang /rang gi lus kyi phyed nye bar ston cing /byang chub
60a3(mdo sde): sems dpa' la smras pa/'jig rten na khyod snying rje can//gzhan gyi sdug bsngal gyis sdug bsngal//nyid kyi sku'i phyed stsal pas//gtso bo bdag ni skyab du gsol//de skad ces thos
60a4(mdo sde): pa dang /blon po chen po'i mchog blo gros chen pos smras pa/lha 'di me ma lags kyi sha za 'am sha zas byin gyis brlabs par gyur pa zhig ste/mi ni rked par bcad pa 'tsho zhing sngon
60a5(mdo sde): ji ltar gnas pa bzhin du tshig tu smra ba ni mi srid do//de skad ces smras pa dang /lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis smras pa/shi pi ba khyed cag rnams ma 'jigs shig/nga ni sha za ma
60a6(mdo sde): yin gyi gzhan du na//nga ni bram ze yin mod kyi dbul bas/bdag gis bu dang chung ma bzhag ste/nor gyis bsam pas rgyal po dpal gyi sde'i thad du chas nas/rim gyis song
60a7(mdo sde): ba na/rgyal po'i pho brang 'dir nyi ma nub pa na phyin pa dang /grong khyer gyi sgo rnams bcad par gyur to//de nas grong khyer dang ha cang mi ring ba na bsod nams khang yod par bdag song
60b1(mdo sde): ste/nub mo gnas pa na lam gyis dub pas gnyid thub mos non pa dang /sngon gyi las kyi nyes pas nub mo gcan zan stag 'ongs nas bdag gi lus kyi phyed sog le lta bu'i mche ba shin tu
60b2(mdo sde): rnon pos bcad nas khyer te song ngo //der bdag tshor ba drag pos kun tu bcom pas gnyid sad pa dang /ci tsam na bdag gi lus kyi ro smad phyed po stog gi sog las dras pa ltar bcad
60b3(mdo sde): pas bdag tshor ba drag pos kun tu bcom yang sngon byas pa'i mi dge ba'i las rnams kyis kun tu bzung bas/shi bar ni ma gyur gyi/gcig tu sdug bsngal ba dang gcig tu drag pa dang ///
60b4(mdo sde): gcig tu rtsub pa dang /gcig tu che ba dang /gcig tu yid du mi 'ong ba'i tshor ba rnams myong zhing nyam thag pa'i nga ros sme bar gyur te/bdag de ltar nyam thag pa'i smre sngags thos pa dang /
60b5(mdo sde): na mkha'i dkyil na gnas pa'i lha gzhan dag gis/bdag dbugs phyung ba'i phyir smras pa/ma 'jigs ma 'jigs bram ze'i mchog/khyod ni tshe ni ring bar mthong /a ris shwa ra ni myur
60b6(mdo sde): song na//khyod ni legs pa dag tu 'gyur//de na kun ster rgyal po ni//dpal gyi snga zhes rnam grags pa//de yi lus kyi phyed bslangs na//de ni nges par khyed la ster zhes smras nas
60b7(mdo sde): lha mo de nyid du mi snang bar gyur to//de nas bdag gis lha mo'i tshig thos pa dang /'tsho bar ra ba kun tu skyes te/tsha ba yang chung bar gyur to//de nas bdag gi lus kyi phyid ro smad
61a1(mdo sde): pas langs kyang ma nus na/'phyo bar lta ga 'a nus snyam nas yang mi chug par gyur pa dang /skyes dbang gis nyi ma shar ba'i tshe gnyen 'dri ba ni 'ongs par gyur to//
61a2(mdo sde): dag gis kyang nyam nga bar zhugs pa mthong ba dang /'di 'chi ba nyid do snyam nas ngu bar gyur to//de nas bdag gis de rnams la dbugs dbyung ba'i phyir lha mo'i tshig rgyus par smras//de nas
61a3(mdo sde): bdag 'di rnams kyis khri la bskyon te/'dir khyer te 'ong so//de skad ces smras nas/lha'i dbang po brgyu byin gdong mchi ma'i rlabs kyis gang ba lci bur bdag nyid nye bar ston cing /
61a4(mdo sde): chub sems dpa' la smras pa/rgyal po chen po/bdag ni dbul zhing na ba dang //rgan pa dang ni bram ze nyid//rang gi sku phyed stsal ba yis//rnyed dka'i srog ni stsal du gsol//
61a5(mdo sde): bdag gi srog ni bsgrub byed pa'i//sbyin pa thugs rjes stsal du gsol//don gyi mchog phyis sbyin pa ni//sku phyed sbyin par sbrul du gsol//nyid kyi sku'i phyed srul pas//bsod
61a6(mdo sde): nams rgya mtsho ltar rgya tsho//de bzhin mkha' ltar mtha' med pa'o//bsod nams khyod kyis thob par 'gyuraro//bdag gis tsherab drag po dang //bkros skom mi bzad la gzigs
61a7(mdo sde): nas//mchog tu thugs rje mdzad nas ni//sku yi phyed ni bdag la gsol//byang chub sems dpa' dge khyod chos la gnas//thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du mnyam bzhed na//bdag
61b1(mdo sde): la sku phyed 'di sgrol de ring ni//shin tu rnyed dka'i srog ni thob par mdzod//rgyal po chen po'i sku'i phyed//shin tu gtang dka' bdag stsol la//chos dang de bzhin grags pa yi//'gro ba kun//
61b2(mdo sde): la khyab par mdzad//de nas tshig 'di thos pa dang //byang chub sems dpa' sngon goms pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba'i bag chags blo la bgos pas/snying rjes sems 'dir zhing slong ba de dbugs
61b3(mdo sde): dbyung ba'i phyir smras pa/bram ze chen po ma 'jigs shig/da ring po mi thogs par lus 'di rdzogs par 'gyur ba dang /yid la re ba yongasu rdzogs par 'gyur gyis/g.yo med pa'i
61b4(mdo sde): sems kyis khyod la lus kyi phyed sbyin par bya'o zhes smras nas byang chub sems dpa' yid rab tu dga' ba dang /tshigasu bcad de smras pa/kye ma rang gi lus slong ba//yun mi ring bar
61b5(mdo sde): blta bar bya//nga yi yan lag btang ba ni//dka' bar 'gyur ba ma yin no//ji ltar yab kyi bu gcig nga yin yang //de lta na yang nga yi lus 'di khyer//lus ni byin pas byang
61b6(mdo sde): chub rnyed gyur cing //'gro 'di shin tu sdug bsngal las grol shog/de nas byang chub sems dpa' brgya byin bram ze'i cha byad 'dzin pa rnams 'di lta bu'i tshig smra ba thos pa dang /yid
61b7(mdo sde): rab tu mgu zhing dga' bas mig gdangs bzhin du bram ze de la smras pa/bram ze lus 'di'i byed legs por byin gyis bor chad med par legs par longs shig ces smras nas/
62a1(mdo sde): 'khor de dag thams cad la bltas te skyes bu gzhan zhig la smras pa/kye skyes bu khyod rings par song la/sog le shin tu rno ba khyer shog shig/de nas
62a2(mdo sde): skyes bu de brgya byin gyis kun tu rmongs par byas pas/shin tu rings pa rings par sogs la nye bor khyer te 'ongs nas smras pa/lha sog le 'tshal te mchis//de nas byang chub
62a3(mdo sde): sems dpa' rangs par blon po la smras pa/khyed cag rnams kyis ji srid du bram ze 'di 'ching bdag gis 'jig rten pha rol tu ma khyor ba de srid du nga'i ro smad sog les myur du tshong
62a4(mdo sde): cig dang /ngas bram ze 'di la sbyin par bya'o//de nas byang chub sems dpa' mchog tu mi zad pa'i tshig smras pa thos pa dang rdo rje lhung bas kun tu skrag pa bzhin du grong khyer na gan
62a5(mdo sde): pa'i skye bo'i tshogs thams cad yi mug par gyur te/sdug bsngal lo sdug bsngalo zhes gsang mthon pos ngu bar gyur to//de nas blon po chen po blo gros chen po zug rngus gnad du
62a6(mdo sde): bsnun pa bzhin du/sdug bsngal drag pos nyam thag ste/byang chub sems dpa' nyid kyi sku la chags pa med pa yongasu gtang ngo snyam bsams nas/gdong la mchi mtshar ltar
62a7(mdo sde): bab pa dang /rkang pa gnyis la btud de/byang chub sems dpa' bzlog pa'i phyir smras pa/lha 'di mi srid de/'di lta ste lus sog les bcad pa'i lus ni nges par 'chi bar
62b1(mdo sde): gyur te 'chi na la su mi rung ba'i ror gyur la/lasu mi rung bas ni bram ze la yang byas pa don ma mchis par 'gyuraro//gang gzhan gyi yan lag bcad pa/gzhan gyi yan lag la 'byor par
62b2(mdo sde): gyur pa 'di yang gnas ma mchis so//de lta na ni lha'i ngal ba yang don ma mchis par 'gyuraro//de bas na bzod par mdzod la bdag nyid don ma mchis par gsod par mi mdzad cing /nyid
62b3(mdo sde): kyi srog yongasu mi gtong bar gsol/de nas byang chub sems dpa' blon po chen po blo gros chen po dbugs dbyung ba'i phyir smras pa/blo gros chen po zhog zhog/ngas nam zhig bla
62b4(mdo sde): na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub thob nas 'khor bar rgyu ba'i sems can bsgral bar bya'o zhes yid la re ba 'di la ngo'i byang chub kyi bar chad ma byed cig/bu dag gzhan yang
62b5(mdo sde): shin tu yun ring por sdug pa dang yang dag par 'dus par gyur pa yang nges par 'brel ba'i mtha' can du 'gyur bar 'dri ni 'jig rten gyi rang bzhin yin no zhes smras nas/byang chub sems
62b6(mdo sde): dadas sog le la bltas te/sog le 'das nga'i bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tshogs kyis phyogs gcig tu 'gyur ro zhes rdza su sems shing /yang blon po la smras pa/
62b7(mdo sde): ji srid du bram ze 'di srog dang bral bar ma gyur gyi bar du khyod kyis nga'i lus kyi phyed ro smad myur du chod cig/bram ze 'di shi ne nga'i bsams pa 'bras bu med par 'gyur ro//de ltar
63a1(mdo sde): blon po blo gros chen pos byang chub sems dpa'i de lta bu'i rang gi lus yongasu gtong ba'i bsam pa shes nas/de mchi ma char bzhin du bab pa'i gdong dang /
63a2(mdo sde): byang chub sems dpa'i rkang pa nas bzung ste/gdong gau chus 'o byas/snying rje rje skad du smre sngags 'don par gyur te/kyi hud ji ltar na 'dzam bu'i gling yongasu skyong ba mdzad pa/snying rje
63a3(mdo sde): tsho ba/yon tan du ma dang ldan pa/sems can thams cad la mnyes gshin pa'i lha la/de ring nyid du mi rtag pa nyid kyi stobs nye bar gnas par 'gyur/kye ma'o mi rtag pa nyid kyi
63a4(mdo sde): stobs dang ldan pa'o//gang 'jig rten du lha yang mthong ba'i skyes bu de rnams ni skal ba can yin no zhes byang chub sems dpa'i gdong la shin tu yun ring du mig mi 'dzums par
63a5(mdo sde): bltas nas/lha'i mi rtag pa nyid la blta mi nu so zhes bsamos nas/skad cig de nyid la mig btsums nas brgyal nas sa'i steng du 'gyel bar gyur to//de nas byang chub seMda'
63a6(mdo sde): skyes bu shing mkhan gnyis shig la smras pa/bzhin bzangs dag 'dir ri'i sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yongasu rdzogs pa'i grogs bya ba'i phyir khyod cag gnyis kyis sog la thogs
63a7(mdo sde): to/nga'i lus kyi phyed ro smad myur du chod cig/bram ze'i yid la re ba yongasu rdzogs par bya'o//nga'i byang chub rnyed pa'i yid la re ba yongasu rdzogs par 'gyur ro//de nas shing
63b1(mdo sde): mkhan de gnyis yul rmus pa lta bu'i mchi ma'i gdong can gyis byang chub sems dpa'i rkang pa la gtugs te smras pa/lha 'di skad gsung ba ni rigs pa ma lags te/de ci'i phyir zhe na/
63b2(mdo sde): gal te gzhan 'ga' zhig lci'i thugasu mi byon pa bgyid na/de la yang bdag cag gis bzlog par bgyi ba legs na/lha nyid kyi sku la mtshon gyis 'debs par ji ltar rngo thog/lha gan+d+ha
63b3(mdo sde): yang gal te bdag cag gnyis kyis thugs rje che ba/byams pa'i bdag nyid can sems can thams cad la mnyes gshin pa/'dzam bu'i gling yongasu skyong bar mdzad pa/khyed kyi sku
63b4(mdo sde): la sog les gcod par bgyid na nges par 'phral du rong gi las kyis dmyal bar lhung bar 'gyur ro//byang chub sems dpas smras pa/bu dge nga'i byang chub sems dpa'i bzod pa'i bdud
63b5(mdo sde): rtsi tha ma'i bar chad khyed cag ma byed cig/de bas na tshur shog/ji srid du bram ze 'di gson pa de srid du de'i byang chub la grogs bya ba'i phyir/myur du nga'i lus kyi phyed ro slad chod cig/
63b6(mdo sde): de nas lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis skyes bu shing mkhan gnyis ji ltar de la kun tu 'jug par 'gyurare ba de ltar byin gyis brlab so//yang bar skabs der srog chags brgya stong du ma
63b7(mdo sde): 'dus pa rnams dang /na mkha'i ngos na lha brgya stong du ma rnams byang chub sems dpa' de'i shin tu dka' ba dang /ba spu ldang ba'i las de blta bar 'dod nas 'dus par gyur to//
64a1(mdo sde): de nas byang chub sems dpa' mchog tu dka' ba'i rang gi mus yong su gtong bar 'dod nas slong ba de la byams pas khyab par byas te/'phram du seng po
64a2(mdo sde): khri las bab so//dge slong dag byang chub sems dpa' dpal gyi sde seng ge'i khri las babs po de rjes thogs nyid la/'dzam bu'o gling thams cad kyi godugs dang /rgyal mnan
64a3(mdo sde): dang /ba dan de dag thams cad rgyal po'i pho brang a ris shwa ra ga la ba der 'dud par gyur to//rgyal po'i pho brang grong khyer a ri sri sha'i phyogs bzhir skar mda' ltung ba dang /phreng
64a4(mdo sde): khyer na gnas pa'i skye bo'i tshogs kyis byang chub sems dpa' dang bral pa'i nyam theg pas sgra bsgrags pas/bram ze sdig pa can 'das rgyal po dpal gyi sde gsod par 'gyur gyis//
