64a5(mdo sde): grong khyer 'di nas phyir phyung shig/de nas lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis ji ltar sgra sus kyang ma thos pa de ltar byin gyis berlabs shing skye bo'i tshogs de rmongs par byas//bar snang dang
64a6(mdo sde): sel rgyu ba'i gnod sbyin rnams byang chub sems dpa' rang gi lus la ltos pa med par shes nas sdug bsngal drag po rnams kyis dngongs nas nyams thag pa'i ngo ros cheng nge 'debs
64a7(mdo sde): pabar brtsams te/kyi hud rgyal po dpal gyi sde 'dzam bu'i gling yongasu skyong bar byed pa/sems can le thugs brtse ba/thams cad nas thams cad du lus gtong bar gyur
64b1(mdo sde): de nas srung po byang gi nang na gnas pa'i lha zhig byang chub sems dpa' de lta bu'i rang gi lus yongasu gtong bar shes nas cho nges 'debs par rtsom zhing 'di skad ces kyang smras//ji lta da ltar 'di
64b2(mdo sde): lta bu'i slongs mo pa 'ongs nas rgyal po dpal gyi sde yon tan du ma dang ldan pa/thams cad nas thams cad du mi 'tsho bar gyur/de nas byang chub sems dpas phyogs bzhir bltas te
64b3(mdo sde): yang dag pa'i smon lam 'debs pa la zhugs pa gang grong khyer 'di na gnas pa'i lha dang klu dang /gnod sbyin dang mi 'am ci rnams bdag la gson cig/bdag 'dir gtong bar byed//
64b4(mdo sde): gtong ba shin tu gtong ba/rang gi lus yongasu gtong bar byed kyis/bdag gis lus yongasu gtong ba de yang rgyal po'i phyir ma yin/mtho ris kyi phyir ma yin/brgya byin gyis
64b5(mdo sde): phyir ma yin/tshangs pa'i phyir ma yin/'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po'i phyir ma yin gyi/gzhan du na bdag gis ci nas bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par sangs
64b6(mdo sde): rgyas nas/sems can mo bsgral ba rnams bsgral bar bya ba dang /mo grol ba rnams dgrel par bya ba dang /dbugs ma phyin pa rnams dbugs dbyung bar bya ba dang /yongasu
64b7(mdo sde): mya ngan las ma 'das pa rnams yongs mya ngan las bzla ba'i bden pa dang /bden pa'i tshig 'dis ngal ba 'bras bu dang bcas par gyur cig/bdag mngon par byang chub nas kyang
65a1(mdo sde): mtshan ma cung zad cig byung bar gyur cig smras te/bram ze de la smras pa/nges pa khyod kyi kun tu rtog pa 'byor par gyur cig/khyod kyi yid la re ba yongasu
65a2(mdo sde): rdzogs par gyur cig/nga'i bla na med pa'i byang chub yongasu rdzogs par gyur cig/de nas byang chub sems dpa' nye du'i skye bo rnams dang /grong khyer pa'i skye bo rnams la bzod par byas
65a3(mdo sde): shing /dman pa dang /nad pa rnams dbugs phyung nas/skyes bu shing mkhan de gnyis la smras pa/bzhin bzongs dag tshur shog/ji srid du bram ze 'di dus ma byas kyi bar
65a4(mdo sde): du sog les zung la nga'i lus lte ba yan chad chod cig/'gro ba sdug bsngal gyis zin pa 'di dag thams cad kyang ngas yongasu bskyab par bya'o zhes byams pas khyab pas na/skyes
65a5(mdo sde): bu gcig gi rgyab nas brten to/'phrul du rkang pa gnyis sa lnga brgyad nas gan rgyal du phab bo//dge slong dag byang chub sems donga'aphab ma thag yang sa chen po rnam pa drug tu
65a6(mdo sde): g.yos par gyur to//de nas btsun mo'i bud med rnams kyis de lta bu'i gtam thos nas/mya ngan drag pos gdungs te/kyi hud 'di ni sdug bsngal lo zhes gdong las mchi ma tshar
65a7(mdo sde): bzhin du 'bab cing sgra rnams dkrol te brang rdung zhing rtabs bag tu byang chub sems dpa' gang na ba der song ste phyin nas lha mo lta bu sdug pa dang bral nas rtabs bag tu byang chub sems
65b1(mdo sde): /dnga'i rkang pa la gtugs nas snying rje skad du smre sngags 'don par rlom pa/kyi hud 'jam bu'i gling yongasu skyong bar mdzad pa/sems can thams cad la mnyes gshin pa/snying rje che ba/
65b2(mdo sde): yon tan du ma dang ldan pa'i lha la dang nyid du mi rtag pa nyid kyi stobs nye bar gnas pa ni sdug bsngal//dang 'dir bdag cag lha dang lhan cig pa las tha dad par gyur te/so so ba dang /
65b3(mdo sde): bye ba dang bral bar gyur to//'di skad ces kyang smras to//lha bzod par mdzod cig/nyid kyi srog med par mdzad pa 'dzam bu gling na gnas pa'i skye bo'i tshogs thams cad mgon med
65b4(mdo sde): par mi mdzad du gsol/lha btsun mo'i 'khor rnams dang /mdzod dang bang ba rin po che sna tshogs kyis rgyas shing yongasu gang ba la gzigasu gsol/'dzam bu'i gling gi skye bo'i tsog
65b5(mdo sde): rtag tu rab tu dga' pa/rnam pa sna tshogs pa la yang gzig su gsol/lha rnams kyi dga' ba'i tshal gyi skyed mos tshil lta bu'i grong khyer a ris shA bzang ba mang po phun suman
65b6(mdo sde): par skye bo rab tu dga' ba rnams bsten pa la yang gzigasu gsal/mgon po khyed kyi rnam kun tu//sras lci yongasu bsgrub pa rnams/khyod bral me yis nges gdungs nas//
65b7(mdo sde): lus con ji ltar gnas par 'gyur/khyod dang bral nas bdag cag kun//shin tu 'chi bdag dbang du 'gro/mgon po khyod dang rnam bral na//bdag cag 'tsho bar ma nus so//
66a1(mdo sde): btsun mo mya ngan gdungs pa dang //sems can gcig tu sdug bsngal na//thugs rjer ldan pa'i thugs rje yis//mi dbang de ni gzigasu gsol//sems can
66a2(mdo sde): rnams la mnyes gshin lha//bzod mdzod srog ni mi gtang gsol//mgon pa dpa' bo khyod gshegs na//su zhig 'jig rten sbyong bar 'gyur//de nas byang chub sems dpas de
66a3(mdo sde): rnams kyi snying rje rje skad du de ltar smre sngags 'don pa thos pa dang /snying rjes gdungs pa'i yid kyis de rnams dbugs dbyung ba'i phyir smras pa/khyod cag rnams kyi mya ngan gyis chog
66a4(mdo sde): gi/shin tu yun ring por sdug pa dang 'phyang bar 'gyur ba yang /nges par tha mar 'bral ba'i mtha' nyid du gyur pa 'di ni 'jig rten gyi rang bzhin yin te/khyod cag rnams
66a5(mdo sde): kyang rtag tu dge ba'i chos rnams la bag yod par gyis shig ces smras nas/shing mkhon gnyis la 'di skad ces smraso//bzhin bzangs dag rings par shog la/lus yun
66a6(mdo sde): rnyiris por mi thogs par chod cig ces smras pa tsam gyis de gnyis kyang brgya byin gyis kun tu rmongs par byas pas/byang chub sems dpa'i lus lte ba man cad 'phral du sog
66a7(mdo sde): les btab ste/ring por mi thogs par chod par 'gyur ro//de nas blon po blo gros chen pos byang chub sems dpa'i shin tu bzong dka' ba'i sdug bsngal mi bzang ba drag pos mya ngan/
66b1(mdo sde): drag pos kun tu skrag pa'i yid kyis rtabs bag tu shing mkhan gnyis bzlog cing 'di skad ces smras//kyi hud kyi hud khyod gnyis kyi rtsol ba 'di ji zhig/'di ji bzhig/'di ltar khyod cag
66b2(mdo sde): gnyis kyis byams pa'i bdag nyid can/sems can thams cad kyang mnyes gshin pa//yon tan du ma dang ldan pa/'dzam bu'i gling yongasu skyong ba/skyon med pa/gnod pa mi byed
66b3(mdo sde): pa/ji ltar gsod mi gti mug can khyod cag 'di lta bu'i chos kyi rgyal po ji ltar gsod par spro/khyod cag gnyis sa chen po'i lha mo 'dis ji ltar 'jog/khyod cag gnyis lha dang /klu dang /
66b4(mdo sde): gnod sbyin dang /lha ma yin dang /dri za dang /na mkha' lding dang /mi 'am ci dang /lto 'phye chen po rnams kyis rdo rje rtse gcig pa dang /'khor lo dang /mda' bo tsha dang /mtshan
66b5(mdo sde): gcig pa la sogs pa'i mtshon rnams ji ltar ma bsnun/khyod cag gnyis 'di lta bu'i 'phags pa ma yin pa'i las byed na/lus rnam pa stong du ji ltar ma lhags khyed cag gnyis rang gi///
66b6(mdo sde): lus kyis 'phrul du dmyal bar ji ltar ma lhung /mi gti mug can khyed gnyis bdag nyid chen po 'dis bu bzhin ma bskyangs sam/zhes 'di dang gzhan yang rnam po mang po smras nas kyi
66b7(mdo sde): tud lha zhes blon po blo gros chen po rings par stan las langs te/log pa gnyis kyis sog le gzung nas/byang chub sems dpa'i lus la mchi ma 'dzag pas brlan par byas te
67a1(mdo sde): zlog par byed do//de nas byang chub sems dpa' zhum pa'i yid de la dbugs dbyung ba'i phyir smras pa/bu zheg zhog mya ngan ma byed cig/sdug pa dang pangs/
67a2(mdo sde): pa dang /yid du 'ong ba dang /mngon par dga' bo thams cad nges par tha dad par gyur te/so so ba dang /bye ba dang 'bral bar 'gyur//gzhan yang bu/bsags pa kun
67a3(mdo sde): gyi mtha' zad tsI//bslang ba'i mtha' ni 'gyel bar 'gyur//'phrad pa'i mtha' ni 'bral ba ste//gson pa'i mtha' ni 'chi ba yin//de phyir khyod lus slong ba la bar chad ma byed
67a4(mdo sde): cig/de ci'i phyir zhe na/blo gros chen po sngon byung ba na pi lus slong ba na lha mo rnams kyi snga bar chad byas te/de rnams kyis nga'i bar chad byas pas/nga'i bla na med pa'i byung
67a5(mdo sde): chub la bar chad byas la/bdag nyid kyang bsod nams ma yin pa meng po skyes//gal te nga'i lus slong ba la lha mo rnams kyis bar chad ma byas par gyur na ni/yun ring po mi
67a6(mdo sde): thigs par ngas bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub 'thob par 'gyur//bu gzhan yang sa phyogs 'di nyid du stag mo zhig bkres pa'i sdug bsngal gyi tshor ba mang pos
67a7(mdo sde): lus gdungs pas bu za 'dod pa mthong ba dang /mchog tu snying rje'i dbang du song ba'i yid kyis yongasu bslab pa'i phyir de ma thag bdag nyid yongasu btang bas byang chub sems dpa'
67b1(mdo sde): byams pa bskal ba ban bcur zhugs pa phyir lus pa byas sa//gzhan yang zla zas chen po bshi pa~M pa'i rgyal por gyur pa n+da ni/yang bram ze rkun po zhig slong ba mthong ste/sna
67b2(mdo sde): rjes bskyod pa'i yid kyis/slong ba'i yid lA re ba yongasu rdzogs par bya ba'i phyir rang nyid kyi ud pa la sngon po'i lo ma lta bu dri ma med pa shin tu mdzes pa/sems can skye ba'i
67b3(mdo sde): mig dang /yid 'phrog pa ma nyams pa'i mig gnyis 'phral du khrag dang bcos par byung nas byin no//gzhan yang blo gros chen po yang nga rgyal po zla 'od du gyur pa na yang bram ze
67b4(mdo sde): drug pa'i mig mgo slong ba la/mchog tu snying rjes bsgom pa'i yid kyis lha dang klu dang /gnod sbyin dang /dri za dang /lha ma yin dang /na mkha' lding dang /mi 'am ci dang /
67b5(mdo sde): lto 'phye chen po dang /grub pa dang /rig pa 'dzin pa'i tshogs rnams dang /lte brgya stong du ma rnams kyis bkag kyang ngas 'gro ba 'di dag mgon med par mthong nas/bla na
67b6(mdo sde): med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par byang chub ste/sems can rnams 'khor ba'i 'brog dgon pa las thar par bya snyam nas/byams pas khyab
67b7(mdo sde): par byas te/ral gri nor bu dang /gser dang /dngul dang /bai DUr+ya dang /rdo rje dang /in dra nI la dang /mar gad kyis kun tu brgyan pa dang /ud pa la sngon
68a1(mdo sde): bo'i lo ma lta bu'i rol gris rang gi mgo d+hA bzhin du bcad cing bcad cing byin no//gzhan yang blo gros chen po yang nga shi pi pa'i rgyal por gyur pa na/phug ron
68a2(mdo sde): skyabs med pa zhig khras 'jigs shing skrag la/sdug bsngal zhing bzhin rmongs pa/skyabs med pa skyabasu 'ongs pa mthong ste/mchog tu snying rjes 'dar ba'i yid kyis phug ran
68a3(mdo sde): khri las yongasu bsrung zhing blu ba'i phyir/rang gis sha bcad cing bcad cing byin no//gzhan yang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par 'dod par bya ba'i
68a4(mdo sde): phyir/sa phyogs 'di nyid du rkang pa dang /lag pa dang bu dang chung ma stong phrag yongasu btang ba byas na yang /sus kyang bar chad ma byas//de'i phyir 'di ltar rig par byas te/
68a5(mdo sde): nga'i lus slong ba la khyod par chad ma byed cig/de nas blon po chen po blo gos chen pos byang chub sems dpa'i rdzu 'phrul chen po skyes nas/byang chub sems dpa' la dad
68a6(mdo sde): pa chen po skyes te/de nas nang mi smra bar gyur cing mchi ma'i dba' rlabs kyis yang dang yang du gdong khebs bzhin du bsams pa/kyi hud 'jig rten pa 'di dag ni skal ba ngan
68a7(mdo sde): ba ste/myur ba nyid du chos kyi rgyal po 'dis//bor bar 'gyur ro//kyi hud chos kyi rgyal mtshan 'gyel bar 'gyuraro//chos kyi sgron ma shi bar 'gyur ro//chos kyi sgron mo//
68b1(mdo sde): mi snang bar 'gyur ro//chos kyi rnga chag par gyu ro//chos kyi rgya mtsho skams par 'gyur ro//chos kyi ri bo rnyil bar 'gyu ro//chos kyi grong khyer choms par 'gyuraro//chos kyi gru
68b2(mdo sde): zhig par 'gyuraro//chos kyi shing phyung ba na kyi hud sdug bsngalo//'di ni 'jig rten kun gyi pha//sems can kun la ngan byed pa//dus kyi 'khor los bcom nas ni//rgyal po chen
68b3(mdo sde): po med par gyur//gang phyir mi zad dus 'dir ni//rnam pa stong du mags pa//snying gi bdag nyid chen po ni//rdo rje chen po bzhin gyur tam//shis pa'i dus ni kun tu 'das//
68b4(mdo sde): mi bzang dus ni nye bar gnas//shes rab ldan mi mang po dang //'jig rten dag kyang brlag par 'gyur//ji lta ji ltar mthor gyur pa'o//sa yi mtshan ma dung ma yis//nges
68b5(mdo sde): par yuni mi ring bar//rgyal po seng ge med par 'gyur//dri med mi yi nyi ma 'di//shin tu rnyed dka' de nub 'gyur//yun mi ring bar 'jig rten 'dir//mi snang ba ni 'byung//
68b6(mdo sde): bar 'gyur//sems can kun la phan pa yi//rgyal po chen po 'di med de//phyi nas 'jig rten mi snang na//su zhig 'jig rten skyong bar 'gyur//de nas lha'i dbang po brgya///
68b7(mdo sde): byin gyis ji lta ji ltar rmod par byas pa de ltar mya ngan chung bar gyur nas/sog mes btab par gyur to//de nas byang chub sems dpa' shing mkhan da gnyis la bzhin
69a1(mdo sde): bzangs dag khyod cag gnyis kyis sog les myur du drongs la/nga'i lus kyi phyed ro smad chod cig/bram ze 'di shi bar gyur na/nga'i ngal ba 'bras bu med par
69a2(mdo sde): mi 'gyur grang /de nas shing mkhan de gnyis brgya byin gyi mthus kun tu rmongs pa/nyam thag pa'i nga ros cho nges 'debs shing skye bo'i tshogs chen pos bkag bzhin du/byang
69a3(mdo sde): chub sems dpa' rang gi lus la sog les 'dra bar brtsam so//de nas byang chub sems dpa' byang chub yid la smon cing dga' ba'i yod kyis slong ba'i yid la re ba yongasu rdzogs par
69a4(mdo sde): bya'o zhes bsams nas/cang mi smra bar gnaso//de nas byang chub sems dpa'i lus kyi lte bar sog les bcad pa las khrag gi tshogs chen po babs par gyur to//de nas blon po
69a5(mdo sde): chen po blo gros chen po 'di ltar sog les bcad pa tshor ba drag pos nyen pa'i khrag 'bab pa mthong ba dang /lha bkrongs pa ni sdug bsngalo zhes bsams nas//re thag chad par gyur
69a6(mdo sde): te/'brel du brgyal nas sa'i steng du 'gyel bar gyur te/na mkha'i dkyil na gnas pa'i lha dang /klu dang /gnod sbyin dang /dri za dang /lha ma yin dang /na mkha'
69a7(mdo sde): lding dang /mi 'am ci dang ///lto 'phye chen po'i tshogs rnams kyang mya ngan drag pos gdungs te ngu bar brtsams te/de rnams kyis du b+ha'i mchi ma blag so//de nas skye bo'i
69b1(mdo sde): tshogs chen pos 'di ci zhig yin snyam nas/steng du lta bar brtsams pa dang /ci tsam na lha brgya stong du ma rnams ngu bar mthong ngo //de nas skye bo'i tshogs chen po shas cher mya ngan drag pos
69b2(mdo sde): gdungs te/byang chub sems dpa' gnas skabs 'di lta bur shin tu sdug bsngal bar mthong nas/kyi hud lha bkrongs pa ni sdug bsngalo zhes bsams nas kun tu rmongs par gyur to//
69b3(mdo sde): de nas lha'i dbang po brgya byin de srog chags brgya stong du ma 'di rnams byang chub sems dpa'i mya ngan gyis gdungs pas shin tu snying rje zhing zhum pa mthong ba dang /myur bar snying rje ba'i
69b4(mdo sde): yid kyis bsams pa/bdag nyid che ba/sems can thams cad la mnyes gshin po/snying rje can/thams cad stor ba 'di'i lus la 'di ltar tshor ba drag po'i las kun tu
69b5(mdo sde): sbyor ba ni bzang po ma yin no//gzhan du na da ni ji ltar srog mi 'jigs par gyur pa de ltar bya'o//de nas byang chub sems dpa' shing mkhan de gnyis kyis sig les drud cing /sog/
69b6(mdo sde): las rnon pos lus bcad pa'i tshor ba drag pos gdungs pa dang /brtan pa'i stobs dang ldan pas slong ba la byams pa'i sems skyes nas bsams pa/ngas 'khor ba'i skyon gyi rang
69b7(mdo sde): bzhin shes nas brtson 'grus sra zhing brtan pa dang ldan pas/lus phyogs gcig gcad pa de ni las/'di lta bu'i sdug bsngal skye na/sems can sngar ma rnams phal
70a1(mdo sde): cher dmyal bar skyes nas/shin tu sdug bsngal ba'i tshor ba rnams kyis gdungs pa la smos kyang ci dgos/de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems can thams cad
70a2(mdo sde): la rjesu 'gro ba byams pa'i sems rnam par bzhag ste/bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas/sems can rnams 'di lta bu'i
70a3(mdo sde): sdug bsngal las thar par bya'o zhes seng ge'i sgra bsgrags te/sdug bsngal drag pos gdungs pa'i rang gis sems spro bar bya ba'i phyir smras pa/'jig rten sdug bsngal ltos
70a4(mdo sde): la yid khyod skyon spangs te//shin tu brtan pa rgya che bskyed pa nyid du gyis//'gro ba skye rga na 'chi sdug bsngal gyis gdungs pa'i//'di na skyabs gyur yin gyis bzod nyid brtan/
70a5(mdo sde): par gyis//gzhan yang kye sems can gang phyir 'gro kun 'khor ba'i//rgya mtsho las rgal rgyu yin gyis//de bas khyod ni gnod pa rnams//mi bzod pa ni rigs ma
70a6(mdo sde): yin//de ltar rang gi sems yang dag par bzhag nas//sems can thams cad rje su 'gro ba'o snying rje nye bar bzhag ste//bsams pa/kye ma'o 'khor ba na gnas pa'i sems
70a7(mdo sde): gyi sdug bsngal ni/kye ma mi bzad pa yin la/'khor ba'i sems can de rnams kyi don tu/'khor ba'i sdug bsngal thams cad brnags par spro bar byas kyis/sems
70b1(mdo sde): can 'ga' yang sdug bsngal ba'i skal ba can du ma gyur cig/dge sbyong dag sems bskyed ma thag byang chub sems dpa'i lus bcad pa'i tshor ba 'phral du rgyun chad par gyur to//de
70b2(mdo sde): nas byang chub sems dpas bsams pa ci'i phyir nga'i lus bcad pa'i tshor ba 'gagaso par 'gyur/sog le 'ga' zhig gis bton par ma gyur grang snyom nas/sog le re la
70b3(mdo sde): bltas so//bltas nas kyang mchog tu yod mi bde bar gyur nus 'dar bar gyur to//de nas lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis de'i bsam pa shes nas smras pa/nyam chung ngan pa ji bany+tsi
70b4(mdo sde): du//rgyal po ci'i phyir 'da' bar byed//bdag gi lus kyi phyed bcad na//sems kyi ni 'dar ba la ltos//khyod ni thams cad ster ba zhes//sa steng kun tu grags pa la//
70b5(mdo sde): 'gyod par byed pa mi rigs te//khyud tshig brdzun du ma gyur tom//de nas byang chub sems dpas smras pa/bram ze don de'i phyir lus 'drar ba ma yin la/'gyod par gyur pa
70b6(mdo sde): 'ga' yang yod pa ma yin no//'on kyang sog le 'dis de'i lus kyi phyed smad tshabs cher zhugs kyang ma chod pa dang /de la ngo 'di snyam du sems te/nga'i sbyin pa ma rdzogs par
70b7(mdo sde): mi 'gyur grang /nga la slong ba'i yid las pa yang yongasu rdzogs par ma 'gyur grang zhes den de rje su sems shing lus 'dar te/sog les drag tu gtsang por mi 'did pa ma
71a1(mdo sde): yin no//de la 'di skad ces smras pa dang /lha'i dbang po brgya byin mchog tu ngo mtshar skyes nas cang mi smra bar gnas//bar skabs der me de gnyis brgya byin
71a2(mdo sde): gyis kun tu rmongs par byas pas/de gnyis kyis sog le rnon pos byang chub sems dpa'i lus kyi phyed ro smad bcang ma thag tu sa'i steng du bzhag pa dang 'gul bar gyur to//de nas byang
71a3(mdo sde): chub sems dpa' rang gau lus bcad pa'i sdug bsngal mi sems par rings bag nyid du skyes bu da gnyis la 'di skad ces smras//bzhin bzangs dag khyod cag gnyis kyis myur du nga'o
71a4(mdo sde): lus 'di rings par bram ze'i lus la sbyor cig/de gnyis kyis kyang de bzhin du byas so//sbyar pa tsam gyis lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis ji ltar skad cig ma de nyid la rma kun tu 'byor
71a5(mdo sde): cad mnyam par gnas pa dang /mdog 'dra bar snang ba de ltar byin gyis brlabs de skad cig ma do la ston cing /yang byang chub sems dpa' dga' bar bya ba'i phyir lha'i dbang po brgya
71a6(mdo sde): byin khri las langs te/'chag pa dang /langs pa dang /'dug par gyur to//de nas byang chub sems dpa' de ltar slong ba po'i lus yongasu rdzogs shing yid la re ba yongasu
71a7(mdo sde): rdzogs par mthong ba dang /mchog tu dga' bas kun tu rgyas pa'i yad kyis ngal ba 'bras bu dang bcas par gyur cad/yid la re ba yongasu rdzogs par gyur te sa ma nas/
71b1(mdo sde): rab tu dga' ba'i yid kyis bsams pa/rnga ltar ngas bram ze 'di la rang gi lus byin te/sdug pa'i srog gis bskyabs shing /'chi ba'i 'jigs pa las yongasu bskyabs pa'i dag
71b2(mdo sde): paba'i rtsa ba 'dis 'di ltar nga bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas/bram ze 'di 'khor ba'i sdug bsngal las bslangs te/shin tu mthar
71b3(mdo sde): thug pa'i bde ba mya ngan las 'das pa la rab tu 'jog par gyur cig ces smras nas/byang chub sems dpa' tshor ba dag pos gdungs pa dang de/yid kyis byang chub tu smon pa byas
71b4(mdo sde): nas mig bcu mos te/brgyal bas gnas par gyur to//de nas lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis de ma thag tu rings po rings par byang chub sems dpa'i lus la 'phel du stobs bskyed
71b5(mdo sde): pa yang 'tsho ba'i sman gyis yang dag par gsos so//dge slong dag do nas rgyal po dngal gyi sde'i lus kyi phyed bcad pa'i rjes thogs nyid la/yang de'i tshe stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i
71b6(mdo sde): 'jig rten gyi khams 'di lan rnam pa gsum du g.yos te/g.yos rab tu g.yos/kun tu rab tu g.yos/'gul rab tu 'gul/kun tu rab tu 'gul to//byang chub sems
71b7(mdo sde): dpa' shin tu yongasu gtong ba nyid dang /rmad du byung ba'i yongasu gtong ba nyid sa chen po 'dis ma theg pas sgra shin tu sgrogs te/'di lta ste/khar ba'i snod chen po kun brdungs
72a1(mdo sde): nas/sgra 'byin pa bzhin du/de'i tshe de'i dus na sa chen po 'di nyid shin tu sgra sgrogs par gyur to//ri dang /ri sul dang /chu bo dang /rgya mtsho'i tshogs//
72a2(mdo sde): rnams las kyang 'jigs pa'i sgra chen po byung bar gyur to//phyogs bzhi nas kyang 'jig su rung ba'i du ba'i sprin chen po byung bar gyur to//kun nas skar mda' ltung ba dang /phyogs
72a3(mdo sde): sreg pa dang /bar snang la yang lha'i bu rnams rnga rdung bar gyur te/stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di tha~Md mun pa mun nag tu gyur te//na mkha'i dkyil na
72a4(mdo sde): 'gro ba'i lha rnams kyis kyang byang chub sems dpa'i mya ngan gyis gdungs pas ca co'i sgra bton to//bar snang las kyang lha rnams byang chub sems dpa'i steng nas lha'i ud pa la
72a5(mdo sde): rnams 'thor zhing /pad+ma dang /pun dA ri ka dang /a ka ru rI phye ma dang /ta ma la'i lo ma'i phye mi dang /tsan dan gyi phye ma dang /lha rnams kyi me tog man da ra ba
72a6(mdo sde): rnams kyang 'thor ro//gos rnams kyang 'thor bar byed do//lha'i rol mo yang rab tu rdung ngo //'dzam bu'i gling gi mi thams cad der yud tsam zhig mchog tu rmongs par
72a7(mdo sde): gyur to//grong khyer na gnas pa'i srog chags brgya stong du ma rnams kyis byang chub sems dpa'i lus kyi phyed bcad pa mthong ba dang /sdug bsngal drag pos gdungs te
72b1(mdo sde): kyi hud lha gsad pa ni sdug bsngal lo//zhes sgra gcig tu bsgrag so//de nas lnga la ni sA la 'gre ldog go/la lnga ni dpung pa brkyang nas cho nges 'debaso//la la ni 'chi ma'i rlabs kyis/
72b2(mdo sde): skad 'dzer bas tshig 'don mi nus te skad chen po dang brang rdung ngo //la la ni mi rtag pa nyid kyi stobs dang ldan zhes sems sdug bsngal dang bcas shing yid mi bde ba dang ldan pas cad
72b3(mdo sde): me smra bar 'dug/de nas lha'i dbang po brgya byin/byang chub sems dpa' bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las ri rab ltar shin tu mi g.yo bar shes shing /byang
72b4(mdo sde): chub sems dpa' rmad du byung ba yongasu gtong la/do yang ba spu ldang ba ni shin tu dga' zhing phul du byung ba/mthong ba dang /ngo mtshar gyis mig gdangs te/lha'i bu de
72b5(mdo sde): bzhi dang /lhan cig tu bram ze'i cha byad mi snang bar byas nas/rang gi gzugs kyis gnas te/byang chub sems dpa' la smras pa/rgyal po chen po bdag ni lha'i dbang
72b6(mdo sde): po brgya byin lags kyi bram ze ma lagaso//rgyal po chen po legaso legasaso//kye ma'o khyod kyi brtson 'grus/kye ma'o ma bcas par brtan pa/kye ma rang gi lus ma chags
72b7(mdo sde): par yongasu gtong ba/kye ma'o sems can rnams la snying brtse ba/kye ma sbyin pa la dgo' ba leg so log so//rgyal po chen po khyod gang du sdug bsngal drag pos bcom yid
73a1(mdo sde): snying rjes rang gi lus sbyin pa la sems mi ldog pa de ni leg so//rgyal po chen po khyod la drang/khyod shin tu dka' ba'i brtson pa 'di lta bus ji zhig
73a2(mdo sde): don du gnyer/byang chub sems dpas smos pa/ko'u shI ka nga'i lus kyi sbyin pa 'das bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas te/
73a3(mdo sde): sems can rnams 'khor ba las bsgral bar bya'o//brgya byin gyis smras pa/rgyal po chen po khyod rang gi lus yongasu zad pa 'am/gtong ba 'am/yongasu btang bas
73a4(mdo sde): khyod kyi sems rnam pa gzhan du gyur pa 'am/'gyod par mi gyur grang /byang chub sems dpas smras pa/ko'u shi ka nga la ni 'gyod pa med do//brgya byin gyis smras pa/
73a5(mdo sde): ji ltar shes par bya byang chub sems dpas smras pa/ko'u shi ka de'i phyir nga'i lus kyi phyed bcad pa 'di gnas ji lta ba bzhin du zhog shig de nas lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis/
73a6(mdo sde): byang chub sems dpa'i lus kyi phyed bcad de gnas ji lta bu bzhin du bzhog/de nas byang chub sems dpas sems can thams cad la rjesu 'gro ba'i byams pa'i sems nye bar
73a7(mdo sde): bzhag nas/bden pa gsol bar byed cing /de'i tshe tshigasu bcad de smras pa/ji ltar byang chub 'dod gyur nas//snying rjes lus ni btang ba na//ser sna med cing
73b1(mdo sde): zhum med de//deng ni 'gyod par gyur pa med//'gyod pa'i sems kyang med gyur te//bden tshig 'di dang legs byas pas//brgya byin deng nI nga'i lus//'di ni sngon gyi ji baN+DI
73b2(mdo sde): du//dbang po ma lus rdzogs gyur cig/dge slong dag tshigasu bcad pa de smras pa'i rjes thogs nyid la/byang chub sems dpa'i lus 'phrul du sngon gyi ji lta ba bzhin du gyur to//
73b3(mdo sde): na mkha'i dkyil na gnas pa'i lha dang /klu dang gnod sbyin dang /na mkha' lding dang /mi 'am ci dang /lto 'phye chen po rnams kyis ngo mtshar de mthong ba dang /ngo mtshar
73b4(mdo sde): kyis mig gdangs te/ca co dang /gzha'i sgra bsgrags so//skye bo'i tshogs chen po 'di dag thams cad kyis kyang ngo mtshar dang /rmad du byung ba dang /lha dang mi rnams
73b5(mdo sde): yid sdug par byed pa'i cho 'phrul dang /byang chub sems dpa'i lus yongasu rtogs pa mthong ba dang /srog stor ba la slar rnyed pa bzhin du mchog tu ngo mtshar skyes so//
73b6(mdo sde): 'dri skad ces kyang smras te/kye ma khyod ni slar 'tsho ba'i//ngo mtshur dag ni blta bar gyis//sa dang nagasuM bcas pa yi//'jig rten 'dri na skal bar lda no//de nas
73b7(mdo sde): lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis/byang chub sems dpa'i lus sngon gyi ji lta ba bzhin du gyur par mthong ba dang /ngo mtshar gyis gdungs pa'i mig dang /spo ba bskyedapa
74a1(mdo sde): /phyir smras pa/rgyu lnga chen pa khyud kyi nr-i shin tu nges pa dang /kyi smon lam m+me gyur ba dang /khyod kyis soms sa la na thos rjes su
74a2(mdo sde): zhugs pa ni leg so legs//gang yang khyod ni yid kun tu skrag par byed pa rnams la mi 'jigs pas/khyod kyi 'ab pa 'di nyid kyis yun ring por mi thogs par bla na med
74a3(mdo sde): yid dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon por rdzogs pa d+mo'i tshong bya ba 'gyu /lha dbang po bad+ma byin gyis da tshig su btsang+ga daM sgras trA~M/k+She m+b+ha khyod kyi brtsod ribadra
74a4(mdo sde): brtan pa nyid kyang thun myed//kye ma sems can la snying ba rtse//yid la brtan//kyi min mo ring 'jig rten 'di/mgon po khyod kyis spyod gyur
74a5(mdo sde): bsngal rgya mtsho drug 'jigs pas//yang dag mya ngan minga' bar mdzad//de skad ces skyes pa dang /lha'i dbang po brgya byin mchi mchar bzhin du 'bab ci skad 'gyur nas
74a6(mdo sde): du//byang chub sems dpa' la bzod par gsal bar ba rnams te/rgyal po chen po gang bdag gis nyams bskyed pa'i bsamo pas tsher ba drag po la kun tu spyor ze bzod
74a7(mdo sde): /gzhan ya gang rlo khyod kyis byud med pa yang dag par rdzogs na rdzogs pa sa su rgyas lamatshan ma ga
74b1(mdo sde): sems dpas smras pa/ko'u shi ka bzod kyis de bzhin du byas te ngas kyang dran par bya'o//bar skabs dar byang chub sems dpa'i mthus de ma thag tu na mkha' las lha'i rin po che'i char
74b2(mdo sde): rnam pa sna tshogs pa/yid du 'ong ba 'dzam bu'i gling thams cad du bab par gyur cing /'dzam bu'i gling thams cad du rgyad rnam pa sna tshogs kyis gang bar gyur pa/lha'i snang ba bas
74b3(mdo sde): kyang gsal bar gyur to//de nas ri la gnas pa'i drang srong de ngo mtshar 'di lta bu rmad du byung ba mthong ba dang /ngo mtshor gyis bsdus pa'i yid kyis bsams pa/sngon ma byung ba'i
74b4(mdo sde): ngo mtshar byung ba 'di ci zhig yin/'di lta bu'i mthu su'i yin snyamo//de nas drang srong de la bsti gnas na gnas pa'i lha gzhan gyis gtam 'di rgyas par smras//de nas drang srong
74b5(mdo sde): byang chub sems dpa'i shin tu dka' zhing ba spu ldang ba'i skad thos pa dang /yang dag par dga' bas ba spu ldang zhing sems can chen po bkur bar 'os zhes bsams nas/'khor
74b6(mdo sde): lnga brgya dang /btsun mo rgyal ba'i 'od khrid dro rangs pa rings par byang chub sems dpa'i thad du phyin nas/rgyal ba dang tshe 'phel bar byas te/dargya byin dang lhan cig smras pa/
74b7(mdo sde): lha'i bu mo bzang 'dra ba'i//bu mo sdug pa 'di rnams la//mgon po khyod kyis bskyang ba dang //dge ma 'di dang dgyes par mdzod//khyim thab mi phyogs btsun mo sdug/'di
75a1(mdo sde): ni khyed la dbul lags kyi//khyed kyis yang ni slong bsdu//num du yang ni ma sprul cig/de nas byang chub sems dpas drang srong de dang /lha rnams kyi dbang ba
75a2(mdo sde): brgya byin gyis gsol ba btab pa/snying rjes ci yang mi smra bar khas blangaso//de nas lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis/lho'i bu las sna tshogs lnga smras pa/las sna tshogs pa
75a3(mdo sde): lho'i song ge'i khri myur du shoms shig/nga nyid kyis rgyal po dpal gyi sde dbang skur bar bya'o//ko'u shau ka legs kyis de ltar bgyi'o//lha'i buM las sna tshogs pas//lha'i
75a4(mdo sde): dbang po btu byin las mnyan nas skad cig ma de nyid la/rin po che sna tshogs kyis nye bar mdzes pa/kun nas mu tig gi tshogs kyi do shal dpyangs pa'i lha'i seng ge'i khri mngon
75a5(mdo sde): pabar sprul to//de nas lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis/rang nyid kyi lag pa gnyis bzung nas/lha'i seng ge'i khri la bzhag taM lha brgya stong du ma rnams dang lhan cig tu lha'i
75a6(mdo sde): rol mi rnams kun tu rdung bzhin du bsnyen bkur chen po byas nas rgyal por dbang bskur bas dbang bskur to//bar skabs der byang chub sems dpa'i mthus su rnam pa drug tu
75a7(mdo sde): g.yos pa dang /lha rnams dga' ba dang mgu bas yang rnam pa sna chags pa'i me tog gi char dang /rin po che'i char yang phab ste/'dzam bu'i gling thams cad du ma tog
75b1(mdo sde): dang rin po che'i char pus mo nub tsam gyis g.yogs par gyur to//lha dang mi rnams kyis 'byor pa bsam gyis mi khyab par gyur pa de rnams mthong ba dang /ngo mtshar du gyur cing rmad du/
75b2(mdo sde): byung ba skyes te/ched du brjod pa ched du brjod pa/e ma'o rgyal po dpal gyi snga'i bsod nams kyi stobs/e ma'i ngo mtshar che'o//de nas lha'i dbang po brgya byin lha brgya stong du
75b3(mdo sde): ma dang thobs gcig tu byang chub sems dpa' yang dag par dga' bar byas nas rang gi gnasu song ngo //ri la gnas pa'i drang srong de yang 'khor lnga brgya dang /byang chub sems
75b4(mdo sde): dpa' la mngon par bstod do//bsti gnas nyid du song ngo //de nas byang chub sems dpas skye bo'i tshogs chen pos mngon par btud cing yun ring du chos kyi rgyal po byed par gyur to//
75b5(mdo sde): 'dzam bu gling gi dman pa dang /long ba dang /bkren pa dang /sdug phongs pa thams cad nor gyis tshim par byas nas/dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam lnga bzhag ste/'dod pa na
75b6(mdo sde): spyod pa'i lha drug kun dga' bar byas nas/dus gzhan zhig gi tshe/srog chags brgya stong du ma rnams dang lhan cig tu dus byas te/dga' ldan gyis lha'i ris su skyes bcom
75b7(mdo sde): ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/dge slong dag de'i tshe de'i dus na/rgyal po dpal gyi snga zhes bya ba de gzhan zhig yin snya mo du the tsom 'am/yid gnyi su gyur na khyed rnams kyis
76a1(mdo sde): de ltar mi blta'o//gzhan du na nga nyid de'i tshe de'i dus na rgyal po dpal gyi sde zhes bya bar gyur te/de'i tshe rang gi lus yongasu btang ngo //dge slong dag de'i tshe de'i
76a2(mdo sde): dus na/rgyal po dpal gyi sde'i btsun mo rgyal ba'i 'od du gyur pa gang yin pa de ni grags 'dzin me 'di nyid yin te/de'i tshe de'i dus na/btsun mo rgyal ba'i 'od ces bya bar gyur to//
76a3(mdo sde): dge slong dag blon po'i mchog blo gros chen por gyur pa gang yin pa de ni dge slong shA ri'i bu 'di nyid yin te/de'i tshe de'i dus na/blon po bla gros chen por gyur to//dge slong dag
76a4(mdo sde): lha'i dbang po brgya byin du gyur pa gang yin pa da ni/rgyal po gzugs can snying po 'di nyid yin te/de'i tshe de'i dus na/lha'i dbang po brgya byin du gyur to//dge slong dag su
76a5(mdo sde): cu rtsa gsum gyi lho gang yin pa de rnams ni/rgyal po gzugs can snying po dang lhan cig tu bden pa mthong ba lnga brgyad cu po 'di nyid yin to//dge slong drag grong khyer gyi skye bar
76a6(mdo sde): tshigs gang yin pa de ni/rgyal po gzugs can snying po gang dag dang thabs gcig tu nga'i thud du 'ongs pa'i ma ga d+hA'i bra mi ze dang khyim bdag 'di dag nyid yin no//dge slong dag
76a7(mdo sde): ri la gnas pa'i drang srong du gyur pa gang yin pa de ni/dge slong mo'u 'gal gyi bu chen po 'di nyid yin te/de'i tshe de'i dus na/drang srong du gyur to//gang gis de'i drung du
76b1(mdo sde): nidro kyi skye nas/ sa pa sa su rnams pa des phyag da bdag
77a1(mdo sde): dus gcig na/bcom ldan 'das rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na/dge slong stong nyis brgya lnga bcu'i dge slong
77a2(mdo sde): dge 'dun chen po dang thabs gcig tu bzhug so//bcom ldan 'das la dge slong dang /dge slong ma dang /dge bsnyen dang /dge bsnyen ma dang /rgyal po dang /blon

77b1(mdo sde): rig pa dang zhabasu ldan pa/bde bar gshegs pa/'jig rten mkhyen pa dang /skyes bu 'dul ba'i kha lo sgyur ba/bla na med pa/lha dang mi rnams kyi ston pa/sangs rgyas

77b5(mdo sde): 'das kyis dge slong rnams la bka' stsal pa/dge slong dag ji ltar nges sbyin pa'i 'bras bu dang /sbyin pa la 'god pa'i rnam par smin pa shes pa ltar/sems can rnams

80b1(mdo sde): legs par grongs la/'dzam bu'i gling gi mi thams cad kyi bza' ba legs par mnyam par bgo bar gyis shig/grangs pa dang /rtsis pa dang //yi ge pa'i mi rnams kyis/rgyal po
80b2(mdo sde): gser mdog gi ltar mnyan nas/'dzam bu'i gling gi mi thams cad legs par bgrangaso//rgyal po gser mdog man chad legs par bgrangs nas/'dzam bu'i gling gi mi thams
80b3(mdo sde): cad la bza' ba mnyam par 'ged do//lo bcu gcig gi bar du ni shi ba med do//lo bcu gnyis pa byung ba'i tshe zla ba gcig la der mi mang du skyes pa dang bud med dang /khye'u dang bu mo
80b4(mdo sde): bkres pa dang skom pas shi'o//lo bcu gnyis pa byung ba'i tshe zla ba lhag ma gnyis dang gsum dang /bzhi dang lnga dang bcu gcig gi bar du der mang du skyes pa dang /bud med dang
80b5(mdo sde): khye'u dang bu mo rnams shi bar gyur to//de'i tshe na 'dzam bu'i gling gi zas la sogs pa thams cad yongasu zad do//gzhan du na gser mdog la zas kyi lhag ma bre'u chung gang zhig
80b6(mdo sde): yod do//de'i tshe dus gzhan zhig na/bskal pa bzhi bcur spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' zhig/mi mjed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams 'dir phyin par gyur to//byang chub sems
80b7(mdo sde): dpa' des gzhan zhig tu/nags khrod zhig na/bu dang ma gnyis nyal po byed pa zhig mthong ngo //mthong nas kyang 'di snyam du gyur te/e ma'o nyon mongaso//sems can
81a1(mdo sde): 'di dag ni nyon mongs gang gi tshe zla ba dgu rum de nyid gnas la/de nyid kyi nu ma lnga 'thungs nas/de nyid du de ltar byed/'di 'dra ba'i sems can chos ma yin
81a2(mdo sde): pa'i 'dod chags kyis zhen pa/log par lta ba 'dod pa mi bzad pas zil gyis non pa/phar mi 'dzin pa/mar mi 'dzin pa/dge sbyong du mi 'dzin pa/bram zer mi 'dzin pa//
81a3(mdo sde): rigs kyi rgan rabs la bkur bsti mi byed pa rnams kyi bdag mchog ste/'di 'dra ba'i sems can rnams kyi don/byang chub kyi spyod pa spyad par su zhig spro/bdag ni nges par
81a4(mdo sde): bdag gcig pu'i don bsgrub po snyamo//de nas byang chub sems dpa' de gzhan gzhan du shing ljon pa'i drung ga la ba der song ste phyin nas/shing ljon pa'i drung der skyil mo krung bcas
81a5(mdo sde): nas lus bsrang ste/dga' ba dang /bde ba dang /dran pa mngon du bzhag nas 'dug/de nas byang chub sems dpa' de nye bar len pa'i phung po lnga rnams la//skye ba dang /
81a6(mdo sde): 'jig par rje su lta zhing gnas te/'di ni gzugs te/gzugs 'di ni skye ba'o//gzugs 'di ni 'jig pa'o//'di ni tshor ba/'di dag ni 'du shes 'di dag ni 'du
81a7(mdo sde): byed/'di dag ni rnam par shes pa ste/rnam par shes pa 'di ni skye ba'o//rnam par shes pa 'di ni 'jig pa'o zhes/de nye bar len pa'i phung po lnga po 'di rnams la skye de/
81b1(mdo sde): dang /'jig par rje su lta zhing gnaso//gang cung zad skye ba'i chos de thams cad ni/yun mi ring ba nyid du 'gag pa'i chos yin par rig nas/de nyid du rang byang chub rjesu thob bo//
81b2(mdo sde): de nas bcom ldan 'das rang sangs rgyas de'i rkyen ji lta ba bzhin gyis/chos thob pa mthang nas/de'i tshe tshigasu bcad pa 'di smras pa/yang dag bsnyen nas chags gyur la/
81b3(mdo sde): chags las sdug bsngal 'di byung ste//tshogs las sdug bsngal 'di 'jug pas//de phyir mkhas pas chags sun phyung //bse ru lta bur gcig pu spyad//de nas bcom
81b4(mdo sde): ldan 'das rang sangs rgyas de 'di snyam du gyur te/bdag gis sems can rnams kyi phyir/dka' ba mang zhig spyad pas ni su la yang phan pa byas pas ma yin te/bdag gis
81b5(mdo sde): de su zhig la sa brtse bar bya zhing bdag gos dang su zhig la bsod snyoms smrangs te/yongasu bzar bar bya snyam//de nas bcom ldan 'das rang sangs rgyas de ma las shin tu
81b6(mdo sde): 'das pa'i lha'i spyan gyis 'dzam bu'i gling 'di kun tu bltas pa dang /bcom ldan 'das rang sangs rgyas ngos 'dzam bu'i gling gi zas la sogs pa yongasasu zad par mthong ste/gzhan
81b7(mdo sde): du rgyal po gser mdag la zas kyi lhag ma bre'u chung gang zhig yod do//de 'di snyam du gyur to/bdag gis nges par rgyal po gser mdog la snying brtse bar bya zhing /bdag
82a1(mdo sde): gis nges par rgyal po gser mdog la zas kyi lhag ma bre'u chung gang zhig yod pa las blangs te/yongasu bza' bar bya'o snyamo//de nas bcom ldan 'das rang
82a2(mdo sde): sangs rgyas de de'i rdzu 'phrul 'di lta bus na mkha' la mngon du song ste/lus snang bar bya bzhin du rdzu 'phrul gyis/rgyal po'i pho brang gser can gang na ba der song ngo //de'i tshe rgyal
82a3(mdo sde): po gser mdog blon po lnga stong tsam dang /khang bzangs kyis steng na 'khad par gyur to//bcom ldan 'das rang sangs rgyas de rgyang ring po nas 'di ltar 'ong ba na/sna chen po la
82a4(mdo sde): gtogs pa gcig gis mthong ngo //mthong nas sna chen po la gtogs pa dag bos nas/grong gi gtso bo dag ltos shig/'di ltar rgyang ring po nas/bya dmar po 'phur ba zhig 'ong ngo ///
82a5(mdo sde): sna chen po la gtogs pa gnyis pas smras pa/grong gi gtso bo dag 'di ni bya dmar po 'phur ba ma yin gyi/'di ni srin po mdangs 'phrog zhig 'ong ste/'dis ni ding bdag cag
82a6(mdo sde): zos par 'gyuraro//de nas rgyal po gser mdog lag pa gnyis klas bzhin legs par phyis te /sna chen po rnams la smras pa/grong ga gtso bo dag 'di ni bya dmar po 'phur
82a7(mdo sde): ba ma yin la/srin po mdangs 'phrog pa yang ma yin no//'di ni drang srong ste/bdag cig la snying brtse ba'i phyir 'ong ngo //de nas bcom ldan 'das rang sangs rgyas de rgyal po
82b1(mdo sde): gser mdog gi khang zangs kyi steng du bab so//de nas rgyal po gser mdog langs nas/bcom ldan 'das rang sangs rgyas de bsus nas/bcom ldan 'das rang sangs rgyas de'i zhabs
82b2(mdo sde): la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/stan bshams pa la bzhugs par gsol to//de nas rgyal po gser mdog gis/bcom ldan 'das rang sangs rgyas de la 'di skad ces smras//
82b3(mdo sde): drang srong ci'i phyir 'dir byon//drang srong gis smras pa/rgyal po zas kyi phyir ro//de nas rgyal po gser mdog rab tu ngus te/mchi ma phyung nas/e ma'o bdag dbul te 'di ltar
82b4(mdo sde): 'dzam bu'i gling gi dbang phyug dam pa byas kyis kyang /drang srong gcig la bsod snyoms dbul bar ma nuso//de nas rgyal po'i pho brang gser can na gnas pa'i lha des rgyal po gser
82b5(mdo sde): mdog la tshigasu bca de smras pa/ci zhig sdug bsngal yin zhes pa de ni dbul ba'o//shin tu sdug bsngal gang yin dbul ba de nyid de/dbul ba dag gi nang na shi dang mtshungs
82b6(mdo sde): par gyur pa ste/bdag ni shi yang bla yi dbul bar mi 'dod do//de nas rgyal po gser mdog gis mdzod la bos nas/'di skad ces smras//grong gi gtso bo khyim na bza' cung
82b7(mdo sde): zad yod na/drang srong 'di la dbul bar bya'o//des smras pa/gang lha nyid mkhyen pa lags te/'dzam bu'i gling gi zas la sogs pa thams cad yongasu bas so//gzhan
83a1(mdo sde): dun nyug gcig bshos kyi lhag ma bre'u chung gang zhig mchiso//de nas rgyal po gser mdog 'di snyam du gyur te/kal tA zos nan lan ste mthos nan dzi sna/ yang /
83a2(mdo sde): 'di snyam du gyur te/gal te zos kyang nges par bdag 'chi bar 'gyur te/'tsho bas mchog gis ji ltar na/'di 'dra ba'i drang srong tshul khrims dang ldan pa/dge ba'i chos
83a3(mdo sde): can te/de nas rgyal po gser mdog gis/rtsis dang sna chen po la gtogs pa dang /sgo ba dang /'khor rnams bsdus nas/'di skad ces smras//grong gi gtso bo dag
83a4(mdo sde): kyi hud/'di ni gser mdog gi sbyin pa gtong ba mtha' ma yin te/rje su yi rang bar gyis shig/dge ba'i rtsa ba 'dis/'dzam bu'i gling gi mo thams cad kyi dbul ba yang
83a5(mdo sde): dag par gcod par gyur cig/de nas rgyal po gser mdog gis zas bre'u chung gang yod pa de/bcom ldan 'das rang sangs rgyas de'i lhung bzed du blugs nas/bcom
83a6(mdo sde): ldan 'das rang sangs rgyas de'i lag pa g.yas par lhung bzed byin no//gang rang sangs rgyas kyi lus kyis chos ston pa ni chos nyid de/tshig gis ni ma yin no//de nas
83a7(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das rang sangs rgyas te/rgyal po gser mdog gi bsod snyoms blangs nas/'di ltar rdzu 'phrul gyis na mkha' la song ngo //de nas rgyal po gser mdog
83b1(mdo sde): thal mo sbyar nas/mig rgyang gis sod dag gi bar du mig mi 'dzums par bltaso//de nas rgyal po gser mdog gis/rtsis pa dang /sna chen po la gtogs pa dang /blon po dang /
83b2(mdo sde): sgo ba dang /'khor rnams bos nas 'di skad ces smraso//grong gi gtso bo dag rang rang gi gnas ji lta ba bzhin dang shig khang bzangs 'dir bkres pa dang /skom pas 'chi ba'i dus ma
83b3(mdo sde): byed cig/de dag gis smras pa/gang gi tshe lha'i dpal dang sku dpal dang ldan par gyur pa de'i tshe/bdag cag lha'i zhwa 'bring na rtse zhing dga' la longs spyod pa lags na/'di lta ste/
83b4(mdo sde): bdag cag lha'i dus phyi ma dang /dus tshod phyi ma yongasu btang ba ga la zhig bzod/de nas rgyal po gser mdog rab tu ngus te mchi ma phyung ngo //mchi ma de legs par phyis nas/rtsis
83b5(mdo sde): pa dang /sna chen po la gtogs pa dang /blon po dang /sgo ba dang /'khor rnams la 'di skad ces smraso//grong gi gtso bo dag rang gi gnas ji lta ba bzhin dang shig/thams cad
83b6(mdo sde): kyis khang bzangs 'dir bkres pa dang skom pa dag gis 'chi ba'i dus ma byed cig/de nas rtsis pa dang /sna chen po la gtogs pa dang /blon po dang /sgo ba dang /'khor rnams rab tu
83b7(mdo sde): dus te/mchi ma phyung ngo //mchi ma legs par phyis nas/rgyal po gser mdog gal ba der song ste phyin nas rgyal po gser mdog gi rkang pa gnyis la phyag 'tshal te/thal
84a1(mdo sde): mo sbyar nas/rgyal po gser mdog la 'di skad ces smras//bdag cag gis lha'i zhal ta ba'i phyi ma dang lags te bdag cag gis gang cung zad lta bka las
84a2(mdo sde): 'gal ba ci bgyis pa bzod par gsol lo//'di lta ste/bcom ldan 'das rang sangs rgyas des bsod snyoms de yongasu zos so//de nas skad cig de nyid la phyogs bzhi nas
84a3(mdo sde): sbyin stug po bzhi langs//rlung grang ba yang langs te/de'i tshe 'dzam bu gling phyag so//de nas de'i dus kyi bye brag la/bca' bar bya ba dang /bza' bar bya ba rnam pa sna tshogs
84a4(mdo sde): kyi char bab ste/bza' bar bya ba dngos po 'di lta bu 'bras can dang /phye dang zan dron dang sha dang nya sho dang /bca' bar bya ba'i dngos po 'di lta bu bca' bar bya ba la phug dang /
84a5(mdo sde): bza' bar bya ba lo ma dang /bza' bar bya ba me tog dang /bza' bar bya ba 'bras bu dang /bza' bar bya ba til dang /bza' bar bya ba til mar dang /bza' bar bya ba bu
84a6(mdo sde): ram dang /bza' bar bya ba ka ra dang /gzhan yang bza' bar bya ba dang /bcang bar bya ba dang /myong bar bya ba rnam pa mang po'i bza' ba dag gi char bab po//de nas rgyal
84a7(mdo sde): po gser mdog mgu la dga' zhing yid rangs te/rab tu dga' nas dga' ba dang /yid bde ba skyes te/rtsis pa dang /sna chen po la gtogs pa dang /blon po dang /
84b1(mdo sde): spro ba dang /'khor rnams bos nas 'di skad ces smras//grong gi gtso bo dag ltos shig/kye ma dang bsod snyoms gcig phul ba'i myu gu byung bar gyur te/'bras bu dang lo ma dang me tog
84b2(mdo sde): ni phyis 'byung bar 'gyuraro//de nas nyi ma gnyis pa la/nyin bdun du nor dang 'bru'i char rab tu phab bo//'di lta ste/til dang /'bras thug po che dang /mon sran gle'u dang /
84b3(mdo sde): mon sran dkar bu dang /nas dang gro dang /sran chung dang /'bras sa lu dang /'bru'i rigs thams cad dang /zhag bdun mar sar gyi char bab bo//zhag bdun du til mar gyi
84b4(mdo sde): char bab po//zhag bdun du be'u ris kyi char bab bo//zhag bdun du rdzas rnam pa sna tshogs kyi char bab po//zhag bdun du rin po che sna bdun la/gser dang /dal dang /shel
84b5(mdo sde): dang /bai DUr+ya dang /mu tig dmar po dang /rdo'i snying po dang /spug rnams te/rin po che sna bdun po 'di dag gi char bab bo//rgyal po gser mdog gi mthus/'jam
84b6(mdo sde): bu'i gling gi mi thams cad kyi dbul ba yang dag par bcad par gyur to//dge slong dag de'i tshe/de'i dus ni rgyal por gyur pa de/gzhan zhig yin snyam du khyod kyis som ny+dzi dang /
84b7(mdo sde): yid gnyisu mi bya'o//dge slong dag de'i tshe de'i dus na/rgyal po gser mdog ces bya ba byung ba de ni/nga nyid yin par blta bar bya'o//dge slong dag rnam grangs des kyang 'di ltar
85a1(mdo sde): rig par bya ste/ji ltar ngas sbyin pa'i 'bras bu dang /sbyin pa la 'god pa'i rnam par smin pa shes pa ltar/sems can rnams kyis kyang /sbyin pa'i 'bras bu
85a2(mdo sde): dang sbyin pa la 'ged pa'i rnam par smin pa shes par gyis shig/gang kha mo phyi ma'i kham phyi ma gcig pu de yang gzhan dag la ma byin ma bgos par bdag gis bor mi bya'o//
85a3(mdo sde): ser sna'i sems kyi dri ma skyes pas kun nas dkris te 'dug par mi bya'o//ji ltar nges shes pa de bzhin du/'di ltar sems can gyi sbyin pa la 'ged pa'i rnam par smon pa mi
85a4(mdo sde): shes te/de lta bsnga na sems can dgra phyi ma phyi ma'i kham gcig pu de yang gzhan dag la ma byin ma bgos par bdag nyid kyis bza' bor mi bya'o//ser sna'i sems kyi dri ma
85a5(mdo sde): skyes pas kun nas dkris te 'dug par mi bya'o//sngon gyi dge dang mi dge byas pa chud mi za//mkhas pa dag la brten pa chud mi za ste//'phags pa'i skye bos legs par bshad/
85a6(mdo sde): po chud mi zad//byas pa gzol byas pa rnams kyang chud mi za//bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang /byang chub sems dpa' de dag dang /dge slong de dag dang //
85a7(mdo sde): lha dang /mi dang lha ma yin dang /dri zar bcas pa'i 'jig rten yid rangs te/bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do///
85b1(mdo sde): gser mdog gi sngon gyi sbyor ba zhes bya ba rdzog so///bod skad du/'phags pa rgyal bu don grub/
85b2(mdo sde): gyi mdo//'di skad bdag gis thos pa'i dus cig na/bcom ldan 'das mnyan du yod pa na/rgyal bu 'dze ta'i tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na/dge slong dang /dge slong
85b3(mdo sde): ma dang /dge bsnyen pa dang /dge snyen ma grangs med pa dang /thabs gcig tu bzhugaso//de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das 'dzum pa mdzad nas/zhal gyi sgo nas/'od zer kha dog sna lnga
85b4(mdo sde): dang ldan pa bkye ba dang /tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo stan las langs te/gos tsha gagos bcos nas thal mo sbyar te/bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to//bdag gis sangs
85b5(mdo sde): rgyas kyi zha 'bring lo nyi shu bgyis kyi bar du/de 'dra bar bzhad pa ma mthong na/bcom ldan 'das kyis sangs rgyas sngon 'das pa 'am/ma byon pa 'am/da ltar bzhugs pa'i sangs
85b6(mdo sde): rgyas la dgongs sam/de ma lags pa ci la dgongs pa don bstan du gsol/bcom ldan 'das kyis kun dga' bo la bka' stsal pa/sangs rgyas 'das pa 'am/ma 'ongs pa 'am//
85b7(mdo sde): da ltar bzhugs pa la dgongs pa ma yin gyi/mngon par dran pa/nga sngon bskal pa glang med pa'i pha rol na/sbyin pa byin pa'i dngos po la dgongs te/de'i tshe de'i dus na/yul ya ba
86a1(mdo sde): zhes bya bar/rgyal po dge bzhed bya ba/drang ba'i chos kyi yul gyi sgyid 'dzin te/'gro ba mang ba sbyang ba zhig byung ngo //rgyal po de la blon pa ni bzhi stong zhig/
86a2(mdo sde): yod de/rgyal phran drug cu la dbang bskur ro//grong khyer chen po brgyad brgya dang /bal gyi glang po che lnga brgya yod de/rgyal po la btsun mo nyi khri yod kyang /sras mi mnga' bas
86a3(mdo sde): ri dang klung go lta gnyen pa la mchod 'bred byas nas/btsun mo dam pa ya sras mnga' bar gyur te/btsun mo'i mel cha dang /zas dang skom la sogs pa yo byad padam zhing bzang
86a4(mdo sde): bopor sbyar nas/rgyal po nyid kyi rim gro byas te/zla ba bcur tshang nas/rgyal bu gcig btsa so//pho brang gi btsun mo nyi khri skyed kyang rgyal bu zhig btsasdu shes thos nas tha~Md
86a5(mdo sde): dga' mgu rangs te/nu zho yang rang byung bas/rgyal bu'i mtshan yang don grub ces btag so//rgyal bu le nu zho snun cing rim gau byed pa bzhi zhig bskos te/gcig ni nu zho
86a6(mdo sde): snun pa'i las byed/gcig ni rgyal bu phang du khyer bar bskosagacig ni rgyal bu bkru ba'i las byed par bsgres gcig ni rgyal bu brtser 'gro ba'i lasuM brkos so//de
86a7(mdo sde): lcer bsgos nas/rgyal bu lo bcu drug yon bai dong /mig rtsis dang /'phongs rnal dang /bzod byed dang //rol mo la sogs pa gang yang mi shes pa med de/thams
86b1(mdo sde): cad kyang lobs/rgyal po yab dang yum la yang lha btsun 'dra bar rim gro byed do//rgyal pos kyang rgyal bu'i pho brang logs shig tu bsgrigaso//rgyal bu de chung ngu nas sbyin pa la dga' nas/
86b2(mdo sde): mi la sogs te/ri dgas dang /'dub chags bya'i bar du sems can thams cad bde skyid par dga' ste/tshig tu yang gang mi shes pa gti mug can ni sbyin pa lo mi dga' bas
86b3(mdo sde): bdag gis bdag bslus te/phan pa'i don med kyis/mkhas pa shes rab can ni/'jig rten gnas kyang sbyin pa la yon tan cher mthong ste/sbyin pa byin pas snga ma 'das
86b4(mdo sde): pa dang /ma byon pa dang /da ltar bzhugs pa'i sangs rgyas dang/rang sangs rgyas dang /'phags pa dgra bcom pa thams cad kyis bstod cing bsngagos par 'gyu ro zhes smraso//
86b5(mdo sde): rgyal bu bags kyis cher skyes nas/rgyal po zhig gi bu mo man te zhes bya ba mnga' byad bzang la sdug pa dang /dpe zla med pa/gser dang /dngul dang /bai DUr+ya dang /rin po che sna
86b6(mdo sde): tshogs kyi rgyun gyi brgyan po/gcig btsun mor blangs na/bu mi srid gnyis shig yod par gyur to//de nas rgyal bu de sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i don sems pa la zhugs nas/
86b7(mdo sde): yab rgyal po la bdag ni rtse zhing ltad mo ltar mchi zhes gsol pa dang /rgyal pos kyang de bzhin du gnang ngo //de nas rgyal bu pho brang nas byung ba dang /brgya byin lha'i dbang pos grong
87a1(mdo sde): khyer gyi sgo lam srang dag na/dbul phongs pa/long ba 'on pa/lkugs pa'i slongs mo pa dag cing sprul nas sdod du bcugo/rgyal bus de dag mthong ba dang /
87a2(mdo sde): de ma thag tu phyir log nas pho brang du zhugs te/mya ngan chen pos non nas/mi dga' zhing 'dug pa la/yab rgyal pos sras rgyal bu la 'di skad ces bsgo'o//rtse zhing ltad mo ltar
87a3(mdo sde): btang na/ci'i phyir mi dga' zhing mya ngan byed par gyur ces dris pa dang /rgyal bus yab rgyal po la 'di skad ces gsol to//bdag rtse zhing ltad mo ltar mchis pa las/slongs
87a4(mdo sde): pa long ba 'on pa lkugs pa mang po dang mjal bas mya ngan gyis non par gyur te/nga yab rgyal po la gsol ba rna gcig gsol na/rgyal po sna gnang ngam/yab rgyal pos
87a5(mdo sde): kyang rgyal bu khyod ci dang ci 'dod pa smros shig dang gnang bar bya'o//zhes bsgo ba dang /rgyal bus rgyal po la 'di skad ces gsol to//bdag ni yab rgyal po la mnga' ba'i bang
87a6(mdo sde): mdzod na rin po che mchis pa rnams grong khyer gyi sgo bzhi dang /tshong 'dus su spungs te/slongs mo bo thams cad la yid dang mi 'gal bar sbyin pa bgyid par 'tshalo zhes gsol
87a7(mdo sde): pa dang /rgyal pos sras rgyal bu le khyod ci dang ci dga' ba yid dang mi 'gal bar gnango zhes bsgo'o//de nas rgyal bus blon po rnams la sgo nas/nor dbyig rin po che rnams
87b1(mdo sde): shing rtas bskyas twa/grang khyer gyi sgo bzhi dang /tshong dus su sbyangs nas pha rol po 'dod pa bzhin sbyin pa byin pa dang /yul khams phyogs brgyad kun tu rgyal bu'i yon tan grags par
87b2(mdo sde): gyur pas/kha cig ni dpag tshad brgya/kha cig ni dpag tshad stong /kha cig ni dpag tshad khri'i pha rol nas lhags te/kha zas dang skom 'dod pa la ni zas skom byin/gang gos dang bgo
87b3(mdo sde): ba 'dod pa la ni gos dang bgo ba byin/gang gser dang /dngul dang /rin po che 'dod pa la yang ci 'dod pa bzhin/yid dang mi 'gal bar gang yang mi gtang ba med do//de'i tshe de'i dus
87b4(mdo sde): na/dag zlar gyur pa'i rgyal khams gcig cig yod pa des/rgyal bu sbyin pa byin pa la dga' bas/pha rol po ci 'dod pa bzhin yid dang mi 'gal bar yongasu gtang ngo zhes thos nas
87b5(mdo sde): blon po rnams dang /mkhas pa blo dang ldan pa kun la sogs pa sdus te//'di skad ces bgros so//yul ya pa'i rgyal po la bal gyi glang po che pad+mo'i steng nas 'gro ba su tA ya zhes bya/
87b6(mdo sde): ba/stobs dang ldan pa zhig yod de de dag nam dgra zla'i rgyal khams gzhan dang 'thab pa'i tshe/bal gyi glang po che des rtag tu rgyal bar gyur pas na/khyed las su zhig der song
87b7(mdo sde): ste/sangs rgyas par nus shes bgros na/blon po las gang yang 'gro nus pa ma byung ngo //de'i nang nas bram ze mi brgyad zhig gis rgyal po la 'di skad ces gsol to//bdag
88a1(mdo sde): cag gis slong zhing mchi bar 'tshal na/bdag cag gi tshogs dang rgyags sbyor cig ces gsol pa dang /rgyal pos de'i tshogs dang rgyags sbyar nas/bram
88a2(mdo sde): ze la 'di skad ces bsgo'o//gal te khyod kyis bal glang de khugs te 'ongs nas/bya dga' chero sbyin no zhes gtsigs byaso//de nas bram ze brgyad pos khor ba thogs te/la
88a3(mdo sde): lung bgrod nas/yul ya ba gdan pa der song ngo //yul dang phyin nas/rgyal po'i sgor khar po la skom tshugs bcas te/rkang pa ye gcig gis 'greng zhing sdod do//de nas
88a4(mdo sde): rgyal bu'i sgo srungs pho brang nang du song nas/phyi rol na bram ze dag cig lhags to/khar ba la skom tshugs bcas nas/rkang pa ya cig gis 'greng zhing sdod do//bdag cag
88a5(mdo sde): ni lam ring po nas/ched du 'dir slong du 'ongs so zhes mchi'o//rgyal bus de skad ces smras pa thos nas/rab tu dga' ste mod la phyi rol tu byung nas bsus te phyag byaso//
88a6(mdo sde): dper na pha dang bu phrad pa tsam du gcig la gcig gis spro ba'i tshig gis khyed gang phyogs nas 'ongs/lam du nyon ma mongs sam/ci 'dod ci slong na rkang pa ye gcig gis 'breng
88a7(mdo sde): zhes dris so//bram ze brgyad pos smras pa/bdag cag ni rgyal bu khyod sbyin 'byon pa lag tu dga' bas pha rol po ci slong yang yid dang 'gal bar mi mdzagad+d+ho zhes rgyal bu'i yon tan
88b1(mdo sde): phyogs mtshams brgyad dang yar ni stang gi gnam la thug/mAr ni sa'i mthil la thug pa man chad du grags pas na/khyod kyi sbyin pa'i yon tan ni bsam gyis mi khyab ste/nye ring thams
88b2(mdo sde): cad kyis bstod cing bsgrags pas/gang yang ma thos pa'am mi shes pa med de/kun gyi brjod pa ma yin la/da lta'i sa su gyur pas na//lha ni ci sgra yang brdzun pa ma yin te/nga rgyal
88b3(mdo sde): bus sbyin pa mi mdzad na bdag cag gi yid dang 'gal bar mdzad dam/bdag cag ni rgyal bu las me tog pad+mo'i steng nas 'gro ba/bal gyi glang po che slong du 'ongs so zhes smras pa dang /rgyal
88b4(mdo sde): bus de dag bal glang gi lha su khrid de/bal glang gzhan zhig byin no//bram ze brgyad pos smras pa/bdag cag ni pad+mo'i steng nas 'gro ba'i bal gyi glang po che su drA yan 'dod do//rgyal
88b5(mdo sde): bus smras pa/bal gyi glang po che 'di ni bdag gi yab rgyal po la gcas shing gnad pa ya ni te/bal glang 'di dang bdag tu tha mi dad par dgongs pas/khyed la sbyin du mi rung ngo //gal
88b6(mdo sde): te bdag gis khyed la byin na/rgyal po'i dgongs pa dang 'gal bas/gal te bal glang 'di'i rkyen gyis bdag yul 'ang nas skrod par 'gyu ro zhes smras nas/rgyal bu yang 'di snyam du
88b7(mdo sde): bsamaso//bdag sngon gyi dam bcas pa na/pha rol po ci slong yang yid dang mi 'gal ba bya'o zhes dam bcas na/da bdag gi sngar bsams pa las bzlog ste/sbyin pa 'di ma
89a1(mdo sde): byin na/ci ltar yang bla na med pa mnyam snyoms pa'i sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa rdzogs par mi 'gyur/gal te sbyin pa 'di byin na/bla na med pa mnyam snyoms parda/
89a2(mdo sde): sbyin sem su 'gyur snyam bsems rnaMs/rgyal bu sku 'di skad ces smras//shin tu dka'o steng bzhin du sbyin par bya'o zhes smras nas/rlung ni 'dug pa'i g.yog la dul gyi glang
89a3(mdo sde): rmi la gser dngul gyi sgras bsnyad de/myur du khrig de shig shig ces bsgo ba dang /bal glang khrid de 'ongs nas/rgyal bus leg pa g.yon pas ni/chu'i snod thogs te/drim
89a4(mdo sde): ze'i lag pa bkrus/lag pa g.yas pas nI/bal glang gi sna thag nas bzung ste/bram ze brgyad po la byin pa dang /bram ze brgyad pos rgyal bu la smon la mi btab ma thag tu
89a5(mdo sde): bal gyi glang po che la spyugs te/dga' bzhin du dong ngo //de nis rgyal bus bram ze de dag la yong 'di skad ces bsko'o//khyed myur du 'gyogs par song shig/gal te la
89a6(mdo sde): rgyal bas gas nan rtogs mi gtong ste 'phrog tu 'di zhes bsgo ba dang /de'i tshe bram ze de dag gis de ma thag tu mgyog su dong ngo //blon pa rnams kyis rgyal bus bal gyi glang
89a7(mdo sde): dgra zla la byin no zhes thos nas/thams cad sreg ste/khri las dbab tu lhung nas mya ngan gyis non ta'adi snyam du yul 'di na/bal glang 'di la bltas na dgra zla gzhan/
89b1(mdo sde): la byin par gyur to snyam du bsams nas/rgyal po ga la ba der song ste/'di skad ces gsol to//rgyal bus ni phyi'i dgra thub pa'i bal glang rin chen pha rol gyi dgra zla la byin no zhes
89b2(mdo sde): gsol pa dang /rgyal po yab yid yed por gyur pa las/blon pos yang 'di skad ces gsol to//da ltar rgyal po la bal gyi glang po che 'di mnga' bas/chab srid che ba lags te/
89b3(mdo sde): bal gyi glang po che de ni bal glang drug cu snyed kyi mthu stobs dang ldan pa lags na/rgyal bus dag la stsal te/dgra zla 'tshal bas/tshab srid kyang stor du mchi na/ci ltar mdzad pa'i
89b4(mdo sde): rigs/'di rgyal bu rang nyamasu sbyin pa byin pas bang mdzod kyang stongs shing /yul gyi srid dang /btsun mo dang /sras kyi bar du sbyin pa bgyid par dogaso zhes gsol pa dang /
89b5(mdo sde): rgyal pos de skad ces smras pa thos nas/lhag par mi dga' bar gyur te/blon po gzhan zhig bos nas/blon po de la rgyal bus bal gyi glang po che dgra zla byin pa bden nam zhes dris
89b6(mdo sde): pa dang /blon po des kyang byin pa bden no zhes gsol to//rgyal pos de skad smras pa thos ma thag tu cher dngangs nas/gdan khri las lhung ste/mi dran par brgyal bar gyur pa lnga
89b7(mdo sde): chus gtor nas/ring zhig lon pa dang /phyis sangs par gyur/btsun mo nyi khri snyed kyang thams cad mya ngan gyis non par gyur to//de nas rgyal po rnams dang /blon po
90a1(mdo sde): rnams 'dus nas/ngad rgyal bu 'di la ci ltar bya zhes bgos pa dang /de'i nang na blon po gcig gas ni/bal glang gi ltasu sted ngan+ta/rkang pa
90a2(mdo sde): gcig pa'i rigs/bal glang bzung ba ni lag pa gcig pa'i rigs migo gis bal glang la bltas nas/mig dbyung ba'i rigs shes gsol//kha cog gis ni mgo gcig
90a3(mdo sde): pa'i rig so zhes blon po rnams so so nas bkres te gsol ba'i tshig rgyal pos thos nas/rab tu mi dga' zhing mya ngan gyis non te/blon po rnams la 'di skad ces bsgo'o//nga'i
90a4(mdo sde): 'di legs pa'i don la mos te/sbyin pa la dga' ba yin na/ci ltar mtho ba tsam zhing gzung bar bya/de'i nang na blon po gcig gis blon po snga ma rnams kyis bgros pa mi rung
90a5(mdo sde): zhes dpyas nas 'di skad ces gsol te//rgyal po la sras gcig pu zhig mnga' ba la rab tu sdug cing gcas pas rgyal bu rgyal tshab lags na/de la mtho ba tsam zhing bzung
90a6(mdo sde): gdagaso bya ba'i sems bskyed pa ni rigs te/bdag ni rgyal po chen po'i sras la bzung bdags bya bar mi gsol gyi/rgyal bu 'di yul 'di nas skyugs te/lo bcu gnyis kyi
90a7(mdo sde): bar du dgon par spangs nas/sla bab cing ngo tsha bar 'gyuraro/zhes bsob pa dang /rgyal pos kyang blon po chen po'i tshig mnyan te//de nas rgyal pos rgyal bu rgyal tshis
90b1(mdo sde): bkug te/'di skad ces smras//khyod kyis nga'i bal gyi glang po che dgra zla la byin pa bden nam zhes dris pa dang /rgyal bus gsol pa/bdag gis skul ba med do zhes gsol to//rgyal
90b2(mdo sde): bas smras pa/rgyal bu khyod ci'i byor de la ma zhus par nga'i bal gyi glang po che dgra zla la byin zhes dris pa dang /rgyal bus rgyal po la 'di skad ces gsol to//sngar yab rgyal po dang dam
90b3(mdo sde): bcas pa na/sbyin pa ci sbyin na yang mi 'gal bar mdzad do zhes gsungs pa/nga rgyal po la ma zhus pa lags//rgyal pos smras pa/sngar dam bcas pa ni/nor dbyig dang /rin
90b4(mdo sde): bopo che dbang bar byas na/bal gyi glang po che ci gtogs/rgyal bus gsol pa/de dag thams cad rgyal po mnga' ba'i bkod lags na/ci'i slad du 'di bkol te ma gtogs zhes
90b5(mdo sde): gsungs/rgyal pos rgyal bu rgyal tshab la smras pa/khyod rid na tig tu lo bcu gnyis spangs kyis/yul 'di nas myur du byung ste song shig/rgyal po la gsol pa/bdag
90b6(mdo sde): rgyal po chen pos bka' stsal pa'i bka' ni mi bcog na/da dung yang zhag bdun zhig sbyin pa bgyis te/bdag gis bsam pa rdzogs nas/yul 'di nas byung ste/mchi bar
90b7(mdo sde): 'tshal lo zhes gsol/rgyal pos smras pa/khyod kyis sbyin pa ma 'os par byas pas yul gyi ngang mdzod kun stongs te/nga'i bal glang rin po che yang med par byas pas khyod
91a1(mdo sde): sbyangs pa yin te/daphyir 'dug cing zhag bdun sbyin pa byur ma gnang gis/myur du song shig ces bsgo'o//rgyal bus gsol pa/rgyal po chen po'i bka' bdag
91a2(mdo sde): mi gcog ste/rgyal po'i btsun mo ni khri snyed kyang rgyal po gang na ba der lhags nas//rgyal bu rgyal tsho zhig bdun zhig sbyin pa byin d+hi/yul nas mchi bar gsol pa/rgyal pos
91a3(mdo sde): kyang de bzhin du gnang ngo //de nas rgyal bu rgyal tshab kyis so so bran g.yogs mngags te/phyogs bzhi nas nor rdzas 'dod pa rnams pho brang skor 'dus shig/nor zas thams cad ni
91a4(mdo sde): rtag pa dang brtan du rung ba ma yin te/mthar 'jig cing med pa'i chos can no zhes bsgo bas/phyogs bzhi nas slong ba mang po lhags pa la rgyal bu rgyal tshab kyis/zas dang skom dang tshor/
91a5(mdo sde): dang rin po che rnams zhag bdun gyi bar du yid bzhin du byin nas/dpal phongs pa rnams longs spyod dang ldan zhing /thams cad bde skying por byas so//de nas rgyal bu rgyal tshab kyis/
91a6(mdo sde): chung ma la smras pa/bzhin bzas longs la bdag ci zor ba nyon drug/rgyal po chen pos ni/blodag lo bcu gnyis kyi bar du ri ngan tog ces bya bar spya so//chung mas rgyal bus smras
91a7(mdo sde): pa'i tshig bris nas/yid ces mdangs te/langs nas 'di skad ces smras//rgyal bu la nyes pa ci zhig mchis ni rgyal pos de lta de ltar mdzad par gyur/rgyal bus smras pa/bdag
91b1(mdo sde): gis sbyin pa ma 'os pa zhig byas te/rgyal po'i bang mdzod kyang stongs/bal glang rin po che yang dgra zla la byin zhes rgyal po dang blon po rnams khros nas/bdag spangs pa yin no//btsun mo
91b2(mdo sde): man te smras pa/rgyal po'i yul du lo legs pa dang /rgyal po chen po dang /blon po dang /'bangs kyis bar du bde skyid pa dang /longs spyod che bar smon lam legs par btab la/
91b3(mdo sde): bdag cag ri la sgom du 'dong ngo //rgyal bus smras pa/bzhin bzangs ri ni 'jigs pa'i gnas yin te/shin tu bya dka' ba bsam dgos la/seng ge dang stag la sogs pa gcan
91b4(mdo sde): zan ma rungs pa yod pas/rab tu 'jigs na khyed ni longs spyod mang ba yin pas/khyod de lta bu bdag la bzod dam/khyod pho brang gi nang na go su ni phra ba dang 'jam pa gyon pa/gnasu ni
91b5(mdo sde): gur dang yol bas bskor ba na 'dug/zasu ni ci la dga' bo bzhin zhim pa dang mngar ba la za na/ri la ni stan du ni DI dngas/zasu ni 'bras bu zan/khyod de la mos shing dga' ba ci
91b6(mdo sde): zhig yod/de ma yin pa gzhan yang rlung dang char pa dang 'brug dang ser ba che zhing ba mo dang zil pas mi'i spu yang langs pa tsam du/grang ba'i tshe na ni grang rab la/tsha ba'i tshe na ni cha
91b7(mdo sde): rab ste/shing gi gseb na 'dug pa'i gan su yang mi rung na/sa la gze ma dang /gseg ma dang /rdo ba yang mang zhing /sbrul gdug pa yang yod na/khyod de lta bu dag bzod dang /
92a1(mdo sde): man tes smras pa/bdag la mnyan zhing 'jam pa dang /bur dang yol ba dang /mngar ba dang /zhim pas ci zhig bgyis/rgyal bu dang bral zhungs sar
92a2(mdo sde): mchi ba bdag mi bzod de/nam du yang rgyal bu dang mi 'bral zhing lhan cig 'grogs par dga'o//rgyal po'i thog mar 'gro ba ni rgyul mtshan/me'i thog mar 'gro ba ni dud pa/chung
92a3(mdo sde): mAma'i thog mar 'gro ba ni khyim thab yin pas bdag ni rgyal bu la yid brtan te/skyabasu mchi'o//rgyal bu ni bdag gi lnga legs te/rgyal bus phyogs bzhi nas 'dus pa'i sbyin pa
92a4(mdo sde): byin pa'i tshe/bdag gis kyang rgyal bu'i grogs bgyi bas/nga rgyal bu lam ring du 'gro ba las/gal te pha rol po slong ba 'ongs na/bdag gis de bzhin du grogs pa rgya
92a5(mdo sde): rgyal bus sbyin du mdzad na/bdag gi srog la bab kyang mi byar mi rung bas/the tshom mi mdzad du gsol/rgyal bus smras pa/bdag la ni sbyin pa la dga' bas/pha rol gyi
92a6(mdo sde): sems ni zlogs te/pha rol pos bdag la gal te/bu 'am khyod nyid slong ba 'ongs na yang /bdag gis mi gtong mi nuso//ci ste bdag gis bsams pa khyod kyis de bzhin
92a7(mdo sde): ma byas na ni/bdag gis dge ba'i sems 'khrugs par gyur pas//'gro ba mi rig so//man tes smras pa/rgyal bus sbyin pa mdzad pa ni/'jig rten gang ni yang 'di 'dra ba
92b1(mdo sde): med pas/yid bzhin du ston pa mdzad du gsol/rgyal bus smras pa/khyod de ltar nus na shin tu legs//zhes rgyal b+ha dang /btsun mo dang /sgras gnyis dang bcas 'grogs te/
92b2(mdo sde): yum gang na ba der sang nas/da bdag cig mchi'o zhes mchi phyag byas nas/yum la 'di skad ces gsol to//yum gyis skabs skabasu rgyal po chen po la/ji nas dkar po'i chos kyis
92b3(mdo sde): yul gyi srid bde zhing 'bangs mang po snyams las mi bcad par gros gdab par gsol lo//yum gyis rgyal bu 'gro'o zhes mchi phyag byas pa mthong nas/lhag par mya ngan gyis gdungs te
92b4(mdo sde): drung na 'dug la 'di skad ces smraso//kho mo'i lus 'di ni rdo ba yin pa lta/snying ni rdo rje yin pa lta ste/bdag gi rgyal po chen po'i rim gro bya ba la skyon ma byung na/de kho mo'i bu gcig
92b5(mdo sde): bu 'di dang bya bral te/'gro na ci'i phyir kho mo'i snying 'digs te shi bar ma gyur/bu 'di kho ma'i khongs pa na 'dug pa na/skyed shing gi 'dab ma lhor nyin mtshan cher skyes te/de skyed
92b6(mdo sde): rdzogs nas/kho mo bor te song bas na/btsun mo thams cad kyang bdag la snying tshim mo zhes brjod la rgyal pos kyang bkur bor mi 'gyur na/gal te lha rnams kyis//bdag gis
92b7(mdo sde): smon lam bzhin mi 'gal bar mdzad na/bdag gi bu byir yul du 'khor bar shog shig/ces smon lam btab bo//de nas rgyal bu btsun mo dang sras gnyis dang bcas te
93a1(mdo sde): yab dang yum la mchi phyag byas te/dong ngo //de'i che btsun ma nyi khris ni so sa nas mu tig gi rkun mo ri rI bag+h+nA so//zin pa chen po bzhi stong gis ni rin po che sna bdun
93a2(mdo sde): las byas pa'i me tog dang pad+mo re re rgyal bu la brdung so//de nas rgyal bu po blang nas byung ste/grong khyer gyi byang sgor phyin nas/rin po che sna bdun gyi me tog dang /do shal yang ril gyis
93a3(mdo sde): phyogs bzhi nas 'dus pa la mi lus par byin no//yul de na gnas pa'i mi mang po khri phrag du mas rgyal bu bskyal te/de dag 'di skad ces gtam du brjod do//rgyal bu 'di ni shin
93a4(mdo sde): tu dge ba yul gyi lha mnyan lta bu yin na/ci'i phyir yangab yum gyis sras rin po che 'di lam ring du spangs shes mthong ba thams cad kyis phang so zhes smraso//de'i tshe rgyal bu
93a5(mdo sde): grong khyer gyi phyi rol tu/skyed shing gi drung na 'dug ste/skyel ba'i mi rnams la 'di nas phyir dang shig ces spro ba'i tshig smras pa dang /skyel skyel ba che chung thams cad mtsho ma blags
93a6(mdo sde): tI/dus nas phyir dang ngo //de nas rgyal bus btsun mo dang sras gnyis shing rta'i nang du bzhag nas/rgyal bu nyid kyi shing rta kha lo ba sgyur te/song ba las rgyangs chad pa
93a7(mdo sde): phyin te/skyeng shing gi d+hu na ngal bso zhing 'dug pa las/bram ze dag cig lhags nas/rgyal bu lo shing rta khrid pa'i rta bslang so//rgyal bus slong ba la rta sbyin nas/
93b1(mdo sde): sras bu gnyis shing rta'i stang du bzhag ste/btsun mos ni shing rta'i byinas phul/rgyul smras ni mdun nas pras twA/rkang pas shing rgyu 'dun cing song ba las/ring po malon par yang
93b2(mdo sde): bram ze zhig dang phrad nas/shing rta bslangs pa dang /rgyal bus shing rtswa yang bram ze la byin no//de nas yang song ba las/ring po ma lon par yang bram ze slong ba dang phrad nas/rgyal
93b3(mdo sde): bus de dag la 'di skad ces smras//gal te bdag gis khyod la ma byin na ni/chags shing ser sna byed par 'gyur na/da ni bdag la nor zas zad do ci yang med do zhes smras pa dang /
93b4(mdo sde): bram ze na re/nor rdzas med na lus la gyon pa'i gos de nga la byin cig ces smras pa dang /rgyal bus lus la gyon pa'i gos rin po che yang slong ba la byin te/gos snying po zhig gyon te
93b5(mdo sde): dong ba las/ring po ma lon par bram ze yang slong ba zhig dang phrad nas/rgyal bus btsun mo'i gos byin no//de nas dong ba las/ring po ma lon par bram ze slong ba dang phrad nas rgyal
93b6(mdo sde): bus sras gnyis kyi gos kyang byin no//de ltar rgyal bus rta dang /shing rta dang /nor rdzas dang /bsngo ba'i gos kyi bar du ma lus pa zad par byin pa yang /thog ma nas 'gyod pa'i
93b7(mdo sde): sems sgra'i nyag ma tsam lam//ba spu tsam yang med do//rgyal bus ni sras bu khur du thogs/btsun mos ni sras mo phang du khyer nas/rkang pas song yang rgyal bu dang /btsun
94a1(mdo sde): mo dang /smras gnyis kyis bar du dga' ba'i mdangs dang bcas twa/rig la ba dang song ngo //ri da na tig ces bya bar yul ya ba nas lams rab tu
94a2(mdo sde): ring ste/dpag tshad phrag stong zhig yod do de ltar song song ba las/'brog dgon par phyin nas/bkres pa dang /skom pa'i sdug bsngal gyis nyen pa las/sum cu rtsa gsum
94a3(mdo sde): gnas kyi lha'i dbang pos 'brog dgon pa der/grong khyer khyim bzang po tshong dus dang /lam srang yod pa/rol mo dang /gos dang /bza' ba dang /btung ba dang ldan pa/
94a4(mdo sde): grong khyim don mi dag gis/rgyal bu bsdu ba dag sprul to//mi mang pos rgyal bu grong khyim du bsus te/zas dang /skom dang /bde ba'i yo byad kyis bstabs pa dang /btsun
94a5(mdo sde): mos rgyal bu la smras pa/lam ring por bgrod pas rab tu nga lad thal byung 'dug du mi rung ngam/rgyal bus smras pa/yab rgyal po bdag cag la/ri dan tig tu song shig ces
94a6(mdo sde): bka' stsal te/da 'dir 'dug par gyur na/yab rgyal po'i bka' dang /'gal bar 'gyur te/bu sri zhu can ma yin no zhes gsung nas grong khyer de nas byung ste/mod la
94a7(mdo sde): song ngo //de ltar song ba las/ring po ma lon par/ri dan tig gi drung du phyin pa dang /ri de'i drung na/chu chen po shin tu zab pa/rgal bar mi thar pa zhig dang phrad do//
94b1(mdo sde): de nas btsun mos rgyal bu la re shig 'dir bsdad do//chu chen po bri nas rgal te 'dong /zhes smras pa dang /rgyal bus smras pa/yab rgyal pos bdag cag la/ri dan tig tu song shig ces//
94b2(mdo sde): bka' stsal pas/da 'dir 'dug par gyur na/rgyal po'i bka' dang 'gal te/bu sri zhu can ma yin no zhes smras pas/rgyal bu de ma thag tu byams pa'i sems kyis ting nge 'dzin du
94b3(mdo sde): zhugs pa dang /mod la chu'i nang nas ri chen po zhig byung nas/chu'i rgyun bcad//de nas rgyal bu dang btsun mo gos brjes te/chu rgal nas/phar rgal ma thag tu/rgyal bus yang
94b4(mdo sde): 'di snyam du bsam so//thal byung song bar gyur na/chu 'khyil pa 'dis sems can mang du 'chi ste/grog sbur mang po chus khyer bar 'gyur snyam bsams nas/rgyal bu phyir chu la bltas
94b5(mdo sde): te/'di skad ces smraso//chu khyod snga ma po bzhin du rgyun tu 'bab cing gal te bdag 'dod pa zhig 'ongs na yang thar bar byos shig ces byas ma thag tu mu yang snga mkho bzhin du 'bab par
94b6(mdo sde): gyur to//de nas song ba las ri dran tig tu phyin nas/rgyal bus ri de la bltas na/ri de rang rong dang zad zed du 'dug la/shing mang po rab tu rgyas shing /bya sna tshogs kyang snyan pa'i
94b7(mdo sde): sgra 'byin/'bab chu dang /chu mig dang /mtshe'u dang /lteng kar ldan te/chu ni mngar/'bras bu zhim/chu bya dang /ngang ngung dang /'dzin mo dang /ri skegs la
95a1(mdo sde): sogs pa bya rnam pa sna tshogs dag kyang gnas pa mthong nas/rgyal bus btsun mo la yang 'di skad ces smraso//ri 'di la bltas na/shing dang /tshal gnam la
95a2(mdo sde): reg pa tsam du skyes na yang /brngas pa 'am/bcad pa med pas/chu mig zhim po la 'thung zhing /'bras bu mngar ba za ba ste/ri 'di la sgom pa dag yod pas/'dir gnas
95a3(mdo sde): par bya'o//rgyal bu ri de la phyin pa dang /ri de la gnas pa'i 'dab chags bya dang /gcan zan dang /ri dgas thams cad rab tu dga' nas/rgyal bu bsu so//de'i tshe ril sgom pa'i
95a4(mdo sde): dge slong a tsu tA zhes bya ba/lo lnga brgya lon pa/yon tan mchog dang ldan pa zhig gnas te/rgyal bu de'i drung du song nas/phyag byas te phyogs gcig tu 'dug nas/'di skad
95a5(mdo sde): ces smraso//ri 'dri la gang phyogs na 'bras bu dang chu mig bzang pos ldan pa gnasu rung ba ci yod ces dris pa dang /a tsu tas smras pa/ri 'di gnas thams cad du/bsod nams
95a6(mdo sde): dang ldan pa'i sa gzhi yin pas gang du gnas kyang rung ste/ri 'di ni shin tu dben po'i gnas gtsang ba yin pas na/ci rgyal bu khyod chung ma dang bu smad du bcas te/chos slob du
95a7(mdo sde): 'ongs sam/de la rgyal bus smras ma khom par/btsun mo man tas smras pa/dge slong la 'di skad ces smraso//btsun pa ri lo lam bsgoms nas ci srid cig lon/dge slong
95b1(mdo sde): nas smras pa/ra 'dod byin nas/ma ban bang+gA'am lnga brgya tsam yin no//btsun mo man tes smras pa/dadung bdag/dang bdag slo 'dzin na/nam zhig lam thob par shAgyu /rA/
95b2(mdo sde): mu gnas kyang / shing dung tha medad /bdag dang bdag gar mi 'dzin na/'du la mtha' para'i 'gyur ni'o//das slong gis smras pa/bdag gas yang da /byA nA
95b3(mdo sde): shes//de nas rgyal bus dge slong la skyes pa/btsun pa yul ya ba'i rgyal du rgyal cha bdun grub ces bya ba thos sam/dge slong gis smras pa/bdag gis rgyun tu thos kyi mtsha
95b4(mdo sde): ma yin no//rgyal dus smras pa/bdag ni rgyal du rgyal tshe ba don grub ces bya ba yin no//dge slong gis rgyul bu khyod gar 'a ci 'dod ces dris pa dang /rgyal bus smras pa/bdag ni
95b5(mdo sde): theg pa chen po'i lam 'di do zhes smras//dge slong gis smras pa/rgyal po'i yon tan dang sbya ni/ring por mardzogs par thog pa chen po la mthob par 'gyurate/rgyal bu rdzun
95b6(mdo sde): da pa'i byang chub mngon par sangs rgyas pan/bdagan te gnas rdzu 'phrul gyi mchog tu myur cig ces smras nas/rgyal du khrid de 'dug pa'i gnas bstan te//de nas dge slo gas
95b7(mdo sde): che me bzhin du rgyal bu sgrazlas nas/mdud pa bar nas/sa su ni shing gi 'bras bu shing tog za/skum dun nu mag 'thung ngo //de nas rgyal bus shing dang rna bsdus te//ba dge 'dun
96a1(mdo sde): pa'i rgya'i skyil po chung ngu ma cig byas/btsun mo mun t+te/bu ming srid gnyis 'dug pa'i skyil po re re yang byas//de'i chen khye'u yi ming ni ya rI zhes bya ba ste/
96a2(mdo sde): lo bdun lon nas/gos rang gyon nus te pha'i phyi bzhin du 'gro'o//bu mo'i ming ni ge no lan zhes bya ste/lo drug lon pas//ri dgas kyi lpags pa gyon cing /mi'i phye bzhin
96a3(mdo sde): 'gro'o//ri de la gnas pa'i gcan zan dang /ri dgas dang /'dab chags bya la sogs pa thams cad kyang /rab tu dga' nas/rgyal bu la rten cing gnaso//rgyal bu ri de
96a4(mdo sde): la phyin nas/zhag cig lon pa dang /sngon skams pa'i chu mig dang /rdzing yong chub gang bar gyur/skyed shing skams pa rnams kyang /thams cad me tog dang 'dab ma skyes par/
96a5(mdo sde): gyur te/srin bu 'dug pa rnams kyang med par gyur nas/gcan zan gcig la gcig za ba yang so so ni rtsal za bar gyur/'bras bu'i shing rnams kyang rgyas shing bzang por
96a6(mdo sde): gyur/bya sna tshogs snying rje'i skad kyis sgra skad snyan pa 'byin par gyur te/btsun mo man tAs ni/shing gi 'bras bu dang /shing tog rnga zhing rgyal bu la phul te/sras ming
96a7(mdo sde): srasring gnyis kyang bstod do//sras bu mang srang ginyis ni skabs skabasu pha ma gnyis dang bral te/ha cang yang mi ring ba'i chu mig 'gram dag tu/ga can zan nam/ri dgas dag
96b1(mdo sde): dang lhan cig rtse ste/bar 'ga' zhig lon par yang rtswa'o//phyis dus gzhan zhig na/sras khye'u ya seng ge la zhon pa las/seng go rgal nas/rngab cig bsnun pas/sras bu'i
96b2(mdo sde): gdong ba cung zad snod de khrag byung ba las/spre'u zhig gis shing gis lo ma blangs te/gdong gi khrag phyis nas/chu 'gram du khrid de khrag phyis pa yang /rgya'i bus rgyung ma nus
96b3(mdo sde): mthong /dri'i tshe yul ke'u le'u zhes bya bar/bra ze dbul po zhig/lo bzhi bcu lon nas chung ma blangaso//chung ma ni rab tu bzang zhing sdug la/bram ze de ni rab tu mi sdug pa'i maN+Da
96b4(mdo sde): ma bcu gnyis rdzogs par yod de/de'i lus mdog sol ba ltar gnag la/gdong la 'bur po gsum yod pa/sna 'byor zhing /mig gnyis shel ltar sngo ba/gdong
96b5(mdo sde): gnyer ma can la/ma mchu 'phyang ba/smra ba'i skad mi snyan pa/gsus pa che la rku ba 'bur ba/rkang pa gnyis gyol ba/mgo shu ba tsa can la/skra med pa/'dre ltar mi
96b6(mdo sde): sdug pa zhig ste/chung mas kyang mthong mi 'dod pa tsam du shi yang bla zhes rgyun tu dmod mo byed pa zhig yod do//dus gzhan zhig na chung ma de chu chur song song ba las/lam du khye
96b7(mdo sde): ga gzhon nu ma dag kha cig dang phrad nas/khyog rnams kyis khyim thabs kyi kha gzugs 'dra'o//zhes co dri zhing brgad nas/khyod ni dpe med par bzang zhing sdug na/ci ltar
97a1(mdo sde): 'di 'dra ba'i chung ma byed nus shes smras pa dang /chung mas khyo ga de dag la 'di skad ces smras//rgan mo'i mgo ni shing la ba mo chags pa ltar skya ba de/nang
97a2(mdo sde): nub she bar dga' na/sher mi btub/ci ltar bya zhes chu snod thogs nas/phyir khyim du 'ongs te/khyim thab la 'di skad ces smraso//bdag chu chur song song ba las/lam
97a3(mdo sde): du khyo ga gzhon nu dag cig dang phrad de/de dag bdag la co bro zhang brgad pas/nga khyod kyis bkol ba'i bran yod na/chu chu yang mi dgos te/gzhan gyis dpyas par yang mi
97a4(mdo sde): 'gyur//khyim thab kyis smras pa/bdag cag ni shin tu dbul phongs pa yin na/bran khol ga las rnyed par 'gyur/chung mas smras pa/gal te bdag gis phyir bran khol
97a5(mdo sde): ma btsal nu/bdag kyang 'gro ste/khyod dang lhan cig mi gnas//chung mas yang 'di skad ces smras//kho mos thos na/rgyal bu dan grub sbyin pa ma 'os par byin pas/yab
97a6(mdo sde): rgyal pos ri dan tig ces bya bar spangaso//rgyal bu de la khye'u gcig dang /bu mo gcig yod ces grag gis khyod der slong du song shog/khyim thab kyis smras po/ri dan tig
97a7(mdo sde): ces bya ba/'di nas dpag tshad drug stong lhag tsam gcig gi lam so yod la/sngon la lung bgrod kyang ma myong na/de ci ltar bgrod par bya/chung mas smras pa/bdag gi/
97b1(mdo sde): phyir ban khol ma btsal na/bdag 'gegs te 'chi'o//zhes smras pa dang /nyis na kho bo ni gcig gus bsad kyang sla'o//khyod shi bar mi 'dod do zhes smras nas/khyod kyis bdage slong
97b2(mdo sde): du 'gro bar dad na/kho bo'i rgyags dang /dgos pa sbyor cig ces bsgo'o//chung mas smras pa/da song shig rgyags dang dgos pa yang med do zhes smras ni/bram zes rgyags rang sbyar
97b3(mdo sde): terkang pas lam du zhugs te song ngo //de nas bram ze yul ya ba zhes bya ba gau la ba der song ste/der phyin pa dang /rgyal po'i pho brang gi sgor 'ongs nas/sgo srung ba la/rgyal bu
97b4(mdo sde): don grub da ltar ga la 'dug ces dris pa dang /sgo srungs de pho brang gi nang du song nas/rgyal bu la da ltar phyi rol na/bram ze zhig rgyal bu don grub ga re zhes 'dri'o//rgyal pos rgyal
97b5(mdo sde): bu ga re zhes smras pa'i tshig thos pa tsam gyis sems 'khrugs shing khrus nas/'di snyam du 'di 'dra ba sha dag gi phyir/nga'i sras spangs par gyur na/da yang slad du 'ong snyam bsams
97b6(mdo sde): nas/dpe 'di skad ces brjod par gyur to//dper na ma ni rang bzhin gyis tsha zhing 'bar ba yin na/de'i steng du shing bstan pa dang 'dra ste/bdag kyang da ltar mya ngan gyis gdungs te me
97b7(mdo sde): dang 'dra ba las da ltar rgyal bu gau re zhes 'dri ba ni me la shing gi bsnan pa dang 'dra'o//bram zes gsol pa/bdag ni lami rang po nas 'ongs pa yang /rgyal bu rgyal tshab mo'i yid
98a1(mdo sde): dang mi 'gal bar sbyin pa bgyid do zhes ming snyan pa stung du gnam la thug/'og tu chu mig gi gting la thug gi bar du grags pa/bdag lam ring po nas reng
98a2(mdo sde): moyod par 'ongs//rgyal pos smras pa/rgyal bu don grub ni da ltar ri shin tu dben pa na gnas te/rab tu dbul zhing ci yang med na/khyed la ci zhig sbyin du yod/bram zes smras
98a3(mdo sde): ba rgyal bu la ci yang med kya bdag phrad par dga'o zhes smos pa dang /rgyal pos kyang gzhan zhig la lam ston cig ces bsgo'o//de nas bram ze sang sring ba las/da ni
98a4(mdo sde): ni drong du rgya chen po zhig yod par byin nas/rgyal bu 'tsho'i shig bsams shing /yid la byas pas chu'i pha rol du phyin par gyur to//de nas bram ze ri der phyin nas/
98a5(mdo sde): mngon pa zhig dang brad de/rngon pa de la/khyod ri la rgyal bu don grub ces bya ba mthong dam zhes dris pa dang /rngon pa des kyang rgyal bu sbyin pa la dga'i bas/bram ze 'di dag
98a6(mdo sde): phyir/ri la spangs par shes pas/rngon pa des kyang bram ze bzung nas/shing la bcings te/brdegs pas lus la rma yang byung //rton pas yang smras pa/khyod rgyal bu
98a7(mdo sde): dris te ci zhig bye/mnga' 'phang ngo zhes byas pa dang /bram ze de la 'di snyam du/da ni 'dis bdag gsod yang dgun/brdzun zhig bya'o snyam bsams nas/rngon pa la
98b1(mdo sde): bdag la 'dren ci nyis shes smras//de nas rton pas/nan ci zhig smra bar sems shes dris pa dang /bram ze brdzun tshig 'di skad smras//rgyal po yab rgyal bu mthong bar dga' bas/
