130a2(mdo sde): banas thugs rgyud nga zhes bya ba'i phyir du snga ma bzhin//dge slong ga dge slong dang blam ze shes ldan 'chog rte mthal la rteg cing sngon gyi maN+Dal la gnas pa skye ba po'i ba
130a3(mdo sde): mngon par spyi nang mngon por brjod pa dakhyi ma'i mtha la rtog phyi ma'i mtha' la gnas pa lta bar song bdag mngon par skye zhing mngon par brjod pa thams cad
130a4(mdo sde): smra bar song 'i drug cu rtsa gnyis po 'di dag la ste/de las mi lhag mi mang la/de dag de bzhin gshegs pas yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin rab tu mkhyen/de las lhag par song
130a5(mdo sde): dge pa ji lta bzhizhin dang tu mkhyen to//de sbyar na lta bar song po 'di dag 'di ltar 'dzin pa dang 'di ltar len pa dang /'di ltar stod pa dang /'gro ba 'dilta du'aM/na
130a6(mdo sde): 'di lta // smon 'di//bul nas de na gshegs pas sa dag pa lta ba bzhin rab tu mkhyen na//de lam stug par yang dag pa du sgru bduzhin
130a7(mdo sde): kyang mchog tu mi 'dzin to//mchog tu mi 'dzin pas bdag nyid mya ngan las 'das par rig nas/tshor ba rnams kun 'byung ba nub par thug pu chud de 'di ni sdug bcwa'o//
130b1(mdo sde): 'di ni sdug bsngal nges par 'byin pa'o zhes bya bar mkhyen to//dge slong dag dge sbyong dang bram ze gang de dag sngon gyi mtha' la rtog cing sngon gyi mtha' la gnas pa lta bar song ba rnams dang
130b2(mdo sde): phyi ma'i mtha' la rtog cing phyi ma'i mtha' la gnas pa lta bar song ba rnams kyis gyen du dmigasu zin kyang de thams cad lta ba'i chu'i nang na 'dug pas bdud sdig can gyi dbang du song zhing lag tu song
130b3(mdo sde): ba ste/bdud sdig can gyis ci dga' dgur bya ba bdud kyi zhags pa dag las yongasu grol ba ma yin no dge slong dag dper na nya pa 'am/nya pa'i slob ma mkhas pa dag gis rgya mig phra mo
130b4(mdo sde): thogs te ldeng ka'i chu chung ngu bcus pa na de srog chags gang rags pa che long rnams kyis gyen du dmyugasu zin kyang /de thams cad chu'i nang na gnas pas nya pa'i dbang du song zhing lag tu
130b5(mdo sde): song ba ste/nya pas ci dga' dgur bya ba yin par rig par bya'o//de bzhin du dge sbyong dang bram ze gang kha cig sngon gyi mtha' la rtog cing /sngon gyi mtha' la gnas pa lta bar song ba
130b6(mdo sde): rnams dang /phyi ma'i mtha' la rtog cing phyi ma'i mtha' la gnas pa lta bar song ba rnams kyis kyang gyen du dmyags zin kyang /de thams cad lta ba'i chu'i nang na 'dug pas bdud sdig can
130b7(mdo sde): gyi dbang du song zhing lag tu song ste/bdud sdig can gyis ci dga'o dga' dga' dgur bya ba dag go/dge slong dag de la dge sbyong dang bram ze gang de dag sngon gyi mtha' la rtog cing rtag
131a1(mdo sde): par smra ba dag bdag dang 'jig rten rtag go zhes mngon par rjod pa ni 'di lta ste/gzhi bzhi po dag la ste dge sbyong dang bram ze mkhas pa ma yin zhing ma
131a2(mdo sde): rig par gyur pa bag med cing rmongs pa la gnas pa de dag srid par rig par bya ste/de ni srid pas rnam par bskyod pa'o//dge slong dag de la dge sbyong dang bram ze gang de dag
131a3(mdo sde): phyi mtha' la rtog cing zhes pa ni mthong ba'i chos la mya ngan las 'das par smra ba dag mthong ba'i chos la mya ngan las 'das par mngon par smra zhing mngon par brjod pa ni gzhi bzhi po
131a4(mdo sde): dog la ste zhes bya ba'i bar du'o//dge sbyong dang bram ze mkhas pa ma yini zhing ma rig par gyur pa bag med cing rmongs pa la gnas pa de dag rig par bya ste/de ni srid pas rnam
131a5(mdo sde): par bskyod pa'o//dge slong dag de la dge sbyong dang bram ze gang de dag sngon gyi mtha' la rtog cing rtag par smra ba dag bdag dang 'jig rten ni rtag go zhes mngon par smra zhing mngon
131a6(mdo sde): par brjod pa ni 'di lta ste/gzhi bzhi po dag la ste/de yang rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba yin pa ri srid kyi rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba ma yin par 'gyur ba de ni gnas
131a7(mdo sde): med do//mthong ba'i chos la mya ngan las 'das par smra ba dag mthong ba'i chos la mya ngan las 'das par mngon par smra zhing mngon par rjod pa dag bzhi lnga po dag la ste zhes bya ba'i
131b1(mdo sde): bar du'o//de yang rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba yin par srid kyi rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba ma yin par 'gyur ba 'di ni gnas med do//dge slong dag de la dge sbyong dang bram ze grang
131b2(mdo sde): de dag sngon gyi mtha' la rtog cing rtag par smra ba mthong ba'i chos la/bdag dang 'jig rten ni rtag go zhes mngon par smra zhing mngon par rjod pa ni 'di bzhi po dag ste/de yang reg pa'i
131b3(mdo sde): rkyen las byung srid kyi reg pas byung ba las gzhan pa'i tshor bar 'gyur ba 'di ni gnas med do//phyi ma'i mtha' la rtog cing zhes bya ba ni mthong ba'i ni chos la mya ngan las 'das par smra ba
131b4(mdo sde): dag mthong ba'i chos la mya ngan las 'das par mngon par smra zhing mngon par brjod pa ni 'di lta ste/gzhi lnga po dag la'o zhes bya ba'i bar du'o//de yang reg pa'i rkyen las byung bar srid
131b5(mdo sde): kyi reg pa las byung ba las gzhan pa'i tshor bar 'gyur ba 'di ni gnas med do//dge slong dag gis gang tshun chad reg pa'i skye mched drug po dag ni kun 'byung po nub pa dang /ro myed
131b6(mdo sde): ba dang /nyes dmigs yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin khong du chud pa 'di ni 'di ltar lhag par yang dgu par ji lta ba bzhin khong du chud pa yin no//dge slong dag de la gang zag pa kun nos
131b7(mdo sde): nyon mongs pa can yang srid pa pa/rims nad dang bcas pa/sdug bsngal rnam par smin pa tshe phyi ma'i rga shi'i rje su 'thun pa de dag de bzhin gshegs pas spangs shing yongs su
132a1(mdo sde): mkhyen la/shing ta la'i mgo bzhin rtsa ba nas bcad de/'gro ba snang ba med pa ste/phyi ma la mi skye ba'i chas can du 'gyu ro//chos kyi rnam grangs 'di
132a2(mdo sde): bshad pa na/stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di rnam pa gsum du g.yos/rab tu g.yos/kun tu rab tu g.yos so//'gul/rab tu 'gul
132a3(mdo sde): kun tu rab tu 'gul to//ldeg/kun tu ldeg/kun tu rab tu ldeg go/de'i tshe tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo bcom ldan 'das kyi snam logs na 'dug cing bsil yab thogs
132a4(mdo sde): nas/bcom ldan 'das la g.yob cing /bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to//btsun pa chos kyi rnam grangs 'di'i ming ci lags/ji ltar gzung bar bgyi/kun
132a5(mdo sde): dga' bo de'i phyir chos kyi rnam grangs 'di ni/rgyu'i dra ba zhes bya bar yang zung shig/don gyi dra ba dang chos kyi dra ba dang /tshangs pa'i dra ba zhes bya bar yang zung shig/de
132a6(mdo sde): bas na tshangs pa'i dra ba zhes bya ba 'di ni/chos kyi rnam grangs 'di'i tshig bla dag so//bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas/dge slong de dag bcom ldan 'das
132a7(mdo sde): kyis gsungs pa la yid rangs te mngon par bstod do////bar gyi sdo ma ni/rtag dang gcig pu rgyu med dang //mtha' ldan de bzhin lha mi spong //
132b1(mdo sde): 'du shes 'du shes med can dang //chad dang mya ngan 'das pa dang //dmyags dang kun nas rmongs pa dang //brten dang reg pa dge slong dang //rgyu dang don chos 'dra ba ste//tha ma tshangs
132b2(mdo sde): pa'o//tshangs pa'i dra ba rdzog so//rgya yi skad du de ni b+hAng bya na/phyur po'u in kyang su phi ma de'i spyir/bod skad du/
132b3(mdo sde): thabs mkhas pa chen po sangs rgyas drin lan bsab pa'i mdo//bam po dang po//'di skad bdag gis thos pa'i dus gcig na/bcom ldan 'das rgyal po'i khab bya rgod spungs pa'i
132b4(mdo sde): ri la/dge slong gi dge 'dun chen po dge slong nyi khri brgyad stong thams cad kyang bya ba byas pa tshangs par spyod pa spyad pa/srid pa kun tu sbyor ba yongasu zad pa/klu chen po ltar sems kyi
132b5(mdo sde): dbang thob pa sha stag la 'di lta ste/'od srung chen po dang rab 'byor dang /kun shes ko'u di n+ya dang /mau rjes bzang dang /byams ma'i bu gang po dang /lam chen brtan dang /
132b6(mdo sde): shA ri'i bu dang /ka t+ya'i bu chen po dang /kun dga' bo dang /sgra gcan 'dzin las sogs pa cang shes pa dag dang thabs gcig tu bzhug so//byang chub sems dpa' sems
132b7(mdo sde): dpa' chen po sum khri brgyad stong dag dang thabs gcig ste/byang chub sems dpa' de dag thams cad kyang yun ring por dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed pas sangs rgyas bye ba brgyad stong
133a1(mdo sde): chad med pa rnams la rtag tu tshangs par spyad pa/smon lam chen po yongasu rdzogs pa ting nge 'dzin brgya stong skyed khong du chud cing rtogs pa/gzungs yong su rdzogs
133a2(mdo sde): pa snying rje chen po mi gtong ba/sems can chen po ji lta ba bzhin thams cad la phan par brtson pa dkon mchog gsum gyi gdung mi 'chad par 'tsho ba pa/chos kyi rgyal mtshan
133a3(mdo sde): rnam par 'dzugs pa/so so'i ma bskul ba'i dge ba'i bshes gnyen du gyur pa/ye shes chen po'i 'gram du phyin pas kun tu grags pa sha stag la 'di lta ste/byang chub sed
133a4(mdo sde): sbyin ras gzigs dbang phyug dang /byang chub sems dpa' mthu chen thob dang /byang chub sems dpa' rtag par brtson pa dang /byang chub sems dpa' yon tan dam pa dang /
133a5(mdo sde): byang chub sems dpa' klog gi 'od dang /byang chub sems dpa' kun tu mnyam pa dang /byang chub sems dpa' yon tan gtso bo dang /byang chub sems dpa' ri rab rgyal po dang
133a6(mdo sde): byang chub sems dpa' spos kyi glang po dang /byang chub sems dpa' spos glang chen po dang /byang chub sems dpa' stobs 'dzin dang /byang chub sems dpa' khams gsum 'phags
133a7(mdo sde): dang byang chub sems dpa' rtag par snying rje dang byang chub sems dpa' lag na rin chen dang /byang chub sems dpa' 'od can dang /byang chub sems dpa' dam pa'i dpal
133b1(mdo sde): dang /byang chub sems dpa' rin chen zla ba dang /byang chub sems dpa' stobs po che dang /byang chub sems dpa' blo gros tshad med dang /byang chub sems dpa' bzang skyong dang /byang
133b2(mdo sde): chub sems dpa' seng ge'i sgra dang /byang chub sems dpa' seng ge byed dang /byang chub sems dpa' seng+ge rnam par bsgyings pa dang /byang chub sems dpa' smon lam rdzogs dang /
133b3(mdo sde): byang chub sems dpa' rin chen brtsegs dang /byang chub sems dpa' byams pa dang /byang chub sems dpa' 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la sogs pa 'khor mang po dang yang
133b4(mdo sde): thabs gcig tu bzhugaso//de ma yin pa gzhan yang 'dod pa'i khams kyi lha'i bu tshad med pa brgya stong dag kyang lhags nas/lha rdzas kyi me tog dang /spos rnams thogs shing lha
133b5(mdo sde): rjes kyi rol mo dkrol nas/steng gi na mkha' la 'khod do//de ma yin pa lha dang klu dang /gnod sbyin dang /dri za dang /lha ma yin dang /na mkha' lding dang /mi 'am
133b6(mdo sde): ci dang /lto 'phye chen po dang /mi dang mi ma yin pa dang /de la sogs pa so so nas 'khor brgya stong snyid lhags nas/sangs rgyas kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/phyogs
133b7(mdo sde): gcig tu 'khod do//de'i tshe na bcom ldan 'das la 'khor mang pos yongasu bskor te/rim gro dang /mchod pa byas bkur sti dang bcas pas yongasu bstod pa byaso//de'i tshe na
134a1(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das kyi byin gyis rlabs kyis kun dga' bo snga dro'i dus su rgyal po'i khab tu zhugs nas/mthar gyis bsod snyoms blangaso//de'i dus na bram
134a2(mdo sde): ze ba ma la sri zhu cher byed pa/khyim so zhig nas ci yang mi bdog pa cig kyang mo rgan khur du khyer te mthar gyis slongs mo byed de/de yang kha zas zhim po ro dang ldan pa 'am/
134a3(mdo sde): shing rtog bzang po dag snyed na/pha ma la stobaso//kha zas ngan pa ro med pa 'am shing rtog skom po dag rnyed na bdag rang zo'o//kun dga' bo de lta bu dag mthong nas rab tu
134a4(mdo sde): dga' ba'i sems skyes te/mi de la leg so legaso zhes snyam par bstod nas/rigs kyi bu pha ma la sri zhu byed cing mchod pa byed pa ngo mtshar che ste/leg so las smraso//
134a5(mdo sde): de nas kun tu rgyu ston pa drug gi bstan pa la phyogs shing grogasu gyur pa gcig dbang po rno ba gtsug lag dang rig byed rnam bzhi la mkhas par gyur pa/skar ma dang rtsis la mkhas
134a6(mdo sde): pa/dge sdig gi ltas rno ba/mo dang /gtsug leg gi rig pas pha rol gyis sems shes pa//phal mang po'i slob dpon du gyur pa kun gyis bkur ba gcig/
134a7(mdo sde): lta ba ngan pa la zhen nas/khe dang grags pa'i phyir dam pa'i chos 'jigs par byed do//sangs rgyas dang chos dang dge 'dun la phrig dog byed de/smod pa'i phyir
134b1(mdo sde): kun dga' bo la 'di skad ces smraso//khyod kyi ston pa go'u ta ma shAg rigs kyi bu nga ni dge ba yin te/yon tan chen po dang ldan no zhes smra ba yang ming tsam du zad de/bden pa'i dngos po
134b2(mdo sde): med do//khyod kyi ston pa go'u ta ma ni yang dag par sdig pa can yin te/bcas nas zhag bdun lon nam yang shi bas sdig can yin par mngon no//rgyal po'i pho brang na 'dug pa las/
134b3(mdo sde): pho gang nang nas bros pas yab rgyal pos yang mya ngan gyi non to//sems 'khrugs nas brgyal ba las chus gtor te/zhag bdun lon pa dang dran pa phyir rnyed de/cho nges btab nas/
134b4(mdo sde): nga'i lha'i bu cig deng du stor ro zhes snying rje rje skad du ngus nas nga'i yul dang srid kyang khyod 'ba' shig dbang bar zad na ci'i phyir nged spangs te ri dgon par chos shes smre sngags 'don du bcug
134b5(mdo sde): bas/khyod kyi ston pa go'u ta ma drin mi shes te/ci la yang ma ltas par langs te song bas na srid zhu med par mngon no//yab rgyal pos pho brang ba rtsi ga nas chung ma blangs pa
134b6(mdo sde): yas kyang chung ma'i las ma byas te/mya ngan gyis gdungs par byas pas na/khrel med pa yang yin par mngon no//kun dga' bos de skad ces smras pa'i tshig de dag thos nas/
134b7(mdo sde): ngo tsha zhing skyengs te bsod snyoms blangs te phyir sangs rgyas gang na bar 'ongs nas/zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/phyogs gcig tu thal mi sbyar ba btud de/bcom
135a1(mdo sde): ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to//bcom ldan 'das sangs rgyas kyis bstan pa'i chos pa pha ma la sri zhu bgyi ba lta ma mchis sam/sangs rgyus
135a2(mdo sde): kyis kun dga' bo la bka' stsal pa/'di skad du zhu ba 'di khyod la su zhig gis bstan/lha 'am mi 'am mi ma yin pas bstan tam/'on te khyod nyid kyi shes pa'i blos
135a3(mdo sde): de bzhin gshegs pa la zhu bar gyur ces bka' stsal pa dang /kun dga' bos gsol ba/bdag la lha 'am klu 'am/yi dgas sam/mi 'am/mi ma lags
135a4(mdo sde): pa glang gis kyang bstan pa ma mchis te/snga dro bsod snyoms slong du mchis pa'i shul du ston pa drug gi 'khor kun tu rgyu gcer bu pa zhig dang mjal ba dang /bdag
135a5(mdo sde): la tshig rtsub mo dag mchi'o//zhes rgyas par gsol to//de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das 'dzum pa mdzad nas/zhal gyi sgo nas kha dog rnam pa du ma dang ldan pa'i 'od byung
135a6(mdo sde): bas/shar phyogs logasu sangs rgyas kyi zhing tshad med pa bye ba brgya stong 'das pa'i pha rol na/'jig rten gyi khams bla ma mchog ces bya ba snang bar byaso//'jig
135a7(mdo sde): rten gyi khams de nas sangs rgyas dga' ba'i rgyal po zhes bya bo/de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rig pa dang /zhabasu ldan pa
135b1(mdo sde): bde bar gshegs pa 'jig rten mkhyen pa/skyes bu 'dul ba'i kha lo bsgyur ba/bla na med pa/ston pa rgyal ba sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das/sangs rgyas kyi zhing rab tu bkod
135b2(mdo sde): pa zhes bya ba na bzhugs te/sangs rgyas kyi zhing de yang shin tu mnyam zhing bai DUr+ya las byas pa/gser ga tsoms thig re'ur bres pa/rin po che sna bdun gyi shong bskyed pa/shing de
135b3(mdo sde): dag kyang mda' rgyang gang tsam du ma tho ba/me tog dang 'bras bu dang /yal ga dang /'dab mas shin tu brgyan pa/rlung mi drag pas bskyod na/sgra snyan pa 'byung ba/sgra de
135b4(mdo sde): dag so so'i skye bos thos pas mi ngoms pa skabs skabs na chu mig dang mtshe'u dang khrus kyi rdzing bu yod la/yon tAn brgyad dang ldan pa'i chus yongasu gang ba/rdzing gi zhabs kyang gser
135b5(mdo sde): gyi bye ma bdal ba/rdzing gi ngos bzhin bsung dam pa dang ldan pa'i me tog pad+ma dang /pun da ri ka dang /pa ri sha ka dang /de ma yin pa'i me tog sngon po dang /ser po dang /
135b6(mdo sde): dmar po dang /dkar po shing rta'i phang lo tsam gyis chu'i steng yongasu khebs te/chu de'i nang na bya rnam pa sna tshogs kyang shin tu yid du 'ong ba'i sgra snyan pa 'byin to//rdzing de'i nang na/rin
135b7(mdo sde): po che sna bdun las byas pa'i glu yod de/de na sems can mang po 'dod dgur rtse zhing longs spyod do//rin po che'i shing de dag gi bar bar na/seng+ge'i khri mtho phyed kyi tshad dpag tshad gcig
136a1(mdo sde): pa bshams nas/rin po che sna bdun gyis brgyan te/lha rdzas kyi na bza' khri'i steng du rim par bting gzhan kyi gros kyi rdul gtu rdzas rgya ma mam cam pa ma/
136a2(mdo sde): ba'i khri de la de bzhin gshegs pa dga' ba'i rgyal po skyil mo klukrung du bcas shing bzhugs pa la/byang chub sems dpa' tshad med pa bye ba brgya stong snyed mdun du bdar te thal
136a3(mdo sde): mo sbyar ba btud nas/de bzhin gshegs pa de la so so nas tshig 'thun par 'di skad ces gsol to//bcom ldan 'das ci'i rgyu ci'i rkyen gyis 'od bzang po kha dog sngon po
136a4(mdo sde): dang /ser po dang dmar po dang /dkar po dang ldan pa/rab tu gsal ba dper mi bzod pa 'di nub phyogs logs nas 'khor mang po 'di dag la snang bar 'gyur te
136a5(mdo sde): grang la 'od kyi reg pa de dag thams cad las dang /sems bde bar gyur pa thugs rtse ba'i slad du//bcom ldan 'das kyi bstan du gsol/de la bcom ldan 'das
136a6(mdo sde): des 'di skad ces bka' stsal to//rigs kyi bu dag legs par nyon la yid la zung shig dang khyod la dgrol zhing bshad par bya'o//'di nas nub phyogs log su
136a7(mdo sde): 'jig rten gyi khams tshad med pa bye ba brgya stong 'das pa'i pha rol na/sangs rgyas kyi zhing mi mjed ces bya ba yod de/de na sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa zhes bya ba de bzhin
136b1(mdo sde): gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rig pa dang zhab su ldan pa/bde bar gshegs pa/'jig rten mkhyen pa/skyes bu 'dul ba'i kha lo bsgyur ba/bla na
136b2(mdo sde): med pa/ston pa rgyal ba sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das shes bya ba 'khor mang pos yongasu bskor nas/'khor mang po thams cad la thabs mkhas pa chen po drin lan bas pa pa'i mdo sde ston
136b3(mdo sde): cing sems can thams cad la phan pa dang /bde ba'i don gyi phyir sems can thams cad kyi log par lta ba'i zug rngu rtsa nas gdon pa'i phyir/sems thog ma'i byang chub sems dbul
136b4(mdo sde): dag byang chub sems las phyir mi ldog cing brtan par bya ba'i phyir/nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas thams cad mthar phyin pa'i theg pa gcig gi lam la dgod pa'i phyir/byang chub se
136b5(mdo sde): rnams myur du mngon par byang chub cing sangs rgyas drin len bsob pa'i phyir/sems can thams cad kyi drin lci ba dran par bya ba'i phyir/sems can thams cad sdug bsngal gyi rgya
136b6(mdo sde): mtshe las dgrol ba'i phyir ro//so so'i skye bo mthe' dag pa ma dag la sri zhu bya bar 'dod pa'i phyir/'od 'di snang bar gyur pa yin no//de'i tshe 'khor de'i nang na byang chub sems dpal
136b7(mdo sde): mang po'i ston pa dang gtso bor gyur pa/stong phrag bcu snyed stan las langs te/bla gos phyogs gcig tu byas nas/pus mo g.yas pa'i lha nga sa btsugs te/bcom ldan 'das
137a1(mdo sde): la 'di skad ces gsol to//bcom ldan 'das kyi byin gyi rlabs kyis bdag cag rnams mi mjed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams der mchi zhing /de bzhin gshe
137a2(mdo sde): pa shAkya thub pa la mchod pa dang bsnyen bkur bgyi ba dang /thabs mkhas pa chen po sangs rgyas kyi drin lan bsab pa'i mdo dam pa nyan cing mchi bar byin gyis brlab tu gsol/
137a3(mdo sde): de nas sangs rgyas des byang chub sems dpa' de rnams la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to//rigs kyi bu dag khyed mi mjed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams der phyin nas sangs rgyas bcom
137a4(mdo sde): ldan 'das de la mchod cing bkur bsti dang /shin tu phrad dka' ba'i 'du shes bskyed par bya'o//de ci'i phyir zhe na/sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa ni bskal pa grangs med pa bye
137a5(mdo sde): ba khrag khrig gi bar du shin tu spyad dka' ba spyad de/snying rje chen po'i smon lam 'di skad ces btab bo//gal te mngon par sangs rgyas pa ni/'jig rten gyi khams sdig
137a6(mdo sde): pa can ri dang /shang shong dang gyo mo dang /gsogs ma dang /tsher ma la sogs pa yod pa'i gnasu sems can dag kyang nyon mongs pa dang bcas pa/mtshams med
137a7(mdo sde): palnga dang /mi dge ba bcu rdzogs par spyod pa'i gnas der mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas te/phan pa dang bde ba'i don du sdug bsngal thams cad yongasu bcad de bde ba
137b1(mdo sde): thams cad dang yongasu ldan par byas nas/chos kyi sku yong su rdzogs par byas shing /lhag ma ma lus pa'i mya ngan las 'das par gyur cig ces smon lam btab bo//sangs rgyas
137b2(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das des thog ma de skad ces smon lam btab pas//khyed rnams 'jig rten gyi khams der phyin nas/ji ltar sangs rgyas nyid gshegs pa dang /ji ltar sangs rgyas
137b3(mdo sde): nyid bzhugs pa dang 'dra bar gnas par bya'o//zhes bka' stsal pa dang /byang chub sems dpa' de dag thams cad kyi tshig 'thun par bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' bzhin du bgyi'o//
137b4(mdo sde): zhes gsol nas/byang chub sems dpa' de dag re re yang 'khor byang chub sems dpa' bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong snyed kyis yongasu bskor te/mi mjed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang
137b5(mdo sde): nA ba der song ngo //de dag 'jig rten gyi khams gang dang gang du phyin par 'jig rten gyi khams de dag rnam pa drug tu g.yos te/'od zer chen pos kun tu snang bar gyur/steng
137b6(mdo sde): gri bar snang las lha rnams kyis me tog man da rab dang /man de ra ba chen po yang char bzhin du byab bo//'di zer chen pos snang bar byas shing /rdzu 'dril gyis 'jig rten
137b7(mdo sde): gyi khams gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag kyang g.yos so//de ma yin pa gzhan yang lA rdzas kyi rol mo tshad med pa brgya stong snyed kyang steng go bar snang las ma dkrol bar rang zer bzhin
138a1(mdo sde): du/byang chub sems dpa' de dwa/khyA rgod sbrus pa'i rigal ba der de bzhin gshegs pa'i spyan sngar lhags nas zhabs la mgo bas phyag 'tshal te/
138a2(mdo sde): sangs rgyas la lan gsum bskor ba byas nas phyogs gcig tu 'khod do//de'i tshe de bzhin gshegs par 'od zer byeste nub phyogs log su sangs rgyas kyi zhing tshad dad pa bye ba
138a3(mdo sde): khrag khrig brgya stong 'das pa'i pha rol ni/'jig rten gyi khams dag pa'i gnas shes bya ba snang bar byas so//'jig rten gyi khams de na sangs rgyas kyi mtshan nyi zla mar mi'i
138a4(mdo sde): 'od ces bya ba de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rig pa dang zhabasu ldan pa/bde bar gshegs pa/'jig rten mkhyen pa/skyes bu/
138a5(mdo sde): 'dul ba'i kha lo sgyur ba/bla na med pa/ston pa rgyal ba/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das sangs rgyas kyi zhing bde ba can zhes bya ba na bzhugs te/sangs rgyas kyi zhing
138a6(mdo sde): de yang shin tu mnyam zhing gzhi bai DUr+ya las byas na/bser gtsoms thig re dur bris pa/rin po che sna bdun gyi shing skyed pa shing de dag kyang mnga' rgyang gang tsam du mtho ba/
138a7(mdo sde): me tog dang 'bras bu dang /yal ga dang 'dab mas shin tu brgyan pa/rlung mi drag pas bskyod pas sgra snyan pa 'byung ba/sgra de dag so so'i skye bos thos pas mi ngoms
138b1(mdo sde): bsgrubs skabs na chu mig dang /mtshe'u dang khrus kyi rdzing bu yod la/yon tan brgyad dang ldan pa'i chus yongasu gang zhing rdzing gi zhabs kyang gser gyi byams bdal ba/rdzing gi ngas
138b2(mdo sde): bzhin bsung dam pa dang ldan pa'i me tog pad+ma dang /pun da ri ka dang /pa ri sha ka dang /de ma yin pa me tog sngon po dang /ser po dang /dmar po dang /dader po shing
138b3(mdo sde): rta'i 'phang lo tsam chu'i steng yongasu khebs te/chu'i nang na yang bya rnam pa sna tshogs kyang shin tu yid du 'ong ba'i sgra snyan pa 'byin to//rdzing de'i nang na rin po che sna bdun las byas
138b4(mdo sde): pa'i glu yod de/de na sems can mang po 'dod dgur rtse zhing longs spyod de//rin po che'i shing gi bar bar ni/seng ge'i khri mtho khyed dpag tshad gcig pa bshams nas//
138b5(mdo sde): rin po che sna bdun gyis brgyan pa/lha rdzas kyi na bzas khri'i steng du rim por bting ba/lha rdzas kyi spos kyi dri 'thul ba/lha rdzas kyi me tog gi chal par bkram pa'i khri de la/de
138b6(mdo sde): bzhin gshegs pa nyi zla mar me'i 'od skyil mo krung bcas shing bzhugs pa la/byang chub sems dpa' tshad med pa bye ba brgya stong snyed mdun du bdar te/thal mo sbyar ba btud
138b7(mdo sde): nas/de bzhin gshegs pa de la so so nas tshig 'thun par 'di skad ces gsol to//bcom ldan 'das ci'i rgyu ci'i rkyen gyis 'od bzang po/kha dog sngon po dang /ser po
139a1(mdo sde): dmar po dang /dkar por bcas pa dang ldan pa/rab tu gsal ba/dper mi bzod pa 'di shar phyogs log su 'khor mang po 'di dag la snang bar gyur te/
139a2(mdo sde): gang la 'od kyi reg pa thams cad lus dang sems bde bar gyur pa/thugs brtse ba'i slad du bcom ldan 'das kyis bstan du gsol/de la bcom ldan 'das des 'di skad ces
139a3(mdo sde): bka' stsal to//rigs kyi bu legs par nyon la shin tu yid la legs par zung shig dang /khyed la dgrol bar bshad par bya'o//'di nas shar phyogs logasu 'jig
139a4(mdo sde): rten gyi khams bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong 'das pa'i pha rol na/sangs rgyas kyi zhing mi mjed ces bya ba yod de/de na sangs rgyas rashAkya thub pa zhes bya ba de bzhin gshegs pa
139a5(mdo sde): dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rig pa dang zhabasu ldan pa bde bar gshegs po/'jig rten mkhyen pa/skyes bu 'dul ba'i kha lo bsgyur ba/bla na/
139a6(mdo sde): med pa/ston pa rgyal ba/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das shes bya ba 'khor mang pos yongasu bskor nas/'khor mang po thams cad la thabs mkhas pa chen po drin
139a7(mdo sde): lan bsab pa'i mdo sde ston cing sems can thams cad la phan pa dang /bde ba'i don gyi phyir sems can thams cad kyi log par lta ba'i zug rngu rtsad nas 'don pa'i phyir/
139b1(mdo sde): sems thog ma pa'i byang chub sems dpa' dag/byang chub las phyir mi ldog cing brtan par bya ba'i phyir nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas thams cad mthar phyin pa'i theg pa cig lam la dgod pa'o/
139b2(mdo sde): phyir/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams myur du mngon par byang chub cing /sangs rgyas kyi drin lan bsab pa'i phyir/sems can thams cad kyi drin ci ba dran par bya
139b3(mdo sde): bo'i phyir/sems can thams cad sdug bsngal gyi rgya mtsho las sgrol ba'i phyir so so'i skye bo dag pha ma la sri zhu bya bar 'dod pa'i phyir/'od 'di snang bar gyur pa yin no//de'i tshe
139b4(mdo sde): 'khor de'i nang na byang chub sems dpa' 'khor med po'i gtso bo dang ston par gyur pa/stong phrag bcu snyed stan las langs te/blo gos phyogs gcig tu byas nas/pus mo g.yas
139b5(mdo sde): pa'i lha nga sa la btsugs te/bcom ldan 'das de la 'di skad ces gsol te//bcom ldan 'das kyi byin gyis rlabs kyis bdag cag rnams mi mdzad kyi 'jig rten gyi khams
139b6(mdo sde): der mchi zhing /de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pa la mchod pa dang /bkur sti bgyi ba dang /thabs mkhas pa chen po sangs rgyas drin lan bslab pa'i mdo sde dam pa nyan gyi
139b7(mdo sde): mchi bar byin gyis brlab tu gsol/de nas sangs rgyas des byang chub sems dpa' de dag la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to//rigs kyi bu dag khyed mi mjed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams
140a1(mdo sde): der phyin nas/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de la mchod cing bkur sti bya ba dang /shin tu phrang dka' ba'i 'du shes bskyed par bya'o//de ci'i phyir zhe na
140a2(mdo sde): sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa ni bskal pa grangs med pa bye ba khrag khrig bar du shin tu spyad dka' ba spyad de/snying rje chen po'i smon lam 'di skad ces btab bo//gal te mngon par
140a3(mdo sde): sangs rgyas pa ni/'jig rten gyi khams sdig pa can ri dang shang shong dang /gyo mo dang /gseg ma la sogs pa yod pa'i gnasu sems can nyon mongs pa dang bcas
140a4(mdo sde): mtshams med pa lnga dang /mi dge bcu rdzogs pa'i gnas der mngon par sangs rgyas te/phan pa dang bde ba'i don du sdug bsngal thams cad yongasu bcad de/bde ba thaMd
140a5(mdo sde): dang ldan par byas nasachos kyi sku yongs su rdzogs shing lhag ma ma lus pa'i mya ngan las 'da' bar gyur cig ces smon lami btab bo//sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das des
140a6(mdo sde): thog ma de skad ces smon lam btab pas/khyed rnams 'jig rten gyi khams der phyin nas/ji ltar sangs rgyas nyid gshegs pa dang /ji ltar sang+yas nyid bzhugs pa
140a7(mdo sde): dang 'dra bar gnas par bya'o zhes bka' stsal pa dang /byang chub sems dpa' de dag thams cad kyis tshig 'thun par bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' bzhin du bgyi'o zhes
140b1(mdo sde): gsol nas/byang chub sems dpa' de dag rar yang 'khor byang chub sems dpa' bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong snyed kyis yongasu bskor te/mi mdzad kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang na ba dar/
140b2(mdo sde): song ste/de dag 'jig rten gyi khams gang dang gang du phyin par/'jig rten gyi khams de dag rnam pa drug tu g.yos te/'od zer chen po yang kun tu snang bar gyur/ste /
140b3(mdo sde): bar snang las lha rnams kyis me tog man da ra ba dang /man da ra ba chen po yang cha ru bzhin phab bo//'od zer chen pos snang bar byas shing rdzu 'phrul gyis 'jig rten gyi khams
140b4(mdo sde): gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag kyang g.yos so//de ma yin pa gzhan yang lha rdzas kyi rol mo tshad med pa brgya stong snyed kyang steng gi bar snang la ma dkrol bar rang zer bzhin du/
140b5(mdo sde): byang chub sems dpa' de dag bya rgod spungs pa'i ril/de bzhin gshegs pa'i spyan sngar lhags nas/zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/sangs rgyas la lan gsum
140b6(mdo sde): bskor ba byas nas phyogs gcig tu 'khod do//de'i tshe de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pas kha dog rnam pa lnga dang ldan pa'i 'od zer gyis byang phyogasu sangs rgyas kyi zhing bye ba
140b7(mdo sde): khrag khrig lnga brgya 'das pa'i pha rol na/'jig rten gyi khams dbang phyug grags pa'i rgyal po zhes bya ba snang bar byas so//'jig rten gyi khams ngan sangs rgyas pad+mo lob rgan
141a1(mdo sde): gyi 'od ces bya ba de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rig pa dang zhab su ldan pa/bde bar gshegs pa/'jig
141a2(mdo sde): rten mkhyen pa/skyes du 'dul ba'i kha lo sbyar ba/bla na med pa ston pa rgyal ba/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das sangs rgyas kyi zhing dri ma dang bral ba zhes bya ba na bzhugs te/
141a3(mdo sde): sangs rgyas kyi zhing de yang shin tu mnyam zhing gzhi bai DUr+ya las byas pa/gsor gtsoms thig re'ur bres pa rin po che sna bdun gyi shing bskyed pa/shing de dag kyang
141a4(mdo sde): mda' rgyang gang tsam du mtho ba/me tog dang /'bras bu dang /yal ga dang /mdab mas shin tu brgyan pa/rlung mi drag pas bskyed na/sgra snyan pa 'byung /
141a5(mdo sde): bsgra de yang so so'i skye bos thos na mi ngoms pa skabs skabs na chu mig dang mche'u dang /khrus kyi rdzing bu yod pa yon tan brgyad dang ldan pa'i chus yongasu gang zhing
141a6(mdo sde): rdzing gi zhabs kyang gser gyi bye ma bdal brdzing gi ngos bzhi bsung dam pa dang ldan pa'i me tog pad+ma dang pun de ri ka dang /pa ri sha ka dang /de ma yin pa'i me tog sngon pa/
141a7(mdo sde): dang /ser po dang /dmar po dang dkar po shing rta'i 'phang lo tsam chu'i stong yongasu khebs te/chu'i chung na bya sna tshogs yang shin tu yid du 'ong ba'i sgra snyan pa
141b1(mdo sde): 'byin te//rdzing de'i nang na rin po che sna bdun las byas pa'i gru yod de/de na sems can mang po 'dod dgu rtsa zhing longs spyod do//rin po che'i shing de dag gi bar bAr nA/seng gan//
141b2(mdo sde): khri mtho khyad dpag tshad gcig pa bshams nas/rin po che sna bdun gyis brgyan te/lha rdzas kyi ni bzas/khri'i steng du rim par bting ba/lha rdzas kyi spos kyi dri 'thul
141b3(mdo sde): ba/lha rdzas kyi me tog gis chal par bkram pa'i khri'i thog na/de bzhin gshegs pa pad+mo le ba rgan gyi 'od chags pa/dkyil mo bkrung bcas shing bzhugs pa la byang chub sems
141b4(mdo sde): dpa' tshad med pa bya ba brgya stong snyed mdun du bdar te/thab mo sbyar ba btud nas/de bzhin gshegs pa de la so so nas tshig 'thun par 'di skad ces gsol to//bcom
141b5(mdo sde): ldan 'das ci'i rgyu ci'i rkyen gyis 'od bzang po kha dog sngon po dang /ser po dang /dmar po dang /dkar po ldan pa rab tu gsal ba dper mi bzod pa 'di lho phyogs logs
141b6(mdo sde): nas 'khor mang po 'di dag la snang bar gyur te/gang la 'od kyis reg pa de dag thams cad lus dang sems bde bar 'gyur ba/thugs brtse ba'i slad du bcom ldan 'das kyis
141b7(mdo sde): bstan du gsol/de la bcom ldan 'das kyis 'di skad ces bka' stsal to//rigs kyi bu dag legs par nyon la yid la zung shig dang /khyed la dgrole zhing bshad par
142a1(mdo sde): //na sgyu sa sus sa /kum+b+ha su smras gyud/ na nga du rna/
142a2(mdo sde): s+yA / zhin//ga ga sa pang smra ba gas sa nga byas na hr-I gags pa 'du de
142a3(mdo sde): ma na sbyin pan ma khyen 'i sems can nga pa pa me 'dzin
142b1(mdo sde): bar gyur pa yin no//de'i tshe 'khor de'i nang nas byang chub sems dpa' 'khor mang po'i gtso bo dang ston par gyur pa stong phrag bcu snyed stan las langs par gyur nas/bla gos phyogs
142b2(mdo sde): gcig tu byas nas pus mo g.yas pa'i lha ngo sa la gtsugs te/bcom ldan 'das de la 'di skad ces gsol to//kha com ldan 'das kyi byin gyis rlabs kyis bdag cag
142b3(mdo sde): rnams mi mjed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams der mchi zhing /de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pa la mchod pa dang /bsnyen bkur bgyi ba dang /thobs mkhas pa chen po sangs rgyas

143a1(mdo sde): sogs pa yod pa'i gan su sems can dag kyang nyon mongs pa dang bcas pa dang /mtshams med pa lnga dang /mi dge ba bcu rdzogs par spyad pa'i gnas der //
143a2(mdo sde): mngon par sangs rgyas te/phan pa dang bde ba'i don du sngal bsngal thams cad yongasu bcad de/bde ba thams cad dang ldan par byas nas/chos kyi sku yongasu rdzogs pa'i

143a4(mdo sde): der phyin nas/ji ltar sangs rgyas nyid gshegs pa dang /ji ltar sangs rgyas nyid bzhugs pa dang 'dra bar sems dpar bya'o zhes bka' stsal pa dang /byang chub sems dpa'

143a6(mdo sde): khrig brgya stong snyed kyis yong su bskor te/mi mjed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang na ba der song ste/de dag 'jig rten gyi khams gang dang gang du phyin par 'jig rten gyi khams
143a7(mdo sde): rnam pa drug tu g.yos te 'od zer chen po yang kun tu snang bar gyur/steng gi bar snang las lha rnams kyis me tog man da ra ba dang /man dar po chen po yang char bzhin du
143b1(mdo sde): bab bo//'od zer chen pos snang bar byas shing /rdzu 'phrul gyis 'jig rten gyi khams gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyang g.yos so//de ma yin pa gzhan yang lha rdzas kyi rol mo tshang
143b2(mdo sde): med pa brgya stong snyed kyang /steng gi bar snang la me dkrol bar rang zer bzhin du/byang chub sems dpa' de dag kyang bya rgod spungs pa'i ri ga la ba der de bzhin gshegs pa'i spyan sngar
143b3(mdo sde): lhags nas/zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/sangs rgyas la lan gsum bskor ba byas nas phyogs gcig tu 'khod do//de bzhin du phyogs mtshams bzhi dang /
143b4(mdo sde): steng dang 'og gi phyogs dang /phyogs bcu nas lhags pa'i byang chub sems dpa' chen pa thams cad kyi so so nas 'khor brgya stong grangs med pa dang bcas te/bcom ldan 'ang
143b5(mdo sde): gang na ba der lhags nas/mchod pa dang /bkur bsti byas/mchog byas nas/thams cad kyis mgrid gcig tu tshigasu bcad pa brgya stong snyed kyis bcom ldan 'das
143b6(mdo sde): la yongasu bstod do//de ltar sangs rgyas la stod nas kyang phyogs gcig tu 'khod do//de'i tshe mi mjed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams yang yongasu dag par gyur te/ri khrang khrod dang
143b7(mdo sde): ri chen po dang /chung ngu dang /rtsang po dang /chu klung dang mtshe'u dang /rdzing dang /steng ka dang /shang shong dang /ngam grog dag med cing /de na gnas pa'i
144a1(mdo sde): sems can rnams kyang 'od kyis snang bar byas pas/sangs rgyas gang na ba der lhags nas dga' zhing mgu ba'i sems kyis thal mo sbyar ba btud nas
144a2(mdo sde): mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/mig mi 'dzum par chags pa'i yid kyis lta zhing 'khod do//de nas bcom ldan 'das kyi 'od zer phyir 'dus par mdzad de/'od zer de dag
144a3(mdo sde): gris sku lo lan bdun bskor nus/dbu'i spyi gtsug tu nub par gyur to//de ltar gyur pa kun dga' bos mthong nas/'khor mang po thams cad the tshom skyes par sems
144a4(mdo sde): kyis rab tu shes pas de bzhin gshegs po'i mdzad pa thabs mkhas pa mngon par bstan pa dang /phyis ma 'ongs pa'i skye bo dag gi shes rab kyi mig dbye ba dang /so so'i
144a5(mdo sde): skye bo thams cad sred pa'i chu klung las rgal zhing pha rol tu phyin pas bde ba la dgod pa dang /so so'i skye bo dag pha ma dang slob dpon dang bla ma'i drin lci ba drani zhing shes par bya ba'i
144a6(mdo sde): phyir bstan las langs nas/gos tshagasu bcos nas phyogs gcig tu byas te/pus mo sa lo btsugs nas thal mo sbyar ba btud de/bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad
144a7(mdo sde): ces gsol to//btsun pa bcom ldan 'das bdag kun dga' bos sangs rgyas kyi zham 'bring na mchis na 'dzum pa mdzad pa mthong ste/'di la nges par dgongs pa ni mnga' na//
144b1(mdo sde): 'khor mang po'i the tsom gyi dra ba bcad pa'i slad du/bcom ldan 'das kyis bstan du gsol/sangs rgyas kyis bshad du gsol/thabs mkhas pa chen po sangs rgyas drin lan
144b2(mdo sde): bsab pa'i mdo las/gleng gzhi'i le'u zhes bya ba ste gcig go///de'i tshe de'i dus na 'khor mang po 'dus pa der rin po che sna bdun las byas pa'i
144b3(mdo sde): pad+ma'i sdong po dngul las byas/'dab ma ni gser las byas/gzhi ni rin po che shel las byas pa/mu tig gi dra bas kun tu brgyan pa gcig de nyid nis byung bar gyur to//
144b4(mdo sde): de nis bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa bzhugs pa las bzhengs nas/pad+mo de la skyil mo krung bcas nas bzhug so//de la zhugs ma thag tu yongasu dag pa'i sku mngon par bstan to//
144b5(mdo sde): sku de las lam rgyud lnga'i lus kyi tshogs bstan/lus kyi tshogs re re le yang gzugs tha dad pa rnams khri brgyad stod snyed bstan to//gzugs rnam pa de re re yang sku'i tshogs
144b6(mdo sde): bstan/rdul phra rab kyi sku'i tshogs brgya stong snyed bstan/sku'i tshogs de dag re re la yang gang gA'i klung bzhi'i bya ma snyed kyi sku'i tshogs snyed bstan to//gang gA'i klung bzhi'i
144b7(mdo sde): bye ma snyed kyi sku'i tshogs de dag re re la yang gling bzhi'i rdul phra rab snyed kyi sku'i tshogs bstan/rdul phra rab kyi sku'i tshogs de dag re re la yang /steng gsum gyi stong chen po'i
145a1(mdo sde): 'jig rten gyi khams kyi rdul phra rab snyed kyi sku'i tshogs bstan to//rdul phra rab kyi sku'i tshogs de dag re re la yang phyogs bcur phyogs re rer yang /sangs
145a2(mdo sde): rgyas kyi zhing bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong gi rdul phra rab kyi sku'i tshogs bstan nas/nam mkha'i dbyings kyis bklas pa/chos kyi dbyings dang mnyam pa/bsam gyis mi khyab
145a3(mdo sde): pa snyed kyi sems can gyi lus kyi tshogs mngon par bstod do//de bzhin gshegs pas de snyed kyi lus kyi tshogs mngon par bstan nas/kun dga' bo dang phyogs nas
145a4(mdo sde): 'dus shing tshogs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams dang /'khor mang po rnams la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to//rigs kyi bu dag deng de bzhin gash+ye
145a5(mdo sde): pas thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes kyis yang dag pa'i tshig gang yin pa de bka' stsal par bya'o//chos la tshig tu bzod pa med mod kyi/de bzhin gshegs pas
145a6(mdo sde): thabs mkhas pa'i dbang gis mtshan ma dang ming med pa'i chos la ming dang mtshan mar bstan par bya'o//'di lta ste/de bzhin gshegs pas ni thog mar skyes shing 'khor
145a7(mdo sde): bar 'khor ba'i tshe/bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i rdul phra rab snyed kyi lus kyi tshogs rnam pa tha dad pa de dag thams cad rdzogs par myong ste/de ltar lus kyi tshogs de dag kun myong bas na/
145b1(mdo sde): sems can thams cad kyang de bzhin gshegs pa'i ba ma gyur pa med/de bzhin gshegs pas kyang sems can gyi pha mar ma gyur pa med de/pha mar gyur pa thams cad kyi phyir rgyun tu
145b2(mdo sde): shin tu spyad dka' ba yang spyad shin tu gtang dka' bo'i yan lag gi dam pa mgo dang /mig dang /glad rgyas dang /yul dang /grong khyer dang /chung ma dang /bu
145b3(mdo sde): dang ban gling dang /rta dang //rin po che sna bdun gyi shing rta dang /theg pa dang /gos dang zas dang skom dang /mal cha dang /nad kyi rkyen rtsi dang /dgos pa'i yo byad thams
145b4(mdo sde): cad gang yang ma btang ba med do//shin tu 'bad pa'i brtson 'grus kyis tshul khrims bsrungs pa dang /sbyin pa byas pa dang /mang du thos pa dang /bsam gtan bsgoms pa
145b5(mdo sde): dang /shes rab spyod pa nas/spyod pa bka' ba thams cad spyod de/skyo ba dang ngal ba med cing rgyun mi 'chad par brtson 'grus su 'bad pa yang pha ma la sri zhu bya ba dang /drin
145b6(mdo sde): shes pa dang /drin lan bsab pa dang /sems can thams cad myur du bla na med pa yang dag por rdzogs pa'i byang chub la dgod pa dang /de bzhin gshegs pa'i sngon gyi
145b7(mdo sde): smon lam yongasu rdzogs par bya ba dang /de ltar na sems can thams cad la sangs rgyas kyi bka' drin chen po yod par shes par bya ba dang /de bzhin gshegs pa'i
146a1(mdo sde): thugs rje chen pos sems can yongasu mi gtong ba dang /rtag par shin tu thabs mkhas pas/khams gsum pa'i srid pa nyi shu rtsa lngar gnas/
146a2(mdo sde): pa'i sems can thams cad la bskal pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i bar du/many+dzum snyoms pa'i byams pa bsgoms shing /btang snyoms dang ldan pa'i thabs mkhas pa
146a3(mdo sde): spyod de/sems can thams cad stong pa nyid du rtogs pa dang /chos stong pa nyid dang /phung po lnga stong pa nyid du rtog shing phyir mi nur ba dang /mi 'byung ba dang //mi
146a4(mdo sde): rgod pa stong pa nyid du yang dag pa'i mtshan nyid la thabs mkhas pas bsgom par bya ba dang /theg pa gsum mi spong zhing chub par slob pa'i thabs mkhas pas/shin tu zab mo'i
146a5(mdo sde): spyod yul dam pa spyad pa la thabs mkhas par bya ba'i phyir/chos kyi mtshan nyid la shin tu gsal bar rtogs te/sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams thog ma dang tha ma'i bar
146a6(mdo sde): du gcig ma yin por rtog shing chud pas/so so'i skye bo dag ni myos shing bslad pas/gdung bya gsum gyis yongasu gdungs te/sdug bsngal gyi rgya mtshor nub
146a7(mdo sde): par gyur to//phyin ces log bzhes bsgrib pas zag po dang bcas pa'i chos la phyin ci log tu gyur to//mi bde bar kun tu rtog pas bdag med pa la bdag tu lta
146b1(mdo sde): mi rtag pa la rtag par lta mi bde ba la bde bar lta/mi gtsang ba la gtsang bar lta zhing /skye ba dang /rga ba dang a/na ba dang /'chi bas gzir te/skad cig tu mi rtag/
146b2(mdo sde): pas bsgribs pa lnga dang /kun nas klag pa bcus kun tu klags te/srid pa gsum du 'khor zhing skye shi thog ma dang /tha ma med pa myong bar gyur to//dri bas ni de bzhin
146b3(mdo sde): gshegs pas ci dang /cir 'phrod pa bzhin ste snod gsum dang /mdo sde dgu nas mdo sde bcu gnyis kyi bar du rnam par phye zhing bstan te/so so'i 'dod pa bzhin mdo sde mang
146b4(mdo sde): po gsungaso//tshig la chag pa kha cig bdag ni 'di kho nas chog ste mya ngan las 'das pa thob ces 'dzin pa yang yod do//de yang de bzhin gshegs pa'i sngon gyi thugs rje chen po
146b5(mdo sde): smon lam gyi shugs kyis phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams na las 'thun pa thams cad bsdu so//de ltar las 'thun pa kun 'dus pas/'khor meng po'i dkyil 'khor
146b6(mdo sde): 'dir dam pa'i chos mdo sde gsungs par dgongs te//gzugs brnyan gyi chos nam du yang rgyun mi 'chad cing /so so'i skye bo thams cad bde ba chen po thob par mdzad do//de bas
146b7(mdo sde): na de bzhin gshegs pa 'dul zhing ston pa yang dus las mi yal bar gshegs dus las me yol bar mya ngan las 'da'o//'jig rten gyi khams kha cig tu de bzhin gshegs/
147a1(mdo sde): pa rnam par snang mdzad ces bya ba dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rig pa dang zhabasu ldan pa/bde bar gshegs pa 'jig rten mkhyen/
147a2(mdo sde): pa/skyes bu 'dul ba'i kha lo sgyur ba/bla na med pa/ston pa rgyal ba/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das zhes grag so//skabs kha cig tu ni dga' ldan gnasu gshegs
147a3(mdo sde): nas lha rnams kyi ston pa mdzad//skyabs kha cig tu ni dga' ldan gnas nas babs tAM/'dzam bu'i gling du sku tshe lnga brgyad cur bzhugs par yang ston to//de bas na de bzhin
147a4(mdo sde): gshegs pa ni bsam gyis mi khyab bo//'jig rten gyi khams kyang bsam gyis mi khyab bo//las rnam par smin pa yang bsam gyis mi khyab bo//sems can yang bsam/
147a5(mdo sde): gyis mi khyab bo//bsam gtan gyi ting nge 'dzin yang bsam gyis mi khyab bo//klu'i mthu yang bsam gyis mi khyab bo//'di na sangs rgyas bsam gyis mi khyab pa ste/son
147a6(mdo sde): thams cad kyis sangs rgyas kyis thugs la dgongs pa shes par 'dod no//sems can dbang po zhan pa tha ma'i bar du yang kun shes par mdzad do//sems can thams cad
147a7(mdo sde): las gang yang sangs rgyas mthong bar 'dod na de ma thag tu mthong bar mdzad do//gal te mthong bar mi mdzad na/mig sngar bab kyang /
147b1(mdo sde): mi mthong ngo //de bas na nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas dag lha'i mig gi mngon par shes pa yod kyang mthong bar mi nus//de ma yin pa gzhan yang sangs rgyas kyis 'od zer chen por
147b2(mdo sde): bskyed nas/srid pa'i rtse mo man chad mtshams med pa'i sems can dmyal ba yan chad snang bar mdzad kyang gang 'dul ba'i skal pa dang ldan pa ni mthong bar 'gyur/gang skal
147b3(mdo sde): ba dang mi ldan pa ni mig sngar bab kyang mi mthong ngo //de bzhin gshegs pa skabs kha cig tu ni ched du skul ba mdzad/skabs cig tu ni cang mi gsung bas na/sangs rgyas
147b4(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das ni bsam gyis mi khyab ste/shin tu dpag par dka' ba shin tu shes shing rtogs par dka' na/ji ltar khyod kyis de bzhin gshegs pa la spyod
147b5(mdo sde): pa dka' ba shin tu zab mo dri ba spobs par gyur/khyod kyis zhus pa 'di ni yang dag par sems can thams cad la byams shing sing brtse ba yin te/ngan 'gro gsum gyi lam
147b6(mdo sde): bkag nas/lha dang mi'i lam btod pa yin no//kun dga' bo ngas de khyod la pha ma la sri zhu bya ba'i spyod dka' bo'i mdo tsam zhig bstan par byas/legs par nyon la
147b7(mdo sde): yid la zung shig/bcom ldan 'das kyis kun dga' bo dang /byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams dang /'khor mang po rnams la 'di skad ces bka' stsal no//
148a1(mdo sde): sngon byung ba bskal pa tshad med pa mtha' yas grangs med pa 'das pa'i pha rol na/yul bar na ser sangs rgyas rnam par gzigs shes bya ba'i de bzhin
148a2(mdo sde): gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rig pa dang zhab su ldan pa/bde bar gshegs pa/'jig rten mkhyen pa/skyes bu 'dul ba'i kha lo sgyur ba
148a3(mdo sde): bla na med pa/ston pa rgyal ba/'jig rten gyi gtso bo/lha dang mi'i ston pa 'jig rten du byung ngo //sangs rgyas de'i sku tshe'i tshad kyang bskal pa chung ngu nyi shur bzhugs so//
148a4(mdo sde): dam pa'i chos kyang bskal pa chung ngu nyi shur gnaso//gzugs brnyan gyi chos kyang bskal po chung ngu nyi shur gnas so//gzugs brnyan la tshes spyod pa'i tshe/mi'i rgyal po
148a5(mdo sde): ra tsa zhes bya ba 'jig rten du byung ste/yul ba ra na se la dbang sgyur ro//rgyal po de la btsun mo ni nyo khri yod/blon po ni bzhi stong snyed yod do//bal gyi glang po che
148a6(mdo sde): yang lnga brgya yod/rgyal phrin drug cu la dbang /grong khyer brgyad brgya zhig yod/rgyal po de la bu gsum yod de/gsum tsar yang rgyal phran re re byed do//de'i tshe
148a7(mdo sde): de'i dus na yul ba ra na se'i rgyal po de mkhas pa'i shes rab dang ldan te/rtag tu yang dam pa'i chos kyis yul gyi sred 'dzin pas/gang yang snyams las tshad ces bya ba med/
148b1(mdo sde): rgyal po'i bsod nams dang yon tan gyi mthus char chu dus las mi yol te/lo tog rgyun tu legs pas/de na gnas pa'i mi rnams kyang bde skyid do//de'i tshe na ba ra na se'i rgyal po
148b2(mdo sde): de la blon po chen po sgra gcan zhes bya ba zhig yod do//blon po sgra gcan rgyal po la 'khus nas/dmag rnam bzhi bshams pas 'di lta ste/ban glang gi tshogs dang /shing
148b3(mdo sde): rta'i tshogs dang /rta'i tshogs dang /dpung bu chung gi tshogs bshams nas/bar na se'i rgyal po la brgal nas/rgyal po'i srog bcad do//de ltar rgyal po bsad nas
148b4(mdo sde): kyang dmag gi tshogs rnam pa bzhi bkye nas/mtha'i rgyal phran bu rab kyang bsad do//de nas rgyal bu 'bring po yang phab nas/mtha'i rgyal phran rgyal bu tha chungs kyi thog tu dmag
148b5(mdo sde): drang bshamaso//rgyal bu tha chung de ngo mtshar du gzugs byed bzang la 'phags par mdzes shing rang bzhin gyis dge ba dul ba/'dzum zhing smra ba/smra'o cog kyang phan pa'i don
148b6(mdo sde): tu smra zhing 'gyur gyi gnod pa med pa rtag tu drang po'i chos kyis yul gyi srid 'dzin te/log pas mi 'tsho bas yul mi rnams kyang bde skyid la dar ba/longs spyod dang nor ni rin po cher
148b7(mdo sde): ldan pa/bang mdzod gang ba/rgyal po de'i yon tan la kun gyis sngags shing bstod pa/bar snang gi lha dang 'jig rten gyi lha thams cad kyis kyang dga' zhing bkur ba/de'i tshe
149a1(mdo sde): rgyam nas mdo nas byub gag gan mdang /shin tu yod na rnam sa/byungs sa sa du/
149a2(mdo sde): bal dga' ba/lus kyi mdog gser du 'dug pa/gnam bdun mnyam par gang ba/skyes bu mtshan rdzogs par ldan pa/lo bdun lon pa zhig yod pa de la ya
149a3(mdo sde): rgyal ba yang shin tu byams shing sdug par sems so//de'i tshen po brang srung ba'i lta zhig rgyal po de la 'di skad ces smras//rgyal po ma khyen tam blon po sgra gcan 'khus nas
149a4(mdo sde): yul srid phyogs te/rgyal po yab kyang bkrongs dmag gi tshogs bzhi yang bkye nas rgyal po gcen gnyis kyang srob gi dbang po dang phral te/dmig gi tshogs rnams
149a5(mdo sde): ring po me thogs par 'dir phyin na/rgyal po ci'i phyir srog skyabs shing gud du mi 'gro//de'i tshe na rgyal po des de skad ces smras pa thos nas/lus kyi ba spu kun zing zhes byed
149a6(mdo sde): lus kyang 'dar nas yi mug cing mya ngan gyis sems gdungs te/sa la 'gre zhing rgyal bar gyur nas ring zhig lon pa dang /cung zad sangs te/dal gyis na mkha'i lha la
149a7(mdo sde): 'di skad ces smras so//'di ltar smra ba'i skad ni yod la gzugs ni mi snang ba khyod ci yin/smras pa'i tshig 'di yang dag par bden nam/ltas smras pa/bdag ni/
149b1(mdo sde): rgyal ba'i pho brang srung ba'i lha yin te/rgyal po khyod shes pa dang ldan zhing bsod nams dang yon tan bcas pas/drang po'i chos kyi yul srid 'dzin te/de bas na bdag gis sbyar
149b2(mdo sde): smras pa yin te/sdug bsngal gyis nyon mongs par ma gyur par myur du byol zhing 'gro ba'i rig so//de nas rgyal po de pho brang du zhugs nas/dA ni bdag yul gzhan zhig tu 'gro
149b3(mdo sde): dgoso snyam du bsams//yang 'di snyam du bsamaso//yul pha rol tu 'gro ba'i lam gnyis yod do//lam nye bar zhugs ni ni zhag bdun gyis pha rol tu phyin par 'gyur/lam
149b4(mdo sde): ring por zhugs na ni zhag bcu bzhis phyin par 'gyur bas/ci nas lam nye bar 'gro'o snyam bsams nas zhag bdun gyi rgyags dang chas te pho brang gi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /phyir pho
149b5(mdo sde): blabyang gi nang du log nas/rgyal bu su sha nga ba pang du blangs te/mig mi 'dzums par lta zhing sngangs pa ltar langs nas phyir yang 'dug go/de'i tshe ni btsun mos da ltar mi bde
149b6(mdo sde): zhing skrag pa ltar gyur pa mthong nas /rgyal po la 'di skad ces gsol to//rgyal po chen po ci'i slad du 'jigs skrag pa lta bu'i gzugs ston cing sku la yang rdul gyi gos pa lta bu
149b7(mdo sde): sgra yang 'dzings te/dbugs kyang mi bde ste yul stor la thug pa 'am/mdza' sdug pa dang bye ba 'am/dgra sdang ba dang /phrad pa lta bu dang /bkra mi shis pa'i mtshan
150a1(mdo sde): ma dag ganga' ba 'di ni lags bstan du gsol rgyal pos smras pa//zab tsanyes pa khyod kyis shes pa ma yin gyis ma s+sa shIg btsun mos gsol pa/
150a2(mdo sde): bdag dang rgyal por lus gzugs gnyis kyang sems gcig ste/dper na bya'i 'dab ma gnyis sam/lus kyi rkang pa gnyis sam/mgo'i mig gnyis sam/de
150a3(mdo sde): dang 'dra na ci'i slad du bdag la gsang ste mi gsung /rgyal pos btsun mo la smras pa/khyod la mi shes sam blon po sgra gcan ngan sems skyes nas/rgyal po la la bus te//
150a4(mdo sde): yab rgyal po yid dkrongs te/gcan rgyal bu yang srog gi bar chad byas nas/de lta dmag dang chas te nga la rgol du 'ongs pas kho bo yul gzhan du 'byol du 'gro zhes smras
150a5(mdo sde): nas/rgyal bu dag don pang du blangs te lam du zhugaso//de nas btsun mo yang rgyal po'i phyir 'brangs te song ngo //de'i tshe rgyal po mya ngan gyis non te yod 'khrugs nas
150a6(mdo sde): zhag bcu bzhi'i lam du zhugs pas lam yang nor te/lam de yang bgrod dka' zhing rtswa yang rtsub pa chu tsam yang med de/zhog du ma zhig song ba las rgyags kyang chad//
150a7(mdo sde): thog ma gsang ste rgyal po gtsog pu 'gro bar byas nas/zhags bdun gyi rgyags las kyang me brdzangs pa las lam yang nor/mi gsum gyis kyang zos te/zhag bcu
150b1(mdo sde): bzhi'i lam du zhugs pas/da dung lam ring zhig yod pa las rgyags chud nas de'i tshe rgyal po dang btsun mos skad byung nas duso//kyi hud kyi hud re sdug thog ma bcas nas da tsam/
150b2(mdo sde): gyi bar du 'di 'dra ba ma myong ba de 'dir myong bar gyur te/da 'dir sdug cing phongaso zhes zer te lag pas mgo la brdab so//sa la 'gre zhing lus la rdul gyis gos nas/tshig
150b3(mdo sde): 'di skad du smre sngags 'don to//bdag cag gis tshe snga ma la sdig pa mi dge ba'i las ci zhig byas/'on te pha ma dang ngagra bcom pa bsad dam/'on te dam pa'i chos la
150b4(mdo sde): skur pa btab bam/'on ta 'thun pa'i dge 'dun gyi dbyen bgyis sam/'on te rngon pa dang nye ba byas sam/'on te sang dang bre bcos te pha rol la phrog rlom byas sam/'on te
150b5(mdo sde): dge 'dun gyi nor la spyod spyod dam/ci byas na 'di 'dra ba'i sdug bsngal myong bar gyur cig gu/de skad sgreng zhing chung zad bstir dgas slobs na/srog gi bar chad nges par 'byung
150b6(mdo sde): lam du zhugs nas 'gror ni bkres pa dang skom pas nyen nas srog la bab tu cha'o//rgyal po dang btsun mo de lta bu'i sdug bsngal gyis nyen te skad phyeng ste ngus pa dang /sa la
150b7(mdo sde): 'gyel nas brgyal bar gyur to//de nas rang zhig lon pa dang sangs nas 'di snyam du/gsum char lhan cig tu nar 'chi bar 'gyur gyis//btsun mo bsad la bdag dang bu'i
151a1(mdo sde): srog thar bar bya'o snyam bsams nas/ral gyi phyung ste btsun mo gsad par bshams pa dang /rgyal bu dge don gyis rgyal po'i lag pa nas bzung
151a2(mdo sde): ste/da ltar ci zhig mdzad dgongs shos gsol to//yab rgyal pos mig nas mchi mas gang bzhin du rgyal bu la 'di skad ces smras//khyod kyi ma btsun mo dam pa
151a3(mdo sde): bsad la khyod kyis srog gso snyam mo//gal te ma bsad kyang rang 'chi bar 'gyur te/kho bo ni 'chi'am gson yang rung na/bu khyod kyi srog gso bo'i phyir/khyod
151a4(mdo sde): kyi ma btsun mo dam pa bsad snyam mo//de nas rgyal bu dge don gyis yab rgyal po la 'di skad ces gsol to//gal te btsun mo bsad par gyur na/de'i sha la bdag
151a5(mdo sde): mi 'tshal te/gang na yang mi'i sha la bu za ba mi srid pas/bdag kyang 'chi bar 'gyur na/yab rgyal po ci'i slad du bdag bkum ste pha mi'i srog thar par mi mdzad
151a6(mdo sde): yang rgyal pos de skad smras pa zos nas/mod la khams te 'gyel nas sa la 'gre zhing rgyal bu la 'di skad ces smras//khyod kho ro'i mig dang 'dran su zhig rang gi mig phyung
151a7(mdo sde): ste za bar byed/kho bo ni shi yang bla bas bu mi gsod do//bu bsad de sha za mi nus//de nas rgyal bu dag don gyis yang yab rgyal po la 'di skad ces gsol to//
151b1(mdo sde): bol te yang yum gyis bdag bkum na sha khrag kyang ring po mi thogs par rul sums nas dgongs pa ma mchis par 'gyur to//bdag gi gsol ba gcig cig ma gnang na byams par
151b2(mdo sde): yab yum ma lags pas/bdag gi yid dang mi 'gul bar mdzad du gsol/de nas yab rgyal pos sras rgyal bu la khyod kyi yid dang mi 'gal bar bya bas/ci gsol ba'i rnams
151b3(mdo sde): myur du smras shig ces bsgo ba dang /rgyal bu dge don gyis yab rgyal po la 'di skad ces gsol to//yab yum gyis bdag la thugs brtsa ba'i slad du nyin re zhing bdag gi
151b4(mdo sde): lus las sha rgyu ma gsum gsum bcad do//cha gnyis ni yab yum la dbulacha gcig ni bdag rang 'tshal na/lus srog gri zungasu 'gyur ro//de nas rgyal pos kyang
151b5(mdo sde): rgyal bus gsol ba bzhin du gnang nas/nyin gcog bzhin sha rgya ma gsum gsum bcad de/cha gnyis ni rgyal po dang btsun mo za/cha gcig ni rgyal bu rang za ste/
151b6(mdo sde): lus dang srog gi zungs byas nas/lam du zhugs te song ba las zhag gnyis kyi yul pha rol ma slebs par rgyal bu'i lus kyi sha zad de/rus pa'i tshogs dang chu ba tsam
151b7(mdo sde): zhig 'drol te/srog gi lhag ma tsam zhig lus nas sa la 'gyel to//de nas rgyal po dang btsun mos rgyal bu bang du blangs nas/skad chen po byung na cho nges btab te/
152a1(mdo sde): 'di skad ces smras so//deng gnyis kyis ma rig par khyod kyi sha zos te/khyod 'di lta bu'i na tsha'i sdug bsngal myang bar gyur la/lam yang da dung
152a2(mdo sde): ring bas khyod kyis lus kyi sha ni zad de/da ni lhan cig tu gnas 'dir ro bzhag go/de nas rgyal bu dge don gyis skad chung ngus yab rgyal po la 'di skad ces gsol la//
152a3(mdo sde): da ni 'di nas pha rol du zhag cig tsam gyis lam las ma lus te/bdag ni g.yo zhing bskyod mi nus pas srog 'dir 'dor ro//rgyal po dang btsun mo ni mi ma rabs ngan pa
152a4(mdo sde): ltar lhan cig tu gnas 'dir ro gzhag go ma gsungs shig/bdag la byams shing thugs brtse bar dgongs na bdag gis bsams pa dang mi 'gal bar mdzad du gsol/
152a5(mdo sde): da dung yang bdag gis rus pa'i gsapa na sha ci yod pa ma lus par gtogs la yul pha rol du gshegasu gsol/de nas rgyal pos yang rgyal bus gsol pa bzhin du/
152a6(mdo sde): tshigs dang rus pa'i gseb na sha ci yod pa btogs nas cha gsum du bgos te/cha gnyis ni rgyal po dang btsun mos zos/cha gcig ni rgyal bus zos te/rgyal
152a7(mdo sde): po dang btsun mo yang lam du zhugs nas dong ngo //rgyal bu dge don langs nas 'greng bzhin rgyal po dang btsun mo song ba la lta'o//rgyal po dang btsun mo gnyis skad rlung
152b1(mdo sde): nas du bzhin song nas/rgyal bu dag don gyi mig gis mi sod kyi bar du rgyal po dang btsun mo la chags pa'i snyoms kyis mig mi 'dzum par lta lta nas ring zhig lon pa dang /phyir stsal
152b2(mdo sde): 'gyel to//sha dang khrag gi dri bro bas phyogs bcu nas sbrang ma dang sha sbyong mang po 'dus nas/rgyal bu yog pa tsam du lus la za zhing 'jungs te/sdug bsngal gyis gdung so//
152b3(mdo sde): de'i tshe na rgyal bu de srog gi lhag ma tsam zhig ma chad da/skad phyung nas 'di skad ces smon lam du btab bo//bdag gi sngon gyi mi dge ba'i las rnams ni 'dis byang zhing zad par gyur
152b4(mdo sde): cig/deng slan chad mi bgyid do//bdag gi lus pha ma la phul te/sbyin pa byas pas bdag gri pha ma snga ma bas lhag pa'i bsod nams bcu gcig dang ldan te/bde bar
152b5(mdo sde): nyal ba dang /bde bar sad pa dang /rmi lam dran pa mi rmi ba dang /lhas bsrung ba dang /mis bkur ba dang /zhal mchu dang /rkun po dang /dgra dang rku lto byed
152b6(mdo sde): pa med cing /dus thams cad du bkra shis par shog shig/bdag gi lus lhag ma tsam sha khrag sbrang me la byin pas thams cad du 'drangs shing tshim par gyur te/bdag
152b7(mdo sde): ma 'ongs pa'i dus na sangs rgyas su grub par shog cig/sangs rgyas su grub nas chos kyi sku thob nas kyang /chos kyi skus thams cad kyis bkres skom pa'i mu ge dang /skye
153a1(mdo sde): shir 'khor ba'i nad lci ba sel bar shog cig/rgyal bus de skad smon lam btab pa na/gnams yang rnam pa drug tu g.yos/nyi ma yang
153a2(mdo sde): 'od mi gsal bar gyur/gcan zan dang ri dwags rnams kyang skrag nas kun tu rgyug/rgya mtsho yang rab tu 'khrugs/ri rab kyang 'gul zhing ldeg/sum cu rtsa gsum
153a3(mdo sde): gnam gyi bar du yang rab tu g.yos so//de'i tshe brgya byin lci'i dbang pos 'dod pa'i khams kyi lha dag dang /'dzam bu'i gling dag tu babs nas/rgyal bu don grub
153a4(mdo sde): bsdig pa'i phyir/seng+ge dang /stag dang /'pho rau spyang las sogs pa'i lus su sprul nas migo dprad/kha gdangs/spu bsgreng nas skad chen po'i nga ro phyung sti/
153a5(mdo sde): rgyal bu la mchod ba bzhin bsdig so//de'i tshe rgyal bu don grub kyis gcan zan khro bo de dag mthong nas kyang skad mi che bas 'di skad ces smras so//khyed rnams kho bo ze 'dod
153a6(mdo sde): na ci bder zo zhig/'di 'dra ba'i mthu rtsal gyis bsdigs ci dgos shes bsgo'o//de nas brgya byin lha'i dbang pos smras pa/bdag cag ni seng+ge 'am/gcan zan
153a7(mdo sde): ma yin te/brgya byin lha'i dbang po yin te/khyod bgam zhing sad du 'ongs so//de'i tshe rgyal bus brgya byin lha'i dbang po mthong nas shin tu dga' dgur rangs par
153b1(mdo sde): yang gyur to//de nas brgya byin gyis rgyal bu la smras pa/khyod kyis shin tu gtang dka' ba btang ste lus kyi sha khrag gis pha ma la bltabs pa 'di'i bsod nams kyis khyod bdud
153b2(mdo sde): kyi rgyal po 'dod dam/'on te tshangs pa'i rgyal po 'dod dam/lha'i dbang po 'am/mi'i rgyal po 'am/'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po 'dod/rgyal bus smras pa/bdag
153b3(mdo sde): ni bdud kyi rgyal po 'am/tshangs pa 'am/lha'i rgyal po 'am/mi'i rgyal po 'am/'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po gang yang mi 'dod do/sems can thams cad
153b4(mdo sde): rnam par grol bar bya ba'i phyir/bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub 'dod do//brgya byini gyis smras pa/khyod ni shin tu yang gti mug can zhig yin pa 'dra//
153b5(mdo sde): bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub ni yun ring po nas shin tu dko' bas bsgrubs pas gzod 'grub ce'o//khyod kyis shin tu sdug bsngal ba bzod dam/rgyal bus
153b6(mdo sde): smras pa/gal te lcags kyi 'khor lo 'bar ba bdag gi spyi bo'i steng na rgyun tu 'khor yang sdug bsngal de tsam gyis bdag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir
153b7(mdo sde): mo ldog go/brgya byin gyis smras pa/khyod kyis smras pa stong pa 'di la su zhig yid ches par 'gyur/de nas rgyal bus dam bcas nas smon lam 'di skad ces bte'o//
154a1(mdo sde): gal te bdag gi smra ba'i tshig brdzun te lha'i dbang ba bslus par gyur na/bdag gi lus kyi rgyu 'di nam du yang 'tsho bar ma gyur cig/gal te smra ba'i/
154a2(mdo sde): tshig bden na bdag gi lus kyang sor chud cing khrag kyang 'o mar gyur cig ces smras ma thag tu/lus kyi rma yang snga ma kho na bzhin sor chud de/khrag kyang 'o mar gyur nas
154a3(mdo sde): rgyal bu'i byad gzugs kyang ma ma bas lhag par bzang zhing sdug pa dang mdzes par gyur te/langs nas lha'i dbang po'i rkang pa la mgo bos phyag byaso//de nas lha'i dbang po brgya byin
154a4(mdo sde): gyis khyod lag so//shin tu legaso//shin tu dpa' ba'i brtson 'grus kyis gdon mi za bar/bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub thob par 'gyur ro//ring por
154a5(mdo sde): mi thogs par bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub thob pa na/thog mar bdag gis don mdzad par gyur cig ces smras nas/brgya byin lha'i dbang po yang na mkha'i
154a6(mdo sde): phyogs de nyid du mi snang bar gyur to//de'i tshe rgyal po dang btsun mo yang rgyal po pha rol po'i drung du phyin nas/rgyal po des kyang rgyang ma nas bsu nas/dgos pa'i yo byad
154a7(mdo sde): yid bzhin du sbyar ro//de'i tshe rgyal po dang btsun mo des rgyal bus lus kyi sha khrag gis pha ma la ji ltar bstabs pa rgyal po de la zhib tu brjod pa dang /rgyal po des ji ltar
154b1(mdo sde): brjod pa de dag thos nas/rgyal bu des lus kyis sha khrag gis pha ma la stabs pas sri zhu cher byas pa'i drin lan bsabs nas dmag rnam bzhi bshams nas/rgyal po de dang yul
154b2(mdo sde): bA ra na ser dmag drang so//de'i rgyal po de dmag rnam bzhi dang chas nas lam du zhugs te/rgyal bu dang bral ba'i gnasu byin pa dang /'di snyam du bdag gi bu ni gdon mi zla
154b3(mdo sde): ba 'di nyid du shin/bu'i dus pa tsam bsdus te phyir bdag gi yul du la/ro snyam du sems nas/skad phyung nas ngu zhing bu'i rus bu sdud du song song ba la/rgyang ma nas bdag gi
154b4(mdo sde): bu'i lus kyi rma yang sos nas/snga ma bas bzang zhing mdzes te drung du 'ongs so//de nas rgyal pos pang du blangs te/khyod da dung gi sngon nam zhes smras pa dang /rgyal bus
154b5(mdo sde): ji ltar gyur pa yab rgyal po dang btsun mo la smraso//rgyal po dang btsun mo rab tu dga' ste/thams cad ban glang la zhon nas/phyir bdag gi yul du phyin pa dang /rgyal
154b6(mdo sde): bu de'i bsod nams de'i mthus bdag gi yul yang phyir thob nas/rgyal bu don grub rgyal por dbang bskur te rgyal por bcug go/bcom ldan 'das kyi kun dga' ba la bka'
154b7(mdo sde): stsal pa/de'i tshe de'i dus na yang rgyal por gyur pa de gzhan yin snyam du khyod sems na/de ltar mi blta'o//de ci'i phyir zhe na/de'i tshe de'i dus na yang rgyal po de
155a1(mdo sde): ni da ltar nga'i yab zas gtsang ma zhes bya bar gyur to//de'i tshe de'i dus na yum du gyur pa de ni gzhan yin pa snyam du khyod sdoms na/de de ltar mi
155a2(mdo sde): blta'o//de ni da ltar nga'i yum lha mdzes zhes bya ba yin no//de'i tshe de'i dus na rgyal bu don grub ces bya bar gyur pa de/gzhan zhog yin snyam du khyod sems na/
155a3(mdo sde): de de ltar mi blta'o//de'i tshe de'i dus na rgyal bu de ni da ltar shAkya thub pa zhes bya ba nga yin no//de'i tshe de'i dus na brgya byin lha'i dbang por gyur pa da ltar kun shes ko'u 'di
155a4(mdo sde): n+ya zhes bya ba yin no//bcom ldan 'das kyi pha ma la sri zhu byed pa'i le'u 'di bstan pa'i tshe/'khor gyi dkyil 'khor de na byang chub sems dpa' khri phrag nyi shu snyed
155a5(mdo sde): kyi 'gro ba thams cad la phan pa dang bde ba'i don la mkhas pa'i tshig gi spobs pa thob par gyur to//byang chub sems dpa' khri phrag bcu gnyis kyis mi skye ba'i chos la chos
155a6(mdo sde): kyi bzod pa thob pa//gzhan yang phyogs bcu nas 'dus pa'i nyan thos dang /rang sangs rgyas dang /rdul phra rab snyed kyis theg pa gnyis kyis sems spangs te/theg pa
155a7(mdo sde): gcig gis mthar phyin par gyur to//dge bsnyen dang /dge bsnyen ma rdul phra rab snyed kyis 'bras bu dang po nas theg pa gnyis kyis 'bras bu'i bar du thob par gyur to//
155b1(mdo sde): lha dang mi brgya stong snyed ni bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed do//de ma yin pa lha dang /klu dang yi dgas dang /lha ma yin dang /dri za dang /na mkha'
155b2(mdo sde): lding dang /mi 'am ci dang /lto 'phye chen po dang /mi dang mi ma lags pa las sogs pa mang po rnams la la ni bla na med pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed pa nas/nyan thos dang
155b3(mdo sde): rang sangs rgyas kyi bar du sems bskyed par gyur to//bcom ldan 'das kyi kun dga' bo la bka' stsal pa dang /byang chub sems dpa' dag gis sems can thams cad don
155b4(mdo sde): du pha ma la sri zhu bya ba'i phyir/lus kyi sha khrag gis kyang pha ma la bstabs shingashin tu spyad dka' ba spyod pa ni 'di lta bu yin no//'khor mang po thams cad kyis sangs
155b5(mdo sde): rgyas kyis gsungs pa thos nas/so so nas phan pa dang bde ba'i don rnyed do//dga' rangs nas mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/g.yas phyogs nas bskor ba byas nas phyir stong //
155b6(mdo sde): thabs mkhas pa chen po sangs rgyas drin lan bsab pa'i mdo las/sri zhu'i le'u zhes bya ste gnyis so////bam po gnyis pa/
155b7(mdo sde): de'i tshe de'i dus na bcom ldan 'das kyi 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor mang po'i nang na/nyi mi'i dkyil 'khor gyi skar ma mang po zil gyis mnan pa lta bu 'am/klu 'khyil ba'i 'ja
156a1(mdo sde): tshon ltar 'chor zhing gsal ba la ltan mig mi chags pa bzhin nam/bsams na yid 'khrul pa tsam du 'od zer lham me b+hang nger bzhugs
156a2(mdo sde): dper na mi bzod pa ni srin bu me khyer gyi 'od nyi ma shar ma thag tu mi snang ba 'am/nyi zla 'od zer brgya stong snyed yod kyang /brgya byin gyi drung na sol phung lta bu 'am/brgya
156a3(mdo sde): byin la 'od gsal ba yod kyang /tshangs pa chen po'i 'od zer gyi drung na gyo mo 'am/gseg ma lta bu'am mtshan mo dang /nor bu rin po che'i 'od du bskrun pa tsam mom
156a4(mdo sde): tshangs pa'i rgyal po chen po'i 'od zer dam pa brgya stong snyed yod pa'i 'od thams cad kyang /de bzhin gshegs pa'i 'od zer gyi drung na sol ba'i phung po ltar gyur te//de ci'i
156a5(mdo sde): phyir zhe na/de bzhin gshegs pa'i 'od zer mdog gang gis phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams kun tu snang bar gyur to//de dag na gnas pa'i sems can dag la 'od
156a6(mdo sde): zer des reg na/dmus longs ni mig gis gzugs mthong bar 'gyur/lus sgur po ni lus rangs par 'gyur/dbang po nyams pa ni dbang po tshang zhing yan lag
156a7(mdo sde): dang nyeng lag dang ldan par 'gyur ro//myos pa rnams ni dran pa phyir rnyed par 'gyur/mdor na ji tsam du yid du mi 'ong ba thams cad dang bral te 'dod pa bzhin 'ong bar 'gyuraro//
156b1(mdo sde): de'i tshe 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor da nyid du byang chub sems dpa' sem sna nga 'tshon po bdun nu skyed stan las langs nas/sangs rgyas kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/yan pa/
156b2(mdo sde): stong bskor ba byas nas phyogs gcig tu 'khod de/thams cad kyis skad 'thun pa'i tshigasu bcad pa brgya stong gis de bzhin gshegs pa la mngon par bstod pa byas pa la'ang snya
156b3(mdo sde): byang chub sems dpa' bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang /byang chub sems dpa' rtag med dbyangs dang /byang chub sems dpa' bde ba 'ba' shig sems dang /byang chub sems
156b4(mdo sde): dpa' dri ma med par grags pa dang /byang chub sems dpa' tshad med dbyangs dang /byang chub sems dpa' grags pa chen po dang /byang chub sems dpa'o gtsug phud 'od dang
156b5(mdo sde): byang chub sems dpa' brtan pa'i seng ge dang /byang chub sems dpa' 'ba' shig rol dang /byang chub sems dpa' rtog pa spong ba dang //byang chub sems dpa' ye shes
156b6(mdo sde): brtsegs dang /byang chub sems dpa' dge gnas blo gros dang /byang chub sems dpa' rtag tu mtshan med dang /byang chub sems dpa'i' blo gros 'od zer dang /byang
156b7(mdo sde): chub sems dpa' khro ba blo gros dang /byang chub sems dpa' shin tu srung 'gyur dang /byang chub sems dpa' dad pa brgyan dang /byang chub sems dpa' me tog 'phags
157a1(mdo sde): dang /byang chub sems dpa' kun tu bde dang /byang chub sems dpa' 'phags pa'i shes rab lus dang /byang chub sems dpa' ngo 'bral 'chang
157a2(mdo sde): dang /byang chub sems dpa' bsam du meng dang /byang chub sems dpa' tshongs pa sbyin dang /byang chub sems dpa' rin chen las dang /byang chub sems dpa' lha'i
157a3(mdo sde): me tog gnas dang /byang chub sems dpa' shin tu sems dang /byang chub sems dpa' dpag med chos dang /byang chub sems dpa' grogs pa'i yid dang /byang
157a4(mdo sde): chub sems dpa' spobs pa brtsegs dang /byang chub sems dpa' dbang phyug sgo dang /byang chub sems dpa' stobs bcu dang /byang chub sems dpa' stobs bcu
157a5(mdo sde): 'chad dang /byang chub sems dpa' 'phags pa tshon pos skyong dang /byang chub sems dpa' 'ongs pa med pa dang /byang chub sems dpa' zhi ba rol dang /byang chub sems
157a6(mdo sde): dpa' de na gnas dang /byang chub sems dpa' grangs med lha dang /byang chub sems dpa' ri rab 'od dang /byang chub sems dpa' rab tu lci ba'i sdong po dang /byang chub
157a7(mdo sde): sems dpa' rgyu las 'phags dang /byang chub sems dpa' gcig pu 'gro dang /byang chub sems dpa' gzi brjid 'phags dang /byang chub sems dpa' sde tshan
157b1(mdo sde): /khams dang /byang chub sems dpa' ris skyob dang /byang chub sems dpa' 'jig rten gsum 'dzin dang /byang chub sems dpa' do 'bral yod dang /byang chub sems dpa'
157b2(mdo sde): grags pa brjod dang /byang chub sems dpa' gnyid gsal dang /byang chub sems dpa' seng ge brtsan dang /byang chub sems dpa' dus tshod rgyal po dang /byang chub sems
157b3(mdo sde): dpa' seng ge'i snying po dang /byang chub sems dpa' srid mngon ston dang /byang chub sems dpa' 'od rgyang gsal dang /byang chub sems dpa' seng+ge'i ri dang /byang chub sems dpa'
157b4(mdo sde): srid len byin dang /byang chub sems dpa' rgyal po byin dang /byang chub sems dpa' rgyal mtshan mchog dang /byang chub sems dpa' dga' mgu rangs dang /byang chub sems
157b5(mdo sde): dpa' brtson 'grus brtan dang /byang chub sems dpa' 'gribs med dang /byang chub sems dpa' grags ldan dang /byang chub sems dpa' 'jigs med dang /byang chub
157b6(mdo sde): sems dpa' mche gros lta dang /byang chub sems dpa' sgron ma chen po dang /byang chub sems dpa' 'jig rten po de dang /byang chub sems dpa' dam pa'i dbyangs dang /byang chub
157b7(mdo sde): sems dpa' thabs chen stobs dang /byang chub sems dpa' mun nag bskul dang /byang chub sems dpa' mnyam med phyogs la sogs pa/byang chubo sems dpa' de dag
158a1(mdo sde): thams cad kyis sangs rgyas kyi spyan sngar yi dam 'di skad bcas//bdag cag rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das mya ngan las 'das pa'i 'og tu sangs rgyas
158a2(mdo sde): kyi chos bsrung zhing /phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams kun tu rgyas par bgyi zhing rgyun mi 'chad par bgyi'o//de ci'i slad du zhe na/bdag cag gis de bzhin ga shaDa
158a3(mdo sde): pApa'i 'od zer dam pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa mthong nas/'od zer de dag las sangs rgyas kyi chos bsam gyis mi khyab pa yang thos par 'gyur/chos de dag zos nas sems
158a4(mdo sde): kyi sgrib pa dang bral te/kun nas nyon mongs pa thams cad byang nas/lha'i rin po tsho gser ltar sems rnam par dag par 'gyur bas/thams cad gsal bar snang bar
158a5(mdo sde): gyur pa'i phyir ro//bdag gis phan pa dang bde ba'i yon tan 'di lta bu dag dran pas de bzhin gshegs pa la ston pa chen por 'du shes skyes so//byams pa'i pha lta bu'i
158a6(mdo sde): 'du shes skyes nas/rtag tu sangs rgyas kyi bka' drin dran te/sangs rgyas kyi bka' dran shes par bgyid do//de ci'i phyir zhe na/dam pa'i chos thos par rang
158a7(mdo sde): po mi thogs par byang chub kyi snying po la 'dug cing /dam pa'i chos kyi 'khor lo bskor te/sems can thams cad sgrol bar 'gyur ro//de dag kyang chos thos pas
158b1(mdo sde): /blu na mod pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub thob par 'gyur ba'i phyir ro//de nas de bzhin gshegs pas 'khor mang pa la 'dri ska myos bka' stsal to//byang chub sems dpa'
158b2(mdo sde): sems dpa' chen po bdun cu po 'di dag yun ring po nas bskal po grangs med pa bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong gis rdul phra rab snyed kyi sngon rol na/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gan
158b3(mdo sde): rlung gi bye ma brgya stong snyed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams rdul phra rab snyed bkur byas te/sangs rgyus de dag las rtag tu tshangs par spyad pa spyod cing /rgyal ba de dag la mi skyo ba'i sems kyis
158b4(mdo sde): mnyes par byas nas/byams pas bdag gis lus bsrungs te/sangs rgyu spyi chos 'dzin cing /snying rje chen pos rgyun tu phyogs bcur thams cad la phan pa dang bde ba'i don
158b5(mdo sde): byed do//sems can gang zhig tha ma shi ka byang chub sems dpa' de dag lo gcig gi ming ngam/gnyis sam/gsum mam/bzhi 'am/bdun nu'i bar du rdzogs
158b6(mdo sde): par thos te/de la srog phyogs skyabs su song na/tshe 'phos ma thag tu gang na sang+yas bzhugs pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams su pad+mo las rdzus te skye bar 'gyur zhing /'dod
158b7(mdo sde): chags dang yongs su bral ba dang mngal gyi gnas nas mi skye ba dang /mnam zhing brtsog pa dang bral bar 'gyur te/lus yongs su dag cing /lus dri zhim pa dang /thams cad
159a1(mdo sde): yid du 'ong zhing bkur bsti byed par 'gyuraro//kun gyi yid du 'ong zhing bkur bsti byas pas sems rab tu dga' bar 'gyur ro//sems rab tu dga'
159a2(mdo sde): bas bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed par 'gyur//bla na med pa yang drug por rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed pas/sems can
159a3(mdo sde): thams cad la byams pa dang /snying rje chen por sems bskyed par 'gyur/de ltar byams pa dang snying rje'i sems bskyod pas/'gro ba mo lus pa la btang sgrom su ma
159a4(mdo sde): gtong ba'i sems skye bar 'gyur/gzhan yang sems can thams cad la phan pa dang bde bar 'gyur ba'i sems dang /bdag dang gzhan gyis don byed pa'i sems dang /
159a5(mdo sde): sgrib pa dang bar chad du 'gyur ba bstsal ba'i sems dang /nyon mongs pa zhi bar byed pa'i sems dang /dge ba'i bshes gnyen la bsnyen cing rtag tu bkur sti byed pa'i
159a6(mdo sde): sems dang /'dun pa'i yid kyi chos nyan pa'i sems dang /mi brjed par yid la byed cing /don bzang po gzungasu 'dzin pa'i sems dang /nyung ngu thos la don mang
159a7(mdo sde): du shes pa'i sems dang /mang du thos la don mi shes pa mi 'dod pa'i sems skye bor 'gyur ro//de nas yang dag pa 'di la dad pa'i sems dang /de bzhin nyid kyi
159b1(mdo sde): don bden pa la dad pa'i sems skye bar 'gyur/yang dag pa dun bden pa lnga dud pa'i sems smras pas rdo ltar bskrun pa bzhin du rnal 'gyur spyod pa'i sems skye bar 'gyur//
159b2(mdo sde): ji ltar bstan pa bzhin du rnal 'byor spyod pa'i sems skyes pas phyir mi ldog pa'i sems skye bar 'gyur/de ltar phyir ma ldog pa'i sems skyes pas/sems can thams cad la
159b3(mdo sde): mnyam snyoms pa'i gnyen po'i sems skye bar 'gyuraro//ji ltar bdage khams gsum pa'i srid pa nyi shu rtsa lngar skye bar mi dga' ba bzhin du gzugs yod pa dang /gzugs
159b4(mdo sde): myespyod pa da/rkang bzla dang rkang mangs nas grog sbyar nas srog chags thams cad kyang de dang 'dra ste/de bas na byang chub sems dpa' ni lus dang srog gi bar du sbyar yang
159b5(mdo sde): b+h+r-i rim po'i srog 'phrog pa'i las m+b+hi byed do//ji ltar bdag la nir rjes dang /'bru dang /gos dang /zas dang /skom dang /ban glang da /shing rta dang
159b6(mdo sde): thig pa dang yul dang /grong khyer dang /chung ma dang /bu dang /lus kyi yan lag gi bar du longs spyod rnams la srung zhing rim gro byed do//gzhan gyis khyer
159b7(mdo sde): zhing 'drog pa la mi dga' ba bzhin du sems can thams cad kyang de dang 'dra ste/de bas na byang chub sems dpa' ni bdag gi lus der srog sbyor kyang sems can rnams kyi nor dang /
160a1(mdo sde): gos dang /zas dang /skom dang /longs spyod la 'phrog pa'i sems mi snyed du//ji ltar bdag gi gzugs dam pa snying ma 'am/chung ma'am/
160a2(mdo sde): slas la gzhan gyis mi rig par byed mi 'dod pa bzhin du/sems can thams cad kyang de dang 'dra ste/de bas na byang chub sems dpa' ni bdag gi lus dang srog stor kyang
160a3(mdo sde): pha rol po'i gzugs dam pa la 'du shes ngan pa log pa'i sems mi skyed na/mi rig pa'i chos ngan pa lta ci smos/ji ltar bdag phra ma dang tshig rtsub po 'khrug par 'gyur ba
160a4(mdo sde): la mi dga' ba bzhin du/sems can rnams kyang de dang 'dra ste/de bas na byang chub sems dpa' ni bdag gi lus dang srog yal yang brdzun du smra ba dang phan tshun 'khrug
160a5(mdo sde): pa'i tshig mi smra'o//ji ltar bdag rdo dbyug gis rdeg pa dang lcag gis gzhu bo dang /nan la 'bor ba la mi dga' ba bzhin du sems can thams cad kyang de dang 'dra ste/
160a6(mdo sde): de bas na byang chub sems dpa' ni bdag gi lus dang srog yal yang rdo dbyug dang /lcag dang chad pas gcad pa'i las kyis sems can rnams la mi chi'o//ji ltar
160a7(mdo sde): bdag lcags sgrog dang /khong sgril dang /mtshon cha dang /bzung ba dang /brtag pa dang /bcing bas bcing ba'i gnod pa rnams la mi dga' ba bzhin du/
160b1(mdo sde): sems can kun kyang de dang 'dra ste/de bas na byang chub sems dpa' ni lus dang srog yal yang lcags sgrog dang /khong sgril dang /bzung ba dang /bcing ba la sogs pa'i
160b2(mdo sde): gnod pas 'tshe bar mi byed do//ji ltar bdag gzhan gyis bstas pa dang /dbang dang dag shul byed pa dang /dbang rlom par can byed bsnyems shing ngan du byed pa la mi
160b3(mdo sde): dga' ba bzhin du/sems can thams cad kyang de dang 'dra ste/de bas na byang chub sems dpa' ni ro dag gcig pu'i lus dang srog yal yang //tshul bzhin ma yin pa'i mi
160b4(mdo sde): rigs pas/sems can la gnod pa mi byed do//ji ltar bdag la pha rol po gzhan gyis bkur bsti byed cing mchod dam/tshig snyan pas bstod na/bdag bde ba la
160b5(mdo sde): dga' bzhin du bdag kyang /sems can rnams la gos dang zas dang skom dang /mal cha dang /nod kyi rkyen rtsi dang bde ba'i yo byad thams cad kyi sbyin par byed do//
160b6(mdo sde): gal te bdag gis las chen po zhig bsgrub bam/sangs rgyas kyi phyir ram/chos kyi phyir ram/dge 'dun gyi phyir ram/don bsgrub pa las blos mi lcogs te/don
160b7(mdo sde): bsgrub par ma gyur nas mi dga' zhing mya ngan gyis gdungs pa las mkhas pa blo dang ldan pa zhig gis bdag gis bsgrub pa'i don ma grub pas mi dga' zhing mya ngan byed par
161a1(mdo sde): mthong na bdag la 'di skad zer ro//rigs kyi bu khyod mi dga' ba ma byed cig/khyod kyi don grub pa'i grogs bya'o//don yid bzhin du grub
161a2(mdo sde): par bya'o zhes zer na/de la rab tu dga' ba'i sems skye bar 'gyur te/de bas na bdag gis sems can la phan pa dang bde ba'i don du bsgrub pa'i las kyis grogs bya'o//

161a4(mdo sde): dga' ba'i mya ngan gyis gdungs par gyur pa las mkhas pa blo dang ldan pa zhig gis bdag de ltar mya ngan gyis gdungs pa mthong na/snyan pa sgra'i tshig gis bdag la mya
161a5(mdo sde): ngan ma byed cing /khyod kyis phyir kho bos rgyal po 'am/blon pa chen po la gsol ba btab ste/gal te nA nor gsug sbyin pa 'am/thabs rnam pa sna tshogs
161a6(mdo sde): kyi ji nas kyang khyod mi bde ba'i sdug bsngal los thar bar bya'o zhes zer na/bdag gis tshig de thos pa tsam gyi sems dga' bar 'gyur te/de bas na byang chub
161a7(mdo sde): sems dpa' ni shes par bya ba'i rgyu rtsal dang /bzo'i bar du mthar phyin par brtson 'grusu slob bo//'di lta ste/shes par bya ba rig pa'i gnas dang /bzo'i

161b3(mdo sde): la sogs pa yang bsams pa'i yid dang 'gal bar mi byed/de ma yin pa gzhan yang longs spyod kyi rkyen gos sam//nor ram zas sam/bza' ba 'am//
161b4(mdo sde): btung ba 'am/nor bu 'am//gdu bu 'am/lus kyi rgyan nam/gser ram/daungul lam//bai DUR+ya 'am/man shel la ma/spug gam/mu tig
161b5(mdo sde): ga ma/a sma gar b+ha 'am/nor bu rin po che'am/pa no glang ngam/rta 'am/theg pa'am/bran po'am/las byed pa'i mi 'am/chung ma 'am/
161b6(mdo sde): slas kyang yod/chu mig gam/khrus kyi rdzing bu 'am/rin po che'i yang tog bzang po 'am/longs spyod kyi yo byad rnam pa sna tshogs yod kyang /byang chub sems
161b7(mdo sde): dpa' de la rlom pa 'am/rgyags pa'i sems med do//de ltar rgyu rtsal kun la yang mkhas/rin po che'i bang mdzod brgya stong dang yang ldan/bani glang dang
162a1(mdo sde): rta dang /theg pa yang yod na chung ma bzang mo yang grangs med par yod/yang tog bzang po yang yod/chu mig dang /khrus kyi rdzing bu la sogs pa
162a2(mdo sde): pa 'dod pa'i longs spyod gang yang yod mod kyi de la chags te/rtag tu 'dod pa nyung ba dang /chog shes pa la dga' zhing /bas mtha' dgon pa dang /ri dang tshal dang /

162b3(mdo sde): bus zhag bdun nam zhag dgu bcu'i bar du byang chub sems dpa' la chos 'dod pa'i phyir 'bul bar byed na/byang chub sems dpa' de'i tshe/mchod pa'i yo byad 'bul ba

162b5(mdo sde): cad la skyed 'di'i sems med pa'i phyir byams pa dang snying rje'i sems dang ldan pa'i phyir mnyam snyoms pa'i sems la gnas pa'i phyir ro//de bos na dus kha cig tu 'khor

163a2(mdo sde): zhing longs spyod par 'gyur/bza' ba dang btung ba dang dam pa dang dga' dgur spyod par 'gyur yang /tha ma mi rtag pa brten te rga ba dang na bas gzir te shi bar gyur na/
