265a4(mdo sde): pa'i bden pa dang /'dus ma byas pa dang /slob pa yang ma yin/mi slob pa yang ma yin pa'i chos ni/chos dkon mchog ces bya'o//nyan thos kyi slob pa dang /mi slob pa ni dge 'dun
265a5(mdo sde): dkon mchog ces bya ste/dbang po'i sgo nas dbye na/sangs rgyas ni kun shes pa'i dbang po'o//chos ni dbang po'i chos ma yin pa'o//dge 'dun ni zag pa med pa'i dbang po gsumo//
265a6(mdo sde): bden pa'i sgo nas dbye na/sangs rgyas ni lam gyi bden pa'i phyogs cha gcig go//chos ni 'gog pa'i bden pa'i bden pa'o//dge 'dun yang lam gyi bden pa'i phyogs cha gcig//
265a7(mdo sde): dge sbyong gi 'bras bu'i sgo nas dbye na/sangs rgyas ni dge sbyong ngo //chos ni dge sbyong gi 'bras bu'o//dge 'dun ni dge sbyong ngo //chos dkon mchog ni dge sbyong gi 'bras bu'o//bram
265b1(mdo sde): zo'i sgro nas dbyen/sangs rgyas ni bram ze'o//chos ni bram ze'i 'bras bu'o//dge 'dun ni bram ze'o//chos dkon mchog ni bram ze'i 'bras bu'o//tshangs par spyod pa'i sgo nas dbye na/sangs
265b2(mdo sde): rgyas ni tshangs par spyod pa'o//chos ni tshangs par spyod pa'i 'bras bu'o//dge 'dun ni tshangs par spyod pa'o//chos dkon mchog ni/tshangs par spyod pa'i 'bras bu'o//rgyu dang 'bras bu'i sgo nas
265b3(mdo sde): dbye na/sangs rgyas ni rgyu'o//chos ni 'bras bu'o//dge 'dun ni rgyu'o//chos dkon mchog ni 'bras bu'o//lam dang 'bras bu'i sgo nas dbye na/sangs rgyas ni lam mo//chos ni 'bras bu'o//
265b4(mdo sde): dge 'dun ni la mo//chos dkon mchog ni 'bras bu'o//sangs rgyas kyi ston pa ni chos yin te/chos las sangs rgyas skyes pas na/chos sangs rgyas kyi yum yin te/sangs rgyas ni chos
265b5(mdo sde): la gnas so//gsol pa/sangs rgyas kyi ston pa chos lags na/ci'i slad du/dkon mchog gsum las chos sngar mi smos/bka' stsal pa/sangs rgyas kyi ston pa chos yin mod kyi/chos
265b6(mdo sde): kyang sangs rgyas ma yin pa gzhan gyis mi ston te/lam zhes bya ba yang mis bsgrubs dgos pas de bas na sangs rgyas sngar smos/de nas ma 'gags pas/yang bcom ldan 'das la
265b7(mdo sde): 'di skad ces gsol to//bcom ldan 'das dkon mchog gsum la skyabasu gsol ba gnas pa'i tshe/sngar chos dkon mchog smos la/phyis sangs rgyas dkon mchog smos na/
266a1(mdo sde): gsum la skyabasu mchi bar rung ngam/bka' stsal pa/rtogs shing shes pa med na/go rims nor na yang nyes pa med de/skyab su 'gro bar chud do//gal
266a2(mdo sde): te shes bzhin du ched du nor par smras na nyes pa dang bcas la/gsum la skyabasu 'gro bar yang mi chud do//gsol pa/sangs rgyas dang chos smos la/dge 'dun ma smos na/
266a3(mdo sde): skyabasu mchi ba gsum du rung ngam/gal te chos dang dge 'dun smos la/sangs rgyas ma smos na/skyabasu mchi bar rung ngam/gal te sangs rgyas dang /dge 'dun smos la/chos
266a4(mdo sde): mo smos na gsum la skyabasu mchi bar chud dam/bka' stsal ba/de gang yang mi rung ste/mi chu do//gsol pa/gsum la skyabasu ma mchis par tshul khrims lnga thob par rung ngam
266a5(mdo sde): gal te gsum la skyabasu ma mchis par yan lag brgyad kyi tshul khrims thob par rung ngam/gal te gsum la skyabasu mchi ba ma mchis par/tshul khrims bcu thob par
266a6(mdo sde): rung ngam/zhu ba dang gsol ba bzhi'i las ma bgyis par/tshul khrims rdzogs par mnod du rung ngam/bka' stsal po/de dag gang yang mi rung ngo //gal te tshul khrims lnga nod na//
266a7(mdo sde): ltar gsum la skyabasu 'go bar bya'o//gsum la skyabasu song ba'i 'og tu/khrims lnga thob par 'gyur te/de nas khrims lnga gang yin pa brjod de/pha rol pos khrims lnga'i ming
266b1(mdo sde): shes par bya'o//de bzhin du gsol pa dang /zhu ba bzhi'i las byas nas/tshul khrims rdzogs par 'gyur te de'i 'og tu gnas bzhi dang /rtsa ba bzhi dang /dge 'dun gyi lhag ma bcu gsum shes
266b2(mdo sde): shing khong du chud par bya ba'i phyir/brjod cing bstan par bya'o//yang gzhan du na skyabasu 'gro ba byas nas/srog mi gcod pa'i khrims bstan na/khrims thob par 'gyur te/de bas na khrims
266b3(mdo sde): gcig bshad pas/khrims lnga thob bces bya ste/gal te khrims gcig thub na/khrims lnga char thub ces bya'o//yang gzhan du na/khrims lnga gcig la gcig 'brel pa yang yin la/thog ma
266b4(mdo sde): nas khrims lnga mnos par dam bcas pa'i phyir ro//yang gzhan du na khrims lnga ni mnos pa'i 'og tu khrims thob bo//ston pa kha cig ni skyabasu 'gro ba gsum byas nas/khrims lnga thob ces bya ba
266b5(mdo sde): ni don bden pa ste/ji ltar gsol ba dang /zhu ba'i las byas pa bzhin no//yan lag brgyad pa'i khrims nod pa dang /khrims bcu nod pa dang /khrims lnga nod pa bshad pa bzhin no//gsol ba//
266b6(mdo sde): gal te sngar gsum la skyabasu mchis te/dge bsnyen du gyur pa slad kyis gal te khrims lnga nod dam/khrims bcu snod kyang rung /skyabasu mchi ba gdod bgye 'tshal lam/bka' stsal pa/skyabasu
266b7(mdo sde): 'gro ba gsum ma byas kyang /sngar gsum la skyabasu song bas tshul khrims kun thob po//gsol pa/gal te gsum la skyab su 'gro ba yang bgyis gsol pa dang zhu ba'i las kyang ma bgyis na/
267a1(mdo sde): khrims thob par 'gyur ram/bka' stsal pa/khrims lnga dang /yan lag brgyad pa'i khrims dang /khrims bcu nod pa gsum la skyabasu song nas khrims 'thob bo//
267a2(mdo sde): gal te tshul khrims rdzogs par mnos pa ni/gsol ba dang /zhu ba bzhi'i las byas pas/tshul khrims rdzogs par 'gyur gyi/gsum la skyabasu song bas ni ma yin no//tshul
267a3(mdo sde): khrims rdzogs par mnos pa ni/yon tan dang /bsod nams tshe bas na/las cung zad tsam 'am/rkyen cung phrad tsam gyis bsgrub par 'gyur bas de bas na skyabasu 'gro ba gsum
267a4(mdo sde): dang /dge slong bcu'i nang du gsol pa dang zhu ba bzhi'i las byas pas tshul khrims thob par 'gyur ro//khrims lnga dang /yan lag brgyad pa'i khrims dang /khrims bcu ni yon tan
267a5(mdo sde): dang mthu de tsam du mi che bas de bas na/gsum la skyabasu song bas/tshul khrims thob par mi 'gyur te/las mang po dang /rkyen mang po mi dgos so//gsol pa/tshul khrims rdzogs
267a6(mdo sde): par mnos pa'i 'og tu/rtsa ba bzhi dang /dge 'dun gyi lhag ma bcu gsum 'ba' shig ni bstan la/gzhan dag rdzogs par mi ston/bka' stsal pa/tshul khrims rnam pa gnyis ni/
267a7(mdo sde): nang gi lci ba yin te/rtsa ba bzhi las gcig nyams na/yang phyir gsor mi rung ngo //lhag ma ni gsor rung mod kyi gso dka' ste/de yang dge 'dun la mgu ba dang /chad pa'i las
267b1(mdo sde): byas la gang na dge 'dun nyi shu yod pa'i mdun du/nyes pa bshags dgos te/'di ni bsrung dga' bas/bsrung dgos pa'i phyir smos so//gzhan slabs na bsrung smra ba'i phyir smos mi dgos
267b2(mdo sde): tote/de bas na rnam pa 'di gnyis smos kyi/gzhan ma smos pa yin no//gsol pa/so sor thar pa'i khrims 'di zag pa med pa'i khrims lags sam/bsam gtan gyi tshul khrims lags//
267b3(mdo sde): bka' stsal pa/zag pa med pa'i khrims kyang ma yin la/bsam gtan gyi tshul khrims kyang ma yin no//so sor thar pa'i tshul khrims 'di ni/gal te sangs rgyas 'jig rten du gshegs
267b4(mdo sde): na/tshul khrims 'di yod kyi/gal te sangs rgyas 'jig rten du ma gshegs na/tshul khrims 'di med do//zag pa med pa dang /bsam gtan gyi tshul khrims ni/sangs rgyas 'jig rten
267b5(mdo sde): du gshegs kyang rung /ma gshegs kyang rung /dus thams cad kyi thams cad du yod do//so sor thar pa'i tshul khrims ni bcas pa las yod par 'gyur gyi/zag pa med pa dang
267b6(mdo sde): bsam gtan gyi tshul khrims ni bcas pa las yod pa ma yin no//so sor thar pa'i tshul khrims ni gzhan las thob par 'gyur gyi/zag pa med pa dang /bsam gratan gyi tshul
267b7(mdo sde): khrims ni gzhan las thob pa ma yin no//so sor thar pa'i tshul khrims ni gnyis kyis log gam ma log pa 'am/dge ba 'am/sdig pa 'am/lung du mi ston pa'i sems kyi dus
268a1(mdo sde): thams cad du yod do//zag pa med pa dang /bsam gtan gyi tshul khrims ni/bsam gtan 'dug pa dang /zag pa med pa'i sems la nges pa'i tshe/tshul khrims
268a2(mdo sde): yod kyi/sems gzhan thams cad la med do//so sor thar nga'i tshul khrim la ni mi'i nangang 'bar zhig na snod kyi/zag pa med pa dang /bsam gtan gyi tshul khrims ni lha dang /
268a3(mdo sde): gnyis la yod do//so sor thar pa'i tshul khrims ni/'dod pa'i khams 'ba' zhig na yod kyi/zag pa med pa dang /bsam gtan gyi tshul khrims ni/'dod pa'i khams dang /gzum
268a4(mdo sde): khams na rdzogs par yod do//zag pa myed pa'i tshul khrims dang /so sor thar pa'i tshul khrims ni/sangs rgyas kyi slob ma 'bal zhig la yod mod kyi/bsam gtan gyi tshul
268a5(mdo sde): khrims ni/mu stegs can la yang yod do//gsol pa/dge bsnyen gyi khrims lnga la/du ni rang bzhin gyi sdig lags/du ni bcas pa'i sdig lags/bka' stsal pa/bzhi ni rang
268a6(mdo sde): bzhin gyi sdog/chung bathung ba'i khrims gcig ni bcas pa'i sdig go//ched 'thung ba ni bag med zi'i lo mi'i gnas yin pa ste/sdig pa bzhi'i grogasu 'gyuraro//dri mas lnga la chang
268a7(mdo sde): 'thung ba ni/bag med pa'i gzhi yin pas/khrims bzhi yang nyams par byed do//dper na/sangs rgyas 'od srung gi tshe/dge bsnyen zhig chab srungs po'i rgyun kyis/gnan gyi rlung /
268b1(mdo sde): mal 'dod pas logs par g.yem pa yang byas/pha rol po'i bya yang brkus nas bsad do//gzhan zhig gris khyod ci'i phyir 'di ltar byed ces dris na/bdag gis byas pa med ces zer te/de ltar
268b2(mdo sde): chang 'thungs pas khrims bzhi tshwa cig chu nyams par byas so//chang 'thungs na mtshams med pa bzhi yang byed par 'gyur te/dge 'dun gyi dbyen 'ba' zhig byed mi nu so//'di yang sngon gyi
268b3(mdo sde): las kyis gnyer ba ma yin mod kyi/'on kyang spro ba dang mi dran par spro ba spong bar 'gyur ro//chang 'thungs pas ban glang myong pa ltar myos shing 'khrug par 'gyur te/chang gis myos na
268b4(mdo sde): yang dag pa'i lasu bya ba/bsam gtan dang mdo sde klog pa dang /'don po dang /dge 'dun gyi las bya ba rnams shor bar 'gyur te/rang bzhin gyi sdig pa ma yin mod kyi rong bzhin
268b5(mdo sde): gyi sdig pa dang 'dra'o//de nas ma 'gags pas yang bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to//dge bsnyen gyi khrims lta bu sems can 'ba' zhig las khrims thob bam/sems
268b6(mdo sde): can ma yin pa las kyang thob par rung /'on te gsad du rung ba dang /brkur yod pa dang /mi tshangs par spyad du rung ba dang /brdzun smra rung ba'i sems can las khrims thob par 'gyur
268b7(mdo sde): ram/'on te gsad du mi rung ba dang /brkur ma mchis pa dang /mi tshangs par spyad du mi rung ba dang /brdzun smra mi rung ba dang /sems can las kyang khrims thob par 'gyur/bka stsal pa
269a1(mdo sde): sems can las ni khrims bzhi thob par 'gyur gyi/sems can ma yin pa las chang mi 'thung ba'i khrims thob par 'gyur ro//sems can du gtogs pa gsad/
269a2(mdo sde): du rung ba 'am/gsad du mi rung ba 'am/mtshangs par spyad du rung ba 'am/mi rung ba 'am/bskur rung ba 'am/mi rung ba 'am/brdzun smra rung ba 'am/mi rung ba thams cad las tshul khrims
269a3(mdo sde): thob ste/mtshams med pa'i sems can dmyal ba yan chad 'du shes med 'du shes med min gyi skye mched man chad stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi kham su gtogs
269a4(mdo sde): pa de bzhin gshegs pa'i bar du srog dang bcas pa thams cad las tshul khrims 'di bzhi thob par rung ste/de yang thog ma tshul khrims nod pa'i tshe/srog thams cad mi gcad pa dang //
269a5(mdo sde): thams cad ma byin par mi len pa dang /thams cad la mi tshangs par mi spyad pa dang /brdzun thams cad mi smra'o zhes bya ba'i mtha' dang tshad gzung du med pas/de bas na sems can
269a6(mdo sde): thams cad las tshul khrims mi thob par 'gyur ba med do//tshul khrims 'dogs pa cho ga bzhin du byas na/sngar khong du chud cing yid ches par bya ba'i phyir chos bshad la son
269a7(mdo sde): thams cad las lo byams pa dang /snying rje'i sems bskyed du gzhug go//de ltar lhag par mos pa'i sems skyes na/lhag pa'i tshul khrims thob par 'gyu ro//yang tshul khrims
269b1(mdo sde): thob pa ni sems can thams cad las/so so nas tshul khrims bzhi thob par 'gyur te/tshul khrims bzhi so sor dbye na/tshul khrims bcu gnyisu 'gyur ro//sems can las srog mi gcod pa
269b2(mdo sde): dang /ma byin par mi len pa dang /mi tshangs par mi spyod pa dang /brdzun mi smra ba las bzlog pa'i nyes pa bzhi skye ba yang /rgyu dang rkyen gsum gyi phyir te/de yang 'dod chags las skye ba dang /
269b3(mdo sde): zhe sdang las skye ba dang /gti mug las skye ba'o//sems can thams cad la mi dge ba bcu gnyis po 'di yod de/mi dge ba 'di las bzlog na/dge ba'i tshul khrims kyi rnam par rig byed
269b4(mdo sde): kyi gzugs bcu gnyis thob par 'gyur ro//dpag tu med pa'i sems can thams cad las thob pa yang de dang 'dra'o//gal te dgra bcom pa khri phrag brgya'am/'bum phrag brgya mya ngan las
269b5(mdo sde): 'das kyang /thog ma dgra bcom pa de dag las tshul khrims thob na/dgra bcom pa mya ngan las 'das kyang /tshul khrims ni nyams par 'gyur ba ma yin no//chang mi 'thung po'i khrims ni
269b6(mdo sde): lus 'di thog ma nas the'i bar du stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams/ji tsam chad du gtogs pa thams cad la nub re zhing khrims kyi rnam par rig byed kyi gzugs
269b7(mdo sde): 'thob ste/thog ma khrims nod pa'i tshe/chang thams cad mi 'thung ngo zhes byas pas gal te chang thams cang zad kyang /tshul khrims na rtag tu yod pas mi nyam so//gsol pa/thog ma khrims
270a1(mdo sde): nod pa'i tshe/bud med thams cad k+Shi sgo gsum nas/'dod pas lag par mi g.yam pa'i khyims mnas lA/phyis chung ma byungs na/tshul khrims 'di nyams par 'gyur/
270a2(mdo sde): ram/bka' stsal pa nyams par mi 'gyuraro//ji lta bu zhe na/thog ma bud med la 'dod pas log par mi g.yem pa'i khri mos thob la/'di ni bdag gi chung ma yin pas 'dong pa
270a3(mdo sde): log par g.yem pa ma yin te//khrims 'di nyams par rim 'gyuraro//don 'di dang sbyar na thams cad 'thun te khrims brgyad dang /khrims bcu dag sems can dang /sems can
270a4(mdo sde): ma yin pa'i rnams las/tshul khrims thob pa yang de dang 'dra'o//tshul khrims nyos brgya lnga bcu yang /sems can kun la/so so nas tshul khrims bdun bdun zhig thob ste/de
270a5(mdo sde): yang rnam par dbye na/tshul khrims nyi shu rtswa gcig tu 'gyuraro//sems can thams cad la lus dang ngag gi sdig pa bdun 'byung ste/sdig pa 'byung ba 'di yang rgyu dang rkyen rnam
270a6(mdo sde): pa gsum gyis skye'o//de yang 'dod chags kyis skye ba dang /zhe sdang gis skye ba dang /gti mug gis skye ba ste/de lta ra nA rgyu dang rgyun gsum gyi sdig pa bdun bdun skye ste/de ltar na mi
270a7(mdo sde): dge ba'i sdig pa bdun gsum nyi shu gtsog/sdog pa de las bzlog na tshul khrim su 'gyur te/sems can gcig le tshul khrims kyi rnam par rig byed kyi gzugs nyi shu rtsa
270b1(mdo sde): gcig yod pa bzhin du/sems can thams cad la yang de dang 'bros//don de dang sbyar na dus gcig tu tshul khrims grangs med pa thob par ni rung gi/dus gcig tu cig car nyams
270b2(mdo sde): pabar 'gyur ba 'am dus gcig tu med par 'gyur ba ni ma yin no//tshul khrims nyams shes bya ba ni/gal te tshul khrims kyi rtsa ba nyams na/gong nas gong du 'phar par mi 'gyur te//
270b3(mdo sde): ci ste tshul khrims phul la phyis nod na yang /tshul khrims thob par mi 'gyur ro//dper na/nyin zhag gcig gi yan lag brgyad pa'i khrims kyi rtsa ba nyams na phyis khrims brgyad dam/
270b4(mdo sde): khrims lnga 'am/khrims bcu 'am/khrims rdzogs pa'am/bsam gtan kyi tshul khrims sam/zag pa med pa'i tshul khrims sam/tshul khrims 'di dag gang yang nod du mi rung //gal te
270b5(mdo sde): tshul khrims lnga'i rtsa ba nyams na yang /khrims brgyad dam/khrims bcu 'am/tshul khrims rdzogs pa 'am/bsam gtan gyi tshul khrims sam/zag pa med pa'i tshul khrims thams cad
270b6(mdo sde): thob par mi rung ngo //gal te khrims lnga nyams pa'i 'og tu/khrims lnga phul la/khrims bcu nod pa de ni gnas ma yin no//gal te khrims phul ba'i 'og tu khrims lnga nod kyang rung
270b7(mdo sde): khrims brgyad dam/khrims rdzogs pa'am/bsam gtan gyi tshul khrims sam/zag pa med pa'i tshul khrims mnos kyang /khrims gang yang mi 'thob bo//gal te khrims bcu 'am/
271a1(mdo sde): khrims rdzogs pa'i rtsa ba nyams na/gong nas gong du 'phar ba dang /khrims phul te khrims nod pa ni ji ltar khrims lnga las gshad pa dang 'dra'o//gsol pa dang /
271a2(mdo sde): bsam gtan gyi tshul khrims dang /zag pa med pa'i tshul khrims dang /so sor thar pa'i tshul khrims dang /tshul khrims 'di gsum las tshul khrim mtshan ces bgyi ba gang lags/bka'
271a3(mdo sde): stsal pa/bsam gtan gyi tshul khrims mchog ste/gzhan du na so sor thar pa'i tshul khrims kyang mchog yin no//de ji lta zhe na/gal te sangs rgyas 'jig rten du gshegs na//khrims
271a4(mdo sde): 'di yod par 'gyur gyi/bsam gtan gyi tshul khrims dang /zag pa med pa'i tshul khrims ni thams cad kyi dus su yod do//so sor thar pa'i tshul khrims ni sems can dang //
271a5(mdo sde): sems can ma yin pa las kyang thob par rung gi/bsam gtan gyi tshul khrims dang /zag pa med pa'i tshul khrims ni sems can las thob pa ma yin no//so sor thar pa'i tshul
271a6(mdo sde): khrims ni sems can thams cad la byams pa'i sems kyi thob par 'gyur gyi/bsam gtan gyi tshul khrims dang /zag pa med pa'i tshul khrims ni byams pa'i sems kyis thob
271a7(mdo sde): pa ma yin no//so sor thar pa'i tshul khrims ni/sangs rgyas kyi chos 'dzin pa 'khor rnam pa bdun 'jig rten na yod cing dza~M ba rnam gsum gyi 'bras bu rgyun mi chad par byed pa'i
271b1(mdo sde): gzhir 'gyur ba yin gyi/bsam gtan gyi tshul khrims dang /zag pa med pa'i tshul khrims ni de lta bu ma yin te/de bas na khams gsum na/mchog rab phul du gyur pa yin no//thog mar
271b2(mdo sde): khrims nad pa'i tshe/gsol pa dang zhu ba bzhi'i las byas ma thag tu tshul khrims rdzogs par 'gyur te/thog ma'i'o sems skad cig ma dang po'i tshul khrims kyi rnam par rig byed kyi gzugs ni/
271b3(mdo sde): las shes kyang bya/las kyi lam zhes kyang bya'o//sems kyi skad cig ma phyi ma las khrims kyi rnam par rig byed kyi gzugs byung ba ni las shes bya'i//lus kyi lam mo yin no//de lta bu
271b4(mdo sde): nu sems kyi skad cig ma dang po las/tshul khrims kyi rnam par rig byed kyi gzugs bsam pa yongasu rdzogs te/bsam pa dang ldan pas/bsam pa'i las kyis lam zhes bya'o//tshul
271b5(mdo sde): khrims snga mas rgyu byas te/tshul khrims lhag ma'i rnam par rig byed kyi gzugs las kyis grub pas/de bas na de la las zhes bya'i las kyi lam ma yi no//dang po'i sems skad cig
271b6(mdo sde): ma cig gi khrims ni cho ga dang yang be tsa sA laM/chog med pa yang yin no//phyir rim gyis skye ba'i khrims ni/cho ga med pa 'ba' zhig dang ldan gyi cho ga dang bcas pa ma yin no//thog ma
271b7(mdo sde): sems skad cig ma gcig gi khrims ni/tshul khrims shes kyang bya/dge bar spyod pa zhes kyang bya/'dul ba zhes kyang bya'o//phyis rims kyi de ma thag tu skye ba'i tshul khrims kyang don/
272a1(mdo sde): de dang ldan na//de nas ma 'gags pas yang bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa/dus gsum du bkum pa'i nang na dus gang gis tshub khrims thob par 'gyur/bka'
272a2(mdo sde): stsal pa/da ltar gyi dus kyi sems skad cig ma gcig gis khrims thob par 'gyuraro//'das pa dang /ma 'ongs pa ni chos yin te/sems can ma yin pas khrims mi 'thob kyi/da ltar gyi
272a3(mdo sde): sems skad cig ma gcig ni sems can yin pas na/khrims 'thob bo//gsol pa/dge ba'i sems kyis tshul khrims thob bam/mi dge ba'i sems kyis sam/'on te lung du ma
272a4(mdo sde): bstan pa'i sems kyis sam/sems med pas khrims thob par 'gyur/bka' stsal pa/thams cad kyis thob par 'gyur te/thog ma dge ba'i sems kyis dge 'dun gyi rkang pa la phyag
272a5(mdo sde): byas la/chos gos dang lhung bzed blangs te/mkhan po gang yin pa la gsol ba gdab bo//de nas tsig tsog por 'dug la thal mo sbyar la/gsol pa dang zhu ba bzhi'i las bar chad
272a6(mdo sde): med la dge ba'i sems kyis khrims rdzogs pa ni/dge ba'i sems kyis tshul khrims thob pa zhes bya'o//gal te de ltar tshig rims kyis byed pa na/rtag tu dge ba'i sems dang ldan te/
272a7(mdo sde): las byed pa las gsol ba dang zhu ba bzhi'i las byed pa'i tshe/'dod chags dang /zhe sdang las sogs pa mi dge ba'i bsam pa blang na/sems de nyid kyis tshul khrims kyi rnam
272b1(mdo sde): par rig byed kyi gzugs dang ldan pa de ni/mi dge ba'i sems kyis khrims thob pa zhes bya ste/de yang thog ma'i dge ba'i sems dang /dge ba'i las kyis shugs kyis khrims thob pa yin
272b2(mdo sde): gyi/mi dge ba'i sems kyis thob pa ma yin no//sngar dge ba'i sems kyis cho ga'i las byas la gsol ba dang zhu ba bzhi'i las byed pa'i tshe/gal te gnyid log gam yur na/log
272b3(mdo sde): cing yur ba'i sems las khrims kyi rnam par reg byed kyi gzugs skye ba ni lung du ma bstan pa'i sems kyis khrims thob pa zhes bya'o//sngar dge ba'i sems kyis cho ga byas la//gsol
272b4(mdo sde): pa dang /zhu ba bzhi'i las byed pa'i tshe/'gog pa'i ting 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs na/de'i tshe khrims kyi rnam par rig byed kyi gzugs dang ldan pa de ni/sems med pa las khrims
272b5(mdo sde): thob pa zhes bya'o//ma 'gogs pas yang gsol pa/gal te khrims lnga ma mnos par thal byung khrims bcu mnos na/khrims thob par 'gyur ram/bka' stsal pa/dus gcig
272b6(mdo sde): tu dge bsnyen gyi khrims dang /dge sbyong gi khrims rnam pa gnyis thob bo//gal te khrims lnga yang ma mnos/khrims bcu yang ma mnos par thal byung khrims rdzogs par mnus na
272b7(mdo sde): yang /dus gcig tu khrims gsum char thob par 'gyur ro//ma 'gags pas gsol pa/bcom ldan 'das gal te khrims rdzogs par mnos pas dus gcig tu khrims
273a1(mdo sde): rnam pa gsum car thob par 'gyur na/rims kyis sbyar khrims lnga mnos lA/de'i 'og tu khrims bcu mnos te/byis khrims rdzogs pa mnod do zhes bgyi yang
273a2(mdo sde): ci 'tshal/bka' stsal pa/dus gcig tu tshul khrims gsum char thob mod kyi/gang sangs rgyas kyi chos la lhag par mos pa ni/gdon mi za bar rim gyis sngar khrims lnga mnos te
273a3(mdo sde): dul bar byas la dad pa dang mos pa lhag par skyes nas/de'i 'og tu khrims bcu mnod do//khrims btsu nos nas/dge ba'i rtsa ba lhag par skyes nas/de'i 'og tu tshul khrims rdzogs
273a4(mdo sde): par mnos na/de ltar rim gyis sangs rgyas kyi chos kyi ro thob cing mos pa brtan pa mi shigs par 'gyur ro//dper na/rgya mtsho chen por 'jug pa yang bags kyis zab pa deng
273a5(mdo sde): 'dra bar sangs rgyas kyi chos kyi rgya mtshor 'jug pa yang de dang 'dra ste/tshul khrims rdzogs par cig car mnos na/gau rims kyang shor la spyod lam yang nyams par 'gyuraro///
273a6(mdo sde): gzhan du na tshul khrims kyang sems can kha cig ni khrims lnga mnos pas/lam gyi 'bras bu thob par 'gyur ba yang yod do//sems can kho cig ni tshul khrims bcu mnos
273a7(mdo sde): ba'i rkyen gyis lam gyi 'bras bu thob pa yang yod do//de ltar rgyu dang rkyen rnam pa tha dad pas na/de bzhin gshegs pas go rims bstan pa yin no//gal te sngar khrims lnga man
273b1(mdo sde): ba la de'i 'og tu khrims bcu mnos na/khrims bcu mnos pa'i tshe yang khrims gnyis ka dang ldana'o//khyims la
273b2(mdo sde): dang khrims bcu mnos pa'i 'og tu/khrims rdzogs par mnos na/rdzogs par mnos pa'i rgyu khrims gsum char dang yung ldan no//khrims lnga dang khrims bcu dang //khrims rdzogs
273b3(mdo sde): par mnos pa rnam pa bdun la gsol ba dang zhu ba bzhi'i las byed pa'i khrims 'ba' zhig ni rims kyis dus gsum du thob bo//lcug ma rnam pa drug nod pa ni dus gcig gis thob kyi
273b4(mdo sde): dus gsum gyi rim pa med do//de ltar tshul khrims rnam pa gsum dus gcig tu thob pa 'gal te/tshul khrims phyir 'bul ba'i tshe/bdag ni dang phyin chad dge sbyong yin te/dge slong
273b5(mdo sde): ma yin no//zhes smras pas tshul khrims rdzogs pa med kyang /tshul khrims gnyis med pa ma yin te yod do//tshul khrims lnga dang tshul khrims bcu mnos pa los/de phyin chad
273b6(mdo sde): bdag dge bsnyen yin te/dge sbyong ma yin no//zhes smras na khrims bcu med par zad kyi/khrims lnga yod do//gal te bdag ni khyim pa dang rab tu byung ba'i khrims thams cad 'bul te/
273b7(mdo sde): bdag la skyabasu 'gro ba'i dge bsnyen du zung shig ces smras na/tshul khrims rnam pa gsum cig cher med kyang skyabasu 'gro ba gsum med pa ma yin no//go rims kyis tshul khrims
274a1(mdo sde): rnam pa gsum thob pa dang /phyir dbul ba'i cho ga dang /rim pa ni ji ltar dus gcig tu khrims thob pa bstan pa dang 'dra'o//gsol pa/gal te sngon dge bsnyen
274a2(mdo sde): las rab tu byung ste/khrims bcu mnos na/khrims lnga ma mchis par mi 'gyur ram/bka' stsal pa/med par mi 'gyur te ming dang go rims brjes par zad kyi/khrims med par
274a3(mdo sde): 'gyur ba ma yin no//de yang dge bsnyen gyi ming stor te/dge sbyong gi ming thob po//khyim pa'i go rims stor gyi rab tu byung ba'i go rims thob bo//gsol pa/dge slong gi tshul khrims
274a4(mdo sde): rdzogs pa mnos na khrims bcu dang khrims lnga ma mchis par me 'gyur ram/bka' stsal pa/med par mi 'gyur te/yang ming dang go rims stor bar zad de/dge sbyong gi ming stor nas/
274a5(mdo sde): dge slong gi ming thob bo//dge sbyong gi go rims stor nas/dge slong gi go rims thob ste/thog ma dang /tha mo'i bar du tshul khrims yin gyi/ming tsam ni 'phral la 'dogs so//
274a6(mdo sde): dper na/skyed shing dang shing gi lo ma lta bur dpyid dang dbyar ni sngo/ston ni ser/dgun ni skya ste/de yang dus kyis bsgyur bas shing gi lo ma kha dog tha dad par zad kyi/thog ma
274a7(mdo sde): nas tha mo'o bar du shing gi lo mar zad de/tshul khrims kyang de dang 'dra bar rtag tu tshul khrims gcig tu zad na/dus kyis tha dad par 'gyur ro//gzhan yang dper na/'o ma dang
274b1(mdo sde): zho dang mar dang /mar gyi snying po ni//rnam pa bzhir tha dad de/de ltar dus kyis tha dad kyang gcig tu zad pa dang 'dru bar tshul khrims kyang de dang 'dra ste/dus gsum gyis tha dad kyang tshul
274b2(mdo sde): khrims la tha dad pa med do//ma 'gags pas yang gsol pa/bcom ldan 'das dge bsnyen gyi tshul khrims nod pa nyams kyis rdzogs par nod par mi nus pa tshul khrims gcig gam
274b3(mdo sde): gnyis sam bzhi'i bar du mnos na/tshul khrims mnos par chud dam/bka' stsal pa/des khrims mi 'thob bo//gsol pa/gal te khrims mi thob na/mdo sde dag las phyogs cha chung
274b4(mdo sde): ba'i dge bsnyen dang /phyogs cha che ba'i dge bsnyen dang /phyogs cha rdzogs pa'i dge bsnyen mchis par gsungs na de'i don ji lta bu lags/bka' stsal pa/de skad ces gsungs pa yang
274b5(mdo sde): khrims bsrungs pa'i yon tan che chung yod pa las dgongs te gsungs kyi de ltar tshul khrims mnod du rung ba ni ma yino//ma 'gags pas yang gsol pa/bcom ldan 'das khrims
274b6(mdo sde): lnga nod pa'i nyin zhag gcig gam/nyin zhag gnyis nas nyin zhag bcu'i bar du de ltar menod/khrims thob par 'gyur ram/bka' stsal pa/de ltar mi rung ngo //sangs rgyas kyis tshul
274b7(mdo sde): khrims bcas pa yang so so nas dus dang chad yod de/de yang khrims lnga nod pa ni gdon mi za bar nam tsho'i bar du mnod dgos so//gal te yan lag brgyad pa'i khrims mnod na//
275a1(mdo sde): gdon mi za bar nyin zhag gcig pa mnod dgos te/de lta bas na snga ma mi rung ngo //gsol ba dang zhu ba bzhi'i las byas te/khrims nod pa yang rab dang la/
275a2(mdo sde): dang tha ma yod do//de la khrims lnga ni khrims tha ma'o//khrims bcu ni khrims 'bring po'o//khrims rdzogs pa ni khrims rab ces bya'o//khrims lnga la yang rab 'bring rnam pa gsum ste/
275a3(mdo sde): gal te chung zhing zhan pa'i sems kyis khrims mnos pa ni/khrims tha ma zhes bya'o//sems 'bring gi tshul khrims mnos pa ni//khrims 'bring thob par 'gyur ro//gal te sems par gyis
275a4(mdo sde): tshul khrims mnos pa ni/khrims rab thob par 'gyuraro//tshul khrims rdzogs pa la rab 'bring gsum yod pa yang khrims lnga bstan pa bzhin no//gal te sngar sems tha mas khris
275a5(mdo sde): mnos pa'i 'og tu/sems rab 'bring gis khrims bcu mnos na/khrims lnga ni snga ma las skye zhing lhag pa med kyi/khrims lnga ma gtogs par kha zas dus ma yin par mi bza'
275a6(mdo sde): ba'i bar du//khrims lhag pa'i lnga ni lhag pa'i khrimasu bsgyur te/tshul khrims sngar mnos po lnga ni tha mar 'gyur ro//sems thams sngar khrims lnga mnos la/de 'og tu sems
275a7(mdo sde): rab dang 'bring gis khrims rdzogs par mnos na/yang khrims sngar mnos pa lnga ni skye ba'am lhag pa med kyi/khrims snga ma lnga ma gtogs par/tshul khrims gzhan thaMd tshul
275b1(mdo sde): khrims rdzogs par mnod pa'i tshe/rab dang lcug sems kyis mnos pas/lhag pa'i tshul khrims rab thob par 'gyuraro//de bas na so sor thar pa'i tshul khrims na/nyi rims du thob pa med de rim
275b2(mdo sde): bar dbye na/khrims lnga ni tha ma zhes bya'o//khrims bcu ni 'bring zhes bya/tshul khrims rdzogs pa ni rab ces bya'o//don gyi sgo nas dbye na/sems rab kyis khrims lnga mnos na/khrims de ni rab
275b3(mdo sde): ces bya/sems 'bring gis khrims bcu mnos na/khrims 'bring zhes bya/sems tha mas tshul khrims rdzogs par mnos na/tshul khrims tha ma zhes bya'o//don dang sbyar na sems rab
275b4(mdo sde): da //'bring dang tha ma las tshul khrims thob pa mi 'thun te/nges par gcig tu chad pa med do//gal te mkhan po zhig la khrims bcu nod par gsol ba btab pa las//khyims bcu nod
275b5(mdo sde): pa'i tshe mkhan po mngon sum du ma gyur kyang /khrims bcu thob bo//gal te khrims bcu nod pa'i tshe mkhan po shi na shi bar shes sam/thos na khrims mnos kyang khrims mi 'thob bo//gal te
275b6(mdo sde): shi bar ma shes ma thos na khrims thob bo//gsol ba dang zhu ba bzhi'i las byed pa'i tshul khrims mnod pa ni/mkhan po mngon sum du ma gyur na/khrims mnod kyang khrims thob par mi
275b7(mdo sde): 'gyur te/dge 'dun gyi grangs ma tshangs pa'i phyir ro//gal te dge 'dun gyi grangs ching na mkhan po med kyang khrims mnod du rung ngo //ma 'gags pas yang gsol pa/bcom ldan 'das
276a1(mdo sde): dge bsnyen gyi khrims lnga pas tshong spogs bgyir rung ngam/bka' stsal pa/tshong spogs byar rung ste/las rnam pa 'di lnga ni mi bya'o//rkang 'gros phyugs kyi tshong sgrog/
276a2(mdo sde): kyi las mi bya'o//bdag nyid kyi phyugs yod na 'tshong du gnang gi/shan pa la 'tshong du mi rung ba dang /mda' zhu mtshon tsha'i bag tshong spogs bgyir mi rung ba dang /bdag la yod pa ni bcing
276a3(mdo sde): du rung ba dang /chang gi tshong spogs kyi las byar mi rung ste/bdag nyid la yod na 'tshong du rung ba dang /srin bu mang du shi bas 'bru mar 'chir du mi rung ba dang /rgya gar gyi chos kyis de bzhin
276a4(mdo sde): te/ga bu sha tshun chad ni 'bru mar 'chir ba'i nang srin bu med na nyes pa med do//kha dog tshon chen po rnam pa lnga btse skrag byed pa yang srin bu mang du mchi bas mi rung ste/yog sha las
276a5(mdo sde): sogs pa yul gzhan dag na tshon gyi gtso slag byed pa las srin bu mang du shi ste/de bas na mi gnang ngo //yul rgya yul yang kha dog mthing ka ba tso ba ni/srin bu mang du shi bas
276a6(mdo sde): btso slag rnam pa lnga'i nang du gtog so//ma 'gags pas yang gsol pa/bcom ldan 'das nyin zhag cig gi khrims brgyad ces bgyi ba dus ma lags pa phye 'phreng kha zas mi 'tshal
276a7(mdo sde): ba ma gtogs pa dgur 'gyur na/ji ltar brgyad ces bgyi/bka' stsal pa/khrims shes bya ba ni chos kyis phye 'phreng dus ma yin par kha zas mi bza' ba yin te/khrims brgyad
276b1(mdo sde): kyi yan lag yin te/grogasu gyur pas yan lag gi khrims brgyad ces bya/dgur ni ma yin no//gsol pa/yan lag brgyad pa'i khrims mnos na gang zag de 'khor rnam pa bdun la
276b2(mdo sde): 'khor gang gi nang du bsdu/bka' stsal pa/nam 'tsho ba'i bar gyi khrims ma mnos kyang /nyin zhag gcig gi khrims yod pas/de la yang dge bsnyen zhes bya'o//gzhan du na dge bsnyen /
276b3(mdo sde): zhes bya ni/nam 'tsho ba'i bar du tshul khrims mnos pa med la/dge bsnyen ma yin zhes byar ni/nyin zhag gcig gi khrims yod pas/da ni gang zag bar ma do zhes mdo sde las
276b4(mdo sde): kyang 'byung ngo //ma 'gags pas yang gsol pa/bcom ldan 'das 'khor bdun ma gtogs par so sor thar pa'i tshul khrims mchis sam/bka' stsal pa/yod de yan lag
276b5(mdo sde): brgyad kyi khrims nyid yin no//don de dang sbyar na yan lag brgyad kyi khrims nod pa 'khor rnam pa bdun gyi nang du ma gtog so//yan lag brgyad pa'i khrims nod pa'i chos kyi ni/nyin
276b6(mdo sde): zhag gcig gi bar du srog mi gcod do zhes tshig de skad chad pas na/khrims gzhan nam 'tsho'i bar mnos pa dang bsrer yang mi rung ngo //gsol pa/yani lag brgyad kyi khrims mnod
276b7(mdo sde): pad nyin zhag gnyis sam/gsum 'am/bcu'i bar du cig char mnod du rung ngam/bka' stsal pa/thog ma sangs rgyas kyis nyin zhag gcig gi khrimasu bcas pas/de las 'dar mi
277a1(mdo sde): rgya //gal te nyams kyi sa da san/nyan gag cig cing ldan nu no gas sbyin zhug su mno kyang rung po/hrIn drug gci kI yan ltag brgyud tu rgyu/
277a2(mdo sde): mnos pa'i thabs ni pha rol po gzhan las mnod dgos te/de yang gang las gnos ce na/'khor lnga po gang yang rung ba las mnod dgos so//yan lag brgyad kyi khrims mnos
277a3(mdo sde): ba'i 'og tu gal te sems can la brdeg bcog byas na tshul khrims rnam par dag pa ma yin no//khyims mnos pa'i nyin par brdeg brtsog ma byas la/pyid de nyin brtag bco
277a4(mdo sde): bya bar dam banas na yang tshul khrims rnam par dag pa ma yin te/mdor na lus dang ngag gis ji tsam du tshul bzhin ma yin pa'i las byas na khrims mi nyams mod kyi rnam
277a5(mdo sde): bar dag pa ma yin no//gal te lus dang ngag rnam par dag kyang /sems kyi 'dod chags kyi rnam par rtog pa bskyed dam/zhe sdang gi 'tsho ba'i rnam pa bskyed na/yang rnam par
277a6(mdo sde): dag pa ma yin no//gul te lus dang dgra dang yid kyi las gsum rnam par dag kyang /rjes dran pa drug yid la mi byas na/dri yang tshul khrims rnam par dge ces mi b+h+ya/
277a7(mdo sde): yan lag brgyad kyi khrims mnos pa'i 'og tu rjesu dran pa drug yid la byas na/tshul khrims rnam par dag ces bya'o//mdo sde dag las 'dzam bu'i gling gi rgyatsho
277b1(mdo sde): 'dzam bu'i gling gi khamasu gtogs pa'i mi thams cad dang /de'i nang na yod pa'i gser dang dngul dang /nor dbyig thams cad la dbang ba'i bsod nams kyis yan lag brgyad kyi tshul khrims
277b2(mdo sde): rnam par dag pa'i bsod nams bcu drug char bgros pa'i cha gcig tsam yang mi phod do zhes 'byung ngo //su yang rung yan lag brgyad pa'i khrims nod par byas la bag med par nyam rang
277b3(mdo sde): su rol mo 'am/gal te na kha zas zhim po la bag med par bza' ba 'am/rtsed mo rnam pa sna tshogs yid bzhin du bag med par byas pa'i 'og tu khrims mnod pa ni lnga dro yang rung phyi dro yang
277b4(mdo sde): rung /khrims thob par mi 'gyur ro//gal te snga nas khrims mnod sems med la bag med pa'i las rnam pa sna tshogs byas pa'i 'og tu dge ba'i bshes gnyen dang phrad de khrims mnos/
277b5(mdo sde): na snga dro yang rung /dus thams cad du khrims thob bo//khrims mnos par chas pa las bgegs sam par chad byung ste/dbang med pa las phyis bgegs dang bar chad med pa'i 'og tu
277b6(mdo sde): khrims mnos na/snga dro yang rung phyi dri yang rung /dus thams cad du khrims thob bo//gsol pa/gal te nyin par khrims bsrung la/mtshan mo mau srung ba'i khrims mnos na/yan lag
277b7(mdo sde): brgyad kyi khrims thib bam/gal to mtshan mo khrims srung la nyin po mi rung ba'i khrims mnos na/yan lag brgyad kyi khrims thob par 'gyur ram/bka' stsal pa/gang yang khrims
278a1(mdo sde): mi thob bo//de bas na sangs rgyas kyis thog ma nas nyin zhag gcig pa'i khrimasu bcas te nges pa'i tshad yin pas 'gal bar byar mi rung ngo //ma 'gags pas
278a2(mdo sde): yang gsol pa/bcom ldan 'das 'o na de ltar khrims mi thob na/mdo dag las dge slong ig zhig 'brog dgon pa zhig na/yi dgas kha cig sdug bsngal sna tshogs myong ste/la la ni///
278a3(mdo sde): nyin par longs spyod bgyid la/mtshan mo sdug bsngal bgyid pa yang mchis/la la ni mtshan mo longs spyod bgyid la/nyin par sdug bsngal myong ba dag mthong ngo //de bas na de dag kyang
278a4(mdo sde): sngon mi'i nang na/nyen par ni khrims srungs la/mtshan mo ni sdig pa bgyid pa 'am/yang na mtshan mo khrims srung la/nyin par sdig pa'i las bgyid pa mi 'thun pa'i don de dag ji lta
278a5(mdo sde): bu lags/bka' stsal pa/skye ba snga ma'i rgyu dang rkyen 'ba' zhig la rten du yang mi rung ste/'di skad du bshad pa yang mdo sde 'am 'dul ba las bshad pa ma yin te de la bden pa'i
278a6(mdo sde): don nges pa zhes bya bar mi rung ngo //gzhan du ni 'di skad bshad pa 'di ni 'phags pa ka ta ya nas ig zhes gdul ba'i phyir sprul pa yin gyi yang dag pa ma yin no zhes 'byung ngo //
278a7(mdo sde): yan lag brgyad pa'i khrims mnos pa las khrims phyir 'bul na/nges par 'khor rnam pa lnga la dbul mi dgos kyi/pha rol po gang zag gcig la khrims phyir dbul lo zhes
278b1(mdo sde): tshig gcig smras pas/khrims phul bar 'gyu ro//so sor thar pa'i khrims thob pa'i sgo nas dbye na lam rgyud lngar gtogs pa la mi'i rgyud du gtogs pa 'ba' zhig gis khrims thob kyi//
278b2(mdo sde): rgyud lhag ma gzhan gyis khrims mi thob po//dper na/lha'i rgyud du gtogs pa ni bde ba'i longs spyod la chags shing zhen pas khrims mi 'thob bo//dper na/sngon 'phags pa mo'u
278b3(mdo sde): dedagal gyi nye gnas zhig nad kyis btab pa las/'phags pa mo'u dgal sum cu rtsa gsum gnam du sman pa 'tsho byed la/dpyad 'drir song ba las de'i tshe lha'i bu rnams rab tu dga'
278b4(mdo sde): ba'i skyed mos tshul du rtser 'dod b+ha'i khar bab nas/'phags pa mo'u dag la de dgu 'gro ba'i lam kar sdod cing 'dug pa las/lha'i bu rnams 'phags pa mo'u dgal la/mig gis lnga
278b5(mdo sde): tsam yang mi khom por song ngo //'tsho byed kyi thad kar phyin pa dang /rgyang ma nas mo'u degal la lag pa bteg pa tsam zhig byas nas/shing rta khrid de song ngo //de nas 'phags pa mo'u
278b6(mdo sde): dgal 'di snyam du sem so//'tsho byed 'od sngon mi'i nang no 'dug pa'i tshe bdag gi slob ma yin na/da ni lha'i longs spyod la chags te/sngon gyi dran pa nyams par gyur to snyam bsam nas/
278b7(mdo sde): rdzu 'phrul gyis 'chi byed kyi shing rta 'gror med par byin gyis brlab so//de nas 'tsho byed shing rta las babs te 'phags pa mo'u dgal gyi rkang po la phyag byas nas/mo'u dgal gri
279a1(mdo sde): rgyu rkyen mang po rnam pa sna tshogs kyi btam so//'tsho byed kyis me'u dag la la smras pa/bdag mi'i nang na 'dug pa'i tshe//btsun pa'i slob ma yin pas/lag partsam
279a2(mdo sde): bteg ste/bro dris kyi lha'i bu gzhan dag de ltar byed pa yod dam/lhar skyes pa ni bde ba'i longs spyod la zhen cing chags pas dbang med de de ltar gyur pa yin no//mo'u dgal gyis 'tsho
279a3(mdo sde): byed la smras pa/slob ma zhig nad kyis btab ste na na de la ji ltar gso bar bya/'tsho byed kyis smras pa/re shig kha zas mi bza' bar bya'o//de nas mo'u dgal gyis bus lha'i dbang
279a4(mdo sde): po brgya byin la 'di skad ces bskul to//sangs rgyas 'jig rten du gshegs pa yang shin tu phrad dka' na/ci'i phyir skabs skabasu drung du song ste/dam pa'i chos mi gleng /de nas
279a5(mdo sde): brgya byin lha'i dbang pos/'phags pa mo'u dgal gyi byasnam pa sems kyis shes nas/lha'i bu zhig mngags te/lha'i bu zhig 'bod du btang ba las lan gsum gyi bar du ngos
279a6(mdo sde): nam 'ongs so//lce'i bu de la lha'i bu mo gcig dang rol mo byed pa gcig las med kyang 'dod pa la chags shing zhon pas/lha'i dbang po chog brgyan mod kyi gtong ma bod de phyis gdod
279a7(mdo sde): 'ongs so//de nas brgya byin gyis ci'i phyir de ltar gyur ces dris na/ji ltar gyur pa drang por gsol te//brgya byin gyis mo'u dgal la gsol pa/lha'i bu 'di la lha'i bu mo gcig dang
279b1(mdo sde): ral mo byed pa gcig las med kyang gtong mi phod do//rtswa dga' na lha'i dbang por gyur te/gzhal med khang sna tshogs mang po dang /lha'i bu mo grangasu med pas bskor lha'i zhal zas ro brgya dang
279b2(mdo sde): ldan pa sna tshogs dang /lha'i rol mo brgya stong snyed la longs spyod cing /rtsa dga' bas shar phyogasu bltas na/nub phyogs kyang brjod pa de lta ci smos te/sangs rgyas 'jig rten du gshegs
279b3(mdo sde): ba dang phrad pa yang dka'/dam pa'i chos thos pa yang shin tu dka' bar shes mod kyi 'dod pa'i bde bas bcings glags te/rang dbang med pas shes kyang byar med par gyur to//tshul
279b4(mdo sde): khrims mnos pa'i chos ni/dpa' zhing rtul phod pa'i sems kyis chad par dam bcas pas khrims thob par 'gyur te/lha'i bu lta bu ni 'dod pa'i bde ba la chags pas mi dge ba'i sams
279b5(mdo sde): kyi shas che ste/dge ba'i sems kyi mthu chung na/ci'i dbang gis khrims thob par 'gyur/yi dwags lta bu ni bkres pa dang skom pas sdug bsngal te/lus dang sems 'bar zhing tshig
279b6(mdo sde): pa'i phyir ro//sems can dmyal pa pa ni tshe gang sdug bsngal grangs med pas gzir te/mi bzod pa sna tshogs myong zhing /lus dang sems gdungs par gyur pas khrims thob pa'i rgyu
279b7(mdo sde): med do//dung 'gro lta bu ni las kyis bsgribs te/shes pa med pas khrims mnod pa'i cho ga med do//mdo sde kha ci ga la bskangs kha cig tu/klus tshul khrims mnos par byung ba dag bI//
280a1(mdo sde): sems kyis yan lag brgyad pa'i khrims mnos pas/nyin zhag gcig gi bar du dge ba'i sems kyis bsod nams ni thob kyi las kyi bsgribs pas tshul//
280a2(mdo sde): khrims ni thob pa ma yin no//gling bzhis dbye na lho'i 'dzam bu'i gling dang /nub kyi ba lang spyod dang /shar gyi lus 'phags gling dang /gling gsum po 'dir gtogs pa'i rgya mtsho'i
280a3(mdo sde): gling phran na 'khod pa'i mi rnams kyis khrims thob bo//dper na/nub kyi ba glang spyod na/'phags pa phrin 'dul gnas par sangs rgyas kyis lung bstan te/da ltar sangs rgyas kyi//
280a4(mdo sde): mdzad pa chen po rgyas par byed pas/'khor rnam bzhi yang yod do//shar gyi lus 'phags gling na yang dge slong yod de/de na yang sangs rgyas kyi chos byed pas/'khor bzhi po dag
280a5(mdo sde): yod do//byang gi sgra mi snyan 'ba' shig na/sangs rgyas kyi chos med de/tshul khrims kyang mi 'thob bo//de yang bsod nams kyi las kyi rnam par smin pas bsgribs shing /gti mug
280a6(mdo sde): gis bsgribs pa'i phyir/'phags pa'i chos kyi snod du ma gyur to//gang zag la rnam pa bzhi ste/gang zhe na/skyes pa dang /bud med dang /ma ning dang /mtshan ma gnyis pa'o//rnam pa
280a7(mdo sde): 'di bzhi la skyes pa dang /bud med gnyis kyis ni khrims thob par rung /ma ning dang /mtshan ma gnyis kyis ni khrims mi 'thob bo//de yang skyes pa dang /bud med la yang /
280b1(mdo sde): gang ba ma bsad pa dang /dgra bcom pa bsad pa dang /sangs rgyas kyi sku la ngan sems kyis khrag byung ba dang /dge 'dun gyi dbyen byas pa dang /dge slong ma la mi tshungs par spyad pa dang /
280b2(mdo sde): gca' 'phrang du chom po dang /kun gnas byed pa dang dge ba'i rtsa ba bcad pa dang /gang zag 'di dag ni gang yang tshul khrims mi thong bo//de la don chen po'i sgo nas brtags na/
280b3(mdo sde): sangs rgyas kyi chos la shin tu dad cing mos pa ni 'dir ma gtogs te/lha 'am/klu 'am/yi dgas sam/gnod skyon nam/byang gi sgyu ma snyan nam/ma nang ngam mtshan gnyis pa la
280b4(mdo sde): sdig pa mi dge ba sna tshogs byas kyang /skyabasu 'gro ba gsum mnod du rung ngo //gsol pa/dus gsum gyi sangs rgyas rnams tshul khrims brnyes pa mnyam 'am/bka' stsal pa/
280b5(mdo sde): mi mnyam mo//tshul khrims thob ces bya ba ni sems can dang /sems can ma yin pa'i ras la khrims thob par 'gyur te/sangs rgyas gcig 'jig rten du gshegs na//
280b6(mdo sde): sems can grangs med pa ji snyed kyi don mdzad de/lhag ma ma lus pa'i mya ngan las 'das pas/phyis sangs rgyas 'jig rten du gshegs pa dag/sems can de dag grang las kyang
280b7(mdo sde): tshul khrims brnyes te/de ltar na/sangs rgyas rnams snga phyir tshul khrims brnyed pa mi mnyam mo//dper na/sangs rgyas 'di srung gis sems can grangs med pa zhig btul te
281a1(mdo sde): lhag ma ma lus pa'i mya ngan las 'das kyang /sangs rgyas 'od srung gis ni sems can de dag kun las tshul khrims bzlas na/sangs rgyas shAkya thub pas na/ngan
281a2(mdo sde): de dag gang las kyang /tshul khrims ma brnyes so//sangs rgyas thams cad 'dra bar dngos po 'di gsum ni mnyam mo//gang zhi na spyod pa'i tshogs mnyam po dang /chos kyi sku mnyam
281a3(mdo sde): dang /sems can gyi don mdzad pa mnyam pa'o//sangs rgyas thams cad 'dra bar bskal pa grangs med pa gsum gyi bar du byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa spyad de yan lag lnga'i
281a4(mdo sde): chos kyi sku yongasu rdzogs shing /stobs bcu dang /mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang /sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad yongasu rdzogs te/thams cad kyis sems can grangs
281a5(mdo sde): med pa ji snyed mya ngan las 'ad so//gsol pa/mdo sde dag las sangs rgyas gcig 'jig rten du gshegs na/sems can bye ba khrag khrig dgu bcu snyed mya ngan las 'da'
281a6(mdo sde): ba'i don mdzad do zhes 'byung na/ci'i slad du sems can grangs med pa'i don mdzad ces gsungs/bka' stsal pa/mdo sde las sangs rgyas gcig 'jig rten du gshegs na/sen/
281a7(mdo sde): bye ba khrag khrig dgu bcu snyed kyi don mdzad ces smos pa ni/sangs rgyas de las grol bar gyur pa la bya ste/'gro ba'i sems can de dag kyang la la ni sangs rgyas nyid kyis don
281b1(mdo sde): mdzad pa yang yod/kha cig ni slob mas don mdzad pa yang yod/kha cig ni bzhag pa'i chos kyis grol ba yang yod de/sems can bye ba khrib khrig dgu bcu zhes smos pa ni/sangs d+hAr
281b2(mdo sde): nyid kyis don mdzad pa la byA/sems can grangs med pa lhag ma mA lus pa mya ngan las 'das shes bya ba ni/spyir de na mdzad pa la bye'o//dus gsum gyi sangs rgyas thams cad mnyam pa
281b3(mdo sde): pa ni gsum mnyam gyi/tshul khrims brnyes pa ni mi mnyamo//gsol pa/sdom pa ma yin pa'i khrims shes bgyi ga sems can dang sems can ma yin pa ltos thob par 'gyur ram/
281b4(mdo sde): zin pa dang ma zin pa kun gyis khrims thob par 'gyur/bka' stsal pa/sems can sdom pa ma yin pa'i khrims thob par 'gyur gyi/sems can ma yin pa las sdom pa ma yin
281b5(mdo sde): pa'i khrims mi thob bo//gzhan du na bsdad du rung ba'i sems can las sdom pa ma yin pa'i khrims thob kyi bsang du mi rung ba'i sems can las khrims mi thob go yang gzhan du na
281b6(mdo sde): gsad du rung ba dang /gsod du mi rung ba'i sems can gnyi ga las sdom pa ma yin pa'i khrims thob ces bya'o//dper na/shan pa lug gsod pa ni rtag tu bsod pa'i sems dang
281b7(mdo sde): chas te/lug gsod pa 'ba' zhig yid la byed pas de'i tshad gzung du med do//ci ste lha dang mir skyes na 'phral du gsod pa'i las mi byed kyang /skye ba gcig nas gcig tu 'khor ba
282a1(mdo sde): phyir lug tu skye ba'i chos yod do//de bas na sems can thams cad las sdom pa ma yin pa'i khrims thob par 'gyur te/sdom pa ma yin pa'i khrims
282a2(mdo sde): bcu gnyis kyang de dang 'dra'o//sdom pa ma yin pa'i khrims bcu gnyis shes bya ba ni/'di lta ste/shan pa dang /gshed ma dang /phag gso ba dang /bya gso ba dang /nyi shor ba
282a3(mdo sde): dang /rngon pa dang /bya shor ba dang /sbrul shor ba dang /klu la sngags 'debs pa dang /btson rje byed pa dang /rkun po byed pa dang /rkun po 'dzin pa dang bcu gnyis so//dar gyi srin
282a4(mdo sde): bu gso ba yang sdom pa ma yin pa'i khrims kyi nang du 'duso//sdom pa ma yin pa'i khrims nyams pa'i dus gsumi yod de/shi ba'i dus dang /chags shing zhen pa zad pa'i dus
282a5(mdo sde): dang /sdom pa'i tshul khrims mnod pa'i dus so//dper na/skyabasu 'gro ba gsum mnod pa'i tshe/thog mi'i tshig dang po gcig smras pas/sdom pa ma yin pa'i khrims nyamaso//
282a6(mdo sde): de'i 'og tu tshig gnyis dang /gsum pa smras pa'i tshe nA/dge ba'i tshul khrims thob par 'gyur ro//gsol pa/gang zag gis sdom pa ma yin pa'i las byed pa ni/dus tshod
282a7(mdo sde): gang gis tshe dge ba'i khrims nyams shing mi dge ba'i khrims thob par 'gyur/bka' stsal pa/shan pa'o zhes tshig gcig dang por smra ba'i tshe dge ba'i khroms nyams par
282b1(mdo sde): 'gyur ba shun pa'o zhes lan gnyis lan gsum smras pas mi dge ba'i khrims thob par 'gyur ro//yang gzhan du na gang gi tshe dge ba'i khrims gtang ba de nyid kyi tshe/mi dge ba'i khrin/
282b2(mdo sde): thob bo//ci ste dge ba'i khrims srung ba'i gang zag gcig bdag shin pa'o//zhes dam ni ma bcas khe dang rnyed pa tsam la chags te/phag phyug gso zhing gsod pa'i las byed na/
282b3(mdo sde): tshe dge ba'i khrims nyams pa zhes bya ste/de ni dge ba'i khrims btang ba mi dge ba'i khrims thob pa zhes bya'o//gal te bdag gshan pa'o//zhes nges par dam bcas na yang mi dge ba'i
282b4(mdo sde): khrims thob par 'gyur ro//mi dge ba'i khrims nod pa ni bdag gis dam bcas pa tsam gyis thob par 'gyur te/pha rol po gzhan las mnod mi dgos so//gal te mi dge ba'i khrims/
282b5(mdo sde): nyin zhag gcig gam gnyis nas nyin zhag bcu'am/lo gcig gam/lo gnyis kyi bar du mnos par dam bcas na/dam bcas pa'i dus ring thung las de bzhin thob par 'gyur te/
282b6(mdo sde): de dus na sdig pa mi dge ba'i chos ni skye shi 'khor ba la gzhol bar byed kyi/gong nas gong du 'phang ba'i don med de//de ltar na mi dge ba'i khrims ni dngos po de nyid kyis thob pa yin te//dag
282b7(mdo sde): ba'i tshul khrims ni 'dra'o//thabs mkhas pa chen po sangs rgyas drin lan bsab pa'i mdo las/ma 'gags pa'i le'u zhes bya ste/brgyad pa'o///thabs mkhas pa chen
283a1(mdo sde): bas sa na spya dran lan bas pa dang med/bas spyo dun pA rgyuzhan yang byung chub sems da shA sems pa rgyun po don lan shes pa dang /don ldan /
283a2(mdo sde): bA dang /thabs mkhas pa chen pos sems can rnams la phan pa dang /bde ba'i don byed pa dog dus dang skabs shes na bstan cing bcos pa la gnong par mi'i rgya'o//
283a3(mdo sde): kyi bu sangs rgyas mngon par 'jig rten du 'byung ba/'jigs pa med pa'i rgyal po zhes bya ba de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rig
283a4(mdo sde): pa dang zhabasro ldan pa bde bar gshegs pa/'jig rten mkhyen pa/skyes bu 'dul ba'i kha lo sgyur ba/bla na med pa/ston pa rgyal ba 'jig rten du gshegs te/skal ba dang
283a5(mdo sde): ldan pa'i don mdzad do//skal ba dang ldan pa rnams kyi don mdzod nas/yongasu mya ngan lngas 'das so//mya ngan las 'das nas dam pa'i chos la spyod pa'i tshe/bram ze'i bu med
283a6(mdo sde): gzhungs shing rno ba'i shes rab dang ldan pa gtan khrims lnga srung ga dam pa'i chos 'dzin pa zhig byung ngo //dus gzhan zhig na bram ze'i bu de yul gzhan zhog tu don panyer
283a7(mdo sde): du song song ba las/'dron du 'gro ba'i lam de 'jigs sa che bas/lam grogs lnga brgya dang 'grogs te song ngo //lam grogs de dag dang 'jigs sar phyin nas/'jigs sa
283b1(mdo sde): de ni mi rgod lnga brgya zhig gnas te/rtag tu 'dron po rgyu ba rnams 'jom so//de'i tshe na mi rgod de dag gis 'dron po de dag gzhom par byas nas mi rgod kyi dpon po des/mi gcig sngar 'dron
283b2(mdo sde): bo de dag ji ltar 'gro ba lta zhing brtog tu btang ngo //de'i tshe mi rgod de dag gi nang nas mi gcig cig/sngon bram ze'i bu de dang mdza' zhing bshes pas sngar mi de dag gi nang du 'ongs te/
283b3(mdo sde): bram ze'i bu de la 'di skad ces bsgo'o//rigs kyi bu khyod 'di ltar rig par byos shig/do nub nam gyi cha stod la dag 'ongs gis/ci nas kyang khyod nyid la gnod pa dang /smas par
283b4(mdo sde): mim gyur par khyod nyid kyis bol ba'i thabs byos shig por bsgo'o//de'i tshe bramo ze'i bu des tshig de dag thos nas/dper na/mi brnangs pa ltar maud du yang med la/bskyug tu yang
283b5(mdo sde): med pa bzhin mi bde bar gyur nas/grogs po rnams la gtam byar ni grogs po rnams kyis mi de bsad kyis dgas ci ste gogs po rnams kyis mi bsad na/grogs po rnams
283b6(mdo sde): ngan 'gro gsum du sdug bsngal grangs med pa myong bar 'gyur pa ste/gal te grogs po rnams la ma smras na ni dgras grogs pa rnams bsad na/dgra rnams ngan 'gro gsum du ltung
283b7(mdo sde): zhing sdug bsngal grangs med pa myong ngo //snyam bsems nas/bdag gis sems can la phan pa dang /bde ba'i thabs byas te/bdag nyid ngan 'gro gsum du ltung zhing sdug bsngal
284a1(mdo sde): myong yang bla'o snyam bsams nas/ral gri thogs nus/sgron ma mi de bsad nas grogs po rnams bde bar byaso//de'i tshe na grogs po rnams kyis de ltar gyur
284a2(mdo sde): pa mthong nas/bram ze'i bu de la 'di skad ces smraso//bram ze'i bu khyod ni mi'i nang nas mchog tu gyur/shin tu dge ba yin na/ci'i phyir dang 'di lta bu'i sdig pa chen po byed ces
284a3(mdo sde): smraso//de'i cha bram ze'i bu des pus mo sa la btsugs nas thal mo sbyar te/ngo mtshar dang ldan pa'i sems kyis grogs po dag la 'di skad ces smras//bdag de ring bya ba'i rigs
284a4(mdo sde): pa'i sdig pa chen po byas te/de yang sems can rnams la phan pa dang /grogs po rnams la bde bar bya ba'i phyir ro//grogs po rnams kyis smras pa/khyod nyid kyis mi bsad pa la
284a5(mdo sde): nged bde bar byas so zhes brjod du yang ci yod/bram ze'i bus smras pa/bdag gis bsad pa'i mi 'di ni dgra ma rungs pa yin te/dgra 'dis grogs po khyed gsod du 'ongs pas//
284a6(mdo sde): bdag ni grogs po khyed kyi phyir me 'di'i srog bcad pas na/khyed rnams ni bde bar yul du phyin te/bdag ni sems can dmyal ba'i sdug bsngal myong yang bla'o//de nas grogs
284a7(mdo sde): po lnga brgya rnams kyis skad phyung ste ngus nas/'di skad ces smos//gnam mtha' 'og na phangs par bya ba ni srog las 'da' ba med do//'jigs pa'i nang na 'chi ba las 'da' ba
284b1(mdo sde): med de/de bas na sems can thams cad n+ti lus dang sdug gi phyir/gsar dang /dngul dang /rin po che dadu /yul sa dang /rgung ma drung /byA dang /zas dang /gos kyang yongasu gtong ste/
284b2(mdo sde): bdag cag ni deng du phyir lan cig 'tsho ba'i srog thob bo zhes smras nas/bram ze'i bu khyed sems can gyi phyir ngan 'gro gsum gyi sdug bsngal khyad du bsad pas/bdag cag ni khyod
284b3(mdo sde): kyi drin shin tu lci bor dran par byed do//drin lci ba dran pas na deng bdug cag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed do zhes smras nas/thams cad byang
284b4(mdo sde): chub tu sems bskyed do//de'i tshe ni mi rgod lnga brgya rnams kyis kyang 'di skad ces smras so//khyod ni kun gyis mchog shin tu dge ba yino zhes zer na/ci'i phyir 'di lta bu'i sdig pa
284b5(mdo sde): chen po byed/bram ze'i bus smras pa/bdag bya bar mi rigs pa'i sdig pa chen po byas te/de yang sems can thams cad la phun pa dang /khyed rnams kyi lus dang srog gi sbyangs
284b6(mdo sde): bya ba'i phyir ro//de nas mi rgod de dag gis bram ze'i bu la smras pa/khyed nyid kyis mi bsad pa la bdag cag la phan pa yang ci zhig yod/bram ze'i bus smras pa/ma rgod khyod
284b7(mdo sde): rnams 'di na 'dug par snga nas shes kyang bdag cang ma smras te/rgyal po yang ma sbran/bdag gis grogs po rnams la yang ma smras/gautam ma byas pas khyed kyi lus
285a1(mdo sde): drang srog bde bar gyur pa yin no//de'i tshe mi rgod de dag gis de skad ces smras pa thos nas 'di snyam du gyur to//bdag cag gi lus dang srog kyang gson no snyam
285a2(mdo sde): bsams nas/bram ze'i bu la thal mo sbyar te/skyes bu chen po shin tu leg so//snying rje chen po dang ldan pa bdag cag gis dang phyin chad ci dang ci bya ba bstan du gsol/bram ze'i bus/
285a3(mdo sde): smras pa/khyed rnams myur du bla na med pa'i byang chub tu sems skyed cig/de nas mi rgod rnams kyang drin bsab pa'i phyir/de ma thag tu bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub
285a4(mdo sde): tu sems bskyed par gyur to//bcom ldan 'das kyis kun dga' bo la bka' stsal pa/byang chub sems dpa' brtson 'grus la gnas pa/byang chub yongasu brgyan pa dang /sang+yas
285a5(mdo sde): kyi bka' drin ldan bsab par 'dod pa dgu rtag tu sems can thams cad la bu gcig pa dang 'dra bar 'du shes bskyod cing dran par bya'o//rigs kyi bu 'di ltar rig par bya
285a6(mdo sde): ste/de'i dus de'i tshe na bram ze'i bu gzhan yin par sems shig na/de'i dus de'i tshe bram ze'i bur gyur pa de ni da ltar nga nyid yin no//de'i rgyu de'i rkyen gyis bskal pa dgu bcu snyed
285a7(mdo sde): kyi 'khor ba las 'das nas myur du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par sangs rgyas//gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' thabs mkhas pa chen po
285b1(mdo sde): spyod cing drin lan shes pa dang /drin lan bsab pa ni 'dri lta ste/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das 'od ma'i tshal nu bzhugs pa na/dge slong gcig lus la 'brum pa'i nad kyis btab nas/lus
285b2(mdo sde): lo kun nas rnag khrag rgyun tu zag pas thams cad kyis mi 'dod de gtsug lag khang gi phyi rol gnas khang zhig par gyur pa tha ma zhig gi nang du bzhago//de'i tshe de bzhin gshegs pas rdzu
285b3(mdo sde): 'phrul gyi mthus/'khor mang pos gcig gis kyang mi shes par byin gyis brlabs nas//de bzhin gshegs pa nyag gcig dge slong nad pa'i thad du gshegs te/chus dkru bar dgo
285b4(mdo sde): nas 'dod pa'i khams kyi lha rnams shes par bya ba'i phyir/bArgyu byin lha'i dbang po lha'i 'khor tshad med pa brgya stong gis bskor te/lha rdzas kyi me tog char bzhin du phag lha rdzas kyi rol mo
285b5(mdo sde): rnam pa sna tshogs byas nas/steng gi nam mkha' la 'khod do//de'i tshe na sum cu rtsa gsum gnam gyi lha'i dbang po bsod nams brgya las grub pa'i bum pa dam pa'i nang na snying rje chen po'i chu
285b6(mdo sde): gtsang mus bkang nas lag na thogs te/de bzhin gshegs pa'i zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal nas/de bzhin gshegs pa la mdun nas bsu ste/phyogs gcig tu sdod do//de'i tshe
285b7(mdo sde): na de bzhin gshegs pas bsod nams brgya dang ldan pa'i phyag brkyang nas/phyag sor gnyen zhing ring ba lnga las 'od zer chen po bkye nas/lha dang 'khor mang po de dag rnams snang bar
286a1(mdo sde): byas te/'khor mang po de dag 'dug nas/de bzhin gshegs pa nyid dge slong nad pa'i drung du gshegs te/dbu'i spyi gtsug nas 'od zer bkye nas/dge slong nad pa snang
286a2(mdo sde): bar byas//dge slong nad pa de la reg ma thag tu na ba'i sdug bsngal byang bar gyur te/rma'i rnag khrag dang bcas pa'i lus kyis skyabasu gsol nas lus kyis de bzhin gshegs pa la
286a3(mdo sde): phyag 'tshal ma nus pas/de bzhin gshegs pas phyag g.yas pas brgya byin lha'i dbang po las rin po che'i bum pa blangs te/dge slong nad pa'i spyi bo nas chu blugs te/phyag yon
286a4(mdo sde): bos dge slong nad pa'i lus kyi rma bkrus shing byugs pas dge slong nad pa'i rmi thams cad de bzhin gshegs pa'i phyag gis rjesu sos par gyur to//de ltar rma kun sos nas dge
286a5(mdo sde): slong de dga' mgu rangs par gyur te/sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa la phyag 'tshalo//thugs rje chen po'i yab la phyag 'tshalo//bla na med pa'i sman pa'i rgyal po mchog la phyag 'tshalo//
286a6(mdo sde): zhes brjod de/bdag gi lus kyi nad rnams no dang du sos par gyur na/sems kyi nad 'ba' zhig ma sos te/de bzhin gshegs pas thugs brtse ba'i slad du bdag la chos kyi sman
286a7(mdo sde): stsal cing sems kyi nad kyang gso' bar gsol lo//de nas de bzhin gshegs pas dge slong nad pa de la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to//de bzhin gshegs pa ni khyod kyi drin
286b1(mdo sde): shin tu lci bar dgongs pas na/de bzhin gshegs pas khyod kyis sprin lan bsab par mdzad do//de'i tshe dge slong nad pa de shin tu dka' bar gyur te/de bzhin gshegs pas spro ba dang
286b2(mdo sde): dga' ba dang /gzengs bstod pa mdzad nas/dge slong nad pa de dgra bcom pa'i 'bras bu thob nas/rig pa gsum dang mngon par shes pa drug dang /rnam par grol ba brgyad du ldan par gyur to///
286b3(mdo sde): brgya byin lha'i dbang po las sogs pa lha'i 'khor thams cad the tsom du gyur te/de bzhin gshegs pa la 'di skad ces gsol to//ci'i slad du/de bzhin gshegs pa nyid phyag dor
286b4(mdo sde): te/dge slong nad pa'i lus kyi rma khrag kun bkrus te/dge slong 'di la shin tu drin lci ba yod do//zhes gsungs pa'i don bdag cag la dgrol zhing bshad du gsol/sangs rgyas kyis
286b5(mdo sde): brgya byin lha'i dbang po dang /lha'i 'khor mang po rnams la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to//khyed rnams legs par nyon la shin tu yid la zung shig dang /dngos po dag bstan par bya'o///
286b6(mdo sde): brgya byin lha'i dbang po sngon 'das pa'i dus bskal pa grangs med/tshad med pa'i pha rol ni/rgyal po sdig pa can chos ma yin par byed pa/kun la 'phrog rlom byed pa zhig byung ngo //
286b7(mdo sde): de'i tshe rgyal po sdig pa can des blon po lnga brgya zhig bkug nas dku gsang gcig tu byas te/gsang la btags nas/blon po de dag la 'di skad ces bsgo'o//gang su rung khrims
287a1(mdo sde): las 'gal bar byas na/khyed kyis chad pas gcad par dbang bskur gyis//khyed kyis nor ci thob kyang rung du dang thun mong bya'o zhes bsgo'o//de'i tshe na lnga brgya po des rtag tu
287a2(mdo sde): gzhu brdeg byed de/nor mang du thob po ni de bzhin du btang /gang nor med pa la ni srog la bab kyi du gnod pa byed do//de'i tshe na dge bsnyen cig khrims la dgal ba cung zad cig byas
287a3(mdo sde): pasad lnga brgya'i gan du khrid nas gzhu brdeg bya bar byas pa l+la/dge snyen shin tu dge ba yin no zhes pas gnod pa ma byas par yin par btang ngo //de'i rkyen gyis dge bsnyen de
287a4(mdo sde): yang shin tu dga' bar gyur to//ko'u shi ka 'di ltar rig par bya ste/de'i tshe de'i dus na lnga brgya po de ni dge slong nad pa 'di yin no//de'i tshe de'i dus na dge snyen du gyur pa de ni da ltar
287a5(mdo sde): nga nyid yin no//de bas na byang chub sems dpa' ni bskal pa grangs med pa'i sngon rol gyi drin yang ba yang lci bas glan pa yin no//mngon par sangs rgyas kyi bar du yang rtag tu mi
287a6(mdo sde): brjed do//de'i tshe na brgya byin lha'i dbang po dang /lha'i 'khor mang po rab tu dga' bar gyur te/lha'i 'khor bzhi khri brgya stong snyed kyis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang
287a7(mdo sde): chub tu sems bskyed par gyur to//byang chub tu sems bskyed nas lha rdzas kyi rol mo byas te/phyis rang rang gi gnasu song ngo //bcom ldan 'das kyis kun dga' bo la bkar stsal
287b1(mdo sde): pa/rigs kyi bu 'am/rigs kyi bu mo gang /drin shes pa dang /drin lan bslab pa ni don rnam pa bzhi la nan tan bya'o//bzhi gang zhe na/dge ba'i bshes bsnyen bsten pa dang /sems rtsertsa
287b2(mdo sde): gcig tu chos nyan pa dang /don yid la byed pa dang /ji ltar bstan pa bzhin du spyod pa'o//gzhan yang chos rnam pa bzhi la gnas par bya'o//bzhi gang zhe na/chos la gnas kyi gang
287b3(mdo sde): zag gi rje su mi gnas pa dang /don la gnas kyi yi ge'i rje su mi gnas pa dang /ye shes la gnas kyi rnam par shes pa'i rjesu mi gnas pa dang /nges pa'i don gyi mdo sde la ni gnas
287b4(mdo sde): kyi bkri ba'i mdo sde la mi gnas pa ste/chos 'di brgyad la nan tan byed na ni drin lan shes pa zhes bya'o//gzhan yang chos rnam pa brgyad dang ldan na drin lan bsab pa zhes bya'o//
287b5(mdo sde): brgyad gang zhe na/'di lta ste/rnyed pa dang /khe dang /smad pa dang /bstod pa dang /grags pa dang /'phya ba dang /sdug bsngal ba dang bde ba la mi lta ba'o//gzhan yang dngos po 'di bzhi la
287b6(mdo sde): nan tan byed pa ni/dIn ldan shes pa zhes bya/dri na lan bsab pa zhes kyang bya'o//bzhi gang zhe na/'di lta ste/byams pa bsgoms pa'i rkyen gyis/sems can sdig pa can dag
287b7(mdo sde): mthong na/byams shing snying brtse ba'i sems bskyed pa dang /snying rje bsgoms pa'i rkyen gyis/sdug bsngal ba'i sems can rnams mthong na ma skyo bar lta zhing mi gtong ba dang /dga'
288a1(mdo sde): ba bsgoms pa'i rkyen gyis slob dpon dang /bla ma dang /pha ma dang /yon tan dang ldan pa rnams mthong na/dga' sems skyed pa dang /btang snyoms bsgoms pa'i rkyen
288a2(mdo sde): gyis dgar gyur pa'i sems can mthong na/zhe sdang gi sems mi skyed pa'o//de'i tshe kun dga' bos gos chagasu bcos nas/sangs rgyas la 'di skad ces gsol to//bcom ldan 'ang
288a3(mdo sde): de bzhin gshegs pa thog ma nas byang chub tu sems bskyed pa ni/drin shes pa dang /drin lan bsab pa'i don gyi dngos po bzhi ji ltar nan tan du mdzad pa lags/bcom ldan
288a4(mdo sde): 'das kyis kun dga' bo la bka' stsal pa/sngon 'das pa'i dus bskal pa grangs med dpag tu med/tshad med pa'i pha rol na/sangs rgyas rnam par gzigs shes bya ba de bzhin
288a5(mdo sde): gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rig pa dang zhabasu ldan pa/bde bar gshegs pa/'jig rten mkhyen pa/skyes bu 'dul ba'i kha lo sgyur ba/
288a6(mdo sde): bla na med pa/ston pa/rgyal ba 'jig rten du byung ste/skal ba dang ldan pa rnams kyi don mdzad do//skal pa dang ldan pa rnams kyi don mdzod nas/yongasu mya ngan las 'das te/dam///
288a7(mdo sde): pa'i chos dang gzugs brnyan las chos bya ba yang nub nas/yul bA ra na se zhes bya ba na mi rnams kyang bskyed cing bde/lo yang legs te/rgyal po de yang drang po'i chos kyis
288b1(mdo sde): yul gyi srid 'tsho'i yul de nA ri drang srong 'phags shes bya ba zhig yod de/ri de la rgyun tu rang sangs rgyas lnga brgya gan so//de ma yin pa mngon par shes pa lnga dang ldan pa'i drang srong yang
288b2(mdo sde): mang du gnas//de'i tshe re de la ri dgas dang gcan zan yang mang du gnas te/de na sing gi yi dam bton zhes bya ba zhig/lus kyi sku gser gyi mdog tu 'dug pa/mthu stobs dang ga
288b3(mdo sde): brjid che ba/skad phyung na bya rnams kyang sa la ltung ba/ri dgas rnams kyang 'bros pa zhig yod de/ri de la 'gro zhing rgyu ba dang /rang sangs rgyas dge sbyong gi gzugasu spyod lam du
288b4(mdo sde): ldan pa gcig dang phrad nas/shin tu dga' de'i sems skyes te/nyin cig bzhin du nye bar brten nas/rgyun tu mdo sde klog pa dang /dam pa'i chos 'chad pa thos par gyur to//da
288b5(mdo sde): che na rngon pa chen po ma rungs pa zhig gis/seng ge'i bgos pa gser gyi mdog tu 'dug pa de mthong nas rab tu dga' ba'i sems skyes te/'di snyam du semaso//gal te bdag
288b6(mdo sde): gis gser gyi seng ge de bsad de/bgras pa bshus la rgyal po lnga phul na/gdon mi za bar bya dga' chen po thob par 'gyur to/rabs bdun gyi bAr du phongs pa med
288b7(mdo sde): par 'gyu ro snyam bsams nas/yang 'di snyam du sems so//seng ge yi dam brtan zhes bya ba 'di ni gcan zan gyi rgyal po yin pas/mda' gzhus kyang mi rdzi/snying rgyas kyang bar
289a1(mdo sde): med de/de bdag gis thabs 'di lta bu zhig bya'o//ri dgas kyi rgyal po seng ge 'di ltar dge sbyong gi phyi bzhin 'brang bas bdag kyang dge sbyong gi gzugs byas la/tshwa/
289a2(mdo sde): gos kyi 'og tu mda' gzhu sbas la mig phab la/gom pa dal bus song ste/shing drung zhig tu 'dug na des bdag mthong ma thag tu gdon mi za bar bdag gi drung du 'ong te/gal te
289a3(mdo sde): bdag gi drung du 'ongs na gzhu brdungs bkang ste/dug mda' phangs na/gdon mi za b+hU bsod do snyam bsams nas/phyir khyim du 'ongs te 'di skad ces smraso//bdag rgyud kyis rngon
289a4(mdo sde): ba byed byed de gnas na/gcan zan la spu gser du 'dug pa yod ma thos na mthong ba lta ci smos te/da bdag gis de gsad pa'i phyir sgra dang kha spu bregs la/chos gos gyon
289a5(mdo sde): nas phyir yang ri de la song nas shing drung zhig na 'dug na/de'i tshe seng ge yi dam brtan gyis dge slong mthong nas/rab tu dga' ste mchong rgal nas dge slong de'i drung du bsnyen te///
289a6(mdo sde): rkang pa la ldag go//de nas rngon pa des seng ge la mda' 'phangaso//de nas dug mdas sdug bsngal bar gyur te/skad phyung nas gzung zhing mchong bar byas pa la 'di snyam bsamaso//
289a7(mdo sde): 'di ni dge sbyong gi kha dog bsgyur ba gyon pa yin te/dus gsum gyi sangs rgyas kyi 'phags pa'i rgyal mtshan yin pas/'di la bdag gis gnod pa bya na dka' ba ma
289b1(mdo sde): yin na/gal te 'di la gnod pa byas te srog gi dbang po dang bral na/sangs rgyas rnams kyi 'phags pa'i rgyu la mtshan ma rung bar byas pa yin no snyam bsnams nas/cang ma byas par//
289b2(mdo sde): bsdad pa las ring po ma lon par dag langs nas lhag par sdug bsngal mi bzod par gyur to//yang bza' zhing bca' sgyum bsems pa las/'di ni bka' ba ma yin no//gal
289b3(mdo sde): te bdag gis 'di la gnod pa byas na/sangs rgyas dang 'phags pa rnams kyis spyod par 'gyur te/'jig rten na dge ba byed pa dang /sdig pa byed pa yang bye brag med de/'di
289b4(mdo sde): nisdig pa can yin te/bdag gsod du 'ongs pas/gal te bdag gis de la bzod pa ma byas ni ni/sdig pacan de dang tha dad pa yang med de/gang bzod pa bsgom pa de la
289b5(mdo sde): thams cad byams par 'gyur ro//gang mi bzod pa de la ni thams cad sdang bar 'gyur bas/de la nyon mongs pa skye bar 'gyur te/nyon mongs pa skyes pa gyur na skye shi'i 'khor
289b6(mdo sde): bar 'gyur ro//skye shir 'khor bya na mi khom pa'i gnas skye bar 'gyur/mi khom pa gnas skyes na/dge ba'i bshes+ye gnyen dang bral bar 'gyur/dge bo ba shes gnyen
289b7(mdo sde): dang bral ni/dam pa'i chos mi thos par 'gyur/dam par chos ma thos na/the tsom gyi dra bas klogs par 'gyur/the tsom gyi dra bas klags par gyur na/bla na med pa yang dag
290a1(mdo sde): par rdzogs pa'i byang chub dang bral bar 'gyur te/de bas na bdag ni sdig pa'i sems ma bskyed do snyam bsams nas/tshig su bcad pa 'di skad ces smraso//bdag
290a2(mdo sde): gi lus srog yal yang bla//mi dge sdig pa'i sems mi bskyed//bdag ni srog dang bral yang rung //ngur smrig gyon la gnod mi bya//rab tu byung ba'i mi dag la//nam du'ang ngan sems
290a3(mdo sde): mi bskyed do//tshig su bcad pa 'di dag smras nas//tshe'i dus byas par gyur te//gru na ma sa yang lan drug tu g.yos so//gcan zan dang /ri dgas kyang skrag nas/phyogs bzhir
290a4(mdo sde): bros so//sprin med par char pa bab nas nyi ma yang 'od mi snang bar gyur to//de'i tshe rngon pa des gos phud nas/gri thogs nas lpags pa bshus te phyir khyim du song ngo //phyir khyim
290a5(mdo sde): du song nas rgyal po la phul lo//rgyal pos lpags pa de mthong nas rab tu dga' ste/blon po rnams la 'di skad ces smra so//bdag skyes nas dud 'gro la lus kyi lpags pa spu gser
290a6(mdo sde): gyi mdog tu 'dug pa yod pa yong ma thos te/da 'dir mig gis mngon sum du mthong ba ngo mtshar che'o zhes rngon pa de la khyod ji lta bu zhig gi thabs byas te/lpags pa 'di lta
290a7(mdo sde): bu thob ces dris so//de nas rngon pas rgyal po la 'di skad ces gsol to//rgyal po chen po 'jigs pa med pa stsal na/drang por smra'o zhes gsol to//rgyal pos kyang khyod ci
290b1(mdo sde): 'dod pa bzhin gnang ngo bar bsgo nas/rngon pa des kyang ji ltar gyur pa bzhin du gsol to//rgyal pos kyang tshig de thos nas mya ngan gyis non te/dper na/mi brnangs pa bzhin
290b2(mdo sde): ming du yang med la/bskyug tu yang med pa ltar mi bde bar gyur te/blon po chen po thams cad dang /rgyal phran dang /'khor mang po kun bsdus te/'di skad ces bsgo'o//khyed rnaMs
290b3(mdo sde): shes par gyis shig/ngas sngon mkhas pa shes rab can dag la 'di skad ces thos te/dud 'gro'i khamasu skyes pa'i nang na lus kyi spu mdag gser lta bur 'dug na/gdon mi
290b4(mdo sde): za bar byang chub sems dpa' yin no zhes zer te/gal te so so'i skye bo las gcig tsam bla na med pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed na/sems can thams cad la phan pa dang bde
290b5(mdo sde): dwa'i don chen po byed pa yin na/ci'i phyir rngon pa sdig can 'dis de 'dra ba'i thabs byas te/byang chub sems dpa' 'di gal to bdag gis blon thabs sam/bya dga' 'am/bal
290b6(mdo sde): gyi glang po che'am/rta 'am/rin po che sna bdun na me/gos sam/nau ra zas sam/nor 'am/'bru'am/'di ltar byin par gyur na/sdig can de dang 'thun par 'gyur te/de'i
290b7(mdo sde): brogasu 'gyur ro snyam bsams nas/rngo ni pa de'i srog gi dbang po bcod do//de ltar rngon pa de srog gi dbang po bcad nas/seng ge'i lpags pa thogs te ri de la song nas/shing
291a1(mdo sde): glung 'ga'i tsan dan smangs te/seng ge'i lpags pa dang rlo bsregaso//de ltar seng ge'i ro bsregs nas rus pa bsdus te mchod rten brtsegs nas mchod pa byas so//
291a2(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das kyis kun dga' bo la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to//rigs kyi bu de'i tshe de'i dus na/song ge yi dam brtan zhes bya ba de ni de ltar shAkya thub pa nyid yi no//de bas/
291a3(mdo sde): na byang chub sems dpa' ni dge ba'i bshes gnyen dang bsten pa'i phyir/lus dang srog phyir yal yang bla'i/sdig pa'i sems mi skye'o//de ci'i phyir zhe na/drin shes pa dang /
291a4(mdo sde): drin bsab pa'i phyir ro//de ltar ci sta zhe na/byang chub sems dpa' ni dge ba'i bshes gnyen dang bsten pas/bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub myur du thob par
291a5(mdo sde): 'gyur ro//rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' ni/rgyun tu brtson 'grusu dge ba'i bshes gnyen la bsten te/khams gsum gyi nyon mongs pa gzhom zhing+ga chud par bya ba'i phyir
291a6(mdo sde): sangs rgyas kyi chos tshig cig tsam 'am/tshig su bcad pa gcig gam/don gcig tsam gyi bar du nyan pa la rab tu brtson par byed do//de ltar byang chub sems dpa' ni
291a7(mdo sde): sems rtse gcig tu sangs rgyas kyi gsung rab tshol ba na/chos 'dod pa'i sems dang //shin tu ldan pas lus dang srog kyang mi phangs par me ma~M mur gyi lcags sam/
291b1(mdo sde): sa gzhi las kyang 'bog cing 'gro ste/gnod par mi sems//byang chub sems dpa' ni tshig su bcud pa 'ga' tsam gyi phyir yang lus dang srog mi phangs na/mdo sde bcu gnyis lta ci
291b2(mdo sde): smos/tshigasu bcad pa gcig tsam gyis phyir yang /lus dang srog mi phangs na/de ma yin pa'i phyi'i zang zing lta ci smos/chos thos pa'i don gyis lus dang sems shin tu bde bar gyur
291b3(mdo sde): te/shin tu dad pa'i sems skyes pas yang dag pa'i lta ba'i sems thob par 'gyur ro//chos ston pa mthong na/pha ma mthong ba ltar nga rgyal gyi sems mi skye'o//sems can gyi don tu///
291b4(mdo sde): chos nyan gyi rnyed pa dang grags pa'i phyir ma yin/sems can la phan pa dang bang ba'i don byed kyi/bdag la phan pa'i don gyis phyir ma yin no//dam pa'i chos kyi phyir rgyal po dang /
291b5(mdo sde): bkres skom dang /grang ba dang /chu bau dang /stag dang /spyang ku las sogs te/can zan khro bo dang /rkun po dang /dgra las sogs pas 'jigs pa ma yin no//sngar dbang po rnas
291b6(mdo sde): kyi nyon mongs pa btul nas/de'i 'og tu chos nyan par byed kyi/dus ma yin par nyan pa ni me yin te/sems rtse gcig tu chos mnyam par byed do//chos la bkur sti bya ba'i phyir
291b7(mdo sde): chos ston pa la rim go gus par byed pa ni/byang chub sems dpa' drin shes pa dang /drin bsab pa zhes bya'o//ji ltar na/byang chub sems dpa' sems rtse gcig tu nyan po
292a1(mdo sde): zhe na/chos nyan pa la rnam pa bzhi ste/yang dag pa'i sems dang /rtse gcig pa'i sems dang /thams cad dang /thams cad kyi sems dang /dge ba'i sems
292a2(mdo sde): dang bzhi ste/de ni byang chub sems dpa' mdo sde bcu gnyis tshal ba la brtson pa zhes bya'o//de ci'i phyir zhe na/sangs rgyas kyi bka' drin lci ba dran pa ni/sangs rgyas thams
292a3(mdo sde): cad kyi dam pa'i chos kun tu rgyas par bya ba'i phyir/sangs rgyas kun gyi dam pa'i chos skye zhing 'phel bar bya ba'i phyir/'jig rten pa dag sangs rgyas kyi chos la dad
292a4(mdo sde): par bya ba'i phyir/sems can thams cad bla na med pa'i byang chub par bya ba'i phyir/de bso na byang chub sems dpa'i phyogs bcu'i sems can grangs med pa dran par byed//
292a5(mdo sde): sangs rgyas kun gyi bka' drin lci ba bsab pa'i phyir/byang chub sems dpa' ni mdo sde bcu gnyis tshol ba la brtson par byed do//byang chub sems dpas brtson 'grusu
292a6(mdo sde): sangs rgyas kyi chos tshol ba ni/sems can thams cad dad pa'i sems bskyed pa'i phyir/rgyu'i rig pa'i bstan bcos slob par byed do//gzhan yang nyes pa'i skyen tha~Md
292a7(mdo sde): shes par bya ba dang /mu stegs can gyi ngan par blta ba'i gtsug lag gzhig par bya ba dang /sems can gdul ba'i thabs mkhas pa shes par bya ba dang /de bzhin
292b1(mdo sde): gshegs pas gsungs pa'i don dang /'jig rten pa'i tshig gi dran rnam par dbye bar bya ba'i phyir/byang chub sems dpa'i rgyu'i rig pa'i bstan bcos slob par byed do//byang chub
292b2(mdo sde): sems dpa' ci'i phyir sgra'i rig pa'i bstan bcos slob par byed ce na/sgra'i tshi go yongasu dag por brgyan pa dang /yongasu ma dag pa'i tshig gis don gsal bar ston mi nus pa dang ///
292b3(mdo sde): dan thams cad shos shing khong du chud par bya ba dang /yang dag pa'i tshig mi nyams pas nga rgyal gyis mi shigs pa dang /ngan par lta ba las bzlog cing /sems can gdul
292b4(mdo sde): ba'i thabs mkhas par shes par bya ba'i phyir/byang chub sems dpa' sgra'i rig pa'i bstan bcos slob par byed do//byang chub sems dpa' ci'i phyir sman dpyad kyi rig pa'i
292b5(mdo sde): bstan bcos slob ce na/sems can rnams mi dge ba'i nad brgya rtsa bzhi dang dpral bar bya ba dang /sems can thams cad la byams shing snying brtse ba'i phyiraro/sems can
292b6(mdo sde): rnams dad pa'i sems bskyed par bya ba dang /de ltar nad dang bral bas dga' ba'i sems skye bar bya ba dang /de ltar dga' bo'i sems skyes pas rtag tu sangs rgyas dran
292b7(mdo sde): par 'gyur te/snying rje chen pos sems can rnams pha rol tu phyin par bya ba'i phyir/byang chub sems dpa' sman dpyad kyi rig pa slob par byed do//byang chub sems dpa
293a1(mdo sde): ni ci'i phyir 'jig rten gyi bzo'i rig pa slob par byed ce na/sems can la phan par bya ba'i phyir/nor zad zing rnyed skabs sems can gyi rnams dad pa bskyed
293a2(mdo sde): par bya ba'i rnams dang /'jig rten gyi bya ba'i dngos po kun shes pos nga rgyal gzhom pa dang /sems can gdul bar bya ba dang /srid pa'i chos thams cad kyi bsgrubs pa
293a3(mdo sde): kun gsal ba'i phyir/byang chub sems dpa' bzo'i rig pa slob par byed do//gal te byang chub sems dpa' rig pa'i dngos po lnga sngar mu bslabs na/nu ma du yang bla na med pa
293a4(mdo sde): yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes thob par mi nus so//de bas na bla na med pa'i byang chub thob pa'i phyir/rig pa'i dngos po lnga bslab par
293a5(mdo sde): bya'o//byang chub sems dpa' ni drin shes pa dang /drin bsab pa ni sems can bshad pa'i dngos po bshad cing bstan par bya'o//ji ltar bshad ce na/bla na med pa yang dag
293a6(mdo sde): par rdzogs pa'i byang chub thob par bya ba'i phyir/rig pa lnga dang ldan par bshad par bya'o//bshad pa la rnam pa gnyis te/rims kyis bshad pa dang /yongasu dag pas
293a7(mdo sde): bshad pa'o//de la ji ltar na rims kyis bshad pa gang zhe na/sngar sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa bshad la/de'i 'og tu tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa nas/shes rab
293b1(mdo sde): kyipha rol tu phyin pa'i bar du bshad pa dang /drin shes pa dang /drin pasab pa'i phyir/don yid la byed cing chos bzhin du gnas pa ni rims kyis bshad pa zhes bya'o//de la yongasu
293b2(mdo sde): dag par bshad pa zhes bya ba ni gang zhe na/nyan pa 'dug lnga bshed pa 'greng na/de la bshad par mi bya'o//gal te nyan pa chos la skyon tshol lam bshad pA lo skyon tshol na de la
293b3(mdo sde): bshad par mi bya'o//gal te gang zag la rten/chos la mi rten na/chos le mi rten pas de la bu shad por ma bya'o//gal te nyan pa yi ge la rten la don la mi rten no bshad par mi
293b4(mdo sde): bya ba nas/bkri ba'i don la rten gyi nges po'i don gyi bar la mi rten na bshad par mi bya'o//de ci'i phyir zhe na/gang zag de ni sangs rgyas dang /byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi yongs
293b5(mdo sde): su dag pa'i chos la ma gus pa'i phyir ro//gal te bshad cing ston pa yang chos la bkur bsti byed lo/chos nyan pa gang gus pa'i sems kyis rtse gcig tu nyan cing nga rgyal gyi sems
293b6(mdo sde): med pa ni/yong su dag par bshad pa zhes bya'o//gzhan yang rims kyis bshad pa zhes bya ba ni thams cad bshad pa'o//thams cad bshad pa zhes bya ba ni/mdo sde bcus
293b7(mdo sde): nas tshig gcig gam/tshig su bcad pa gcig gam//tshog su bcad pa phyed kyi bar du bshad pa ste/de yang tshig sgra dang /don dang tshe su ldan la//
294a1(mdo sde): chos dang don bstan pa yang spro ba dang /gzeng bstod pa dang /dga' bar bya ba'i phyir dus su bstan pa dang /dus kha cig tu gshe zhing spyo ba dang /dus kha cig tu drang
294a2(mdo sde): por thad kar bstan pa dang /dus kha cig tu dpe rnams bstan te/ci dang 'phrod pa bzhin du bstan pa dang /dus kha cig tu de bas nya zhing slu bar bstan pa dang /dus kha cig tu
294a3(mdo sde): ci ltar mos pa bzhin du 'jug sla ba/bstan pa ni/byang chub sems dpa'i drin shes pa/drin bsab pa la mkhas pa'i mchog chos rims kyis bshad pa zhes bya'o//gzhan//
294a4(mdo sde): yang yongasu dag par bshad pa zhes bya ba ni/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dgra sdang ba la byams pa'i sems bsgom ste/byams pa'i sems kyis sems
294a5(mdo sde): can sdig pa dang bcas pa dang /gang zag bag med pa dang /le lo can dgal/thabs rnam pa med po nas chos bstan pa nas/rgyags shing dregs pa dang /gang zag dbul
294a6(mdo sde): 'phongs pa'i bar du thabs rnam pa mang pos chos ston par byed kyi/bdag bstod pa/gzhan smod pa 'am/bza' ba dang /btung ba dang /rnyed pa dang /grags pa'i phyir ma yin
294a7(mdo sde): pa ni/byang chub sems dpa' drin shes shing drin bsab pa la mkhas pa'i chos yongasu dag par bshad pa zhes bya'o//de la ji ltar na chos bzhin du gnas pa yin zhe na/lus//
294b1(mdo sde): dang ngag dang yid kyi las dge ba'i chos sgom zhing yong su dag pa dang ldan te/d+hIn shes pa dang /drin bslab pa yang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub yongasu bstan pa'o//gzhan//
294b2(mdo sde): yang byang chub sems dpa' chen po drin shes shing /drin bsab pa ni don yid la byed de/mang du thos pas gzungs thob par byed cing chos kyi sgron ma 'bor bar bya ba'i phyir/sems
294b3(mdo sde): can thams cad la phan pa dang /bde ba'i don tu sbyin pa dang /tshul khrims dang /mang du thos pa la brtson par bya/chos ston cing 'chad pa lnga mchod pa dang /rim gro byi'i/chos lnga
294b4(mdo sde): skyon mi gdags ston cing 'chad pa la skyon mi gang gos/gnod pa dang /'tshe ba med pa'i sems kyis sems can la mi 'jigs pa sbyin pa ni/drin shes pa zhes bya'o//lha dang mi'i
294b5(mdo sde): longs spyod myong zhing mya ngan las 'da' ba'i lam thob pa ni drin shes pa dang /drin bsrab pa zhes bya'o//byang chub sems dpa' ni gzhan yang dngos po bzhis bzod pa bsgom zhing
294b6(mdo sde): mi bzod pa yongasu spangs te/sems can mang po bsdus nas bzod pa bsgom pa la bkod de/bdag kyang bzod pa byed de/gzhan yang bzod pa byed pa la 'god cing /'jigs pa
294b7(mdo sde): dang bral ba ni drin shis pa zhes bya'o//de ltar bzod pa byas pa'i rkyen gyis zhe sdang gi sems mi 'byung bas/'khor phun sum tshogs pa dang ldan/sdug bsngal ba 'am/nyon mongs/
295a1(mdo sde): pa mi 'byung bas 'gyod pa'i sems med de/lus 'di dang bral nas kyang lha dang ma'i longs spyod mya ngan las 'da' ba thob pa ni drin bsab pa zhes bya'o//rag+sa/
295a2(mdo sde): kyi bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' dngos po rnam pa bzhis brtson 'grus rtsom ste/le mo yongasu spangs nas/byang chub brgyan pa'i phyir/sems can yongasu sdud do//
295a3(mdo sde): byang chub kyi lam gyi phyir brtson 'grus rtsom pas nyal na yang bde ste/nyon mongs pa dang bral bas bde ba'i chos skyo zhing 'phel te/lus kyi bde ba'i longs spyod myong ba ni
295a4(mdo sde): bdag la phan pa'i don byed pa zhes bya'o//byang chub sems dpa' brtson 'grus rtsom yang /sems can la mi 'tsho ste/'tsho ga dzag dang /gshe ba dang spyo ba med pa ni/gzhan
295a5(mdo sde): la phan pa'i don byed pa zhes bya ste/lus 'di dang bral nas kyang lha dang mi'i longs spyod myong zhing mthu dang dbang du ldan te/byang chub kye lam thob pas dbras bu chen po thob par
