295a6(mdo sde): 'gyur te/'di ni byang chub sems dpa' brtson 'grus ba rtsom pa'i dngos po bzhi zhes bya'o//byang chub sems dpa'i tong 'dzin bsgoms pas 'khrug pa'i sems yongasu spangs
295a7(mdo sde): tede byang chub brgyan pa'i phyir sems can yong su sdud do//byang chub kyi lam gyi phyir ting nge 'dzin bsgoms pas tshe 'di yang 'jig rten gyi bde ba myong la/lus dang sems
295b1(mdo sde): dben zhing zhi ba ni drin ldan shes pa zhes bya'o//de ltar lus dang sems dben zhing zhi bas sems can la mi che ba ni drin bslab pa zhes bya ste/byang chub sems dpa' lus 'di dang bral
295b2(mdo sde): nas rnam par dag pa'i lus thob cing bde ba phun sum tshogs pa'i longs spyod myong ste/yongasu mya ngan las 'da' ba thob pa ni/byang chub sems dpa'i bsam gtan sgoms
295b3(mdo sde): pa'i dngos po bzhi zhes bya'o//gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' drin shes pa dang /drin bsab pa'i shes rab dang ldan pas ma rig pa bcom ste/byang chub yongasu brgyan pa'i
295b4(mdo sde): phyir/bsdu ba'i chos rnam pa bzhis sems can yong su sdud do//byang chub kyi phyir shes rab bsgoms pas chos kyi dbyings shes shing rtogs pa'i phyir/lus kyis bde ba'i
295b5(mdo sde): longs spyod myong ba ni/bdag la phan pa'i don zhes bya'o//sems can rnams kyi 'jig rten gyi don dang /'jig rten las 'das pa'i don bskyed pa ni gzhon la phan pa'i don zhes bya'o//
295b6(mdo sde): nyon mongs pa dang /shes bya'i sgrib pa rnam pa gnyis yongasu spangs pas na/'bras bu chen po zhes bya ste/'di ni drin shes shing /dri ni bsab pa'i byang chub sems dpa' shos
295b7(mdo sde): rab kyis dngos po bsam gyis mi khyab pa bzhi zhes bya'o//gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi gnas dran pa'i mngon par shes pas/sngon 'das pa'i dngos po shes
296a1(mdo sde): rab kyis rtogs te/sems can rnams kyi dge ba dang sdig pa'i las brtags nas/dge ba'i su 'thun pa'i sems can thams cad la phan pa dang bde bar
296a2(mdo sde): don du/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po thabs mkhas pas/dga' ldan gnam du tshe phun sum tshogs par skyeso//de na mchog tu gyur pa gsum dang ldan te/
296a3(mdo sde): tshe mchog tu gyur pa dang /gzugs mchog tu gyur pa dang /glags pa mchog tu gyur pa'o//thig ma gnas de nas babs pa'i tshe 'od zer chen po dkye nas/phyogs
296a4(mdo sde): snang bar byas te/yum gyi sgyumasu 'jug pa dang /lhums na ji srid gnas pa dang /sgyums nas bltams pa'i dus mkhyen to//phyogs bcu'i phyogs re re ra yang mis ma
296a5(mdo sde): brten par gom pa bdun bdun bor te/'di snyed cesuM bsgrag so//bdag glid sgyur gyi lus 'di ni lus nang gi tha ma ste/lha dang klu dang /gnod sbyin dang /dri za dang /snum
296a6(mdo sde): yon dang /namakhara' rdzing dang /ma'am ci /smyo 'phye chen po rnams kyis me tog dang /bdug seMs dang /rol ma dang /si la snyan dang / don dang /gdugs dmapa
296a7(mdo sde): rnams kyis mchod pa byas so//skyes bu chen po'i mtshan sum cu rtse gnyis dang ldan pas//de'i lus las mchog tu gyur pa gzhan med do//byams pa'i shugs kyis
296b1(mdo sde): bdud kyi dpung rnams bcom mo//sku tshigs re re la yang gyang mthu bo che'i stobs re re dang ldan no//gzhon nu bus pa'i tshe 'jig rten gyi dngos po ma bslabs par thams cad kun rtogs
296b2(mdo sde): shing shes so//ston pa med par rung brtsal te/bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub lhun gyis grub bo//tshangs pa'i lha'i dbang pos bskul nas sems can rnams la
296b3(mdo sde): chos kyis 'khor lo basbyor to//ting 'dzin la mnyam par bzhag pas 'brug ska sgrags kyang ma g.yos so//gcan zan rnams nye bar bsnyen te pha ma bzhin du sdug par bsam/
296b4(mdo sde): so//byol song gi bsod snyoms phul ba yang sangs rgyas kyis de'i bsams pa mkhyen to//lha dang klus char phab ste/lus kyis khrus byas//shing ljon pa'i yal grwa yang de'i
296b5(mdo sde): phyogasu~M btud de grib mi'i skyabs byas//mngon par sangs rgyas nas kyang /lo drug gi bor du bdud ma rungs pa/rgyun tu blugs bcol kyang glegs ma rnyed do//rgyun tu ti nge 'dzin la
296b6(mdo sde): mnyam par bzhag pas/dran pa nye bar gzhag pa'i sems yong su rdzogs te/rnam par rtog pa 'byung ba dang /'gag pa la shin tu mkhas pas/de ni byang chub sems
296b7(mdo sde): dpa' skye ba thun mong ba bsam gyis mi khyab pa zhes bya'o//skye ba thun mong ma yin pa ni sems can la phan pa dang bde ba'i don tu/dper na/gang zag smyos pa dag de bzhin
297a1(mdo sde): gshegs pa mthong ba'i rkyen gyis sngon gyi sems sor chud pa dang /dmus long gis mthong bar 'gyur ba'am/mngal mgo log tu gyur pa legs par bcas pa 'am/
297a2(mdo sde): 'on pa rna ba thos par gyur pa 'am/'dod chags dang /zhe sdang dang /gti mug can dug gsum byang bar gyur pa de lta bu ni skye ba thun mong ma yin pa bsam gyi ma khyab pa zhes bya'o//gzhu
297a3(mdo sde): yang skye ba thun mong zhes bya ba ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i mdzad pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa ste/rtag tu glo g.yas pa phab nas gzims pa dang /seng+ge'i rgyal po lta bur/rtsa 'jog ma ltar
297a4(mdo sde): mi 'gog pa dang /rlung gi rgyal po b+hA ram pas g.yas pa sngar 'dor ba dang /gang nas gang du gshegs kyang sa gzhi mthon dman mnyam pa dang /bsod snyoms la dri nga ba'i skyon med
297a5(mdo sde): cing zhal nas phyir mi 'brul ba ni skye ba thun mong ba bsam gyis khyab pa zhes bya'o//gzhan yang skye ba thun mong ba bsam gyis mi khyab pa ni/'di lta ste/zhabs kyi mthi lo mnyaM
297a6(mdo sde): zhing gang ba yin/zhabs kyi mithol na 'khor lo rtsibs stong dang ldan pa yod pa yin/phyag sor phra la ring ba yin/zhabs kyi rting pa zlum lo gang ba yin/phyag sor gyi
297a7(mdo sde): bar dra bar 'brel ba yin/phyag dang zhabs 'jam zhing mnyen pa yin/zhabs byan par dgos kyi rgyal po e na ya ltar zlum la/shugs kyi gzhol ba yin/zhabs kyi long
297b1(mdo sde): bu phyir mi snang ba yin/phyag bus mor slebs pa yin/rta'i rgyal po ltar myatshan sngags kyi nang du mi snang ba yin/shing na gro da ltar sku'i yan lag yongasu rdzogs pa yin/sku'i ba spu gyen du nyal
297b2(mdo sde): ba yin/bi sU re re na so g.yasu 'khyil pa yin/sku mdogo gser btso ma ltar 'dug pa yin/rtag pa'i 'od 'dom gang dang ldan pa yin/lcags pa mnyan zhing 'dzam la rdul dang dA ma
297b3(mdo sde): mi gos pa yin/gnas bdun yongasu gang ba yin/sku'i stod seng ge ltar 'dug pa yin/phyag gi lag ngar zlum la shugs kyis gzhol ba yin/sgrog rus mnyam par gang ba yin//
297b4(mdo sde): sku'i stong smad 'byes pa'i mtshan dang ldan pa yin/zhal gyi tshems bzhi bcu dang ldan pa yin/tshems kyi thags bzang zhing mnyam pa yin/tshems kyi mdog dkar ba yin/'gram
297b5(mdo sde): bo ri dgas kyi rgyal po seng ge ltar gang ba yin/ro bro ba'i mchog dang ldan pa yin/sha'i do ker gyi mtshan dang ldan pa yin/ljags ring la yangs pa yin/tshangs pa'i sgra dbyangs
297b6(mdo sde): dang ldan pa yin no//spyan gyi mdog mthon mthing ltar 'dug pa yin/spyan khyu mchog gi rgyal po ltar 'dug pa yin/smin mtshams mdzod spu dkar po dang ldan pa yin/de bzhir
297b7(mdo sde): du bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i dpe byad bzang po brgyad cu dang ldan te/dpe byad bzang po re re la yang dpe byad bzang po'i mchog dam pa brgya stong snyed yod/dpe byad bzang po de
298a1(mdo sde): dag re re yang byang chub sems dpa' thog ma byang chub tu sems bskyed nas/byang chub la shin tu brtan pas/drin shes shing drin bsab pa'i phyir/spyod pa dam pa
298a2(mdo sde): de dag spyad de bas na bla na med pa'i byang chub thob par 'gyur ro//sangs rgyas kyis bka' stsal pa/de bzhin gshegs pa ni sngon yun ring po bskal pa grangs med/tshad med pa'i bar du//
298a3(mdo sde): tshul khrims yongasu dag par bsrungs pas/zhabs kyi mthil mnyam par gang ba'i mtshan dang ldan par gyur pa yino//pha ma dang /slob dpon dang /bla ma dang /gang zag ston dang
298a4(mdo sde): ldan pa la mchod pa dang /bkur bstir byas pa'i rkyen gyis zhabs kyi mthil 'khor lo'i mtshan dang ldan par gyur pa yino//sems can rnams la mi 'tshe zhing 'phrog pa dang rku ba'i
298a5(mdo sde): sems med la/pha ma dang /slob dpon dang /bla ma dang /yon dang ldan pa'i gang zag la rgyang ma nas bas su bskyal byas shing /khri bstan bting la nga rgyal spangs te rim go dang
298a6(mdo sde): bkur bsti dang /phyag byas pas/de'i rgyu de'i rkyen gyis sor mo phra zhing ring bar gyur pa'i mtshan dang ldan par gyur pa yino//gong du smos pa'i bya ba gsum dang ldan pas/rting pa
298a7(mdo sde): zlum la gang ba'i mtshan dang ldan par gyur ba yin//bsdu ba'i chos rnam pa bzhes 'gro ba mang po yongasu sdus pas/de'i rgyu de'i rkyen gyis sor mo'i bar dra bar 'brel pa'i mtshwa
298b1(mdo sde): dang ldan par gyur pa yi no//mAr dang 'bru mar gyis pa ma dang /slob dpon dang /bla mA dang /ljon drang ldan pa'i gang zag gi lus la bskus shing mnyes pas/de'i rgyu de'i rkyen gyis rga lag
298b2(mdo sde): mnyan zhing ring ba 'jam pa yin no//dge ba'i chos bsgom pa la mi skyo bas/de'i rgyu de'i rkyen gyis thal gong mnyam la lag ngur zlum zhing shugs kyis gzhol ba yin no//chos thos
298b3(mdo sde): par dga' zhing gzhan la chos ston par yang mos te/chos kyi phyir mongag gzhug gi las byas pas/de'i rgya de'i rkyen gyis long bu'i rus pa mi snang ba'i mtshan dang ldan pa yino//sgo
298b4(mdo sde): gsum yongasu dag cing nad g.yog dang sman gyi sbyin pa byin te/nga rgyal med la bza' ba dang btung ba la chog shes pa'i rgyu dang rkyen gyis lus drang por 'greng na lag pas pus mo slebs
298b5(mdo sde): pa yin no//'khon bcugs su gyur pa la tshig 'jam pos bsdums te/de dag kyang ngo tsha ba dang ldan pa'i chos spyod de/gzhan yang spyod du bcug pa/de'i rgyu de'i rkyen gyis rta'i rgyal
298b6(mdo sde): po ltar mtshan sbubs kyi nang du nub pa yin no//bdag gi sgo gsum yongasu dag la/gzhan yang yongasu dag par byed cing sems tson drag chen po bzhi 'khrugs te nad du gyur pI
298b7(mdo sde): sman dpyad kyis gsol bas ni/de'i rgyu de'i rkyen gyis lus kyi mtshan yongasu rdzogs pa yin/chos thos par dga' zhing gzhan la chos ston par mos pas na/lus kyi ba
299a1(mdo sde): spu gyen du nyal ba'i mtshan dang ldan pa yin/chos kyi don zab mo yid la bgyid cing dge ba'i chos sgom pa mos la/pha ma dang /slob dpon dang /bla ma dang /ston
299a2(mdo sde): dang ldan pa gang zag la mchod pa byas pa dang /sangs rgyas kyi mchod rten dang /dge 'dun gyi gnas khang dang /lam srang na 'dug pa'i bong ba 'am/rdo ba 'am/tsher ma 'am/
299a3(mdo sde): mi gtsang ba med par byas pas na/de'i rgyu de'i rkyen gyis spu re re g.yas phyogasu 'khyil ba'i mtshan dang ldan par gyur pa yin no//pha rol po gzhan dag la zas dang /skom dang //
299a4(mdo sde): rgyan dang /de las sogs pa byin zhing zhe sdang gi sems med pas na/de'i rgyu de'i rkyen gyig ser btso mi'i mdog dang ldan pa dang /'od rtag pa'i mtshan gnyis dang ldan pa yi no//tsaM
299a5(mdo sde): las kyi ba spu'i khung bu re re nas/s+phu re re skyes pa'i mtshan dang ldan zhe na/las kyi rgyu las gyur te/lus kyi rgyu de nyid kyis lus gnyen zhing 'jam la/rdul dang dri mas mi gos
299a6(mdo sde): pa'i mtshan dang ldan pa yino//sems can dag la dgos pa'i zang zing rgyan tu gtong bas na/de'i rgyu de'i rkyen gyis gnas bdun mnyam par gang ba'i mtshan dang ldan pa yin//badrag
299a7(mdo sde): gis nga rgyal dang dregs pa bcom nas/rang bzhin gyi mnyen zhing nges pa'i sems kyis/sems can gyi yid dang sbyor te chos bzhin du spyod la/mi dge ba'i tshes spangs pa'i
299b1(mdo sde): phyir/dge ba'i chos ston nas/de'i rgyu de'i rkyen gyis ro stod ri dgas kyi rgyal po sIng+ge lta bu'i mtshan dang /smin mtshams dang sgrog rus mnyam par gang ba'i mtshan dang /sor mo ring ba'i man+ta
299b2(mdo sde): dodang /lus kyi mtha' yang zhing 'jam pa'i mtshan dang ldan pa yin no//phra ma yongasu spangs te rtsod cing 'khon pa'i bsdums byas pas/de'i rgyu de'i rkyen gyis so bzhi bcu dang ldan pa'i
299b3(mdo sde): mtshan dang /so'i thugs bzang ba'i mtshan dang /so mnyam pa'i mtshan dang ldan pa yi no//'dod pa'i khams kyi byams pa bsgoms pas/de'i rgyu de'i rkyen gyis so dkar ba'i mtshan

299b5(mdo sde): bu gcig pa bzhin nam 'dra bar lta bas/de'i rgyu de'i rkyen gyis ro bro ba'i mchog gi mtshan dang ldan pa yin no//sems can la bla na med pa'i chos kyi ro rtag tu gtong zhing brjed/
299b6(mdo sde): cing mi dran pa la yang dran par byas te/bdag kyang tshul khrims lnga srung la/gzhan yang bsrung bar bskul zhing byams pa'i sems kyis chos kyi sbyin pa chen po byas na/de'i rgyu/
299b7(mdo sde): de'i rkyen gyis sha'i gtsug tor gyi mtshan dang lce ring zhing yengs pa'i mtshan dang ldan pa yino//bden pa'i tshig dang /chos kyi dga' ba'i tshig dang /mnyes zhes pa'i tshig smra'o//
300a1(mdo sde): dus ma yin pa'i chog ma smra bas/de'i rgyu de'i rkyen gyis tshangs pa'i dbyangs dang ldan pa yino//snying rje'i sems bsgoms pas sems can rnams la ba ma lta bur//
300a2(mdo sde): lta bas de'i rgyu de'i rkyen gyis mig mthon thing ltar 'dug pa dang /mig khyu mchog gi rgyal po lta bu'i mtshan dang ldan pa yino//skyon dang ldan pa'i legs pa ma bcabs shing bstod
300a3(mdo sde): cing bsngags pas/de'i rgyu de'i rkyen gyis mdzod spu dkar po'i mtshan dang ldan pa yin no//mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis 'di dag gi rgyu dang rkyen so sor bshad mod kyi/de'i rgyu/
300a4(mdo sde): de'i rkyen yang dag pa ni tshul khrims dang brtson 'gruso//de ci'i phyir zhe na/gal te tshul khrims ma bsrungs brtson 'grus ma spyad na/mi'i lus kyang thob par mi nus na/mtsho
300a5(mdo sde): sum cu rtsa gnyis thob pa lta smos kyang ci dgos/spyi gtsug bltar ma snang ba dang /shi'i gtsub tor gyi mtshan gnyis la tha dad pa med do//gzhan yang ci byed do cag la gcig
300a6(mdo sde): tu ma nges te/'gyod pa'i sems med na/de'i rgyu de'i rkyen gyis rkang 'thil mnyam par gang ba'i mtshan 'thob pa//de yang sems rtse gcig tu byas na/de'i rgyus 'khor lo'i
300a7(mdo sde): rtsibs stong dang ldan pa'i mtshan dang /mtshan gsum pa dang /bzhi pa dang /sor mo'i bar 'brel pa dang /gnas bdun mnyam par gang po dang /mnyen zhing 'jam pa dang //
300b1(mdo sde): phrag pa zlum pa dang /sgrog rus gang ba dang /lus drang ba dang /lce ring zhing yangs pa'i mtshan dang ldan pa yin no//nga yang bya ba rtag tu byas na/de'i rgyus sor mo ring ba'i mtshan dang
300b2(mdo sde): lag pas pus mo slebs pa dang /'od rtag pa 'dom gang gi mtshon dang /so thags bzang zhing ye yo med pa'i mtshan thob bo//bya bo yongasu dag par byas na/de'i rgyus mtshan lhag
300b3(mdo sde): ma gzhan rnams thob par 'gyur ro//gzhan yang sems can dag la dge ba 'ba' zhig gi sems spyad skyed pas de'i rgyus rga lag mnyen zhing 'jam pa dang /lkugs pa mnyen zhing 'a
300b4(mdo sde): pa rdul dang dri mas mi gos pa'i mtshan thob bo//rim gyis bsgom zhing spyod pa dang /dus bzhin du bskam shing spyod pas/de'i rgyus gnyis pa dang /gsum pa dang /bzhi pa'i
300b5(mdo sde): mtshan thob bo//dge ba'i chos bsgom pa la mos shing 'gyod pa'i sems med pas de'i rgyus lus kyi mdog gser lta bu dang /'od rtog pa dang /so dkur ba dang /smin mtshams kyi/
300b6(mdo sde): mdzod spu'i mtshan thob po//bstod cing sngags na yang nga rgyal mi skye la/bdag gi legs pa bcabs ta rlom sems med nA/de'i rgyus rta lte bur mtshan sbub su nub pa'i mtshan
300b7(mdo sde): thob//dge ba'i las ci byas pa byang chub tu bsngos na/de'i rgyus po spu lung bu ra re nas smra ba'i mtshan dang //ba spu gyen du nyal ba dang /so bzhi bcu dang ldan pa dang /ro bro ba'i
301a1(mdo sde): mchog gi mtshan thob bo//rtag tu brtson 'grus byas na de'i rgyus 'gram pa'i lha nga zlum pa dang /lus kyi stod seng ge lta bu'i mtshan thob bo//sems can thod/
301a2(mdo sde): la bu gcig pa dang 'dra bar sdug par bsams pas/de'i rgyus so thags bzang ba dang /mig mthon thing du 'dug pa dang /mig khyu mchog gi rgyal po lta bu'i mtshan thobo///
301a3(mdo sde): dge ba'i chos sgrub pa la skyo zhing ngal ba'i sems med pas/mtshan lhag ma gzhan rnams thob po//byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po mtshan nyid la spyod cing
301a4(mdo sde): gnas pa'i tshe/mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis kyi las byed do//rnam par dag pa'i spyod pa la gnas pa'i tshe/mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis yod mod kyi/yongasu rdzogs pa'om
301a5(mdo sde): gsal ba ma yino//spyad pa bcu gsum pa la gnas pa na/mtshan rnams kyang mngon/gsal bar yongasu rdzogs//sangs rgyas kyi chos kyis mtshan grangs med mod kyi//
301a6(mdo sde): sems can rnams la mi 'thun te/rab dang 'i brang dang tha ma yod pas bsam gyis mi khyab pas/de bas na sangs rgyas kyi sa mtshan bzangs sum cu rtsa gnyis gsungs//
301a7(mdo sde): sems can thams cad kyi bsod nams ji tsam yod pa phyogs gcig tu bsdus te spungs nas/de bzhin gshegs pa'i ba spu gcig gi mtshan dang mnyam mo//
301b1(mdo sde): ba spu'i khung bu thams cad kyi bsod nams ji snyed gcig yod pa cig tu bsdus te spungs na/dpe byad bzang po gcig dang mnyamo//dpe byad bzang po ji tsam yod pa'i bsod
301b2(mdo sde): nanums ji skad yod pa de las brgya 'gyur du byas na/mtshan gcig dang mnyam ste/smin mtshams kyi mdzod spu dkar po'i mtshan dang /spyi gtsug mo chen bltar mi snang ba'i mtshan ni ma gtogs
301b3(mdo sde): so//de ma yin pa mtshan gzhan thams cad gcig tu bsdus te stong 'gyur du byas na/mtshan gong ma gnyisu 'gyur ro//mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis dang /dpe byad bzang po brgyad cu po'i bsod
301b4(mdo sde): nams ji snyed yod pa gcig tu bsdus spungs te/khri phrag stong 'gyur du byas pa dang /de bzhin gshegs pa'i 'brug sgra lta bu'i dbyangs zab cing rgyang ring por grags pa'i mtshan dang
301b5(mdo sde): mnyam ste/gsung sgra de nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing tshad med mtha' yas bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i rdul phra rab snyed du glegs shing sems can gyi don du byams pa dang /snying rje chen po
301b6(mdo sde): spyod pas/drin shes pa dang /drin bsab pa dang /'di ni bsam gyis mi khya'o//de ltar mtshan dang dpe byad bzang po de dag re res kyang /so so'i skye bo tshad med grangs med pa bye ba
301b7(mdo sde): brgya stong gis chen po'i rdul phra rab snyed la phan pa dang /bde ba'i don byas nas/byang chub tu sems bskyod du bcu go/de ltar mthar gyis bsgrub po yongasu rtogs nas/mtshon dang
302a1(mdo sde): dpe byad bzang po rnam pa gnyis thob ste/mtshan dang dpe byad bzang po yongasu rdzogs nas/byang chub kyi shing drung du song ste/bdud kyi dpung rnams btul te mngon par sabyas nas//
302a2(mdo sde): yang dag par chos kyi 'khor lo bskor to//so so'i skye bo la phan pa dang bde ba'i don tu/'dod pa'i chu klung las bsgral nas/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i 'gram du bkod do//sems can thaMd
302a3(mdo sde): la phan pa dang /bde ba'i don yongasu rdzogs par byas//bcom ldan 'das kyis kun dga' bo dang /byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po la sogs te/'khor mang po thams cad la 'di
302a4(mdo sde): skad ces bka' stsal to//rigs kyi bu dag khyed rnams la su zhig sangs rgyas kyi bka' drin rtag tu gzo zhing dam pa'i chos bsrungs pa'i phyir/thabs mkhas pa chen po'i mdo sde drin lan
302a5(mdo sde): bsab pa'i mdo sde shin tu zab mo 'di/glegs bam du bri ba dang /klog pa dang //kha ton byed par 'gyur/su zhig gis phyi ma'i dus ngan pa'i tshe/brtson 'grus chen po bskyed/bla na med pa lnga
302a6(mdo sde): dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub 'di bsrung zhing gzungasu 'dzin par 'gyur/su zhig goso chos bsrung ba'i phyir/mdo sde 'dri rgyas par spel zhing sems can thams cad la phan pa dang /bde ba
302a7(mdo sde): byed par nus shes bka' stsal pa dang /de'i tshe 'khor de nyid na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po khri brgyad stong snyed 'dug pa las langs te/gos chags bcos nas bla gos phyogs
302b1(mdo sde): gcig tu gzar nas pus mo g.yas pa'i ldeng sa la tsugs thal mo sbyar ba btud nas sangs rgyas kyis 'di skad ces gsol to//bcom ldan 'das bdag cag gis slad ma'i dus ngan pa'i
302b2(mdo sde): che/bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub 'di bsrung zhing dam pa'i chos gzungasu bzung ste/sems can mang po la phan pa'i don byed par spro'o//de nas byang chub sems dpa'
302b3(mdo sde): seng ges 'di skad ces gsol to//bcom ldan 'das bdag kyang thabs rnam pa sna tshogs kyis sems can rnams yongasu bsdu bar spro'o//byang chub sems dpa' rdo rjes gsol pa/sem+b+ha swA
302b4(mdo sde): gang ngan 'gro gsum du ltung bar gyur pa dag bdag gis ci nas kyang mi lang bar bgyi bar spro'o//byang chub sems dpa' 'jam dpal gyis gsal ba/sems can gyi rnams ci dang ci
302b5(mdo sde): 'dod pa bdag gis thams cad yongasu rdzogs par bgyi bar spro'o//byang chub sems dpa' ye shes rgyal mtshan gyis gsol pa/bdag gis ni sems can rnams la yis chen po'i chos kyi
302b6(mdo sde): rgyal mtshan sbyin par bgyi bar spro'o//byang chub sreda'i chos kyi rgyal mtshan gyis gsol pa/bcom ldan 'das bdag gis ni sems can rnams la ches yongasu sbyin par spro'o//byang chub sode'i nyi
302b7(mdo sde): 'od kyis gsol pa/bcom ldan 'das bdag gis ni sems can rnams la bde ba sbyin par spro'o//byang chub sede'i zla 'od kyis gsol pa/bcom ldan 'das bdag ni son rnams la bsod nams kyi lu
303a1(mdo sde): byed du gzhug par bskul bar smra'o//byang chub sems dpa' dge sbyong gsol pa/bcom ldan 'das bdag ni sems can rnams la thams cad bag med pa la mi gnas byuR+Ya
303a2(mdo sde): bskul bar spro'o//byang chub sems dpa' blo gros mi zod pas gsol pa/bcom ldan 'das bdag ni sems can thams cad la zad mi shes pa'i dbyings kyi don mthong bar bstan par spro'o//
303a3(mdo sde): byang chub sems dpa' zla 'od bus gsol pa/bcom ldan 'das bdag ni sems can thams cad bla na med pa'i bde ba'i sbyin pa bgyi bar spro'o zhes/byang chub sems dpa' de
303a4(mdo sde): dog so so nas dam bcas so//byang chub yongasu brgyan cing /sems can thams cad la phan zhing bde ba dang /sangs rgyas kyi bka' drin dran zhing /sangs rgyas kyi bka'
303a5(mdo sde): drin bsab pa'i phyir/bstan los sangs nas thul mo sbyar ba btud de/sangs rgyas mdo sde 'di bdag cag la brjod du gsol/zhes gsol to//de'i tshe tshe dang
303a6(mdo sde): ldan pa kun dga' bos/'di skad ces gsol to//bcom ldan 'das mdo sde 'di'i mtshan ci zhes bgyi/ji ltar yongs su gzung bcom ldan 'das kyis kun
303a7(mdo sde): dge' bo la bka' stsal pa/mdo sde 'di'i ming dge ba'i dngos po kun bsdu ba zhes kyang bya/thabs mkhas pa chen po zhes kyang bya/dgongs pa dam pa'i spyod pa zhes
303b1(mdo sde): da d+h+ya/sangs rgyas drin lan bas pa pa zhes kyang bya'o//bcom ldan 'das kyis kun dga' bo dang /byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pa rnams
303b2(mdo sde): 'di skad ces ka'i sprul to//khyed rnams hU~M sgyur bstan du bzhin du nan tan du skye sdigasangs rgyas kyi/yongs sa
303b3(mdo sde): dadas ba'i le'u 'di bstan/nyan thos bdun khri nyes ste gsablo na med pa'i byang chub tu snrums bskyed par gyur to//

303b7(mdo sde): sa rgyas drin lan bas pa ba zhes bya ba'i ma gas/rgyun ga las mengad du 'gyur ba la 'gyur gas patshad ma byas pa/
304a1(mdo sde): bod skad du/'phags pa legs nyes kyi rgyu dang 'bras bu bstan pa zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo//sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la
304a2(mdo sde): phyag 'tshal lo//'di skad bdag gis thos pa gcig na/bcom ldan 'das rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dgo' ra ba na bzhugaso//de'i tshe bcom
304a3(mdo sde): ljon 'das byang chub sems dpa' tshad med pa dang /lha dang mi'i 'khor mang pos yongs su bskor cing /sems rtse gcig tu chos nyan pa dag la chos ston par mdzad do//
304a4(mdo sde): dri nas tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos sems can rnams kyi ched du/bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to//bcom ldan 'das da ltar 'jig rten na rnam pa gcig tu
304a5(mdo sde): mir skyes par mtshungs pa la/kha cig ni sdug cing kha cig ni byad bzhin mi sdug pa dang /kha cig ni dpa' zhing /kha cig ni zhen pa dang /kha cig ni dbul zhing /kha cig
304a6(mdo sde): ni phyug pa dang /kha cig ni sdug bsngal zhing /kha cig ni bde ba dang ldan pa dang /kha cig ni yo rab su gyur cing /kha cig ni ma rabs gyur te/sgra dbyangs mi mtshugs shing
304a7(mdo sde): skad tha dad par gyur pa dang /kha cig ni lo brgyar lon kyang 'chi bar mi 'gyur la/kha cig ni lo sum cu lon nas sngar mgum pa dang /kha cig ni lo bco lnga lon nas glo bur 'chi ba
304b1(mdo sde): dang /kha cig ni ma'i mngal nyid du 'gum pa dang /kha cig ni byad bzhin sdug cing mdzes pa dang /kha cig ni dbul zhing ma rab su gyur la byad bzhin mi sdug pa dang /kha cig ni phyag
304b2(mdo sde): cing ya rab su skye ba dang /kha cig ni dpa' zhing dman par gyur la/kha cig ni zhan cing rigs mthon por skyes pa dang /kha cig ni sdug bsngal zhing tshe ring po/kha cig ni bde zhing tshe
304b3(mdo sde): thung ba dang /kha cig ni dge ba spyod kyang //nongs skyon dang bcas par 'gyur la/kha cig ni sdig pa bgyis kyang bsod nams kyi phan yon thob pa dang /kha cig ni tsho zhing dkar yang

304b5(mdo sde): zhing bong chen yang gzhan dag gi g.yog bgyid pa dang /kha cig ni bu tsha myong la/kha cig ni gcig pu gnas pa dang /khe cig ni slad rol du rgyu zhing bkres pa dang /grang ba dag gi
304b6(mdo sde): nyen par 'gyur/kha cig ni khyim na gnas kyang gos zas drug la dga' 'byor pa dang /kha cig ni gzhon pa'i tshe dbul zhing phongs la/rgas pa'i tshe gdod phyug por 'gyur ba dang /
304b7(mdo sde): kha cig ni yus ma mchis bzhin du yang /nongs pa ma mchis par nan gyis go rar sprul pa dang /kha cig ni pha ma yang snying rje dang ldan pa/bu yang sri zhu che zhing mdo sde dang gtsug lag
305a1(mdo sde): gdon gleng bar bgyid la/kha cig ni po nu bos sor phye nas 'thab cing rjod par bgyid pa dang /kha cig ni khang khyim dag brtsigs nas/'byor pa sna tshogs dang
305a2(mdo sde): ldan la/kha cig ni khang khyim ma mchis pas/gzhan dag le rten pa dang /kha cig ni bya 'dab chags bzhin du shing dang bang la glonas pa dang /kha cig ni gcan zan gyi rnam pa dang
305a3(mdo sde): mtshungs shing spu'i gos dang ldan pa zas su rtsa 'tshang zhing khrag 'thung ba dang /kha cig ni yi ge ma 'tshal ba dang /kha cig ni ci yang ma bgyis par bden par rnam par smin
305a4(mdo sde): pa myang bar 'gyur la/kha cig ni sla bar bgyid pa'i gnas kyang mi rnyed pa dang /kha cig ni dbang po gsal bas shes pa dang ldan la/kha cig ni dbang po mi gsal bas shes

305a6(mdo sde): dbul por gyur kyang gtong ba la dga' ba dang /kha cig ni tshig smras pa rnams mnyen zhing des la/kha cig ni tshig smras pa rnams gtum zhing brlang ba dang /kha cig ni mang
305a7(mdo sde): po kun gyis bkur zhing snying du sdug par 'gyur la/kha cig ni mang po kun gyis thag ring du spong bar bgyid pa dang /kha cig ni byams pa'i sems kyis srog chags gso ba
305b1(mdo sde): bgyid la kha cig ni srog chags dpag tu ma mchis pa dag gsod par bgyid pa dang /kha cig ni yangs pa mang po kun gyis yid du mchi bar 'gyur la/kha cig ni gzhan dag bre spong

305b3(mdo sde): ba dang /kha cig ni mdo sde thos nas gnyid log bgyid pa dang /kha cig na dpa' zhing rtsal dang ldan yang zhes ma mchis la/kha cig ni tshig 'bru dang don dag la slob par mos pa dang
305b4(mdo sde): kha cig ni dud 'gro'i dbyibs tha dad pa sna tshogs bgyis pade dag gda' na/bcom ldan 'das de dag gis 'bras bu gang lags pa rgya cher bkas ba shad du gsol/'khor mang po
305b5(mdo sde): rnams kyis thos shing rtogs par 'gyur la sems rtse gcig tu dge tshwa la gzhol bar 'gyur pa lagaso//bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/kun dga' bo khyod kyis ji
305b6(mdo sde): skad dris pa de de bzhin te/rnam par smin pa myong bar mi mtshungs par gyur pa de dag thams cad ni/tshe rabs snga ma dag la sems can spyod pa mi mnyam pa'i dbang pos na/
305b7(mdo sde): tha dad pa'i bye brag brgya stong mang po myong bar gyur pa yin te/tshe 'di la byad bzhin sdug pa gang yin pa de ni/bzod pa dang du blangs pas las 'ongs pa yino//byad mi sdug pa
306a1(mdo sde): yin pa da ni 'khang khro ba las 'ong ba yin no//mir gyur kyang dngul por gyur pa gang yin pa de ni/ser sna byas pa las 'ongs pa yin//mir gyur kyang phyug par gyur/
306a2(mdo sde): pa gang yin pa de ni/sbyin pa btang ba las 'ongs pa yino//ya rabs mthon por gyur pa gang yin pa de ni/gzhan dag lo gus par phyag byas pa las 'ongs pa yin//ma rab su
306a3(mdo sde): gyur pa gang yin pa de ni/nga rgyal byas pa las 'ongs pa yin no//mir gyur kyang lus ring zhing bong che ba gang yin pa de ni/gus pas bkur bsti byas pa las 'ongs pa yino//

306b1(mdo sde): chos thos par mi dga' ba las 'ongs pa yin no//mir gyur kyang so rnon por gyur pa gang yin pa de ni/rung ba 'cha' zhing sha za ba las 'ongs pa yino//mir gyur kyang sna dgye bor gyur pa

306b4(mdo sde): dag gi rna ba phug pa las gyur pa yin no//mir gyur kyang lus kyi sha brur lta bur gyur pa gang yin pa de ni/gos yang zhing srab pa dag bgos nas/de nas de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku
306b5(mdo sde): gzugs kyi spyan sngar 'ongs pa las gyur pa yin no//mir gyur kyang mdog gnag pa gang yin pa de ni/de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gzugs khyams dag gi 'og tu bzhag nas dud pa
306b6(mdo sde): bdug pa las gyur pa yin//mir gyur kyang rkang lag zha bor gyur pa gang yin pa de ni/mkhan po dang bla ma rnams mthong yang ldang ba med pa las gyur pa yin//mir gyur kyang skur par
306b7(mdo sde): gyur pa gang yin pa de ni/gos yang zhing srab pa dag bgos nas/phan tshun du 'gro ba'ide bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gzugs la rgyab kyis phyogs pa las gyur pa yin no//
307a1(mdo sde): mir gyur kyang bral ba mi sdug pa gang yin pa de ni/de bzhin gshegs pa mthong ba'i tshe phyug kyang mi byed la/lag pas 'phral bar brdabs pa las gyur pa
307a2(mdo sde): yin no//mir gyur kyang gnya' ba thung ba gang yin pa de ni/bla ma dag mthong nas mgo sbas te bros nas 'byol ba las gyur pa yin//ser gyur kyang rtag par steng na ba gang yin
307a3(mdo sde): pabade ni/sems can gyi lus kyi yan lag bcad cing btubs pa las gyur pa yin no//mir gyur kyang mje can du gyur pa gang yin pa de ni/nyes pa med par gzhan dag
307a4(mdo sde): ge nor blangs pa las gyur pa yin//mer gyur kyang dbugs thung ba gang yin pa den+ti/dgun grang ba'i dus kyi tshe/gzhan dag la zas grang mo dag byin pa las gyur pa yin//
307a5(mdo sde): mir gyur kyang bu khye'u dang bu mo med par gyur pa gang yin pa de ni/bya mang po dag gi klu gu bsad pa las gyur pa yin//mar gyur nas bu che mang ba gang yin pa de ni/sems
307a6(mdo sde): can gso bar dga' ba las 'ongs pa yin no//mir gyur kyang che ring ba gang yin pa de ni/byams pa'i sems dang ldan pa las 'ongs pa yino//mer gyur nas tshe thung ba gang
307a7(mdo sde): yin pa da ni/srog chags mang po bsad pa las gyur pa yin no//mir gyur nas phyug por gyur pa gang yin pa de ni/sbyin pa btang ba las gyur pa yin no//mir gyur nas rta dang /

308a1(mdo sde): gtsang sbra med pa gang yin pa de ni/phag byas pa las 'ongs pa yino//mir gyur nas glu gar la dga' ba gang yin pa de ni/rol mo mkhan byas pa las 'ongs

308a5(mdo sde): gyur kyang gzhan gyi chung ma la g.yem par dga' ba de ni shi 'phos nas bya ngang pa dag tu ltung bar 'gyur ro//mir gyur kyang bdag dang nye zhing gnyen du 'brel pa dag la g.yem par mngon//

308a7(mdo sde): nas gzhan dag la mi ston pa gang yin pa de ni/shi 'phos nas shing sring dag tu skye bar 'gyuraro//mir gyur nas mda' gzhu thogs shing gzhom paM la mngon par dga' ba
308b1(mdo sde): gang yin pa de ni/shi 'phos nas kla klo can du lhung bar 'gyur ro//rngon pa byed cing srog chags bsod pa la mngon par dga' ba gang yin pa de ni/shi 'phos nas 'phar sprang dag tu ltung bar/

308b4(mdo sde): shi 'phos nas khye'u khra'u byed par 'gyuraro//gzhan gyi tshig zlos shing ku re byed pa mngon par dga' ba do no/shi 'phos nas bya ne co byed par 'gyur ro//phra ma byed pa la mngon par dga'
308b5(mdo sde): ba gang yin pa de ni/shi 'phos nas skal lus po che dag tu skye bar 'gyuraro//nyes pa med par dag la rnam par 'tshe ba gang yin pa de ni/shi 'phos nas sen bu khon du 'dzin pa'i
308b6(mdo sde): sems dang bcas pa dag tu skye bar 'gyur ro//gzhan gyi dbyin byed par dga' ba gang yin pa de ni/shi 'phos nas srin bya dag tu skye bar 'gyur ro//da mod mo'i tshig smra ba la mngon
308b7(mdo sde): par dga' ba gang yin pa de ni/shi 'phas nas wa dag tu skye bar 'gyuraro//gzhan dge sgrog cing mngon par dga' ba gang yin po de ni/shi 'phos nas ri dgas sha ba'i rigasu
309a1(mdo sde): skye bar 'gyur//tshe snga ma la shong gi d+d+ha mgon nas drug cing khang du zhugs pa gang yin pa d+mo ni/tshwa 'di la rta'i rigasu skyo bar 'gyur//rdo ltam byon gtong ba ma/
309a2(mdo sde): mngon par dga' ba gang yin pa de ni/srin bu gnam po'i rig su skye bar 'gyuraro//tshe snum la dge 'dun gyi gargyun dang rang thag yong su spyod pa gang yin pa de metshe 'di la srog
309a3(mdo sde): chags srin bu mgo rdebs pa dag tu skye bar 'gyuraro//tshe sna ma la gzhan dag gi zas kyi dgegs byas na/tshe 'di la shing sbyin byed par 'gyuraro//dge 'dun gyi chu brkus nas yongasu
309a4(mdo sde): spyad pa gang yin pa de ni/tshe 'di la nyo drang chu srin dag tu skye bar 'gyur ro//dge 'dun gyis gzhi dag la mi gtsang ba 'dor ba gang yin pa de ni/gshing ga ci'i nang du srin du
309a5(mdo sde): dag tu skye bar 'gyur//dge 'dun gyi shing te ga brkus pa gang yin pa de ni/'jim rtsub za ba'i srin bu byed par 'gyuraro//dge 'dun gyi bkor brkus pa gang yin pa de ni/
309a6(mdo sde): thag 'dron pa'i glang dang bong bu byed par 'gyur ro//dge 'dun gyi dkor la nan gyis slong zhing sde sbyin byed na/phug ron dkar po byed par 'gyur//dge 'dun la 'phya zhing
309a7(mdo sde): smod par byed na glang gi gnya' ba'i srin bur skye bar 'gyuraro//dge 'dun gyi tshod ldum zos na chod mo'i srin bur skye bar 'gyur ro//dge 'dun gyi khri bstan la 'dug na sa'i srin
309b1(mdo sde): bu mjug ringasu skye bar 'gyur//dge 'dun gyi yo byad sna tshogs dag la yongasu spyod par byed na phye ma lob du skyo bar 'gyur//rus pa dag thogs nas gtsug lag khang du byed na bya ma chu/
309b2(mdo sde): ringasu skye bar 'gyur//dmar rtsi drang dkar rtsi dag mtshu la brkus nas gtsug lagi khang du 'jug par byed ni bye mchu dmar dag tu skye bar 'gyuraro//gos tshun can bgos tog tsug lag
309b3(mdo sde): khang du 'gro bar byed na bya kha dog ser po dag tu skye bar 'gyuraro//khyo shug gtsug lag khang du gnas nas nyal po byas na bya mgo sngon dag tu skye bar 'gyur ro//de bzhin gshegs pa'i
309b4(mdo sde): mchod rten la brdzes ni rnga mo'i lus byed par 'gyur ro//lham bgos te de bzhin gshegs pa'i dri gtsang khang du 'gro bar byed na/sprul par skye bar 'gyuraro//chos nyan pa'i tshe
309b5(mdo sde): blag cor zer na ni bya lce brgya dag tu skyo bar 'gyur ro//dge slong ma gtsang ma sun par byed na/shi 'phos nas sems can dmyal ba'i gnas lcags kyi brag phrag tu ltung zhing
309b6(mdo sde): ril gyi 'khor lo brgya stong du ma gcig tu babs nas lus gcod par 'gyuraro//de nas bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos 'di skad ces gsol to//bcom ldan 'das
309b7(mdo sde): kyis 'di skad gsungs pa lta na dge 'dun gyi rdzas yongasu spyod pa gang lags pa de dag la yang dag par shin tu lci ba zhig lags par gyur na/sbyin bdag bzhi po ji ltar gtsug
310a1(mdo sde): lag khang du mchi zhing bkur bsti dang /phyag 'tshod bar bgyi pa lags/bcom ldan 'dus kyis bka' stsal pa/dge 'dun gyi grwa drug /khang du 'gro ba
310a2(mdo sde): la sems rnam pa gnyis yod de/dge ba'i sems dang /mi dge ba'i sems gang yin pa'o//dge ba'i sems shes bya ba ni ji lta bu zhe na/gang gis gtsug lag khang du
310a3(mdo sde): phyin nas/de bzhin gshegs pa mthong na phyag byed pa dang /dge 'dun mthong na gus par bkur bsti byas nas/mdo sde'i don 'dra bar byed pa dang /sdom pa yang dag par
310a4(mdo sde): blongs nas nyes pa 'chags par byed pa dang /nor rdzas dag yongasu btang nas dkon mchog gsum gyi zhal ta byed pa dang /lus dang srog l-i 'phyangs pa med par chos chen po
310a5(mdo sde): yongasu srung zhing yang dag par 'dzin par byed pa'i gang zag de lta bu dag ni gom pa gcig 'dor bar byed na yang /lha'i gzhal med khang drung du 'ong zhing /ma 'ongs pa na
310a6(mdo sde): khyim bdagi shug de ka bzhin du rnam par smin pa'i 'bras bu myong bar 'gyur ba gang yin pa de ni/skyes bu mchog tu dge ba zhes bya'o//mau dge ba'i sems dang ldan pa ji lta bu
310a7(mdo sde): zhon na sems can la la zhig gi tsug lag khang du 'jug pa'i tshe/dge 'dun la spongs me dang/g.yor po dang sra smyon 'bar shig bya bar sems pa dang /dge 'dun gyi rgyu
310b1(mdo sde): tshal zhing rtse gcig tu rnam par bshig pa 'bar shig tu 'dod pa dang /dge slong dang /dge 'dun gyi zas zos na yang sems la gnod pa ci yang med cing //khur ba dang /shing tog/
310b2(mdo sde): dngad ldam ldum dag khyer nas/rang gi khyim du 'gro bar byed pa'i gang zag de lta bu dag shi 'phros ma thag tu lcags kyi thu lum za ba'i sems can dmyal bar ltung zhing /zangs tu
310b3(mdo sde): nang du btse ba dang /skor ba'i mes bsregs pa dang /ralo 'gri lta bu'i ri lo ma can gyi ljon shing la 'dzeg pa la sogs pa'i sdug bsngal gang yang mi myong ba med par 'gyur te/'di
310b4(mdo sde): ni skyes bu mchog mi dge ba zhes bya'o//bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/kun dga' bo ni ngas ma 'ongs pa'i dus ni slob ma rnams la rjesu bston pa yin gyis/bag yod
310b5(mdo sde): bar bsgrims te/dkon mchog gsum po dag la nyes mi byed pa dang /nur pa'i sems skye ba med par de bzhin gshegs pa'i bka' stsal pa bzhin byed na/de bzhin gshegs
310b6(mdo sde): pa byams pa 'jig rten du byung ba'i tshe/yongasu mya ngan los 'da' bar 'gyur ba the tshom med do//bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/tshe 'di la gzhan gyi lus las gos
310b7(mdo sde): bshus te 'phrog por byed ni/shi 'phos nas grong ba'i sems can dmyal bar ltung ba dang /gzhan yang der gyi srin bur skyes nas 'tshod par 'gyuraro//tshe 'di la sku gzugs dang /
311a1(mdo sde): mdo sde'i spyan sbyar mar me sbar la mngon par mi dga' na/shi 'phos nas ri 'khor yug gi bar na sems can dmyal gnas mun nag yod pa dag tu ltung bar
311a2(mdo sde): 'gyuraro//tsha 'di la sems can gyi srog bcad pas dmyal zhing gtub par byed na/shi 'phos nas sems can dmyal ba mtshon ltar rab tu rto bo'i ril/ral gyi lo mtshan gyi
311a3(mdo sde): ljon shing 'dzeg pa dag tu ltung bar 'gyur ro//tshe 'di la kha cig sdig gtong zhing rngon pa byed par mngon par dga' ba de dag ni/shi 'phos nas sog les 'dra ba'i sems can
311a4(mdo sde): dmyal bar 'gyuraro//tshe 'di la mang du 'dod pas log par g.yem pa gang yin pa de ni/shi 'phos nas zangs kyi ka ba rab tu 'bar ba la 'jug pa dang /lcags kyi khri rab tu
311a5(mdo sde): che ba la nyal ba'i sems can dmyal bar ltung bar 'gyuraro//tshe 'di la chung ma mang po 'chang ba gang yin pa de ni/lcags kyi rang thag tu 'thag pa'i sems can dmyal bar
311a6(mdo sde): ltung bar 'gyuraro//tshe 'di la khyim thub mang po bdog pa gang yin pa de ni/shi 'phros nas sbrul gdug pa gang dang ldan pa'i sems can dmyal bar ltung bar 'gyur/
311a7(mdo sde): 'di la sgong bsregs pa gang yin pa de ni/shi 'angos nas mer mer rab tu tsha ba dang ldan pa'i sems can dmyal bar ltung bar 'gyuraro//tshe 'di la phog dang bya rnams bshu zhing 'jog
311b1(mdo sde): bsnang yin pa na/'bros nas zangs dag tu 'tshod pa'i sems can dmyal ba dag tu ltung bar 'gyur//tshe 'di la phag dang khye rnyog pa 'byin pa gang yin pa de na/
311b2(mdo sde): 'phros nas rdo zur dang ldan pa'i sems can dmyal bar ltung bar 'gyur// 'di la tshang 'ithungs nas rgyas par byas pa gang min pa du ni/'phos nas lcags khu 'dus
311b3(mdo sde): pa'i sems can dmyal bar ltung bar chu rgyu 'di la sems can gyi lus kyi yan lag bcad cing gtubs pa gang yin pa da ni/shi 'phos nas lcags kyi 'khor lo dang ldan pa'i
311b4(mdo sde): sems can dmyal bar ltung bar 'gyuraro//tshe 'di la dge 'dun gyi shing rtog brkus pa gang yin pa de ni/shi 'phos nas lcags kyi thu lum za ba'i sems can dmyal bar ltung
311b5(mdo sde): bar 'gyur//tshe 'di la phag gi rgyu dang sha zos pa gang yin pad ni/'phos nas snron ljin gyis gang ba'i sems can dmyal bar ltung ba tshe 'di la nya gson por zos pa gang yin
311b6(mdo sde): bden/shi 'khos nas mtshan dang /dbyig pa dang /ral gyi saun+tan b+hUm+b+hi ni shing dang ldan pa'i sems can du rgyal bar ltung ba myor// 'di la m+b+ha yar mor gyur nas rlungs
311b7(mdo sde): snga na ma'i bu dag la nor ba byas pa gang yin pa de ni/shi 'phos nas me rab tu 'bar ba'i shing rta dang ldan pa'i sems can dmyal bar ltung bar 'gyuraro//tshe 'di la phra ma byas nas
312a1(mdo sde): dkrugs ma byas pa gang yin pa de ni/shi 'phos nas lcags kyi thong shol gyis rmo ba'i sems can dmyal bar ltung bar 'gyuraro//tshe 'di la mi snyan pas gzhan drag/
312a2(mdo sde): la spyo ba gang yin pa de ni/shi 'phros nas lce rab tu 'byin pa'i sems can dmyal bar ltung bar 'gyuraro//tshe 'di la brdzun mang du smras pa gang yin pa de ni/sha 'phros nas lce
312a3(mdo sde): lcags kyi gzer gyis 'debs pa'i sems can dmyal por ltung bar 'gyuraro//tshe 'di la srog gcad nas log pa'i lha la mchod sbyin byas pa gang yin pa de ni/shi 'phos
312a4(mdo sde): nas lcags kyi rtun gyis brdungs pa'i sems can dmyal bar ltung bar 'gyur ro//tshe 'di la bon po byas nas 'dre 'don gyi tshig 'don cing gzhan dag bslus te nor blangs pa
312a5(mdo sde): gang yin pa de ni/shi 'phos nas sha'i ri lta bu'i sems can dmyal bar ltung bar 'gyur ro//tshe 'di la bon mo byas nas btsums te/sa la nyal nas gzhan dag la mtho
312a6(mdo sde): ris su skye bar 'gyuraro//zhes drang po ma yin pa'i 'dre 'don dag gis len pa gang yin pa de ni/shi 'phos nas rked pa gtubs pa'i sems can dmyal bar ltung bar 'gyuraro//
312a7(mdo sde): tshe 'di la bon mo byas nas gzhan dag gi srog bcad lha 'dre dang lam lnga'i sa'i bdag po dang srin mo la sogs pa la chad pa bcug pa gang yin pa 'di lta bu la sogs pa de dag
312b1(mdo sde): thams cad ni skyes bu blun po rnams 'drid pa gang yin pas/shrI 'phros nus sta res gcod pa'i sems can dmyal bar ltung bar 'gyuraro//sems canA m+b+hal bArar+ya bsrungs ma rnams kyis
312b2(mdo sde): yan lag brjod cing gi tub pe dang /bya lcags kyi sathu can gyis mig gi 'bras bu gnyis la 'jog par 'gyuraro//tshe 'di 'khon po byas nas/mi shi ba'i ri rnams sbed pa dang /28
312b3(mdo sde): khyim rnams kyi bzang duni dang /rigs lnga po rnams kyis khe 'thob pa dang /mi 'thob pa lta ba dang /glu rnams bde bar 'god pa dud/dAr gyi sbyin bu dag la btang dag gtong ba dang /
312b4(mdo sde): sems mnan nas/skyes bu blun po dag la slus te/nor mang po blangs pa dang /brdzun tshig gis bzang dan ston pa gang yin pa de ni/shrI 'phos nas/lcags kyi dra ba can gyi sems
312b5(mdo sde): can dmyal bar ltung por 'gyur bas/bya mdab chags ma rungs pa/tshad med pa sred de'i lus la 'du ste/sha rnams ma lus par zos nas/rus pa dang /rgyas pa rnams
312b6(mdo sde): kyang 'azlog par byed byas/sdug bsngal dpag tu med pa dag myong bar 'gyuraro//tshe 'di la sman pa byas te/nad gso bor mi nus bzhin du gzhan dag bslus te/no blangs pa gang
312b7(mdo sde): yin pa de ni/sho 'phos nas gautar ba dang /me btsas bsregs pa'i sems can dmyal bar lhung bar 'gyur bas/lus la kun tu rab tu 'bar por 'gyuraro//tshe 'di la mchod
313a1(mdo sde): rten dang /gtsug lag khang bshig pa dang /mkhan po dung /slob dpon gyi sgo ba ma nyan pa dang /pha ma la srid zhu med pa gang yin pa de dag ni/shi 'phos nas/
313a2(mdo sde): mnar med pa'i sems can dmyal ba chen po dang /sems can dmyal ba chen po brgyad po dag tu sdug bsngal sna tshogs myong ba dang /gzhan yang sems can dmyal ba chung
313a3(mdo sde): du brgya sum cu rtsa drug po kun tu 'jug cing /bskal pa gcig gam/bskal pa gnyis sam/bskal pa lnga brgya'i bar du sdug bsngal myong nas/de'i 'og tu gdod thar par
313a4(mdo sde): 'gyur te/dge ba'i bshos gnyen dang phrad na ni/byang chub tu sems bskyed par 'gyur la/gal te phrad par ma gyur na ni/spring yang sems can dmyal bar ltung bar 'gyur ro//
313a5(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/mir gyur kyang lus kyi mdo che zhing shin tu mnam pa dang //khro skyo che zhing dgrol dka' ba gang yin pa de ni/rngon gyi rnga mo byas pa las 'ongs
313a6(mdo sde): pa yin no//mir gyur kyang 'gro ba la dgar zhing /zan za ba 'grus pa dang /nyam du bdag la 'byor po med pa gang yin pa de ni/rngon rta byas pa las 'ongs po yin//mir gyur
313a7(mdo sde): kyang grang ba dang /tsha ba dag bzod cing sems la 'dzin pa med pa gang yin pa de ni/rngon blar byas pa las 'ongs pa yin no//mir gyur kyang sgra skad che ba dang /ngo tsha med cing khrim
313b1(mdo sde): med pa dang /sred pa dang /grang ba mang zhing legs nyes kyi bye brag mi phyed pa gang yin pa de ni/sngon gyi bong bu byas pa las 'ongs pa yin//mir gyur kyang rtag par sha la skam zhig/bya ba/
313b2(mdo sde): dag la 'jigs pa med pa gang yin pa de ni/sngon seng gau byis pa las 'ongs pa yino//mir gyur kyang lus ring zhing mig zlum pa dang /'brog dgon pa na mang du rgyu ba dang /bu dang chung na//
313b3(mdo sde): sdang ba gang yin pa de ni/sngon stag byas pa las 'ongs pa yin//mir gyur kyang sran zhing mig chung ba dang /gnas gcig tu gnas par mos pa med pa gang yin pa da ni/sngon bya
313b4(mdo sde): med pa chags byas pa las 'ongs po yino//mir gyur kyang rang bzhin mi brtan zhing srog chags phra mo bsod pa la dga' ba gang yin pa de ni/sngon gyi wa byas pa las 'ongs pa yin//
313b5(mdo sde): mir gyur kyang dpa' zhing bshor ba dang /'dod chags chung zhing chung ma la sred pa med pa gang yin pa de ni/sngon sbyang ki byas pa las 'ongs pa yin//mir gyur kyang gos bzang po
313b6(mdo sde): la mi dga' ba dang /ma yin pa byas pa dag la rtog pa dang /gnyid chung zhing zhe sdang mang ba gang yin pa de ni/sngon khyebs pa las 'ongs pa yino//mir gyur kyang g.yem
313b7(mdo sde): pa la dga' zhing skye bo mang po'i yid du 'ong ba'i gtam brjod pa la mngon par dga' ba gang yin pa de ni/sngon na co byas pa las 'ongs pa yino//mir gyur kyang lus kyi bong chung zhing
314a1(mdo sde): g.yem pa la dga' ba dang /sems rtse gcig tu mi gnas pa dang /gzugs mthong ma thag tu mngon par zhen pa'i sems 'byung ba de ni/sngon bye'u mchil pa byas
314a2(mdo sde): pa las 'ongs pa yino//mir gyur kyang mig dmar zhing so thung ba dang /smra ba'i tshe lbu ba 'byung zhing /nyal na gos kyis lus dkri bar byed pa gang yin pa de ni//sngon gyi
314a3(mdo sde): sbrul dang /rtsangs pa byas pa las 'ongs pa yino//mir gyur kyang smras ma thag tu khong khro zhing pha rol gyi don la so sor mi rtog pa dag gi bdug po 'byin pa gang yin pa de ni/ston
314a4(mdo sde): sdig pa byas pa las 'ongs pa yino//mir gyur kyang gcig pu dben par gnas shing zas la skam pa dang /mtshan mo gnyid chung ba gang yin pa de ni/sngon byi la byas pa las 'ongs
314a5(mdo sde): pa yi no//mir gyur kyang rtsig pa phug nas rkun po byed pa dang /nor la brkam zhing 'khon 'byung sla ba dang /nye ring gi mtshan ma med pa gang yin pa de ni/sngon byi ba byas pa las
314a6(mdo sde): 'ongs pa yino//bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsol pa//mir gyur kyang mchod rten dang /gtsug lag khang bshig pa dang /dkon mchog gsum gyi dkor spos nas/bdag
314a7(mdo sde): nyid kyir yongasu spyod pa gang yin pa de ni/shi 'phos nas sems can dmyal ba chen por gnar med par ltung bar 'gyur ro//sems can dmyal ba las thar bar gyur na yang /dud
314b1(mdo sde): 'gro'i skye gnas kyi lus 'di lta ste/phug ron dang /mchil pa dang /ngur pa dang /ne tso dang /bye'u sngon po dang /nywa dang /rus sbal dang /spre'u dang /ri dwags kyi lus len par
314b2(mdo sde): 'gyur//brgya lam na mi'i lus thob par gyur na yang /ma ning dang /bud med dang /mtshan gnyis pa dang /dbang po med pa dang /smad 'tshong me dag tu 'gyuraro//mir gyur kyang
314b3(mdo sde): khong khro ba dag la mngon par dga' ba de ni/shi 'phos nas sbrul gdug pa dang /stag dang /seng ge dang /do ma dang /dred dang /byi la dang bya khwa'i rnam pa dag tu lhung bar 'gyur ro//
314b4(mdo sde): brgya lam na mi'i lus thob par gyur na yang /khyim bya dang /phag gsod pa dang /shen pa dang /rngon pa dang /bya shor ba dang /brtson srungs byed pa la mngon par dga' bar 'gyur//
314b5(mdo sde): mir gyur kyang glen zhing gti mug pa dang /rigasaM bi'o tshul gang yin pa de shes pa de ni/shi 'phos nas glang po che dang /phag dang /ba lang dang //chu klung dang /sro shig dang /
314b6(mdo sde): sbrang ma dang /sbrang bu mchu rings dang /grog mo la sogs pa'i lus len par 'gyur te/gal te mi'i lus thob par gyur na yang /'on pa dang /long ba dang /lkug pa dang /
314b7(mdo sde): lus kyi yan lag ma tshang ba dang /rgyab sgur ba dang /dbang po ma tshang ba dag tu 'gyur ro//mir gyur kyang khengs shing nga rgyal che ba gang yin pa da ni/shi 'phos nas mi bcing ba'i gnas
315a1(mdo sde): kyi srin bu dang /rnga mo dang /bong bu dang /rta dang /khyi dag tu ltung bar 'gyur te/gal te mir skyes na yang /bran mo'i lus len cing dbul phongs pas slong
315a2(mdo sde): mo byed pa dang /mang po kun gyis brnyas shing smad pa dag tu ltung bar 'gyuraro//mir gyur kyang bla ma'i mthu brnyems pa'i rgyas gzhan gyi nor len pa gang yin pa de ni/shi 'phos nas

317a5(mdo sde): sems bskyed pa'i kha na mtho ba gang yin pa des ni/sems can rnams sems can dmyal ba dang /dud 'gro'i skye gnas dang /gshin rje'i 'jig rten dag tu ltung bar byed de/
317a6(mdo sde): gal te mir skyes na yang rnam par smin pa'i 'bras bu rnam pa gnyis 'thob par 'gyur te/nor la rkum zhing tshig shes pa med pa dang /mang du tshol zhing rtag par yid bzhin du mngon
317a7(mdo sde): par grub par mi 'gyur ba gang yin pa'o//gnod sems kyi kha na ma tho ba gang yin pa de ni/sems can rnams sems can dmyal ba dang /dud 'gro'i skye gnas dang /gsha
317b1(mdo sde): rje'i 'jig rten dag tu ltung bar byed do//gal te mir skyes par 'gyur na yang /rnam par sbyin pa'i 'bras bu rnam pa gnyis myong bar 'gyur te/rtag par gzhan gyis glags tshol bar//
317b2(mdo sde): 'gyur ba dang /rtag par gzhon gyis gnod pa byed par 'gyur ba gang yin pa'i//'og par lta ba'i kho na ma tho ba gang yin pa des ni/sems can rnams sems can dmyal ba dang /dur
317b3(mdo sde): 'gro'i skye gnas dang /gshin rje'i 'jig rten dag tu ltung bar byed do//gal te mir skyes par gyur na yang /rnam par smin pa'i 'bras bu rnam pa gnyis 'thob par 'gyur te/rtag
317b4(mdo sde): par log par lta ba'i khyim dag tu skye bar 'gyur ba dang /semos g.yos dang bcas par 'gyur ba gang yin pa'o//kye sangs rgyas kyi sras rnams de ltar na//sdig pa mi dge ba
317b5(mdo sde): las kyi lam bcu po rnams ni sdug bsngal mang po sna tshogs kyis phung po chen po'i rgyu dang rkyen su gyur pa yino//de nas de'i tshe 'khor 'dus po chen po de nyid du sdom pa mi dge ba'i las bcu
317b6(mdo sde): po dag byas pa gang yin pa de dge bcom ldan 'das kyis sems can dmyal ba'i sdug bsngal gyi rnam par smin pa bkas bshad pa thos pa dang /da dag thams cad skad cher byung ste/
317b7(mdo sde): dus nas/bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to//bcom ldan 'das bdag cag dge ba ji lta bu zhig smad na/sdug bskal 'di dag las thar par 'gyur lags/bcom
318a1(mdo sde): ldan 'das kyis ba/'a stsal pa/sems can thams cad bsod nams kyi las la gzung bar bya ste/ji ltar bsod nams mngon par bsgrub par banon/som
318a2(mdo sde): can gang la la zhig tshe 'di la yongasu bskul ba'i bdag po chen po byas te/de bzhin gshegs pa'i mchod rten dang /d+hi gtsang khung dang /gtsug log khang bye rtsegs nam 'ongs
318a3(mdo sde): pand gdon mi za bar rgyal po byed cing /skye bo mang po la dbang byed par 'gyur bas/gang yang dag minyan pa med par 'gyuraro//tshe 'di grong dang /grong gi gtso bor gyur kyang drang dran
318a4(mdo sde): tshozhing ches bzhin du sbyang bar spyod pa gang yin pa de nI/ma 'das pa ni gdon ma ze bar rgyal po'i blon po byed par 'gyur zhing /gos zas dang /n+ya phun sum chags pa dang /
318a5(mdo sde): 'dod pa 'byor par 'gyur ro//tshe 'di la skye bo mang po bsod nams byed par bskul zhing gzung ba gang yin pa de ni/ma 'ongs pa na/gdon mi za bar tshe rigs btsun zhing shin tu
318a6(mdo sde): phyag pa'i khyim bdag tu 'gyur bar skye'o//mang po kun gyis bkur ba dang /phyogs bcu po dag tu don gnyer ba dag kyang 'grub par 'gyuraro//tshe 'brel mar me gzugs nas mchad
318a7(mdo sde): bo byed pa la mngon par dga' ba gang yin pa de ni/nyi zla ltar skye bar 'gyur bas/'od zer gyis bdag nyid gsal bar byed par 'gyuraro//tshe 'di la sbyin pa gtong de'i dga' ba dang /
318b1(mdo sde): byams pa'i sems kyis srog chags gso ba dga' ba gang yin pa de ni/skyeb thams cad du phyug por 'gyur bas gos pas dag rang 'byung ba 'gyuraro//tshe 'di la skye ba mang po rnams la
318b2(mdo sde): bza' ba dang /btung ba la mngon par dga' ba gang yin pa de ni/skyo ba thams cad du lho'i zas dang 'byung bar 'gyur ba dang /gzugs dang stobs phun sum tshogs pa dang /
318b3(mdo sde): dbang po rno zhing spobs pa dang ldan pa dang /tshe ring bar 'gyur//gang gos dud 'gro'i gnas su song ba'i rnams la sbyin pa yongasu btang na/rnam par smin pa'i 'bras bu brgya 'gyur
318b4(mdo sde): rnyed 'thob par 'gyuraro//'dod chen po dag la sbyin pa yongasu btang na rnam par smin pa stong 'gyur skyed 'thob par 'gyuraro//tshul khrims dang ldan pa'i dge slong la sbyin pa yongasu btad na rnams
318b5(mdo sde): par smin pa khri 'gyur snyed 'thob par 'gyuraro//gang gis thag pa chen po de bzhin gshegs pa'i snying po 'khor mang po la/yang dag par bsgrags nas/sems kyi mig 'byed pa'i
318b6(mdo sde): chos smra ba gang dag la sbyin pa yongasu btang na/rnam par smin pa'i 'bras bu/rgyud med pa snyed 'thob par 'gyuraro//gang gis sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' rnams la sbyin pa
318b7(mdo sde): yongasu btang na/rnam par smin pa'i 'bras bu mthar thug pa med pa snyed la longs spyod par 'gyuraro//gzhan yang gang zag rnam pa gsum la/sbyin pa yongasu btang na/rnam por
319a1(mdo sde): smin pa'i 'bras bu yongs su gtugs par mi 'gyur te/de bzhin gshegs pa rnams dang /pha ma dang /nad pa rnams so//zas za cig tsam yongasu btang bas
319a2(mdo sde): kyang /rnam par smin pa'i 'bras bu tshad med pa snyed 'thob par 'gyur ro//rtag par yongs su btang bas/yongs su gtugs par mi 'gyur ba lta smos kyang ci dgos/tshe 'di la dge
319a3(mdo sde): 'dun mang po'i sku bsil ba gang yin pa de ni/skye ba thams cad du byad bzhin sdug cing mdzes pa dang /rang bzhin gos zas dang ldan pa dang /skye bo mang po la kun gyis bkur bar
319a4(mdo sde): 'gyur//tshe 'di la bsngags pa brjod pa dang /mdo sde'i chos klog cing kha ton du 'dod par dga' ba gang yin pa de ni/skye ba'i gnas thams cad du sgra dbyangs snyan cing thos pa
319a5(mdo sde): /rnams rab tu dga' bar 'gyuraro//tshe 'di la tshul khrims bsrung bar mngon par dga' ba gang yin pa de ni/skye ba thams cad du byad bzhin sdug cing mi'i nang na mchog tu
319a6(mdo sde): 'gyuraro//tshe 'di la lam gar khron pa brkos nas skyed shing btsugs nas grib ma mang po kun la bsgribs par mngon par dga' bo gang yin pa de ni/skye ba thams cad du mi'i
319a7(mdo sde): rgyal po byed cing ro brgya dang ldan pa'i bza' ba dang /btung ba bsams pa tsam gyis 'byor par 'gyur//tshe 'di la mdo sde bres te gzhan dag la byin nas/klog tu bcug pa la
319b1(mdo sde): mngon par dga' ba gang yin pa da ni/skye ba thams cad du bdag spobs pa gang po dang ldan pa dang /chos bslabs pa la lan cig thos pa tsam gyis go bar 'gyur ba dang /sangs rgyas dang byang
319b2(mdo sde): chub sems dpa' rnams kyis byin gyis rlob cing /yongasu bsrung ba dang /rtag par mi'i nang du mchog dam pa gtso bo byed par 'gyur ro//tshe 'di la zam pa dang /gru gzings bcas
319b3(mdo sde): nas skye bo mang po zlos par mngon par dga' ba gang yin pa de ni/skye ba thams cad du rin po che sna bdun phun sum tshogs pa dang /skye bo mang po kun gyis bkur zhing bsngags pa brjod nas
319b4(mdo sde): mngon par dga' ba dang phan tshun 'gro zhing 'ong ba'i tshe mang po kun gyis bsnyen bkur dang rim gro byed par 'gyuraro//bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/kun dga' bo ngas ji skad du
319b5(mdo sde): mdo sde de dang de dag tu rgyu dang 'bras bu bstan nas/sems can mang po rnams klag pa dang /kha ton du 'dzin pa dang mngon par bsgrub par bskul ba sdug bsngal gyis bgegs las yongasu
319b6(mdo sde): bzlas pa de bzhin du 'dir yang de ltar bstan pa yin pas/gang la la zhig gis chos kyi rnam grangs 'di thos nas skur ba 'debs par byed pa de ni tshe 'di nyid la lce'i dbang po ltung
319b7(mdo sde): bar 'gyuraro//de nas bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos 'di skad ces gsol to//bcom ldan 'das chos kyi rnam grangs 'di'i ming ci lags/ci ltar yongasu gzung bar
320a1(mdo sde): bgyid bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/kun dga' bo chos kyi rnam grangs 'di ni legs nyes kyi rgyu dang 'bras bu bstan pa zhes bya ste/byang chub sems
320a2(mdo sde): dpa'i spyod pa mngon par sgrub par smon lam btab pa zhes bya bar yang zung shig/bcom ldan 'das kyis chos kyi rnam grangs 'di bstan pa na/lho dang mi stong phrag brgyad cu
320a3(mdo sde): bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed par gyur to//bud med brgya stong du mtsho 'di nyid la bud med kyi dbang po gyur nas/skyes pa'i lus mngon par grub
320a4(mdo sde): par gyur to//sdig pa spyod pa'i skye dgu stong nyis brgya ni/gdog pa'i sems spangs nas/bdag gi tshe rabs dran par gyur to//dge ba spyod pa'i skye bo tshad med pa dag ni mi skye
320a5(mdo sde): ba'i bzod pa thob nas/rtag par bde ba myong bar gyur to//tshe 'pho bar 'gyur ba tshad med pa snyed ni sangs rgyas kyi zhing yong su dag par skyes nas/byang chub sems dpa' rnams
320a6(mdo sde): dang mnyam zhing mtshungs pa'i grogasu gyur to//bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas/'khor 'dus pa thams cad rang gi gnas su dong ste/bsod nams mngon
320a7(mdo sde): par 'du byed cing /rab tu dga' bos dga' bzhin du spyod par gyur to//'phags pa legs nyes kyi rgyu dang 'bras bu bstan pa zhes bya ba'i mdo rdzogs so//
320b1(mdo sde): zhu chen gyi lo ts+tsha ba ban d+hu chos grub kyis rgya gar dang rgya'i dpe las bsgyur cang zhus te/gtan la phab pa/rdzogs so///dge ba dang mi dge ba'i las kyi rnam par
320b2(mdo sde): smin pa bstan pa'i mdo//bam po gcig/'di skad bdag gis thos pa'i dus gcig na/bcom ldan 'das mnyan yod na 'dze ta'i tshal sbubs med zas sbyin g+hi kun
320b3(mdo sde): dga' ra ba na/byang chub sems dpa' tshad med pa dang /lha dang mi'i 'khor mang pos bskor nas chos ston cing bzhug so//de nas dga' bos 'gro ba mang po'i don gyi phyir ba
320b4(mdo sde): ldan 'das la 'di skyed ces gsol to//bcom ldan 'das da ltar 'jig rten gyi khams 'dir rigs 'thun pa'i nang 'dir skyes pa las bzang po yang mchis mi sdug pa
320b5(mdo sde): yang mchis/drag po yang mchis zhen pa yang mchis dbul po yang mchos phyug po yang mchis nyon mongs pa yang mchis/bde ba yang mchis btsan pa yang mi chos
320b6(mdo sde): ma rabs kyang mchis/skad ni mi mtshungs tshig ni mi mthun/la la ni lo brgya lon nas mchi ba yang mchis/la la ni sum cu 'am/bcu lon nas mche ba yang mchis/l+ya
320b7(mdo sde): la ni byed bzhin bzang yang dbul la/la la na mi sdug pa la phyag pa yang mchis/nyams rtsal che ba ni ma rabs kyi nang na yang mchis/nyams brtsal chung la gral mtho
321a1(mdo sde): ba yang mchis/la la ni nyon mongs la tshe ring ba yang mchis/la la ni skyid cing tshe thung la la ni legs par spyod pa la byur dang phrad/la la ni mi dge
321a2(mdo sde): ba spyod pa la legs pa'i don du 'gyur ba yang mchis/dkar zhing sha bzang la mi g.yo ba yong mchis/la la ni sngo zhing gnag lo mdangs dang ldan pa yang mchis la la
321a3(mdo sde): ni lus chung zhing thung la snying brtsal dang ldan pa yang mchis//la la ni tshe zhing ring yang gzhan gyi bran g.yog bgyid pa yang mchis/la la ni bu tshe mahA ba yang mchis//
321a4(mdo sde): la la ni rmed ba yang mchis/la la ni rtag par phyi rol tu 'khyam la bkres pa yang mchis/la la ni pho brang gi nang na 'dug cing gos dang zas kyis mi brel te longs
321a5(mdo sde): spyod pa yang mchis/gzhon na dbul zhing rgas na byug cing btsan pa yang mchi sa/drang rkan che zhing 'gal bar mi byed pa las gyong la theg pa yang mchis/pha ni byam
321a6(mdo sde): buM ni sri zhu che ste/gtsug bag gi yi ge dang gzhung smos shing bshad pa yang mchis/spun mi mthun nas rtsod pa yang mchis/gnas mtho zhing yo byad rnam pa sna tshogs
321a7(mdo sde): su ldan pa yang mchis/bdag gi khyim med la 'dron thab su gnas pa yang mchis/bya dang /ri dgagos dang /gcan zan dang 'dra bar gnas pa yong mchis/gosu
321b1(mdo sde): bal gos bon zhing zasu sha za zhing yi ge mi shes pa yang mchis/mi g.yo bar 'dug kyang skyid cing yon tan thob pa yang mchis/glu za zhing gnas pa yang mchis yid gzhungs shing /
321b2(mdo sde): khong grol ba yang mchis rmongs shin kun la ngan pa yang mchis/brtsal te ma rnyed po yang mchis/ma btsal te rnyed pa yang mchis/phyug cing btsan la nor dang ldan la
321b3(mdo sde): ser sna che ba yang mchis/dbul la sbyin pa lnga sred pa yang mchis/tshigs smra na bden zhing mnyen par zer ba yang mchi sna/tshig sman gzer ba bzhin du zug pa yang mchis//
321b4(mdo sde): gzhan gyis byams shing bkur ba yang mchis/kun gyis spangs shing bsrings pa yang mchis/snying rje'i sems kyis sems can gso ba yang mchis/bag med par srog
321b5(mdo sde): gcod pa yang mchis/khyod yangs shing kun dang mthun pa yang mchis//kun gyis mi 'dod pa yang mchis/mna' ma dang sgyug mor mthun pa yang mchis/chag pa mo dang mdza'
321b6(mdo sde): ba yang mchis/la la ni chos kyi gtam la dga' ba yang mchis/la la ni mdo sde thos nas gnyid bro ba yang mchisu/la la ni brdal bag can la 'dzangs pa yang mchis/la
321b7(mdo sde): la ni gtsug lag khang la dga' zhing bsgom pa la 'grubs/la la ni byol song gi gzugs dang mtshungs la la ni ri dgas rnam pa sna tshogasu 'gyur ba yang mchis na/bcom ldan
322a1(mdo sde): 'das kyis rgyu dang 'bras bu rgyas par bsha na 'khor mang po kun gyis thos nas sems rtse gcig tu dge ba'i rjesu phyogs par 'gyur lagaso//bcom ldan 'das
322a2(mdo sde): kyis bka' stsal pa/dga' bo khyod kyis ji ltar rnam par smin pa mi 'dra bar 'dri ba de bzhin du/de dag kun kyang tshe rabs snga ma la spyod pa mi thun pas de'i phyir na khyad par sna tshogasu gyur
322a3(mdo sde): to//de la de ltar byad bzhin bzang po ni bzod pa las 'ongaso//mi gdug pa ni zhe sdang dang khong khro ba las 'ong so//dbul 'phongs pa ni ser sna la so 'ong so//btsan zhing che ba ni sadra
322a4(mdo sde): chusru la gus par phyag 'tshal ba las 'ongs//mi ma rabs thams cad ni rgyags shing dregs pa las 'ong so//lus ring zhing bzang ba ni bkur sti byas pa las 'ongaso//lus thung
322a5(mdo sde): ba ni chos la le lo byas pa las 'ong so//blun pa ni lug las 'ong so//skam zhing gnag pa ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku bsgribs pa las 'ongs//mchu dma' ba ni chos ston pa'i
322a6(mdo sde): zas la myangs pa los 'ongaso//mig chag bI ni me bslangs pa mi ster ba las 'angaso//mun sros nas mig mi mthong ba ni khwa'i mig brus pa las 'ongaso//lkugs pa ni dam pa'i chos
322a7(mdo sde): la skur pa 'debs pa las 'ongaso//'on pa ni chos thosu mi dga' ba las 'ong so//so sto ba ni rkang dang rus pa la sred pa las 'ongs//sna gnyer ba ni spos mi zhim pa bsregs te
322b1(mdo sde): sangs rgyas la mchod pa las 'ongs//shar ni nya'i mchu phug pa las 'ongaso//skra sar pa ni phag gi spu gtogs pa las 'ongaso//rna ba ngal pa ni rna ba phug pa las 'ong so//thang sbrul 'dra
322b2(mdo sde): ba ni gos mi gtsang ba gon te/sangs rgyas la snyogs pa las 'ongaso//dmas gnag pa ni sangs rgyas kyi sku gzugs khyim mam khyimasu bzhag pa las 'ong so//zhar ba dang skyil po
322b3(mdo sde): ni mkhan po dang /bla ma mthong ste/mi ldang ba las 'ongaso//skur ba ni gos mi gtsang ba gon zhing //sangs rgyas kyi sku la rgyob kyis phyogs pa las 'ongaso//dpal ba 'bur ba ni sangs
322b4(mdo sde): rgyas mthong nas/phyag gus par me 'tshal zhing lag pa dpral bar gtugs pa las 'ongs/'jing ba thung ba ni btsun pa dang /bla ma mthong nas/mgo smad cing byol ba las
322b5(mdo sde): 'ongaso//mchen pa ni pa ni sems can gyi lus gtubs shing btsags pa las 'ong so//mdzes can ni gzhan gyi nor ma 'os par blangs pa las 'ongaso//lung pa mang ba ni dgun
322b6(mdo sde): mi gzhan la zas gang mo byin pa las 'ongaso//bu tshwa med pa ni bya phrug mang po bsad pa las 'ongaso//bu tsha mang ba ni sems can mang po gsos pa las 'ongaso//tshe ring ba ni snying
322b7(mdo sde): rje che ba las 'ongaso//tshe thung ba ni srog gcod pa las 'ongaso//phyug pa ni sbyin pa byas pa las 'ongaso//rta dang /shing rta bdog pa ni/dkon mchog gsum la yon phul ba las
323a1(mdo sde): 'ong so//dbang po rno ba ni slob pa la 'grus pa dang mdo sde/kha ton du byas pa las 'ongaso//rkun pa ni byol song las 'ong so//bran po dang /bran mo byed pa ni
323a2(mdo sde): bu lon ma gzhal ba las 'ong so//spro thung ba ni spre'u las 'ongaso//yang mji can ni dkon mchog gi rten bshig pa las 'ongaso//yan lag ma tshang ba ni sems can gyi rkang lag
323a3(mdo sde): bcad pa las 'ongaso//gdug pa ni sbrul dang /sdig pa las 'ong so//dbang po drug tshang ba ni/tshul khrims bsrungs pa las 'ong so//dbang po drug ma tshang ba ni/tshul khrims
323a4(mdo sde): bshig pa las 'ongaso//gtsang sbra chung ba ni 'phags pa la ma mchod pa las 'ong so//glu gar dang rol mo la dga' ba ni/rol mo mkhan du skye'o//'dod chags che ba ni bya las
323a5(mdo sde): 'ongaso//lbub can ni sgrog pa las 'ong so//kha dman pa ni tshig rtsub mo smra ba las 'ongaso//mtshan dang mi ldan pa ni khyi dang /phag dang /rta'i 'bras bu bton pa las 'ong so//
323a6(mdo sde): lce thung bA ni btsun pa dang bla ma la kha byas pa dang tog tu 'phyas pa las 'ongaso//gzhan gyi chung ma la g.yam pa byas pa ni ngang mo dang /ngur par skye'o//gnyen dgu la g.yog
323a7(mdo sde): byas pa ni bye'u mchil par skye'o//mdo sde dang gtsug lag gi yi ge spyod cing ser snas gzhan la mi gton pha ni tshe'i dus byas nas thang gi srin bur skye'o//mda' gzhu thog
323b1(mdo sde): ba dang /rta zhon pa la dga' bu ni/tshe phyi ma la 'phar ba dang /spyang kIr skye'o//skra thung ba dang /mgo rgyun btags pa la dga' ba ni/tshe phyi ma la sprin bu mchu ring su skye'o//
323b2(mdo sde): nyal zhing za ba la dga' ba ni tshe phyi ma la phag tu skye'o//dar mtshon gyi gos la dga' ba ni bye'u khre'ur skye'o//mi snyan zlos shing /ku re la dga' ba ni bya ne tse ru skye'o//phra ma
323b3(mdo sde): byed pa la dga' ba ni/tshe phyi ma la lto 'phye mgo drug par skye'o//ma 'ongs par ku re byed pa la dga' ba ni/tshe phyi ma la srin bu rmongs par skye'o//gtam ngan skyil ba la
323b4(mdo sde): dga' ba ni tshe phyi ma la srin por skye'o//mau la gnod pa dang ngan du dga' zhing gtam la srid pa ni tshe phyi ma la war spyi'o//mi sdangs pa la dga' ba ni tshe phyi ma la srin bu do log
323b5(mdo sde): tu skye'o//tshe snga ma la shing lham gyon zhing /lha khang du 'gro ba ni tshe phye ma rtar skye'o//tshe snga ma la 'phyen bag med par btang bas ni tshe 'di la sbur par skye'o//tshe sde ma la dge
323b6(mdo sde): 'dun gyi rang 'theg dang /gtun la spyad pa ni tshe 'di la srin bu mgo rdebasu skyo'o//sems can gyi zas la gegs byas pa ni bya shing rta mur skye'o//tshe snga ma la dge 'dun gyi chu
323b7(mdo sde): brkus pas nya dang rus sbal la sogs po chu'i nang na gnas pa'i sems can du skye'o//tshe snga ma la dge 'dun sme bar byas pas ni gtsang sbra'i srin bur skya'o//dge 'dun gyi shing
324a1(mdo sde): tog brkus pas ni mchin pa za ba'i srin bur skye'o//dge 'dun gyi nor brkus pas na/rang 'thag skor ba'i bung bu dang glang du skye'o//dge 'dun gyi nor nan
324a2(mdo sde): gyis bskye brnya byas pas ni bya phug ron du skye'o//dge 'dun la spyo ba byas pas ni glang gi gnya' ba'i srin bur skye'o//dge 'dun gyi ldum skyur zos pas ni ldum bur rtsa ba gang
324a3(mdo sde): gi srin bur skye'o//dge 'dun gyi khri bston pa la 'dug pas no//srin bu mgo dmar du skye'o//dge 'dun gyi nor sna tshogs la spyad pas ni/srin bu 'phye bor skye'o//mgo la
324a4(mdo sde): rus pa'i thur ma ga tur nas lha khang du 'gro na/bya mchu ringasu skye'o//dkar rtsi dang /dmar rtsis byugs taM/lha khang du 'gro na bya skyong kar skya'o//dar mo tshan gyi gos gyon te/lha
324a5(mdo sde): khang du 'gron bya'u sa rur skye'o//khyo shug zhag lon ti/lha khong du nyal na srin bu mgo sngon du skye'o//de bzhin gshegs pa'i mchod rten la 'jug stegs 'cha' zhing 'dug
324a6(mdo sde): pa ni rnga mor skye'o//lham dang /'bog gyen zhing gzhal med khang du 'gro na sbal par skye'o//chos nyan pa'i tshe long gtam zer na bye'u lhan kar du skri'o//dge slong khrims dag
324a7(mdo sde): par la mi gotsang bar bskyed pa ni/lcags kyi sems can dmyal bar skye'o//ral gri 'khor lo khri phrag brgya snyed du char pa lus kyi steng du 'bebaso shing de'i lus gtubs par
324b1(mdo sde): 'gyur ro//de nas dga' bos bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to//bcom ldan 'das kyis ji ltar gsungs pa de ltar dge 'dun gyi nor la spyod pa sdig lci bar gsungs
324b2(mdo sde): gal te de ltar dge ba'i las le phyogs pa dang /sbyin bdag la sogs pa ji ltar gtsug lag khung gi nang du bsti steng brjod pa dang /phyug tshal bar bgyid pa lag
324b3(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/lha khang du 'gro ba la sems rnam pa gnyis yod de/dge ba'i sems dang /mi dge ba'i sem so//de la ji ltar na dge ba'i sems zhes
324b4(mdo sde): bya zhe na/lha khang du phyin pa'i tshe sangs rgyas mthong ni phyag 'tshal zhing /dge 'dun la bkur sti byed cing /mdo sde 'dri 'am/'don nam/khrims nod dam/sdig pa bshag
324b5(mdo sde): pa 'am/dkon mchog gsum gyi spyi nor las sogs pa gtong du mya/sgrog la yang mi chags par dam pa'i chos 'dzin pa ni gom pa gcig bor bas kyang lhar skye bar 'gyuraro//
324b6(mdo sde): ma 'ongs pa'i dus na khyim pa dag tu zhugs te/de dang 'dra ba'i longs spyod dang ldan par 'gyur ro//de ni dge ba'i mchog dang ldan pa yi no//de la gang mi dag pa ni lha khang du
324b7(mdo sde): 'jug pa'i tshe/dge 'dun la slongs mo dang /bskye brta byed pa dang /dge 'dun la skyon chal zhing /blan ka tshol ba dang /dge 'dun gyi zhal zas zos kyang tshim pa med
325a1(mdo sde): c-ing/bza' shing dang /shid tr-I pyA dang /sgyum sbyar la sogs pa/sbyim du khyed ba de sgyu dran+ti shin rgyu dmyal ba'i la b+h+yo au dang /shin tu
325a2(mdo sde): 'bar ba dang /ral gri'i ri dang /ral gri'i shing las sogs pa'i drimyal bar shin tu sdug bsngal len par 'gyuraro//de ni mi dge ba'i mchog ces bya'o//bcom
325a3(mdo sde): ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/dga' bo khyod ma 'ongs pa'i tshe nga'i nye gnas rnams la dkon mchog gsum gyi dkor la ma spyod par 'dug cig cis gros thob
325a4(mdo sde): shig/de ltar ma gyur cig/bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa ltar byas na/sangs rgyas byams pa 'jig rten du 'byung ba'i tshe gdon mi za bar grol lo//bcom ldan 'das
325a5(mdo sde): kyis bka' stsal pa/tshe 'di la gzhan gyi nor 'phrog na/tshe phyi ma la shin tu grang ba'i dmyal bar ltung ngo //der gyi sbyin bur 'gyurate/btso zhing bzhu bar 'gyur ro//
325a6(mdo sde): 'di la sangs rgyas kyi sku gzugs dang mdo sde la mer maM yis snang ba med par byed cing mi dge ba ni kho ra khor yug gi mun nag gi sems can dmyal bar 'gyur ro//tshe 'di
325a7(mdo sde): shan pa byed cing sems can mang po'i srog gcod pa ni ral gri dang /ral gri nags tshal gyi sems can dmyal bar ltung //tshe 'di la khra dang khyi la sogs pa gtong ni
325b1(mdo sde): skyon pa byed pa la dga' ba ni lcags kyi sog le'i dmyal bar ltung //cha 'di la ldog par g.yem pa la dad pa che ba ni zad kyi ka ba dang /lcags kyi khrag gi sems can dmyal bar ltu//
325b2(mdo sde): tshe 'di la chung ma mang du blangs pa ni lcags kyi gtun gyi dmyal bar ltungo //tshe 'di la bud med skyes pa dang mang du nyal ba ni sbrul gdug pa'i dmyal bar ltung ste/tshe 'di la bsreg cing baH/
325b3(mdo sde): ba'i thal ba 'babs pa'i dmyal bar ltung ste/tshe 'ang la phag dang khyi'i spyi gtogs pas ni shin tu bskol ba'i dmyal bar ltung ngo //tshe 'di la phag dang khyi dang rta'i 'bras bu bton pas ni rdo
325b4(mdo sde): zug rngu'i dmyal bar ltu ngo //tshe 'di la chang mang du 'thungs pa myos pazangs khu 'thung ba'i dmyal bar skye'o//tshe 'di la sems can gtubs shing dmyal bas ni lcags kyi 'khor lo'i
325b5(mdo sde): dmyal bar ltung //tshe 'di la dge 'dun gyi shing tog brkus pa ni lcags kyi thu lum gyi dmyal bar ltung //tshe 'di la khyi dang phag gi rgyu ma zos pas ni mi gtsang ba'i dmyal bar ltung bar
325b6(mdo sde): 'gyuraro//che 'di la nya ba shor khas ni ral gri'i nags tshal gyi dmyal bar ltung bar 'gyur ro//tshe 'di la ma yar mo byas te/snga mi'i bu la nai rA ba byed pa ni me'i shing dum gyi dmyal
325b7(mdo sde): bar ltung bar 'gyuraro//tshe 'di la dbyen byed pa ni lcags kyi gshol gyi dmyal bar 'gyuraro//tshe 'di la tshig ngani pos mi le spyod pas ni lce med pa'i ngamyal bar bltu //tshe 'di
326a1(mdo sde): la brdzun zer bya ni lcags kyis gzer bus gzer ba'i dmyal b.raHltung //tshe 'di la srog gcod cing lha'i srin la rjed pas ni lcags kyi bskyung
326a2(mdo sde): bu'i dmyal bar lhung //tshe 'di la bon mo byed cing 'dre ba so//zhes brdzun zer zhing nor len pa ni shel mA ri'i dmyal bar ltung //tshe 'di la bon byed cing mig btsums nas
326a3(mdo sde): khyod kyi bla ma mchod 'os zhes zer zhing sru bo ni rked pa rabatubs pa'i dmyal bar lhung //tshe 'di la bon byed cing srog gcod du bcug ste/lha srin rjed du bcug pa na sta res
326a4(mdo sde): gtubs pa'i dmyal bar lhung ste/bsrungs mas lus gtubs shing lcags kyi byan chu can gyis mig gnyis kyi 'bras bu btsogs par 'gyuraro//tshe 'di la bon byed cing gshin
326a5(mdo sde): rtog du 'dur ba dang /khang khyim bzang ngan lta ba dang /rigs lnga'i khams bde mi bod lta ba dang /glen pa bslus te nor mang du len pa ni lcags kyi dra bar bcug pa'i dmyal
326a6(mdo sde): par skye'o//khya ma rungs pa grangs med pas lus kyi steng du 'dug nas steng gi sha zad nas rus pa dang rgyus pa gtigs te/sdug bsngal mu med pa byed par 'gyuraro//tshe 'di la sman
326a7(mdo sde): byed cing nad pa gso mi nus par brdzun gyis nor len pa ni lcags kyi thur mas btsugs pa'i dmyal bar ltung ste/lus la kun tu me 'baro//tshe 'di la lho khang du mchod rten bshig cing
326b1(mdo sde): /dge 'dun dang /pha ma dang mkhan po la bag med par sri zhu chung ba ni mnar med pa'i sems can dmyal ba chen po brgyad du mthar gyis 'gro'o//de nas sems can dmyal ba chen po brgya sum cu cu
326b2(mdo sde): drug gnang du 'gro ste/la la ni bskal pa gcig/la la ni bskal pa gnyis/la la ni bskal pa lnga'i bar dul lo//bgang ga bod mthar phyin nas dge ba'i bshes gnyen dang phrad na ni
326b3(mdo sde): byang chub tu sems skye bar 'gyur ro//gal te ma phrad na slar yang sems can dmyal bar ltu ngo //bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/mi lus bong tsha zhing gnag la spro thung ba 'gro ba
326b4(mdo sde): la dga' ba na rnga mo las 'ong so//'gro ba la sred pa za ba la rngam ste/nyung ba la 'byol pa ni rta las 'ongaso//che ba da dgrang ba mi 'jigs shing gzugs che ba ni glang las 'ongaso//sgra che
326b5(mdo sde): zhing 'dzem bgra med la gang 'dod pa dam du 'dzin cing bzang ngan bye brag mi phyed pa ni bong bu las 'ongaso//rtag tu shal sred cing rngam ste 'jigs pa med pa ni seng ge las 'ongaso//
326b6(mdo sde): lus ring zhing mig zlum la ri 'am dgon par shin tu 'gro la chung mo la sdang po ni stag las 'ong so//spu ring zhing mig zlum ste gnas cig tu mi dga' ba ni byA las 'ong so//'gyur
326b7(mdo sde): ldog che zhing srin bu gsod pa la dga' ba ni wa las 'ongs//dpa' bshor che zhing khrel 'dzem chung zhing chu mang du bul sod pa ni spyang ki las 'ongaso//g.yon can gyis ngos 'dzin
327a1(mdo sde): la gnyid chung la khro ba ni khyi las 'ong so//khro ba la dga' zhing smra bar ni 'dod la mi kun gyis byams pa ni ne tsi las 'ong so//mang por 'dus shing smra ba la dpang
327a2(mdo sde): zhing dmya ngan mang ba ni byA khu blugs las 'ong so//bong chung zhing g.yem pa la dang tshe ste skying mi bstan pa ni byi'u mchil pa las 'ongaso//mig tshag la spro thung la kha nas lbu ba 'ong
327a3(mdo sde): la nyal ba'i chan lus spring 'dod pa ni rtsangs pa las 'ong so//smra na khra zhing pha rol gyi tshig mi ge la khro la mi la gdug pa'i tshig 'byung ba ni sdig pa las 'ong so//gcig rA
327a4(mdo sde): 'dug cing za ba la rkam ste nub mo gnyid chung ba ni byi ba las 'ongaso//khyim phugs dang rku ba la dad che ste gnyen ngo mi shes pa ni byi la las 'angaso//bcom ldan 'das kyis
327a5(mdo sde): bka' stsal pa/gang la la zhig gtsug lag khang dang mchod rten 'jig cing gang gis dkon mchog gsum gyi rdzas blangs shing spyad na tshe phyi ma la bstir med pa'i sems can
327a6(mdo sde): dmyal bar skye ste/ci ste der skyes nas dmyal ba las thar na yang 'di lta ste/phug ron dang mchil pa dang ngur pa dang ne co dang /b+hi'aM ka sno dang /nywa dang rus sbal dang spre'u dang phag
327a7(mdo sde): ba dang sha bor skye'o//gal te mir skyes ni yang ma ni ba dang bud med dang mtshon ga pa dang mtshan ma med pa'i sbun pa sogs par skyo'o//mi zhe sdang che ba ni sbrul gdug pa dang /seng/
327b1(mdo sde): ga dang stag dang sbyang ki dang dom dang dred dang byi la dang /khra la sogs pa thams cad du skye'o//tsaste mi'i lus thob na yang bya dang /phag gdod pa la dad cing rngon pa dang /brtson ma rdzar
327b2(mdo sde): 'gyuraro//gti mug che zhing dge mi dge'i bye brag mi phyed pa ni tshe phye ma la bal glang dang /pag dang ba glang dang lug dang ma he dang shig dang lji ba dang sbrang ma dang mchu bsnyung dang glog/
327b3(mdo sde): ma la sogs par skye'o//ci ste mi'i lus thob na yang 'on pa dang dmus long dang lkugs pa dang sgru ba can dang sgyur pa la sogs par skye'o//yan lag ma tshang ba dang /dbang po ma/
327b4(mdo sde): tshang ba'i lusu 'gyur te/chos la nan tan byed mi nu so//rgyags shing dregs pa ni tshe phyi ma la mi gtsang ba'i nang gi srin bu dang na mo dong bung bu dang khyi dang rta la sogs par skye'o//
327b5(mdo sde): ci ste mi lus thob na yang bran khol du skye'o//dbul 'phongs te slongs mo byed la thams cad kyis brnyas shing spang ba 'ong ngo //gang dbang po yod pas byin du gzer zhing gzhan gyi nor
327b6(mdo sde): la len pa ni tshe phyi ma la shel ma ri'i sems can dmyal bar ltung ste/sems can khri phrug brgyad stong skyed sos sha gcod cing za bar 'gyuraro//tshe 'di la pha rol po 'greng du myi
327b7(mdo sde): dga' ba ni tshe phye ma la ba lang gi lusu skye ste/rkang lag rengs shing nyel mi shes pas gnyid log tu med par 'gyuraro//tshe 'di la mchod ston zos pa'i nub mo zas zos na
328a1(mdo sde): /ma sa dun ga su 'gyu/khrun na go bar drubag ba dang brgyung bskrad pa ma ma//nan+dan du 'chu dam tshogs rnanas ca dus 'ad/tshad la na /
328a2(mdo sde): 'dug par dad pa ni bu nyung ba'i bya rtag tu 'bod par skye'o//tshe 'di la mchod ston gyi zas zos kyi lhag ma khyim du khyer ba ni tshe phyi me la lcags 'bar ba'i sems can dmyal bar ltung //ci ste/
328a3(mdo sde): mir skyes na yang lkog nad can dang /tshe thung bar 'gyuraro//tshe 'di la sangs rgyas la phyag 'tshal ba'i tshe dpral po sa la ma gtugs ni spre'u tshugs kyis dmyal bar lhungo //ci ste mo re skyes
328a4(mdo sde): nayang mi bo cog gis brnyas shing slu bar skye'o//tshe snga ma la sangs rgyas la phyag 'tshal ba'i tshe thal mo mi sbyor ba ni tshe phye ma la mtha' 'khob du skye ste/las mang du byas te 'bras bu 'grub
328a5(mdo sde): pa chung //tshe 'di la zhal skyon nyal nas mi langs pa ni tshe phyi ma la lto 'phyo'i ri su skye'o//lus ring zhing che bo ni srin bu pho mo thams cad kyis zo bar 'ong //tshe 'di l-i lag pa stsol te sangs
328a6(mdo sde): rgyas la phyag 'tshal ba ni tshe phyi ma la phyan ka log tu bcings pa'i sems can do myal bar ltung //mi ru skyes na yang nye bar gyod la thogs par 'ong //tshe 'di la thal mo sbyar te yan
328a7(mdo sde): log smad lnga sa la gtugs te rtse gcig pa'i sems kyis sangs rgyas la phyag 'tshal ba ni gang nas gang du skyes par rtag tu btsan zhing skyid par 'o //tshe 'di la mkhong zhing spro thung ba ni
328b1(mdo sde): byol song las 'jos//tshe 'dri la mig yon por 'dug pa ni gzhan gyi chung ma la mig zur gyis bsgregs pa las 'ong //tshe 'di la chung ma'i non byas te pha ma la rgal ba na lte gtubs pa'i sen dmyar

328b7(mdo sde): 'ongs pa kun gyis slu bar 'gyur//phra ma byed pa yang sems can ngan song gsum du ltung bar bye'o//ci ste mir skyes na yang gnyen zhig pa dang /gnyen ngan pa dang /phrag dog can du 'gyur//

329a4(mdo sde): rang bzhin dang /mang du tshol yang bsams pa bzhin mi 'gru'o//zhe sdang gi kha na ma tho ba yang sems can ngan song gsum du ltung bar byed//ci ste mar skyes na yang 'bras bu rnam pa gnyis smin te/

330b1(mdo sde): cad lan cig zos pas mi brjed par zin par 'gyuraro//sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' yang rtag tu de la dgongs par 'gyur ro//mi'i nang na mchog dang phul du 'gyuraro//gtso bor 'gyur ro//tshe
330b2(mdo sde): 'di la zam pa dang gru la sogs pa byed de/skye bo mang po sgrol bar byed pa la dga' ba ni skye ba thams cad rin po che sna bdun dang ldan zhing phal mang pos bkur te bsngagaso//'gro zhing 'ong ba la
330b3(mdo sde): bsu bskyal bar 'gyur//bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/dga' bo ji ltar ngas mdo sde thams cad las rgyu dang 'bras bur ba shudado//sems can rnams 'don nam/kyog gam rjesu spyod na/mi
330b4(mdo sde): khom po dang /sdug bsngal las grol bar 'gyuraro zhes gsung so//gang la la zhig gis mdo sde 'di la skur pa 'debs pa ni tshe 'di nyid la yang lce rtsu ba nas 'chad par 'gyuraro//de nas dga' bos
