330b6(mdo sde): ba dang mi dge ba'i rgyu dang 'bras bu zhes kyang bya/byang chub sems dpa'i lam dang /spyod pa zhes kyang bya ste/de ltar zung shig de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das kyis mdo sde 'di bshad na 'khor mang po'i nang du lha dang /
330b7(mdo sde): mi brgyad khri snyed bla na med pa'i byang chub tu semos bskyed//bud med brgyad stong snyed ni mo'i lus las phor gyur te//mi dge ba'i sems can thams cad kyang dge bar gyur to//dge sdig rnam par dbye ba'i mdo rdzog so//
331a1(mdo sde): sngon sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa ro khan+d+ra cag gi steng na bzhugs te/de'i tshe phyogs bcu'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i 'khor dang /
331a2(mdo sde): bcas pa dang /dgra bcom pa dang /lha dang //klu dang /gnod sbyin dang /dri za dang /lha ma yin dang /mi 'am tso dang /lto 'phye chen po dang /na mkha' lding dang /bdud
331a3(mdo sde): sdig can la sogs pa mthu bo che thams cad tshogs pa de'i dus na/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyis zhal gyi smin mtshams nas/'od gzer shar gyi lus 'phags dang /
331a4(mdo sde): lho'i 'dzam bu'i gling dang /nub kyi ba lang spyod dang /byung gi sgra mi snyan pa dang /gling 'di bzhi 'od zer kun tu khyab par bkram sti/'od gzer btang ba de ni che/rim ro nga
331a5(mdo sde): la sogs pa/ri chen po dang /ri dang nags chel dang /spyan ljongs re sul grag grogs kun la yang snang bar snyom ste/lag mthil dang 'dra bar gling bzhi gcig cang snang bar
331a6(mdo sde): gsal bar gyur/'od gzer de dag las sangs rgyas phal po che'i sku gzugs kha dog dang dbyibs sna tshogs dang bcas phal po che byung ba/byang chub sems dpa' dang /lha
331a7(mdo sde): dang /klu la sogs pa sems can kun gyis mthong ste/ngo mtshar du gyur to//de nas bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa la/be shir man la sogs pa rgyal po chen po bzhis
331b1(mdo sde): gsol pa/'od zer de lta bu ci'i don du mdzad pa lags shes pa las/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/nga mya ngan las 'das pa'i 'og tu gleng gzhi dngas dam pa'i chos kyi gsung
331b2(mdo sde): rab dang /ring bsrel dang /gzugs brnyan 'di lta bu dag 'byung ste/'di khyod kyi lag tu btang do spongs shig/de nas bcom ldan 'das la byang chub sems dpa' zla ba'i snying pos
331b3(mdo sde): zhus pa/bcom ldan 'das 'di lta bu rdzu 'phrul chen pos/bcom ldan 'das mya ngan las 'das pa'i 'og tu/dam pa'i chos rgyal po la gtod pa thugs rje che ba/snga ma 'das pa'i
331b4(mdo sde): sangs rgyas mya ngan las 'das pa nas/dgung lo bdun lags nas/dam pa'i chos kyi gzugs brnyan nub na/bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa mya ngan las 'das pa'i 'og tu dam pa'i
331b5(mdo sde): chos ji tsam gyi bar du gnas par 'gyur/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/'di lta bu'i the tshom zhus pa legaso legs so//nyon cig dang ngas bshad do//nga mya
331b6(mdo sde): ngan las dngas nas/dam pa'i chos kyi gzugs brnyan lo nyis stong gnas par 'gyuraro//byang chub sems dpa' zla ba'i snying pos gsol pa/bcom ldan 'das dam pa'i chos
331b7(mdo sde): 'di tha mar ji ltar nub par 'gyur/rgyu ci las nyams/sus ma mchis par dgyid/bka' stsal pa/nga mya ngan las 'das pa'i 'og tu lo lnga brgya'i bar du/nga'i bstan pa
332a1(mdo sde): spyod pa'i sems can rnam par grol ba myang du 'gyur/de nas lo lnga brgya'i bar du tenge 'dzin spyod pa mang du 'gyur/rgyal po dang /sems can phal po che dam pa'o//
332a2(mdo sde): chos la dad cing /spyod pa yang phyo zhing nyung bar 'gyuraro//de nis lo rdza r+g+ha'i bar du dam pa'i chos ston cing /sems can 'dren pa dang /thar par byed pa'i slob dpon mang du
332a3(mdo sde): 'byung /nyan thos kyi dgra bcom pa ni nyung bar 'gyuraro//rgyal po dang /sems can phal gyi rnams kyang nyan par tsam du zad kyi/nyam su len cing spyod pa 'am/brtson 'grus
332a4(mdo sde): ni mi byed/dad pa 'bri bar 'gyur ro//dam pa'i chos kyi srungs ma dag kyang mi dga' bar 'gyur te/dam pa'i chos la ma dad pa rnams ni ston pas mthu dang stobs skyeso//'dzam bu//
332a5(mdo sde): gling gi me'i rgyal po rnams kyang phan tshun gcig la gcig dmag 'dren cinga'akhrug par 'gyur ro//de nas yang lo lnga brgya'i tshe/lo gsum brgya ni/dam pa'i chos spyod pa'i
332a6(mdo sde): klu la sogs pa/sems can srungs ma rnams mi gnas shing /sems can chos la mi dad par 'gyur/sems can chos spyod pa rnams kyang chos kyi gzhung bzhen
332a7(mdo sde): mi smad/brtson 'grus chung bas grub pa yang nyung bar 'gyur//kha dog bzhi dang bzhi las gyur pa yang dri dang ro la sogs pa chung bar 'gyuraro//mi nang phyugs nad dang mu ge yang
332b1(mdo sde): rgyu/mnyas brgyus da rlung rgyas dunanas spyod/d+ha/r+m+ma / blugs pa d+ha tu tshul Sh+TAngs la myon sa/dam pa'o rgyas mnor pa stod du/
332b2(mdo sde): la ni bskrun cing bskur pa 'debasamongs spyod dang so byud 'a/'jig rten gyi rgyal po'i gsang la rten rgya mo srid 'dzin rgyal po'i 'dren par 'gro zhing ngo 'phral tshal/
332b3(mdo sde): po dang 'phongs 'khrugs pa'i dbyen byed/nye chang deng khe spogs byed/thabs tshol dam pa'i chos spyod pa yang snying nas ni nyam su blangs /mi spyod kyi/phal cher kha gsag dang 'dral
332b4(mdo sde): tshul 'chos pa ya ma R+Ya byed/de'i dus nas chos la dga' ba'i lha klu thams cad kyis khams kyi dge slong 'di ltar spyod pa'i sa gzhi bor te mi gnas shing /bdud kyi ris la sogs
332b5(mdo sde): chos kyi bgegs rnams der 'byung ste/mthu dang stobs skye bar 'gyur/rgyal po dang /blon po la sogs pa dad pa blo dge sdig gi mtshams mi zin/dam pa'i chos la rma 'byin//dkon
332b6(mdo sde): mchog gsum gyi dko dang dge 'dun gyi rdzas l-I chu 'drag byed/sdig pa la mi 'dzem/gzugs brnyan dang mchod rten gyi rnams dang kyis bsheg+sas/mchod pa'i hU~M hU~M/
332b7(mdo sde): dmapa'i chos mi nor par spyod pa/dge slong deng khyim pa 'ga'o tsam gnas pa de'i bsod nams kyis yul phyog su kha char dus su babacing lo legs/mi nad phyugs nad nyung zhing yul bdi
333a1(mdo sde): bdag kyang yod/'di lta bu mi gnas pa phal cher ni sdug bsngal mi bde ba sna tshogs 'byung de'i dus na rgya gar dang /rgyu ma yin pa rgyal po chen po gsum 'byung ste/gsum/
333a2(mdo sde): la yA ba na ba dang /ba la bA dang /shi kun 'di gsum dam pa'i chos mi spyod/dmag 'dren cing 'thab rtsed/nub dang byang gi yul khams mang ngo zhig med par byas/yul
333a3(mdo sde): khams de'i mchod rten dang /gtsug lag khang pa shig mes btang /mchod pa'i yo byad dang /dkon mchog gi dkor lo sogs pa phrogs bcom/rgyal po 'di gsum
333a4(mdo sde): gcig la gcig gnod pa sna tshogs kyis 'thab mo byed/gsum car gyi rgyal srid mi bde bar 'gyur/de nas rgyal po 'di gsum mjal du ma ste/srid gcig tu byas dmag
333a5(mdo sde): mang po 'dus nas/rgya gar gyi yul yul 'ga' 'oga'i tshu rol 'gan d+ha ra dang /ma ha de sha la sogs pa'i yul phrogs nas bzung /de'i dus na 'ga' 'ga'i pha rol lho
333a6(mdo sde): phyogs na/ko'u sha bi'i yul na/rgyal po ma he na 'dra se zhes bya ba de la bu zhig 'byung ba de'i ming ni tu pra sa ha zhes bya ba zhig 'byung ste/sprin mtshams na lcags kyi sme ba zhig
333a7(mdo sde): yod pa/bu mo man chad khrag gis bskus pa zhig 'byung ba de dag dang lhan cig tu/blon po lnga brgyal bu 'byung ba yod/ril gyis lag pa khrig ma tshan tshang khrag can du 'gyu
333b1(mdo sde): de dang dus gcig tu rgyal po de la rte'u sgra shes pa cig kyang 'byung ste/de'i nub mo yang gnam las khrag ga char bab nas/rgyal po ma he na 'dra so nas/drang srong gi mkhan po lnga
333b2(mdo sde): mngon par shes pa zhig la/bdag gi 'khor du bu dang /rta ya mtshan 'di lta bu zung /khrag gi cher bab pa/ci'i ltas shes brtags pa las/drang srong na ra/khyod kyi bus
333b3(mdo sde): 'dzam bu'i gling gis gzhi 'di mi'i khrag gis gshor bar byas nas/de'i 'og tu 'dzam bu'i gling gi rgyal po chen po byed par 'gyur zhes smraso//rgyal bu btsas nas lo bcu gnyis lon
333b4(mdo sde): pa dang /de'i tshe rgyal po yab dang /ba lA ba dang /sha ku na gsum 'dus pa'i dmag gsum 'bum rgyal po dang tshos te rgyal po ma he ni 'dra se na'i yul du drangs pa las/yul
333b5(mdo sde): du dmag phal po che byung bas rgyal po snying mi dga' ste/mya ngan byed cing 'dug pa las/bu du pras has pa la dris pa/yab 'di lta bu thugs mi dgyes pa ci las gyur ces
333b6(mdo sde): zhus pa las/pha ne re rgyal po byin gsum gyi dmag bdag cag gi yul du byung bas/mi dga' zhes smra so//bus smras pa yab mi dgye su ma mdzad cig/dmag 'di bdag gis
333b7(mdo sde): thub par bgyi'o zhes pa dang /pho na re lag so zhes smras nas/rgyal po blon po'i bu ya mtshan can lnga brgya la sogs te dmag nyis 'dum dang chas nas thab mo byas pa'i tshe/smin
334a1(mdo sde): mtshams nas lcags kyi spro ba la skyed nas/lus ril gyis lcag su byas nas/rab tu khros te brgal ba dang du spras ha'i dmag rgyal /phyir log pa dang /
334a2(mdo sde): nare bu khyod kyis rgyal po gsum gyi dmag 'di lta bu dang /thab mo byas pa las rgyal po leg so//da phyin chad khyod kyis rgyal srid zung shig/nga ni 'byung zhes bsgo nas rgyal srid
334a3(mdo sde): bus bzung //de nas lo bcu gnyis kyi bar du/rgyal po gsum gyi dmag dang 'thabs pa las/dmag mang po yang ril gyis btubs/rgyal po gsum yang bzung nas
334a4(mdo sde): med par byas so//de phan tshad 'dzam bu gling gi rgyal po byas par gyur to//de nas rgyal pos blon po rnams la smras pa/nga 'dzam bu'i gling gi rgyal po byed pa ni dga' na/gud
334a5(mdo sde): nas mi dgo' ba zhig yod ces smra so//blon po rnams kyis ci mi dgyes zhes dris pa dang /sems can mang po 'di snyed cig bsad pa'i sdig pa che bas mau dga' na/sdig pa
334a6(mdo sde): 'di lta bu zhig tu byas nas/sus 'byung bar 'gyur zhes smras pa dang /blon pa rnams kyis smras pa/yul po dal bau tra zhes bgyi bran/chos kyi mkhan po sde snod
334a7(mdo sde): gsupa shes pa/bram ze a kan dra d+ha'i bu shing sha ka zhes bgyi bzhig dgon pa'i sel gnas par spyan drangs nas/sdig byed par bzed rdo thog ces gsol ba de rje
334b1(mdo sde): rgyal po dga' nas dge slong shing sha ka yang 'gugs pa btang ste/rgyal po'i drung du 'ong so//mkhan po shing sha ka la rgyal pos phyag byas te sdig pa byas pa rnams ci zhig gis byung bar
334b2(mdo sde): 'gyur zhes zhus pa dang /dkon na chug gsum la lo bAn+d+ha ga nyis kyi bar du mchid dz+haiM /skyabasu gsol na/sdig pa 'byung bar 'gyur zhes byes//de nas 'jam bu m+b+hi na dge slong du
334b3(mdo sde): go tshwa gul 'gugs pa btang ste/ril gyis 'ga' 'gri'i pha rol tu yu la~M koSh+ma shaM bi na rgyal po gnas par bsdus te/yul gzhan du chos spyong du mi ster bar 'gyur//dge slong ba
334b4(mdo sde): pade'i tshe lam du chud zos pa yang myang /rgyal po'i 'khor du ni 'bum tsam zhig gis phyin par 'gyuraro//dge slong lam du chud zos pa yang gar+b+ha ni zan sna tshogs da /mi rgod drang chul
334b5(mdo sde): sogs pas pa la khyer te chud zas so//dge 'dun mang po phyin pa dang /dge 'dun la rgyal pos mchod ston gsol yon du mi te mchod do//de'i tshe dge 'dun rnams gcig la gcig
334b6(mdo sde): gtam du smras pa/khyod kyi mkhan pa ga re/skyob ma g+har sa ng+ge/grogs pa khrims nA gA re zhes so sar gtam dras pa dang /stag dang /sring gi dang /mi rgod kyis bsgru ba
334b7(mdo sde): dang /chos khyer ba dang /nad kyis btab ste shi ba la sogs pa'i gtam byas nas/dge slongasas nas myo ngan langs te/dud maM 'debs brang rdib par 'gyur//de nas de'i

335a2(mdo sde): rgyal pos mya ngan ma byed cig ces bsgo ba/dge 'dun rnams kyis mnyan pa dang /rgyal po yang mi dga' bar gyur nas/kha phyogs te nyal lo//nyal ba'i tshe smon//
335a3(mdo sde): lam du btab pa/da 'jig rten gyi dge 'dun la ni skyabs kyang ma byung na/dgra bcom pa'i zhal mthong bar shog shig ces smon lam btab pa dang /'jig rten gyis lhas rmyil ma
335a4(mdo sde): du bstan pa/rig na d+ha ma ha na'i ri la/su rang sho na'i bu su rad ces bya ba dgra bcom pa zhig bzhug sa te/de spyan drangs ni sdig kyang 'byung /the tshom yang spel bar 'gyu ro zhes
335a5(mdo sde): lung bstan pa dang /rgyal po sad de 'phral du pho nya bkye ste/spyan drangs nas phyin pa dang /dgra bcom pa la rgyal pos mchod cing phyag byaso//de'i dus na tshes bcu bzhi'i
335a6(mdo sde): nub mo dge 'dun 'dus pa'i nang nas/dge slong gsar zhugs rnams kyis ste snod gsum shes pa'i mkhan po shir sha ka 'dul ba ba~Mshad par gsol ba las/shir sha ka
335a7(mdo sde): na re mi la mig zhar/sna dang rna ba med na/me long ci dgos/bltar ci yod/'dul ba bshad kyang khyed 'dul ba ltar mi spyod/chos khrims mi srung ba la 'dul ba bshad
335a8(mdo sde): na ci phan zhes smras pa dang /de'i tshe su rad ces bya ba dgra bcom pas seng ge'i sgra bzhin du smras pa/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyi chos khrims ngas mnos nas/da tsam
335b1(mdo sde): gyi bar du rtswa mchog tsam yang ma nyams na/de skad ma zer bar 'dul ba shod ces smras pa dang /mkhan po shir sha ka yang dgra btsam pa yin par shes nas/rab tu gnod ma
335b2(mdo sde): smra'o//shir sha ka'i slob ma dge slong a ka de zhes bya ba de 'khor 'dus pa'i nang nas langs te/su rad ces bya ba dgra bcom pa de la khyod ci ste nga'i mkhan po la de skad smra/
335b3(mdo sde): khyad khrims kyang med/'dul ba yang mi shes na/ngo'i mkhan po sde snad gsum la mkhas pa de la/ci'i phyir brnyas shes khros nas/dgra bcom pa brdegs te gsad do//de'i
335b4(mdo sde): tsho chos la dga' ba'i gnod sbyin dwi ta mu kha zhes bya bas/lag par rdo rje thogs te mngon du byung nas/dge slong a ga di la ci ste dgra bcom pa bsad ces smras nas/rdo rje byung ste/
335b5(mdo sde): bsad do//de'i dus na dge slong gi rad ces bya bas/dge slong shir sha ka brdegs te bsad do//de nas de'i rjes la dge slong rol gyis gcig gis gcig bsad do//gcig kyang
335b6(mdo sde): ma lus so//de'i dus na na mkha' las lha klu lo sogs pa/chos kyi srungs ma phal po che mi dga' nas ngus pa'i mche ma ni khrag dang me'i char sa gzhi der bab bo//na mkha' yang ser po///
335b7(mdo sde): nag po//dmar por rtag tu gyur cing /glog sgra chen po byung /skar me du me ke du zhes bya ba'i lus las du ba nag po zhig byung ste/des zla ba dang nyi ma la sogs pa'i 'od kyang med/
336a1(mdo sde): gcig kyang lhur mi snang bar 'ong ngo //de'i dus na sum cu rtsa gdum gnam gyi lha dang /yum ma hA ma ya la sogs pa/'khor phal po che der 'ongs nas/dge 'dun
336a2(mdo sde): gyi gos tshon can ril bsdus te khyer bar 'ongo //de'i dus na rgyal pos 'di lta bu'i ku cho sgra chen po byung ba ci las byur ces smras pa dang /dge 'dun 'khrugs nas gcig gis gcig//
336a3(mdo sde): bsad par gyur to zhes gsol po dang /rgyal po mi dga' nas langs te/tho ras mkhar gyi phyi rol gyi lha gang du phyin pa dang /dge 'dun le la ni mgo bcad/la la ni rga
336a4(mdo sde): lag bcad/kha cig ni mig phyung 'di ltar sna tshog su shi ba mthong nas/dgra bcom pa dang /shir sha ka sde snod gi sum shes pa'i mkhan po'i ro btsal nas gnyi ga'i ro skad de/
336a5(mdo sde): mtshan khung g.yas g.yon su bcug nas/dgra bcom pa ni nga'i ma yin/shir sha ka ni chos kyi mdzod yin te/'di gnyis 'das par gyur pa ni da phyin chad nga'i srog kyang gces
336a6(mdo sde): pa med/rgyal srid kyang su 'dod pa la sbyin no zhes smras nas/mig kyang bcums te mi lta bar 'gyur ro//de'i dus na blon po rnams rgyal po la snying brtse ste/mya ngan bsang ba'i
336a7(mdo sde): phyir/mi lnga brgya pa na de ltar bcos te/mgo dang kha spu breg tu spu bris mchod nas/phyogs nag po dang /de mar po'i ko ba gyon te ban de ltar bcos naso rgyal po'i drung du
336b1(mdo sde): 'ongs so//blon pas rgyal po la ngan de lnga brgya 'ong so zhes smras pa dang /rgyal po dpa' nas mig phye ste/ban+da de la bltas pa dang /ban de yang ris gyis phyugs kyi ko ba gosu gyon
336b2(mdo sde): la/skra dang kha spu mes bsgregs par mthong nas/rgyal po dga' ste/dkon mchog gsum lo mchod pa'i yo byad 'on cig par bsgo nas/ban de de rnams la mchod do//
336b3(mdo sde): pos chos dris pa dang /chos tshig gcig kyang mi shes nas/rgyal po yang mya ngan langs te ngu'o//ban de shi ba'i re ril gyis bsdus nas bsregs te mchod pa byed do//
336b4(mdo sde): de'i tshe de'i dus nA/badzam bu gling gi lha chos ril nuba'o//gser ni dngul dran pa dang rdor 'gyur/dngul ni rag na ngan pa dang rdor 'gyur/ra gan ni zangasu 'gyur/
336b5(mdo sde): rin po che dang mu tig ni rwar 'gyur/zas la ro drug yod pa las mngar zhing zhim pa la sogs pa bzhi ni nub kha ba dang rtsub pa gnyis luso//sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa
336b6(mdo sde): la byang chub sems dpa' zla ba'i snying pos zhus pa las lung bstan pa rdzog so//rgya gar skad du/Ar+ya go shrag byA ka ra Na nA ma ma hA pA/
336b7(mdo sde): na smr-i tra/bod skad du/'phags pa ri klang ru lung bstan pa zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo//bam po gcig go//bcom ldan 'das 'jam dpal gzha nur gyur pas phyig
337a1(mdo sde): 'tshal lo//'di skad bdag gis thos pa'i dus gcig na/lha'i yang lha sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa/bskal pa grangs med pa gsum nas/bsod nams kyi tshogs

337a4(mdo sde): dpa' du ma dang /gnas brtan shA ri'i bu dang /mo'u dgal gyi bu la sogs po/nyan thos chen po stong nyis brgya lnga bcu dang /tshangs po dang /brgya byin la sogs pa lha du
337a5(mdo sde): ma dang /lha'i rgyal po rnam thos kyi bu la sogs pa 'jig rten skyong ba du ma dang /klu yi rgyal po chen po du ma dang /gnod sbyin mthu chen po mang po dang /dri za'i rgyal gri
337a6(mdo sde): gtsug phud lnga pa la sogs pa dri za mang po dang /mi 'am ci'i rgyal po yid 'ong la sogs pa mi 'am ci du ma dang /rgyal po gzugs can snying po la sogs pa 'dzam bu'i
337a7(mdo sde): gling gi mi'i rgyal po mang po'i 'khor du ma dang thabs gcig tu bzhug so//de nas de'i tshe lha'i yang lha sangs rgyas shAkya thub pas/phyi ma'i dus kyi yul dge ba la rjesu
337b1(mdo sde): dngas shing mngan sum du mdzad nas/'khor mang po ga cum pA/rigs kyi klu byung phyogs logs na/ri glang du dang nya bachu 'o go ma'i 'bras ma rgyu dang skyong d+harA drang/
337b2(mdo sde): po drang mchod rten go mas la gan dA zhes bya ba zhig yod der gdon mi za bar bya dgos po'i 'phrin las zhig yod pas gshegs pa'i dus la bab bo//de nas de'i tshe lha'i rang
337b3(mdo sde): lha sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das 'khor phal po che dang na mkha' la 'phags te/dri za'i rgyal po gtsug phud lnga pa la sogs pa dri za grangs med pa ni/mdun na lha'i rol
337b4(mdo sde): mo sna tshogs byed/mi'am ci'i rgyal po yid 'ong la sogs pa mi 'am ci du ma ni steng nas mchod pa'i las byed cing /sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la dbyangs dang /lha'i
337b5(mdo sde): skad yid du 'ong bas bskyod bzhin du/'khor de dag dang /mchod pa de dag dang bcas te/ri glang ru ga la bu der gsheg so//gshegs nas lha'i yang lha sangs rgyas 'a
337b6(mdo sde): ldan 'das bzhengs bzhin du/zhal byang phyog su mtsho chen po yun ring po nas//rgya mtsho ltar 'dug pa la gzigs te/sku drang por bsrang nas/de bzhin gshegs pa'i ting
337b7(mdo sde): 'dzin bye ba brgya phrag brgya snying du ma la snyoms par zhugs te/bskal pa grangs med pa gsum nas/bdag nyid kyi sangs rgyas kyi spyod pa spyod lam dang /bsod nams ma
338a1(mdo sde): du mdzad do//de nas de'i tshe lha'i yang lha sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyis/ri glang ru dang yul dge ba dang /gser gyi dkyil 'khor nas/snyid de'i rtsa
338a2(mdo sde): mo'i bar du byin gyis brlabs te/bsrung ba dang /gtsang ba dang /bkra shis dang /mtshams gcad pa dang /bzlas brjod dang /yul dge bar mdzad do//de nas
338a3(mdo sde): de'i tshe lha'i yong m+b+ha sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyis 'khor de dag thams cad la bka' stsal pa/ri glang ru bcom ldan 'das kyi pho brang mchod rten go mas la gan da dang
338a4(mdo sde): bcas/yul dge ba dang bcas pa 'di ni/bskal pa bzang po'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das thams cad kyi phyag tsacan dang /ma 'dres pa dang /thun mong ma yin pa dang /
338a5(mdo sde): dben pa yin te/rgyu des na yul 'di ni dge ba zhes bya'o//de nas de'i tshe lha'i yang lha sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyis yul dge ba dang /mkhar dge ba can dang /dge
338a6(mdo sde): 'dun so so'i kun dga' ra ba dang /gtsug lag khang dngadagon pa'i gnas dang /yul der so sor nas bsod nams bya ba'i dngos po dge ba byed par 'gyur pa'i rgyal
338a7(mdo sde): po dang /chos dang ldan pa'i dad pa can dang /sbyin bdag dang /li thams cad 'byung bar lung bstan to//de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' rnams la bka'
338b1(mdo sde): stsal pa/rigs kyi bu khyed rnams kyis kyang ma 'ongs pa'i dus na 'byung ba'i yul 'dir ci nas kyang /sems can rnams dam pa chen po myur du thob par 'gyur ba dang /ting 'dzin
338b2(mdo sde): 'grub par 'gyur bar byin gyis rlobs shig/de nas de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das/mtsho rol nas cung zad cig slar bkyeng de/de'i mod la ri glang ru'i steng du gdun khri bo shams pa
338b3(mdo sde): yang skyil mo krung bcas te bzhugs nas/zhal nub phyogs bcom ldan 'das kyi pho brang mchod rten go ma sa la gan da gang na ba de logasu gzig so//de nas de'i tshe 'jig rten gyi
338b4(mdo sde): khams gzhan dang gzhan nas/byang chub sems dpa' nyi khri mngon par shes pa lnga dang ldan pa'i drang srong mang po dang thabs gcig tu bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der lhagaso lhags
338b5(mdo sde): nas/bcom ldan 'das kyi pho brang mchod rten go mu sa la gan da la yang phyag 'tshal skyabasu song /sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das 'khor dang bcas pa la yang phyag 'tshal skyabasu
338b6(mdo sde): song nas/phyogs gcig tu 'khod do//de nas de'i tshe sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyis 'khor phal po che 'dus par mkhyen nas/'khor de dag la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to//
338b7(mdo sde): bskal pa bzong po 'di la sngon sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das bzhi byung ste/de dag gis kyang mchod rten go ma sa ston da yul dang bcas par byin gyis brlabs//bskal pa bzang po 'di nyid
339a1(mdo sde): lam 'ongs pa'i dus na yang sangs rgyas stong rtsa gcig 'byung bar 'gyur te/dro dag thams cad kyang 'khor dang bcas te 'drir gshegs nas/mchod rten goms
339a2(mdo sde): la gnA da yul dang bcas par byin gyis rlob cing /mtshams bcad pa dang /bkra shis pa dge bar mdzad par 'gyur ro//nga yang da ltar byin gyis rlob pa'i dus la bab pas byin
339a3(mdo sde): gyis rlob par mdzad do//de nas de'i tshe lha'i yang lta/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das ting nge 'dzin da ltar gyi sangs rgyas mngon sum du bzhugs pa zhes bya ba dang /gzhan yang de bzhin
339a4(mdo sde): gshegs pa'i ting 'dzin grangs med pa la snyoms par zhug so//de'i tshe ting 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs pa rnams dang /bsam gton pa rnams yongasu skyong bar byed pa/byang chub
339a5(mdo sde): sems dpa' mthu chen gyis kyang /sangs rgyas 'od srungs kyi mchod rten gyi drung du bzhugs te/yul byung bar gyur pa'i tshe bdag gi gzugs brnyan byed par 'gyur bar so gzhi
339a6(mdo sde): de byin gyis brlabaso//de bzhin du smon lam chen pos gnas pa/byang chub sems dpa' 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas kyang /ri glang rul gtsug lag khang par spong byed ces
339a7(mdo sde): bya ba 'byung bar 'gyur ba'i sa gzhi der/bsnyen pa byed pa rnams 'grub par 'gyur bar byin gyis brlab so//de bzhin du na mkha' ltar stobs dpag tu med pa/byang chub sems
339b1(mdo sde): dpa' namakha'i snying pos kyang /gtsug lag khang 'jigs tshogs spong byed ces bya ba 'byung bar 'gyur ba'i sa gzhi de mchod gnas su 'gyur bar byin gyis brlab so//de bzhin du
339b2(mdo sde): thugs rje chen po dang ldan pa/byang chub sems dpa' 'phags pa sprin ras gzigs dbang phyug gis kyang /gtsug lag khang 'od can zhes bya ba 'byung bar 'gyur ba'i sa gzhi
339b3(mdo sde): der/dngos grub 'grub par 'gyur bar byin gyis brlab so//de bzhin du rtag tu byams pa dang ldan pa byang chub sems dpa' byams pas kyang /gtsug lag khang bri si mo nya zhes
339b4(mdo sde): bya ba 'byung bar 'gyur ba'i sa gzhi der/bdag nyid bzhugs par byin gyis brlab so//de bzhin du spyod pa shin tu rnam par dag pa/byang chub sems dpa' sa'i snying pos kyang //
339b5(mdo sde): gautsug lag khang ye shes ri zhes bya ba 'byung bar 'gyur ba'i sa gzhi der phyag bya bar 'os par 'byung bar 'gyur bar byin gyis brlabaso//de bzhin du gdul ba'i skye bo rnams krol bar
339b6(mdo sde): mdzad pa la thag thogs mi mnga' bo/byang chub sems dpa' sman gyi rgyal pos kyang /gtsug lag khang pa no co zhes bya ba 'byung bar 'gyur ba'i sa gzhi der dngos grub 'grub par
339b7(mdo sde): byin gyis brlab so//de bzhin du rdzu 'phrul chen po dang ldan pa/byang chub sems dpa' kun tu bzang pos kyang /gtsu go lag khang dge 'dun skyong zhes bya ba 'byung bar 'gyur ba'i sa
340a1(mdo sde): gzhi der dngos grub 'grub par 'gyur bar byin gyis brlab so//de bzhin du sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la sogs pa/byang chub sems dpa' gzhan dag dang //
340a2(mdo sde): dgra bcom pa chen po rnams kyis kyang /li yul gang dang gong du gtsug lag khang dang /skyed mos tshal dang /dgon pa'i gnas 'byung bar 'gyur ba'i sa thams cad/dper
340a3(mdo sde): na zla ba nya ba la skar ma'i tshogs rnams kyis yongasu bskor nas/steng gi bar snang dag pa la rgyu ba bzhin du mdzes pa dang /yid du 'ong ba dang /rgyas pa dang /dga' dga'

340a5(mdo sde): bcom pa chen po rnams kyis 'od gzer rnam pa sna tshogs du ma bkye bas/li yul thams cad snang ba chen pos khyab par byaso//de nas skad cig de nyid la mtsho chen po de'i nang
340a6(mdo sde): nas pad+ma sum brgya lnga bcu rtsa gsum byung bar gyur te/pad+ma ra re'i steng na yang sangs rgyas dang /byang chub sems dpa'i sku gzugs 'od dang bcas pa bzhugs pa snang
340a7(mdo sde): bar gyur to//de nas de'i tshe lha rnams kyis sngon ma mthong ba'i mtshan ma mthong nas//sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la zhus pa dang /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/rigs
340b1(mdo sde): nga nas smras rgyam bcun+ya g+sas nas s+yA r+b+ba smra dang /byang chub soms 'i sgra gzugs dang bcas te byung ba 'ad nam dngas pa dus na/sul 'ad 'byung bang /

340b3(mdo sde): sems dpa' chen po rnams dang /nyinas chen po rnams 'od gzer rnam pa sna tshigs 'byed cing /yul b+hi gyis brlabs pa'i sa h+la zhi de dag da/de bzhin du ngase
340b4(mdo sde): bzhin gshegs pa'i pho brang mchod rten go ma sa la gnad yul dge ba dang bcis pa byin gyis brlabs pa'i sa gzhi 'dir/dad pa can ni sbyid bdag rnams kyis so so nas/sangs

340b7(mdo sde): par 'gyid pa lags/btsun po bcom ldan 'das de ltar ni dgon pa cha chen po'i gte ri lags na sde zhig gis ji ltar 'byin pa bka' stsal du gsol/bcom lda
341a1(mdo sde): 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/rags kyi bu nyon cig/nga mya ngan las 'das nas lo brgya lon pa'i tshe/rgya'i yul du rgya'i rgyal po che yang zhes bya ba bu stong changad //
341a2(mdo sde): bar bdag pa zhig 'byung bar 'gyur te/bu re re yang yul re re gsar du tshol du bcug go/phyis nub phyogs logs na/ri glang ru dang /bcom ldan 'das kyis pho brang mchod
341a3(mdo sde): rten go ma sa la gan da yod pa'i yul de bzhin gshegs pa du mas byin gyis brlabs pa zhig yid do zhes thos nas/'di snyam du ma bdag la bu gcig yod na/sangs rgyas
341a4(mdo sde): phal po ches byin gyis brlabs pa'i gnas der yul 'debasu bzhug go snyam du bsams nas/de'i tshe rgya rgyal pos rnam thos kyi bul bu cig bslangs so//rnam thos kyi bus
341a5(mdo sde): kyang 'dzam+bu'i gling 'di na/rgyal po mya ngan med ces bya ba'i bu zhig btsos pa byin te/bud med gzugs bzang ba dbyibs mdzes pa/blta na sdug pa zhig yin no//bu da
341a6(mdo sde): don du sa las nu ma zhig byung ba dang /bu de sngon gyi bsod nams dang dag pa'i rtsi ba'i mthus/nu ma da la nu bar byed pas/des na bu de'i ming sa las nu ma nu zhes bya'o//bu
341a7(mdo sde): de myur bar skyes nas/pha rgya'i rgyal pos rgyal srad kyi dbang ni bskur/nor mang pa na bya na/blon po phal po che ni lus kyi rim gro bar bskos nas/rgyal po sa la sau nu ma nu
341b1(mdo sde): rgyun pa chen po 'ang na zhes bya ba la sags pa dmag dum dang ldan cog d+hA n+ya'o yul nas byung ste/yul 'dor 'ong bar 'gyur//'angs nas 'ad+mor yul 'dabs par 'gyu
341b2(mdo sde): rgyal pos las nu ma nu des/yul btang bya'i byur/rmyangs na yul 'di'i ming ni sa las nu ma nu'i yul zhes bya bar 'gyuraro//dus de'i tshe na nub phyogs logs nas rgya gar gyis
341b3(mdo sde): bal po che 'dir 'ong bar 'gyur te/rgyal po sa las nu mau nu'i 'bangasu mched kyis 'tshal zhing /chu srid gcig par du ma par 'gyur nas/rgya'i blon pa chen po 'jang shol

341b7(mdo sde): 'byung bar gnang bar byed yul 'dir mi byang chub sems dpa' rigs can mang po zhig 'byung ste/rtag tu dkon mchog gsum las dge ba'i rtsa ba stsogs shing /bsod nams
342a1(mdo sde): bya ba'i dngos po byed par 'gyuraro//de ltar na yul 'di ni rgyal po sa las nu ma nus yul gtod pa'i tshul de lta bus 'byung bar 'gyuraro//yul 'di ni sangs rgyas 'byung
342a2(mdo sde): ba re re'i tshe yang 'byung zhing rgyas por 'gyur ro//ci'i phyir yul gzhan dang gzhan dag ni zhig nas/yun ring mo zhig tu stong zhing dgon par 'dug la/yul dge ba ni sangs
342a3(mdo sde): rgyas 'byung ba re re'i tshe mi rnams kyis brgyan cing mdzes par 'gyur zhe na/'di ltar yul 'di ni thub pa drang srong chen po'i gnas/de bzhin gshegs pa'i mchod rten go mas la
342a4(mdo sde): gnas zhes bya ba'i ri grang ru dang nye ba/chu bo go ma'i 'gram na yod pa'i phyiraro//mchod rten 'di mdo sde'i nang nas ni ming go ma sa la gan da zhes bya'o//'jig rten phal gyi tha snyad
342a5(mdo sde): du ni chu bo go ma'i 'gram zhes bya bar 'dogs par 'gyur te/'di ltar ji srid du mchod rten chu bo go ma'i 'gram zhes bya ba dang /'od srung gi mchod rten 'di gnyis rgyas
342a6(mdo sde): shing mchod gnas su byed pa ji srid du ni/yul dge ba zhes bya ba rgyas shing bzang por 'gyur ro//nam mchod rten 'di gnyis rgud pa de'i tshe/yul yang rgud cing stongs par
342a7(mdo sde): 'gyur ro//de nas de'i tshe 'khor der 'dus pa'i lha rnams kyis /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa'i gsung de thos nas/mchod rten go ma sa la gan da dang /ri glang ru la
342b1(mdo sde): dad pa dang /gus pa chen po rnyed de/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la mgro bos phyug 'tshal sgrubs song nas/s+yA//sUrA 'di skad du bdag cag kyang dus da yul 'dir rigs mngon
342b2(mdo sde): por skyes nas/bde bar gshegs pa'i bstan pa srung zhing /yul chos kyi bka'o khrims mi nyams par gyur cig ces smin lam bti'o//de nas de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das kyis lha'i rgyal
342b3(mdo sde): po rnam thos kyi bu dang /byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'du shes can zhes bya ba dang /lha mi 'pham pa zhes bya ba dang /klu'i rgyal po khyim tshig ces bya ba dang /lha nam

342b6(mdo sde): pa dang /bskyang ba dang /mchod gan su 'gyur bar gyis shig/yul 'di'i rgyal po dang /yul 'dzin pa'i blon po dang /sbyin bdag chos dang 'thun pa rnams kyang yongs su
342b7(mdo sde): gtad kyis de bzhin du gyis shig/ri blang ru lung bstan pa'i mdo 'di yongasu gtad kyis 'phel zhing rgyas par gyis shig/gang gi tshe yul 'di me 'am/chu 'am/pha rol
343a1(mdo sde): b+he dmag gis nyen cing phongs par gyur na/mdo 'ad klag pa dang //kha ton dang /mchod pa dang /bsam pa dang /bsgom pa byas na/des na yul de'i gnod pa zhi

343a4(mdo sde): 'ongs pa'i dus na yul 'dir rgya rnams kyang 'ong bar 'gyur gyis/de'i tshe mdo 'di lhogs shig dang /mdo 'di thos nas de dag dad pa skyo bar 'gyuraro//dad pa'i stobs kyis yul mi
343a5(mdo sde): 'jig cing /phyir zhing bsrung ba dang /bsod nams bya ba'i dngos po yang byed par 'gyur te/rgyu des ni mdo 'di ni yul la phan 'dogs pa byed pa yin//mdo 'di ni phan
343a6(mdo sde): yon gzhan yang ming du yod do/yun thung ngus ni brjod par mi nus//de'i phyir mdo 'di khyod rnams la yongasu gtad do//de nas de'i tshe rnam thos kyi bu la sogs pa lha rnams dang /
343a7(mdo sde): klu yi rgyal po dang /lha ma de dag 'khor dang bcas te langs nas/bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar/pus mo'i lha nga sa la btsugs te/thal mo sbyar nas 'di skad ces

343b7(mdo sde): bai shud ba yin no zhes rnar grags pa gyi/su bye bar thob par baN+DI/sems bsgyur bar bgyi'o//bcom ldan 'das nas yul 'dir dkon mchig gsu mi mi tshad gan sum
344a1(mdo sde): bgyid cing /chos dang mi mthun pa rnams kyi mgon lhag par bgyid pa de'i tshe/sems bsgyur bdag cag rnams kyi gzi brjid dang /mthu stobs nyams par 'gyur
344a2(mdo sde): bas yul 'di'i ched dang bsrung bar ni rngo mi thog gi/de ci'i slad du zhe na/bdag cag rnams kyi mthu stobs dang /gzi brjid ni bde bar gshegs pa'i bstan pa dang /chos
344a3(mdo sde): dang mthun par yul chos bzhin du skyong ba dang /bsod nams bya ba'i dngos po dge ba'i rtsa ba'i mthus 'phel bar 'gyur ba lagaso//de nas de'i tshe sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das
344a4(mdo sde): gdan las bzhengs nas/ri glang ru'i steng gi 'gram nas mchod rten go ma sa la gan dgang na ba de logasu gzigs nas/yang nas yang du de bzhin gshegs pa'i spyod yul
344a5(mdo sde): mchod rten go ma swa la gan da dang /ri glang ru dang /yul dang bcas pa lan gnyis lan gsum gyi bar du byin gyis brlabs nas/li yul thams cad dang /'tshe'i

344a7(mdo sde): sems can de dag thams cad sdug bsngal ni zhi bar gyur/khro ba dang khon du 'dzin pa dang ni bral te/byams pa'i sems dang ldan par gyur cing /lha'i bde ba dang ldan
344b1(mdo sde): nas skad cog de nyi la//sems can de dag las grangs med pa zhig tshe 'phos nas/lha dang mi rnams kyi nang du skyes te/sangs rgyas nyid du 'gyur ba'i sa bon rnyed cing /byang
344b2(mdo sde): chub las phyir mi ldog par gyur to//de nas de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das kyis lha rnams la lan gsum gyi bar du bos nas/'di skad ceste bka' stsal to//rigs kyi bu khyod
344b3(mdo sde): kyis dam pocas pa rnams ni brtson 'grus med par mi 'gru'o//rigs kyi bu ngas bsgral pa grangs med pa gsum gyi bar du dka' ba spyad pa'i bstan pa 'di dang /mchod rten
344b4(mdo sde): goms la gan da yul dang bcas pa khyod rnams la yongasu gtad kyis yongasu sung shig/khyed rnams las gang zhig gis nga rjes drin zhing gzungs yod ba dang /bstan
344b5(mdo sde): bsrung ba des ni bstan pa 'di la rab tu byung me rnams yongasu bsrung bar gyis shig/de ci'i slad zhon/mi khyim pa la la zhig/lho ban+d+ha ri bar du nyin re zhing dge ba'i rtsa ba bsod
344b6(mdo sde): nams chen po bye la/'ga' zhig nyin cig rab tu b+h+yo nas bstan pa la gnas nA/sdom pas phyi ma'i bsod nams kyi brgya'i char yang mi tshig go//de ci'i spyad zhen
344b7(mdo sde): sangs rgyas gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed thams cad kyang sngo khyim gyi gan su spangs te rab tu byung nas/spyod lam de nyid kyis byang chub chen po brnyes//nga yang pha ril tu phyin pa
345a1(mdo sde): drug yongasu rdzogs te/sa bcu brnyes nas srid pa tha ma'i tshe/nam phyed nas rgyal po'i khab nas byung ste/nags tshal du gshegs so//nags tshal nas
345a2(mdo sde): gzhon pa rgyal po yab kyi thog tu sgri nas/rang gi sla ral gris bregs te/nga'i gos gya nom pa rin thang med pa/rngon pa de dag las chos gos ngur smrig du rjeso//ngas chos
345a3(mdo sde): gos de gyon nus dus gsum gyi sangs rgyas thams cad la phyag 'tshal skyabasu skyong nas/rab tu byung ba'i spyod lam bzung ba dang /lha thams cad nga la phyag 'tshal/sgrub
345a4(mdo sde): su song nas phyi bzhin du 'brang ngo //nga yang spyod lam de nyid kyis yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas brnyeso//de'i phyir bde bar gshegs pa'i bstan pa ni dam pa yin par
345a5(mdo sde): shes par bya'o//rab tu byung ba ni bsod namos dang ldan par shes par bya'o//'jig rten na rab tu byung bas thob pa ma gtogs par khyim pa'i cha lugs kyis dgra bcom
345a6(mdo sde): ba'am/rong sangs rgyas sam/bla na med pa'i byang chub 'thob pa ni sus kyang ma thos ma mthong ngo //rab tu byung ba'i spyod lam 'di ni 'jig rten na lha la sogs pa thams cad kyi
345a7(mdo sde): mchod gnas yin//de nas de'i tshe lha dang lha mo de dag thams cad stan las langs te/dbyangs gcig tu sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to//btsun
345b1(mdo sde): pabacom ldan 'das bdag cag rnams kyis/bcom ldan 'das kyis ji ltar bka' stsal pa bzhin 'tshal zhing /bsam bzhin du bka' las 'gal bar mi 'cha'o//yul 'dir sangs
345b2(mdo sde): rgyas kyi bsten pa dang /de bzhin gshegs pa'i spyod yul mchod rten dang bcas pa yang kun tu bsrung ba dang /bsgrub pa dang rjesu gzung bar 'tshal gyis/bcom ldan 'das kyis
345b3(mdo sde): kyang /bdag cag rnams la mthu ba ltang du gsol/de ci'i sladadu zhe na/ma 'ongs pa'i rtsod pa'i dus nu byin gyis brlabs pa'i yul 'dir dgra mang po dang /ma dad pa dang /phyir
345b4(mdo sde): rgol ba bde bar gshegs pa'i bstan pa la//dad pa'i khyad par mi rnyed cing /bstan pa gzhig pa'i slod brtson pa dag 'byung ba'i slad du'o//de nas de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das
345b5(mdo sde): kyis lha de dag leg so zhes bya ba gnang ste/skyes bu dam pa rnams legaso//legaso//ngas kyang yul 'di byin gyis brlabs zin to//byin gyis brlabs pa de nyid kyis
345b6(mdo sde): mtshams bcad pa yang yin no//ma 'ongs pa brtsod pa'i dus na/yul 'di gzhom pa'i phyir/sum pa'i dmag phal po che dang /drug gu rus sna tshogs dang /ho ra dang //
345b7(mdo sde): gzhan yang dad pa med pa dag 'ong bar 'gyur te/de'i tshe yul gzhan dang gzhan dag nas /de bzhin gshegs pa'i gzugs brnyan byin gyis brlabs pa dag yul 'dir
346a1(mdo sde): gshegs nas/yul gyis mtshams bsrung bar mdzad de//bsod nams kyi stobs das na yul 'di gtan brlag par mi 'gyuraro//gzugs brnyan dengag
346a2(mdo sde): gi phyi bzhin du/byang chub sems dpa' dang /lha dang /klu dang /mthu stobs dang ldan pa mang po dag 'ong zhing /yul yul du gnod pa rnams bzlog par byed/dgra rnams
346a3(mdo sde): kyis yul mi tshams par byed de/dge ba can zhes bya ba'i mkhar nas/de bzhin gshegs pa bde ba'i 'byung gnas shes bya bri'i gzugs brnyan gshegs nas/nub phyogs
346a4(mdo sde): mkhar ku sheng du bzhugs shing /yul gyis mtsha mos bsrung bar 'gyuraro//byang phyogs yul she na zhe zhes bya bar de bzhin gshegs pa'i gzugs brnyan shin+da na zhes bya ba pa'i
346a5(mdo sde): 'og nas 'byung bar 'gyur zhing yul gyis mtshams bsrung bar 'gyu ro//de bzhin gshegs pa'i gzugs brnyan ki'u lang zhes bya ba gshegs nas/shar phyogs yul phye ma
346a6(mdo sde): zhes bya ba'i mkhar du bzhugs shing yul gyi sa mtshams bsrung bar 'gyuraro//de bzhin gshegs pa'i gzugs brnyan phye se zhes bya bar gshegs nas/byang phyogs kyi ri gla
346a7(mdo sde): rul 'od srung gi mchod rten drung du bzhugs shing /dge slong dgon pa pa rnams kyi dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed cing /de bzhin gshegs pa'i bstan pa dang /yul gyis mtshams
346b1(mdo sde): // ga yan na na na na/na tu rgyunan tshu dudu na na pa smra /ma pa ga
346b2(mdo sde): bde//de bzhin gshegs pa'i gzugs brnyan n+ya gon pa na zhes bya ba zhugs shing /mkhar dge bcan zhes bya ba yul dang bcas pa'i sa mtshams bsrung bar 'gyur ro//
346b3(mdo sde): gtsug lag khang den d+ha zhes bya bar de bzhin gshegs pa myu me mdzad kyi gzugs brnyan kod du byas pa ga shegs pa /gzugs bya rnyan da ni 'dun
346b4(mdo sde): sno khong du byas pa/thams cad kyi thog mar 'byung ba yin//gzugs brtan de/li rnams kyis mtshan 'khor ba'i mar mi mdzad ces bya bar 'dogs pa'i 'gyur te/de na
346b5(mdo sde): yul gyi gzugs brnyan por kong du bye thams cang gi dper 'gyur 'dri bar gshegs pa rdul dang bcas pa yongasu srung bar 'gyu //gzhan mang bzhin gshegs
346b6(mdo sde): na chen mang gyi gzugs parnyan tshul 'drar dbu sa gshegs /'gas bcu'i marnam tsud par mang du// mying dang na 'i de
347a1(mdo sde): phyogasan bzhugs pa de dag mchod gnas su byed pa de srid du/yul 'di brlag par mi 'gyur ro//yul 'di nas skyes pa'i mi 'am/yul gzhan nas skyes/
347a2(mdo sde): pa'i mi mi snyan zhig de bzhin gshegs pa'i gzugs brnyan de dag la snying theg pa nas dad pa dang /gus pa dang /rab tu dang par byed cing /'di snyam du bde bar gshegs
347a3(mdo sde): pa'i gzugs brnyan 'di dag na/yul 'di bsrung ba'i slad du gshegs snyam du yang sems na/gzugs brnyan de dag kyang sangs rgyas bzhugs pa bzhin don mdzad par 'gyur ro///
347a4(mdo sde): de ci'i slad du zhe na/gzugs de dag nga dang 'dra bar dus gsum du thogs pa'i sangs rgyas thams cad kyis byin gyis brlabs pa'i phyir//gzhan yang yul 'dir nga'i gzugs brnyan
347a5(mdo sde): chen po shing rjes 'dren pa byas te/mkhar dag bA can zhes bya ba'i nang du bzhugs nas/mchod gnas tshon por byed par 'gyur ro//de nas yul 'dir phyogs dang phyogs mtshams
347a6(mdo sde): nas/tshong dpon chen po rnams 'ong bar 'gyur zhing /gnod pa rnams kyang zhi bar 'gyur ro//gzhan yang yul 'dir de bzhin gshegs pa'i gzugs brnyan nyis brgya rtsa
347a7(mdo sde): brgyad/'od srung gi mchod rten dang bcas par 'byung bar 'gyur te/de dag thams cad kyang cho 'phrul chen po ston cing sems can rnams kyi sdig pa chen po yongasu sbyong ba dang /
347b1(mdo sde): gnod pa sel ba mdzad par 'gyuraro//yul 'dir gnod pa dang /'jigs pa dang /skrag pa 'ba' zhig byung na/yul 'di ched du phyogs lngar sbyor ba byas te/rgyal ba
347b2(mdo sde): dang /blon po rnams yul 'dzin pa grang zhig 'jigs dang bral bar bya ba'i phyir/bde bar gshegs pa'i bstan pa las bsod nams skyed par 'dod na/gtsug lagu khang tsar ma
347b3(mdo sde): zhes bya bar bsod nams bya'o//de ci'i phyir zhe na/yul 'di'i mi rnams kyi dad pa yang dag pa'i lta ba ni dang po gtsug lag khang de nas skye bar 'gyur//nam zhig li'i rgyal
347b4(mdo sde): podang //blon po dang /yul 'dzin pa rnams la gnod pa rnam pa sna tshogs zhig byung na/re glang du sngon yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gang na bzhugs pa'i sa gzhi
347b5(mdo sde): bskor bar bya'o//yul 'di'i sems can rnams las mi dge ba 'i shegs par 'dod na/mchod rten go ma sa la gan da'i gan du bshugs par bya'o//de ci'i phyir zhe na/
347b6(mdo sde): rten de ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das bzhugs pa bzhin du gang dag gis bskor ba 'am/me tog gam bdug pa 'am/dbyangs snga ma rol mo'i sgras mchod pa byas na/mtshams
347b7(mdo sde): medang lde yang nyams dmas par 'gyur na lce smos kyang ci dgas/yul 'di rgyal po dang /blon po dang /yul 'dzin pa 'am/gang zhig brtul zhugs chen po'i sdom pa yin par
348a1(mdo sde): 'dod pa des/rIng na klung sa de bzhin gshegs pa'i ga byas brnyan sa zhes bya ba dang /'di srung gi mtsho dz+nyAn spyod pa de'i dun la ts+tsha pa
348a2(mdo sde): bya'o//dana'i byim na na/yul 'di ches spyod pa yongs rmugs pa dang /tshul khrims yong su dag pa'o/de nas 'byung bar 'gyur ba'i phyir ro//sum 'di ma la la zhin
348a3(mdo sde): chen po zhig la thug ma dang de glang rtswa gnas pa'i 'jigs pa'i dge 'dun la sbyabasu 'greb /des na tshang pa chen po de las thor bar 'gyu//'phyir na/
348a4(mdo sde): gnas de na thar pa thob pa stong phrag du ma'i mtha'i bar du gnas shrIng ma sbyangs pa'i phyir te/rgyu ngas na glang du dang /mchod rten gams la gan da yul dang bcas po da ngan
348a5(mdo sde): gshegs pa rnams kyi chang khyu yin//de nas de'i tshe phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing dag nas/byang chub sems dpa' nyi khri lhags nas/bcom ldan 'das gang na ba de log su
348a6(mdo sde): thal mo sbyar ba btud de/dbyings gcig tu 'di skad ces gsol to//bcom ldan 'das bdag cag rnams kyis kyang /zabs sna tshogs kyis de bzhin gshegs pa'i spyod 'a
348a7(mdo sde): dang /yul 'di yong su bskyong bar bgyi/bsrung bar brtse zhing /ji srid du 'de bar gshegs pa'i bstan pa dang /dkon mchog gsum gnas shing /rgyal po dang /
348b1(mdo sde): blon po la sogs pa/me tshul khrims dang ldan pa dad pa can dang /yul chos dang 'thun par bgyid pa nga srid du songasu mi gtang zhing /yul 'dar dus su spyad lam dang cha lug
348b2(mdo sde): ci drung /ji lta bus sems can mang po'i bsod nams chen po yongasu smin par 'gyur ba dang /sangs rgyas nyid du sems bskyed par 'gyur ba dang /bsam gtan dang /
348b3(mdo sde): 'dzin la snyoms par 'jug par 'gyur ba dang /sangs rgyas nyid las phyir mi ldog par 'gyur ba de lta bu'i skye ba blang ba'i bslad du/kha cig gis ni rgyal rigs yongasu gzung
348b4(mdo sde): bar brgya/kha cig gis ni rab tu byung ba dang /khyim pa gzhan gyi tshe lugs yongasu gzungs par bgyi'o//bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/rigs kyi bu lagaso//
348b5(mdo sde): legs so//rigs kyi bu khyed rnams kyis 'di ltar bskal pa bzang po'i sangs rgyas thams cad kyi spyod yul dang /yul 'di gang du sems can rnams/sangs rgyas nyid las
348b6(mdo sde): phyir mi ldog par 'gyur byar de lta bu chu gang thob shig/yang de'i tshe lha rnam thos bu zhes bya ba dang /mi 'pham pa zhes bya ba la sogs pa lha thams cad kyis/bcom ldan 'ang
348b7(mdo sde): la 'di skad ces gsol to//bcom ldan 'das da ni byang chub sems dpa' chen po rnams kyis yul 'di bsrung ba'i slad mthu btangs pa dang /bcom ldan 'das kyi byin gyis
349a1(mdo sde): rlabs dang /mthus bdag cag rnams kyis kyang de bzhin gshegs pa'i spyod yul dang /byin gyis brlabs brlabs pa'i yul 'di/kun tu bsrung zhing yul
349a2(mdo sde): bar mi gtang ba'i slad du/brtson 'grus chen po'i shugs kyis 'bad par 'tshalo//gal ta yul 'dir gr-i gu la sogs pa gtum po 'dad pa ma mchis pa rnams dang /hor
349a3(mdo sde): dang /sum pa'i dmag dag mchi bar 'gyur na/de dag phan tshun nang 'khrugs 'byung ba dang /de dag gi 'khor nang mi mthun par 'gyur ba dang /'gum par 'gyur bar
349a4(mdo sde): bgyi'o//yang na de dag ci nus kyang 'dir mi mchi zhing /de bzhin gshegs pa'i bstan pa 'jig mi nus par bgyi ba'i slad du/gzhan gyi dbang du 'gyur bar bgyi'o//
349a5(mdo sde): gal te rgyu'i dmag dag mchis par gyur na/de dag gi sems dad par bgyi zhing sgyur yul 'di la phan 'dogs pa dang /phyis phul 'dir bsod nams bgyi ba'i dngos
349a6(mdo sde): dge ba rgya chen po bgyid du stsal to//nam zhig yul 'di'i sems can rnams la gnod par bgyid pa de'i tshe na yang phyir dad par bgyi zhing mdo 'di yang khong du chud par bgyid du
349a7(mdo sde): sprul to//gang gi tshe de dag ma 'ongs par dkon mchog gsum gyi yo byad la dbang 'tshal zhing mdangs 'phrog pa dang /sems can bsod nams dang ldan pa rnams la 'chi
349b1(mdo sde): na/bdag cag gi 'khor gan sbyin dang ba can dang /dad pa ma mchis bdu na nog dbang bsgyu N+ya/nas du lta da canas kyang yun ring ma zhaklag bar du chud par 'argya
349b2(mdo sde): zhing //rdul 'di 'jig mi nus par 'gro ba'i smad/mu ga dang /nad dang /pa ma gyi dmag mi mchi bar bgyid du stsal te//lci yul gyin rA rdzas de dag gis 'tshal po rnams kyang
349b3(mdo sde): dz+rami shes par ba zhing gang dang gang du sbyin dra'i yul de thams cad du yang smanA yon mi thogs shing 'khrug par bgyi'o//de dag gi yul 'dzin pa dang dmag dpon yang
349b4(mdo sde): rgyud par bgyi'o//bod kyi dmag rnams la yi de bzhin du rig par ts+tshi/gang gi tshe de dag chos dang 'thun par yul 'di 'dzin cing srung na ne/bdagu cag rnams kyis kya
349b5(mdo sde): de dag yongasu bskyang zhing rgyal bar 'gyur bar bgyi'o//na mi zhig bde bar gshegs pa'i bsnyen pa 'jig pa dang /yul gyi mi la gnod par bgyid pa de'i tshen/dmag rnams
349b6(mdo sde): nang 'khrug 'byung ba dang /dmag gi dpon yang tshe thung ngu chud par 'gyi ste/rgyas par ni snga ma bzhino//ma 'ongs pa'i dus na yul 'di'i rgyal po dang /blon po sems kyi
349b7(mdo sde): b+h+yatsan//bsod nams chung ba dang /dad pa med pa/dkon mchog gsum gyi dkor la 'jol tog tu rlom zhing /yul gyi rtsis mgo dang 'gal bar bgyid pa/nor rdzas
350a1(mdo sde): ma brtags pas go 'phang 'tsho lnga ba/sems can bsod nams dang ldan pa rnams la sun 'byin du rgol ba/ngo tsha med pa dang 'dus can/'dod pa'i yon
350a2(mdo sde): tan gyis ngoms mi myong ba/rab tu byung ba dag gis sems skyo ba la la dag 'byung bar 'gyur na/de dag ni bdag cag gis kyang yul 'di nas dbyung zhing yul dran pa gzhan dang
350a3(mdo sde): gzhan dag tu spyugs par bgyis te/tshul de lta bus yul 'di yongasu bskyang ba dang /bsrung bar bgyi'o//bcom ldan 'das slad ma rtsod pa'i dus na/yul 'di gzhig
350a4(mdo sde): par brtson pa'i sems can bdud kyi phyogs sdig pa bgyid pa/mthu stobaso dang ldan pa/yul dag tu sems can rnams kyi dad pa zlog par bgyid pa/sems gdug cing
350a5(mdo sde): brlang ba/lha dang klu dang gnod sprin dang srin po du ma zhig 'byung bar 'gyur la/de dag kyang bdag cag gi dbang du mi 'gyur na/de la bdag cag gis thabs ji ltar 'tshal/
350a6(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsol pa/rigs kyi bu khyed yid skyo bar ma byed cig/de ci'i phyir zhe na/gling bzhi pa 'di na/byang chub sems dpa' rnams dang /lha
350a7(mdo sde): mthu stobs che ba dang /klu dang gnod sbyin sa thob pa du me zhig gnas pa de dog la/sems 'jam pos mchod pa chen po byas te/mchod rten go ma sa la gnad dang /gtsug
350b1(mdo sde): lag khyang tsar ma la sogs pa/rdul byin gyis brlabs brlabs pa rnams/theg pa chen po'i sde snod shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /'dus pa chen po dang /sangs rgyas
350b2(mdo sde): phal po che dang /dkon mchog brtsegs pa la sogs shin tu rgyas pa'i ste mang po lhogs shig dang /yul so so nas byang chub sems dpa' sa bcu pa la sogs pa dang /mthu
350b3(mdo sde): stobs che ba'i sems can de dag yul 'dir 'ongs nas/chos kyi ro mnos shing /dus gsum du gtogs pa'i de bzhin goshegs pa rnams kyi dam tshig las mi 'gal bar byed//
350b4(mdo sde): bskal pa bzang po'i sangs rgyas rnams kyi spyod yul dang /yul yang bsrung bar byed/yul 'di'i mi dang bstan pa yang bsrung bar byed par 'gyuraro//gzhan yang ma 'ongs pa'i
350b5(mdo sde): dus na/yul dge ba 'di'i rgyal po mthu chung bar 'gyur te/mthu chung ba des na/rang gi mthu stobs kyis yul mi thub pas/rgyal po dad pa can gzhan 'di lta ste/rdo kyi
350b6(mdo sde): rgyal po dang /rgya'i rgyal po la sogs pa la skyabs brtsal nas yul bsrung bar byed do//de tsA'i phyir zhe na/ma 'ongs pa'i dus na/rgya dang bod kyi yul du dkon mchog gsum
350b7(mdo sde): gnas shing /mchod gnas chen por byed pa dang /yul de dag kyang byang chub sems dpa' chen po'i gan su 'gyur zhing /sems can de dag kyang byang chub chen po'i lamatshil
351a1(mdo sde): ba'i ngang tshul can/theg pa chen po la dad pa'i ting 'dzin la gzhol bar 'gyur te/de dag gi mthu stobs kyis li yul gyi mi dang /dkon mchog gsum brlags
351a2(mdo sde): par mi 'gyur ro//skyes bu dam pa khyed rnams kyis kyang bod dang /rgya'i rgyal po dang /blon po dag ci nas mchod rten go ma sa la gan da dang /yul dge ba 'di la ri mo byed par 'gyur
351a3(mdo sde): ba dang /yul 'di bsod nams bya ba'i dngos po dge ba rgya chen po byed par 'gyur ba dang /yul 'di'i mi nyi 'og dad pa med pa'i yul gzhan du 'khyams pa rnams kyang //sdug bsngal
351a4(mdo sde): dang bral zhing bde bar rang gi yul du bskyal nas/phyir yang dag pa'i lta ba can dang /bsod nams la dga' bar 'gyur bar sems sgyur cig dang /dge ba'i rtsa ba de'i stobs
351a5(mdo sde): kyis/skyes bu dam pa khyed rnams kyi dge ba'i rtsa bo dang /mdangs dang gzi brjid dang /'khor 'phel bar 'gyur zhing sangs rgyas nyid du yang nye bar 'gyur gyis/dus gsum
351a6(mdo sde): du btogs pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi gdams ngag la byas pa gzo bar gyis shig/'di ltar yul 'di'i sems can rnams ni phyir mi ldog pa/byang chub sems da
351a7(mdo sde): las dang ldan pa/snying rje dang ldan pa/bden pa dang ldan pa/gtong phod pa/phrag dog dang /khon du 'dzin pa rnam par spangs pa/byas pa gzo ba chos la dga' bo/yang dag pa'i
351b1(mdo sde): lta ba can/log pa'i lta ba thams cad rnam par spangs pa/sems 'jam par 'gyur te/rgyu des na dge ba rnams shes bya'o//yul 'di mkhar yang mi byams pa dang /'jam pa'i
351b2(mdo sde): sems dang ldan pa rnams dang /mchod rten dang /gtsug lag khang du sems brgyan par 'gyur te/de'i phyir mkhor dge ba can zhes bya'o//gzhan yang yul gzhan dag
351b3(mdo sde): nas/sems can dad pa med pa dang /snga mkhon du 'dzin pa dag yul 'dir 'ongs pa kun/yul 'di'i rdul gyis rig cing /yul 'di nas 'khrungs pa 'tsho ba la longs spyod na//
351b4(mdo sde): de dag thams cad kyi sems bsgyur nus/sems 'jam pa dang /byams pa'i bsam paM dang /khro ba dang /khon du 'dzin pa spangs pa dang /dad pa dang /yang yul 'dir sdig
351b5(mdo sde): pa mi byed par 'gyur te/yulo 'di ni yon tan 'di dag dang ldan pa yin//de nas de'i tshe sngar sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyis lan gsum gyi bar du byin gyis brlabs nas/
351b6(mdo sde): 'od gzer thugs rje chen po dang bcas te bkye ba des/chu na gnas pa'i sems can rnams kyi sems yongasu dag pa dang /bde ba dang ldan par byas nas chu'i nang nas slar te/phyogs
351b7(mdo sde): bcu'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad du khyab par gyur to//yang 'od gzer de dag log nas/byang chub sems dpa' chen po rnams kyis yul byin gyis brlabs pa dang /nyan thos chen
352a1(mdo sde): po rnams kyis yul byin gyis brlabs pa dang /mtsho'i nang nas byung ba'i pad+mo'i steng na/de bzhin gshegs pa'i gzugs brnyan bzhugs pa de dang de dag gi 'od gzer
352a2(mdo sde): de dang 'dres nas na mkha' las 'phags te/steng gi na mkha' khebs par gyur cing /li yul thams cad du lha'i me tog gi char pha'o//lha'i me tog de dag phan tshun du reg pa las chos kyi
352a3(mdo sde): sgo mo 'di lta ste/sangs rgyas dang /chos dang dge 'dun gyi mtshan dang /yang dag pa'i lta ba dang /shes rab dang /tshul khrims dang /dge ba'i rtsa ba dang /de bzhin gshegs
352a4(mdo sde): pa rnams kyi dka' ba spyad pa dang /smon lam dang /byang chub sems dpa'i rdzu 'phrul dang /sems can yongasu smin par byed pa dang /dge sbyong gi 'bras bu bzhi po rgyun tu zhugs
352a5(mdo sde): pa dang /lan cig phyir 'ong ba dang /phyir mi 'ong ba dang /dgra bcom pa dang /khams gsum gyi srid pa las nges par 'byon pa dang /rnam par thar pa'i sgo gsum dang /'du
352a6(mdo sde): byed 'jigapa dang /dran pa nye bar gzhag pa dang /'phags pa'i bden pa dang /rdzu 'phral gyi rkang pa dang /bsam gtan dang /bsdu ba'i dngos po dang /so so yang dag
352a7(mdo sde): por rig pa dang /gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi dang /dbang po yongasu dag pa dang /byang chub kyi phyogs dang 'thun pa'i chos mtha' dag gi sgra 'byin par 'gyur ro//

359b7(mdo sde): par 'dzin du bcug/yang dag par gzeng bstod/yang dag par rab tu dga' bar mdzad/sems dga' ba lus su rung ba dang /rab tu dga' ba'i sems dang /sgrib pa
360a1(mdo sde): med pa'i sems dang /tha ba med pa'i sems kyi bcom ldan 'das kyi bka' gang yin pa shes nas dge slong ma gzugs bzang mo dga' ba'i bsam pa dang /las su rung

360b1(mdo sde): las rgal zhing som nyi spangs te/tha snyad rnams dang bral zhing dri ma med pa thob pas gzhan gyi rkyen gyis mi bkri bar ston pa'i bstan pa la chos kyi rje su 'brang bas//bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la//

365a2(mdo sde): ba dang mun pa gnyi su skyes pa dang /gdol pa'i skye gan su skyes pa yang bram ze dam pa rnams dang /dman pa khyed dang 'brel par 'dod pa ji ltar ma rmongs/gdol

366a2(mdo sde): can rnams la gnod pa bya bar bram ze rnams rab tu ston to//byad dang ro langs kyi las bram ze rnams rab tu ston to//las mi bzad pa rnams la yang bsod nams yin par bram ze

366a5(mdo sde): mi ston/mdza' bo dang gnyen dang /bdag nyid kyang yul na gnas pa sngags de bzlas nas yang mtho ris su 'gro ba drug pa rnams ci'i phyir mi gtong thams cad chom pas dus
366a6(mdo sde): cig tu bde 'gro mchog tu 'gro bar 'gyur na/ci'i phyir phyugs rnams kyi bdag nyid kyis phyir mi byed/bde 'gro mtho ris sur lug 'gro bar bstan par mi bya ste/mtho ris kyi
366a7(mdo sde): lam de dag ma yin te/brdzun bstan pa yin no//bram ze rnams sdang ba'i sems kyis sha bza' bo 'dod pas rnam grangs du mas thabs bsams te/phyugs rnams bsad pa'i
366b1(mdo sde): cho ga bstan pa yin no//gzhan yang bdag gis bram ze rnams kyi cho ga gang yin pa brjod par bya ste/rig byed bzhi las sdig pa'i bya bar bstan te/gser rku ba dang /char 'thung dang /
366b2(mdo sde): bla ma'i chung ma spyod pa dang /sdom pa'i tshogs ni 'jig pa ste//sdig pa bzhi ru bram ze 'dod//gser chu ba ni spang bar bya//de bzhin las gzhan sdig yod min//bram ze gang gis gas
366b3(mdo sde): rkus na//de dag bram ze min par 'dod//chang ni btung bar mi bya ste//gzhan ni btung bar bya bar 'dod//bram ze gang zhig chang 'thung ba//de dag bram zer mi 'gyuraro//bla ma'i chung
366b4(mdo sde): me spyad mi bya//gzhan gyi chung ma bgrod par bya//bla ma'i chung ma la 'gro ba//de dag bram zer mi 'gyur ro//bram ze gcig kyang gsad mi bya//bram ze min pa du ma gsad//gang zhig
366b5(mdo sde): bram ze gsod byed pa//de dag bram zer mi 'gyuraro//bzhi po de dag gang yin pa//bram ze rnams la sdig par gyur//de dag las gzhan sdig med 'dod//bzhi po de las gcig byas na//
366b6(mdo sde): de ni bram ze yin mi 'gyur//bram ze rnams ni tshogs pa ru//chud min phyag kyang mi bya'o//stan dang chu rnams mi btab cing //bsu bar yang ni mi bya'o//bram ze nyams pa de la yang //de ni
366b7(mdo sde): 'byung ba'i thabs snang ste//de yis lo ni bcu gnyis su//bong bu'i lpags pa bgo bya zhing //kha T+wAM kha ni thogs par bya//thod pa'i nang du bza' bor bya//dka' thub 'di ni bzung bar bya//
367a1(mdo sde): nges par rgyun ni ma bcad par//gang gis brtul zhugs yang dag blangs//phyir yang bram zer 'gro bar 'gyur//lo ni bcu gnyis tshangs pa ni//phyi nas de ni bram zer/
367a2(mdo sde): 'gyur//de ni 'byung ba'i thabasu bstan//bram ze yi ni dka' thub yin//rmongs pas las ni ngan po ste//'byung ba med par bstan par bya//bram ze de ni 'di lta ste//'ad shes tha mal
367a3(mdo sde): tsam nyid du//'jig rten gang yin brjod par byed//bram ze'ang de lta'o//rgyal rigs kyang de lta bu'o//rje'u rigs kyang de lta bu'o//dmangs rigs kyang de lta bu yin//de dag thams
367a4(mdo sde): cad de lta bu yin pas rnam pa thams cad du bdag gi bu gzhon nu stug sna la bram ze'i bu mo gzugs bzung mo chung ma'i don du byin cig/rin gang bab pa de 'dod pa'i de bzhin du
367a5(mdo sde): gcal bar bya'o//gdol pa'i rgyal po tri shang ku las de lta bu'i tshig thos pa dang /bram ze pad+ma'i snying po mchog tu khros 'khrugs shing /don de la yid sdang bas de'i rkyen
367a6(mdo sde): gyis dpral po'i khro gnyer gsum bsdus nas/kha nas du ba 'thul zhing ne le ltar ser skyar gyur pas rnam par sgyur zhing gdol pa'i rgyal po tre shang ku la 'di skad ces smraso//
367a7(mdo sde): dmangs rigs khyod ma brtags par 'di lta bu'i tha snyad kyis 'jig rten rnams mnyam zhing rigs gcig cing tha dad pa ma yin par ston nam/'di ltar ji ltar dman pa'i rigs/
367b1(mdo sde): blam rig byed par ma byin//dman pa'i rag su gyur pa yin//rnam par nyams par khyod 'dod dam//rgyal por gyur nas de dmanal//byA brag byung bar shes pa med//'di lta /spru
367b2(mdo sde): khrims dang /grong khyer gyi khrims dang /grong gi khrims dang /ljongs kyi khrims dang /sho gam gyi lugs dang /bag mo gting ba'i khrims dang /bag ma len pa'i khrim
367b3(mdo sde): dang /sngon gyi las kyi chos rnams kyang mi shes so//rigs ni bzhi po 'di dag yin te/'di lta ste/bram ze'i rigs dang /rgyal rigs dang /rje'u rigs dang /dmangs rigs

368a2(mdo sde): las skyes pa yino//dmangs rigs rnams kyi bu ni gcig tu 'gyur te/dmangs rigs mo las skyes pa yin//kye dman pa bram ze rnams kyi bu ni lus kyi stod kha nas skyes pa yino//brang
368a3(mdo sde): las ni rgyal rigs skyes pa yin no lte ba la ni rje'u rigs skyes pa yin no//rkang pa nas ni dmangs rigs skyes pa yin te/kye dman pa nges par bram ze rnams ni 'jig rten thams cad

368a5(mdo sde): dman pa khyod rigs de lta bu bzhi pa yin par mi mthong ngam/bdag rigs kyi mchog/rigs kyi gtso bo//phul du byung ba rigs kyi rab mchog dam par gyur pa dang /yang dag

368b1(mdo sde): rgyal rigs rnams so//de nas rje'u rigs te gsum pa'o//de nas ni dmangs rigs te bzhi pa yin par 'dod do//zhes bstan pa la rkang pa dang bcas pa/brla dang bcas pa dang lag pa dang /

369a1(mdo sde): rigs//skyes pa bud med mtshan mas phye//rkang pa lag pa 'thun pas na//dul rigs kyi bu gang gis 'dod//mgo ba dang ni brang rnams dang //lpags pa dbang po'i
