523a4(mdo sde): dga' ma ste gsum po ni bdud kyi bu mo bdag cag gi pha ni ma mthong bar gyur pas de ma thag par gA na yod dam zhes blta zhing rgyu ba ni de yid mi bde ba thob par gyur te/
523a5(mdo sde): sa la ri mo byed pa mthong nas pheM dang nye bar song ste pha gang gi phyir sdug bsngal zhing yid mi bde bar byed zhes driso//bu mo dge sbyong chen po 'di bdag gi dbang du byed pa las
523a6(mdo sde): 'das so zhes 'di rnams kyi dus su bltas pas skyon cung zad kyang ma mthong //de'i phyir bdag sdug bsngal zhing yid mi bde ba skyeso//'di ltar gyur na de ltar ma bsam/
523a7(mdo sde): gcig bdag cag gsum gyi de dbang du byas nas khrod la 'ong //smras pa/bu mos mi nus te sus kyang dbang du bya bar mi nus pas skyes bu 'di ni mi g.yo ba'i dod pa la
523b1(mdo sde): gnas//smras pa/pha bdag cag bud med yin pas da lta nyid du de la 'dod chags kyi zhags pas bcings te khrid la 'a //khyed ma sems cig/de nang bud med du
523b2(mdo sde): rnams bcom ldan 'das dang nye bar song ste dge sbyong khyed kyi zhabs la bsnyen bkur bdag cag gis bgyi'o//zhes smraso//bcom ldan 'das nyid kyis de rnams kyi tshig la
523b3(mdo sde): thugs ma gtad do//spyan rnam par grol ba yang ma gzig so//ji ltar de bla na med pa'i nye bar skye ba zad pa rnam par grol ba'i bsam pas dben pa'i bde ba nyid la nyam su
523b4(mdo sde): myong bar mdzad cing bzhug so//gzhan yang bdud kyi pus mo bsam pa mang zhing skyes bu dang mtshungs pa'i sems//gang dang gang gzhon la dga' bar 'gyur ro//gang dang
523b5(mdo sde): gang zhig na tshod dang por gyur pa la dga' ba dang /gang dang gang zhig na tshong por ma gyur pa la dga' ba dang /gang dang gang zhig na ched phyi mar gyur pa la dga' ba'o//
523b6(mdo sde): bdag gis de lta bu'i rnam pa sna tshogs pa'i 'od la chags par bgyi'o zhes smras nas/bu mo re res gzhon nu'i ma'i gzugs la sogs pa'i brgya phrag brgya phrag gis
523b7(mdo sde): bdag nyid kyi lus smra'o//gzhon nu ma'i gzugs dang lang 'tsho ma'i gzugs dang /dang po bu dang bu mo len cig skyes pa'i gzugs dang /bar ma'i bud med
524a1(mdo sde): kyi gzugs dang /lus rags mor gyur nas lan drug tu bcom ldan 'das dang nye bar song nas/dge sbyong khyod kyi zhabs la bdag drug gis
524a2(mdo sde): bsnyen bkur bgyi'o//zhes smraso//bcom ldan 'das kyis de rnams kyi tshig la yang thugs ma gtad do//ji ltar de bla na med pa'i nye bar skye ba rnam par grolo//gzhan
524a3(mdo sde): yang slob dpon gang zhig 'di skad smra'o//de rdzu 'phrul dang ldan pas bud med 'ongs pa la lta zhing bcom ldan 'das 'di lta bu'i gzugs kyis 'di rnams so bya ba dang /

524a5(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das kyiso ci mthong 'di lta bu'i 'bad pa byed pa gsong gcig/'di lta bu'i tshul gyis 'dod chags dang mo bral ba la sogs pa'i mdun du bya bar rig so//
524a6(mdo sde): de bzhin gshegs pas slar yang 'dod chags spangs shing nyes pa spangs pa dang gti mug spangs pas rang gi 'dod chags spangs pa'i phyir//gang zhig rgyal ba de la
524a7(mdo sde): rgyal mi nus//gang zhig 'jig rten 'dir ni rgyal mi 'gyur//mtha' yas sangs rgyas spyod yul de mi gnas//rkang med kyis ni rkang yod la mi nus//gang gi sred
524b1(mdo sde): pa'i dra ba bton gyur nas/de ba sred pa rnams ni cung zad med//mtha' yas sangs rgyas spyod yul de nyid la//rkang med po yis rkang yod la mi nus//'dir ni sangs rgyas
524b2(mdo sde): kyi chos mchog gi sde las tshig su bcad pa gnyis gsungs nas chos snyan to//bu mo rnams la pha zer ba yang bden pa yino//dgra bcom pa bde bar gshegs pa
524b3(mdo sde): 'jig rten na ma'i mchog yino zhes smras nas lha dang ny+dza bAr so //bcom ldan 'das kyis kyang 'dir zhag bdun bzhugs nas btang zung gi gnasu gshegaso//der
524b4(mdo sde): zhag bdun du sku la yul ngan par grang ba zhi bar bya ba'i phyir klu'i rgyal po btang zung zhes bya ba lus kyi lan bdun du ngakris nas/gdeng ka byaso//dri'i gtsang khang shin
524b5(mdo sde): tu yangs par bzhugs pa bzhin rnam par grol ba dang ba~M de bu so sor rigs par byed cing zhag bdun du bzhugs nas shing rA dza ya ta na dang nye bar gshegaso//der yang
524b6(mdo sde): rnam par grol ba dang bde ba so sor rigs par byed pa nyid kyis bzhug so//de rnams kyis re zhig zhag bdun phrag bdun yongasu rdzog so//de rnams kyi bar du zhal
524b7(mdo sde): shol ba med par dang /sku la byi dor byed po med pa dang zhal zas gsol pa med par gyur to//bsam gtan gyi bde ba dang /lam gyi bde ba dang /'bras bu'i
525a1(mdo sde): bde ba nyid kyis nyan mtshan 'da'o//de nas de'i bdun phrag bdun gyi mthar gcag gis dman pa'i lnga bcu'i mtha'i nyi ma la der bzhugs nas zhal
525a2(mdo sde): shol ba'i thugs skyeso//lha'i dbang po brgya byin phyis a ru ra mchog blangs nas phul lo//ston pas de gsol bas sku dngas par gyur to//de nas brgya byin nyid
525a3(mdo sde): kyis so rtsi'i so shing nyid kyi so shing dang /zhal-i shol ba'i chu phu lo//ston pas so shing blangs nas so brud de mtsho chen po ma dros pa'i chus zhal ba sha lo//de nyid
525a4(mdo sde): du shing rA dza ya ta nA'i drung du bzhug so//de'i tshe ga gon dang bzang po zhes bya ba'i tshong dpon gnyis shing rta lnga brgya dang bcas pa lho phyogs kyi ljongs nas yul dbusu
525a5(mdo sde): 'gro ba na reng nyid kyi sngar gyi gnyer/ltar gyur pas shing rta thams cad bying nas 'gro bar mi nus par byin gyis brlabs pas ston pa la kha zes ster ba'i phyir skye ba
525a6(mdo sde): skyes//sbrang bsrubs pa'i 'khor ba'i gong bu blangs nas/btsun pa bcom ldan 'das bza' ba 'di thugs rje chen po skyed la so sor bzhes par zhu zhes ston
525a7(mdo sde): po'i drung du nye bar 'khod do//bcom ldan 'das 'o thug bzhes pa'i nyin mo nyid lhung bzed mi snang ba'i phyir de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi yang phyag gis
525b1(mdo sde): len nam 'on kyang lhung bzed kyis smyung zhes bsamaso//de nas sems kyis shes nas/phyogs bzhi'i rgyal po chen po bzhi po rnams kyis nor bu en+d+ra ni la'i lhung bzed blangs pa/
525b2(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das kyis ma gnang ngo //slar yang sran ma mung+ga'i kha dog can gyi rdo las byung ba'i lhung bzed bzhi phulo//bcom ldan 'das kyi lha'i bu bzhi po rnams la rjesu bcu
525b3(mdo sde): bas lhung bzang bzhi po bzhes te steng nas steng du brtsegs nas bzhag te gcig tu 'gyur bar byin gyis brlab so//bzhi po yang lta ba'i phyir du kha la ri mo bzhir gyur te/lhung
525b4(mdo sde): bzed 'bring po'i tshad cig tu gyur to//bcom ldan 'das la de'i so sor phul ba ron thang med pa'i rdo las byung ba'i lhung bzed du bza' ba'i phyir du bzhes nas yongasu longs
525b5(mdo sde): spyad nas rje su yi rang bar mdzad do//tshong dponi spyan gnyis sangs rgyas dang chos la skyabasu 'gro zhing tshig gnyis pa'i dge bsnyen du gyur to//de nis de rnams kyis btsun

525b7(mdo sde): khyer du byed song nas mchod rten bzheng so//yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyis kyang de nas bzhengs nas slar yang ra lug skyong ba'i shing n+ya gro d+ha nyid du gshegs nas shing
526a1(mdo sde): n+ya gro d+hA'i drung du bzhug so//de nas de nyid du bzhugs tsam nyid na rang gis lhag par rtogs pa'i zab mo'i chos so sor bsam zhing sangs rgyas rnams
526a2(mdo sde): kyis lhag par rtogs la 'di ni chos//gzhan gyis chos ston par mi nus par bsams nas rab tu 'jug pa'i rnam pa'i rnam par rtog pa skyeso//de nas mi 'byod kyi bdag
526a3(mdo sde): po tshangs pa 'jig rten nyams par 'gyur ba'i phyiraro zhes bsams nas/stong phrag bcu'i khor yug gi brgya byin dang /mtha' bral bzong po dang /dga' ldan dang /
526a4(mdo sde): 'phrul dga' dang /gzhan 'phrul dbang byed dang /tshangs pa chen po rnams khrid nas ston pa'i drung du phyin nas/btsun pa bcom ldan 'das chos stan du gsol/dang

526a6(mdo sde): mkhas pa kun len de'i chos 'di myur du shes par 'gyur ba'i thugs skyeso//slor yang gzigs te de dus las 'das nas zhag bdun lon par rtog so//'char byed la
526a7(mdo sde): brtags pa de yang dus las 'das par mkhyen//dge slong lnga sngas bdog la bsnyen bkur mang po byas pas lnga sde'i ched du bsams nas de rnams gang na gnas pa yin
526b1(mdo sde): zhes brtag so//grong khyer bA ra Na si'i ri dwags rgyu ba'i nags tshal na yod par mkhyen//der gshegs nas chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ro zhes dgongs nas zhag 'ga' zhig tu byang

526b3(mdo sde): mthar nam langs pa na shin tu snga ba nyid du lhung bzed dang rnam sbyar bsnams nas dpag tshad bco brgyad yod pa'i lam la gshegs shing lam gyi bar du nye bar gnas

526b5(mdo sde): lnga sdes de bzhin gshegs pa byon pa ring po nyid nas mthong ste/dge sbyong gau ta ma 'di bza' ba mang po'i phyir lus yongasu rdzogs par gyur//dbang po yongasu rdzogs
526b6(mdo sde): bar gyur/gser gyi kha dog tu gyur nas 'ong gis//'di la phyag la sogs pa mi bya'o//'di rigs chen por skyes pa tsam yin pas gdun shom pa tsam 'oso//de'i
526b7(mdo sde): phyir gdan tsam rig so zhes gtam byed//bcom ldan 'das lha dang bcas pa'i 'jig rten rnams kyi sems dang spyod pa shes par nus pa'i ye shes yod//de yang 'di
527a1(mdo sde): rnams ji ltar sems pa yin zhes bsams nas sems shes pa yin//de nas lha dang mi thams cad la mthong ba med pa'i dbang gis thams
527a2(mdo sde): cad du khyad par nus pa'i byams pa'i sems yang dag par bsdus nas/ma mthong ba'i dbang gis byams pa'i sems kyis khyab par bcom ldan 'das kyis bsgoms
527a3(mdo sde): nas de bzhin gshegs pa nyaM bar gshegs shing gshegs pa ni/sar gyi bca' khrims rnams gnas par mi nus pas phyag phul zhing bsrung ba dang bsnyen bkur thams
527a4(mdo sde): cad byaso//gzhan yang dge slong de rnams yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas grub pa mi shes pa'i phyir ming brjod pa na tshe dang ldan pa zhes smra ba tha mal pa'i tshig brjod

527a6(mdo sde): dge slong dag da ni de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyaso zhes bdag nyid sangs rgyas grub par byed pa dang /gdan bshams pa
527a7(mdo sde): mchog la sangs rgyas bzhugs te/rgyu sker bre mchog gsum 'dzom pa la bye ba phrag bco brgyad kyi tshangs pa'i 'khor gyis bskor nas gnas brtan lnga sde bos te chos
527b1(mdo sde): kyi 'khor lo bskor ba'i mdo'i mthar bshad//de rnams la gnas brtan kun shes kau Di n+ya bshad pa'i rjesu 'brangs nas ye shes thob pa mdo'i mthar bye ba phrag bco brgyad

527b4(mdo sde): lto bu'i thangs nyid kyis slar yang nyi ma phyi ma la gnas brtan bzang ldan dang /slar yang nyi ma phyi ma la gnas brtan ming can dang /slar yang nyi ma phyi me la gnas brtan

527b6(mdo sde): pa'i mthar gnas brtan lnga sdes dgra bcom pa'i 'bras bu thob po//de nas ston pas rigs kyi bu grags pa nye bar mi rten par gzigs nas/de'i mtshan mo'i char sdug
527b7(mdo sde): bsngal sems kyi khyim spangs nas/'thon pa la gregs pa 'dir shog ces bos nas mtshan mo de nyid kyi cha la rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu dang slar yang nyi ma gnyis pa la
528a1(mdo sde): dgra bcom pa'i 'bras bu grub par byed do//gzhan yang slar yang grogs po lnga bcu rtsa bzhis rab tu byung zhi ba dge slong du gyur nas dgra bcom par
528a2(mdo sde): byed do//'di ltar 'jig rten du dgra bcom pa drug cu rno gcig tu gyur to//ston pas dbyar bzhugs nas dgag dbye byas te/dge slong drug cu po rnams phyogs
528a3(mdo sde): phyogasu gtang nas/rang nyid steng rgya su gshegs pa'i bar gyi lam na ras bal can gyi tshal ni dpag tshad bcu pa'o//gzhonu bzang sde brtul lo//de rnams las
528a4(mdo sde): thams cad kyi mtha'i phyi ma rgyun tu zhugs par gyur pa/thog ma ni phyir mi 'ong du gyur to//de rnams kyang dge slong gi gzugs kyis rab tu byung ba bgyis nas phyogs
528a5(mdo sde): phyogasu btang ste/steng rgyas su gshegaso//stong phrag phyed dang gsum gyi cho 'phrul lta zhing steng rgyas 'od srung la sogs pa'i spyan gsum po dang ral pa can stong
528a6(mdo sde): phrag gcig brtul po dge slong gi gzugs kyis rab tu byung bar byas nas ri bo gaM yi'i rtse mo na sdod pa rnams la nyi ma'i rnam grangs kyi mdo sde bstan nas dgra bcom
528a7(mdo sde): par byas te/des dgra bcom pa stong phrag rnams 'khor du byas nas rgyal po gzugs can snying po la khas blangs byin pa dgrol bar bya ba'i dgongs pas rgyal po'i
528b1(mdo sde): khab kyi grong khyer dang nye ba'i shing dpal gyi tshal du byan/skyed mos tshal skyong ba rnams kyis ston pa byon no zhes rgyal po la smraso//rgyal pos thos te/khri khrag bcu gnyis
528b2(mdo sde): kyi bram ze dang khyim bdag 'khor du byas nas ston pa dang nye bar song ste 'khor lo sna tshogs pa'i steng du gser gyi bla res dang 'dra ba'i 'od zer phyogs phyogasu 'phro zhing bzhug
528b3(mdo sde): pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa'i zhabs lo mgo bos phyag legs par byas nas 'khor dang bcas pa phyogs gcig tu 'khod do//de nas yang bram ze rnams dang khyim bdag
528b4(mdo sde): la sogs pa 'di lta bu'i sems gyur te/'on kyang dge sbyong chen pos steng rgyas 'od srung gI rje suM tshangs pa spyod pa spyad dam/yang na steng rgyas 'od srung gis dge
528b5(mdo sde): stong chen po'i rje su tshangs par spyod pa sprad ces pas mo//bcom ldan 'das kyis de rnams kyi sems kyi rtog po thugs kyis mkhyen nas gnas brtan la tshig su bcad
528b6(mdo sde): po gsungs//steng rgyas gnasu gnas nas ci zhig mthong //sbyin sreg 'dor ba'i rgyu mtshan ci zhig smra//'od srung 'di yi don ni dri bar bya//khyod kyi ji ltar sbyin sreg
528b7(mdo sde): spong ba yin//gnas brtan gyis kyang bcom ldan 'das kyis dgongs pa shes nas/gzugs dang sgra dang de bzhin ro dang dri//bud med 'dod pa yang ni mchod
529a1(mdo sde): sbyin spyod//'di rnams dri ma legs par rtogs byas nas//de phyir mi yi sbyin sreg 'di spang so//tshig su bcad pa 'di brjod nas rang nyid nyan thos
529a2(mdo sde): kyi 'dod pa gasngal bar bya ba'i phyir de bzhin gshegs pa'i zhabs kyi bol du mgo bos reg nas/bdag ston par btsun pa bcom ldan 'das kyi nyan thos yin no zhes
529a3(mdo sde): smras so//shing tA lo gcig dang shing tA la gnyis dang shing tA la gsum dang ji srid du shing tA la bdun gyi tshad tsam du na mkha' la 'phags nas babs te de bzhin gshegs
529a4(mdo sde): pa la phyag byas nas phyogs gcig tu 'khod do//de'i cho 'phrul blta zhing mi mang po rnams kyis e ma hohi sangs rgyas kyi mthu chen pos 'di lta bu'i blta ba bstan pas dgra bcom
529a5(mdo sde): pa zhes bya ba la sems shing /steng rgyas 'od srung gi blta ba'i dra ba bcad de bzhin gshegs pas brtul nas ston pa'i yon tan nyid brjod do//bcom ldan 'das kyis
529a6(mdo sde): kho bos 'dadi da lta kho na ma yin par steng rgyas 'od srung brtul lo//'das pa nyid du'ang 'di ngas brtul lo zhes brjod nas don 'di 'das pa ni ma sbyin chen po 'od srung gi skyes
529a7(mdo sde): rab su bshad pa'i bden pa bzhi po gsol bar bste no//de'i mod la yul ma ga d+hi'i rgyal po 'khor khri phrag bcu gcig dang bcas pas rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu thog/
529b1(mdo sde): khri phrag gcig dge bsnyen du gyur to//rgyal po ston pa dang nye ba nyid du 'dug ste bslab pa'i gzhi lha so sor rab tu thos nas skyabasu song ste sang gi gdugs tshod la 'gron du gnyer
529b2(mdo sde): nas/stan las langs te bcom ldan 'das la bskor ba byas nas song //slar yang sang gi snga dro nyid bcom ldan 'das mthong ba dang mi mthong ba rgyal po'i khab na gnas pa
529b3(mdo sde): rnams kyis bye ba phrag bco brgyad kyi grangs kyi mi rnams de bzhin gshegs pa blta bar 'dod pas sngo dro nyid rgyal po'i khab nas shing dngar gyi tshal du song ste rgyang grags bcu
529b4(mdo sde): gnyi su mi shing bar shing dngar gyi tshal thams cad rgyun mi 'chad par gyur to//mi thams cad kyis stobs bcu pa'i gzugs mchog thob par 'dod pa bdag nyid kyi sku la
529b5(mdo sde): blta bas tshim par ma nuso//'di lta bu'i sa gzhi'i kha dog yino//'di lta bu'i gzugs kyi gnasu de bzhin gshegs pa'i mtshan dang dpe byad bzang po la sogs pa'i
529b6(mdo sde): rab tu byed pa thams cad kyang gzugs kyi sku dpal gyi bsngags par bya bar 'os//'di ltar gzugs mchog thob pa'i stobs bcu pa'i sku lta ba'i phyir mi mang po rgyun mi 'chadado//
529b7(mdo sde): skyed mos tshal dang /lam du dge slong gcig gis kyang phyi ru 'thon pa'i skyabs med/nyi ma de'i dus na bcom ldan 'das kyi gdugs tshod yod pa lta bur gyur to//de
530a1(mdo sde): /ma thag par brgya byin sdod pa'i stan dra ba'i rnam par mthong ste/des rnam par rtag so//de'i rgyu mtshan shes nas bram ze'i khye'u'i gzugs su
530a2(mdo sde): mngon par sprul te/sangs rgyas dang chos dang dge 'dun so so la ji ltar rigs pa'i bstod pa brjod par byed do//stobs bcu pa'i sngun du ches nas lha'i mthus yis lam
530a3(mdo sde): thob par byas//'dul zhing 'dul ba'i grogs sngon bcas bram ze rnam grol ral pa dang //seng ge'i gzugs kyis 'thon nas no//bcom ldan rgyal po'i khab
530a4(mdo sde): nang byon//grol zhing grol ba'i grogs sngon bcas//bram ze rnam grol ral pa dang //seng ge'i gzugs kyis 'thon nas ni//bcom ldan rgyal po'i khab nang
530a5(mdo sde): byobyin//brgal zhing brgal ba'i grogs sngon bcas//bram ze rnam grol ral pa dang //seng ge'i gzugs kyis 'thon nas ni//rgyal po'i khab nang bcom ldan byon//bcu
530a6(mdo sde): po gsung ba'i stobs bcu pa//chos bcu la mkhas bcu la gnas//stong phrag bcu'i 'khor dang ldan//bcom ldan rgyal po'i khab nang byon//tshig suM bcad pa
530a7(mdo sde): 'dis ni ston pa la bsngags pas bstod cing sngun du 'gro ba'i mi rnams kyis bram ze'i khye'u'i gzugs kyi dpal mthong nas bram ze'i khye'u 'di shin tu gzugs bzang ba'o//
530b1(mdo sde): slar yang sngar mthong ba med do zhes bsams nas bram ze'i khye'u 'di gang na gnas pa lan/gang zhig gi yin zhes smraso//de thos nas bram ze'i khye'us smras pa/gang zhig

530b3(mdo sde): pas brgya byin gyis skabs phye ba'i las du dge slong stong phrag gcig 'khor du byas nas rgyal po'i khab kyi nang du gshegaso//rgyal pos sangs rgyas la sogs pa'i dge 'dun

531a2(mdo sde): chen po spangs nas sa gzhi g.yos pa 'di bzhes te/sde gzhan ni med do//ston pas 'od ma'i tshal gyi kun dga' ra ba bzhes nas rgyal po la rjesu yi rang bar

531b1(mdo sde): btsomu pa thog/gnas brtan shA ri'i bus zla ba byed nas dgra bcom pa thob pa ste/de gnyis po yang ston pa'i nyan thos kyi mchog tu gnas par gzung //gnas brtan

532a1(mdo sde): cad kyi mthar 'khod de ston pa'i chos bstan pa thos nas ji ltar 'khod pa nyid bzhin du skyes bu stong phrag gcig dang lhan cig tu dgra bcom pa thob
532a2(mdo sde): nus rab tu 'byung bar zhuso//bcom ldan 'das kyis btsun pa rnams 'dir shog ces phyag brkyango //thams cad de nyid du rdzu 'phrul las byung ba'i lhung bzed dang

532a4(mdo sde): zhig bar mAr gnas par gyur te/rgyal pos btang ba'i sprid yig stobs bcu pa la ma brjod do//rgyal pos btang ba'i mi rnams las gcig kyang ma byung
532a5(mdo sde): zhing spring yig kyang ma thos so//'dir shog la khyed song cig dang de lta bu'i nges pas blon po gzhan gcig btangango //des song nas yang sngar bzhin du 'khor dang

532b1(mdo sde): nga la mi dga' ba'i rgyu mtshan gyis spring yig tsam gyi lo rgyus kyang mi brjod do//su zhig nga'i tshig bzhin byed par sems/rgyal pos mi thams cad la brtags pas nag po 'char ka

534b1(mdo sde): rang nyid kyang na mkha' la gshegs nas bza' ba'i lhung bzed bzung ste/ston pa'i phyag tu phul nas ston pas kyang der bza' ba la longs spyod do//gnas brtan

535a1(mdo sde): me tog so so lag tu thogs te/bsu ba byed cing rgyan thams cad kyis so sor brgyan nas//zhonu rang gzhon ni grong khyer gyi khye'u dang bu mo sngar dang

535a5(mdo sde): lhan cig gzhon nu yi no//ded ni phu po yin no//'di ni sring mo'i bu yi no//'di ni tsha bo yin zhes bsams nas khye'u dang rgyal po'i gzhon nu zhes smras tes/khyed

535a7(mdo sde): rnams bdag la phyog mi byed par 'dod kyang da lta phyag byed du bzhugs dgos te/mngon par shes pa'i gzhi dang ye shes dang bsam gtan dang ldan par 'jug pa

535b2(mdo sde): par cho 'phrul mdzad do//rgyal pos de ya mtshan che ba mthong zhes smraso//bcom ldan 'das khyed 'khrungs pa'i nyin mo dka' thub pa nag po lce len gyis phyag byed cing
535b3(mdo sde): bar gnas pas khyed kyis zhabs bskyod pa bram ze'i spyi bo la nye bar gnaso//de mthong nas bdag gis kyang khyed la phyag byaso//'di ni bdag gi phyag dong po yino//bkra
535b4(mdo sde): shis pa'i 'bru 'dabs pa'i nyin mo 'dzam+bu'i shing gau grib ma'i dpal gyi lam stan la khyed bzhugs pa na shing 'dzim+bu'i grib mas ma btang bar mthong ba'i tshe yang
535b5(mdo sde): zhabs la phyag byaso//'di ni bdag gis phyag gnyis pa yino//da lta ni bdag giso sngar ma mthong ba'i cho 'phrul yang mthong bas khyed kyi zhabs la phyag bgyid do//
535b6(mdo sde): 'di ni bdag gi phyog gsum pa yino//slar yang rgyal pos bcom ldan 'das la phyag byed cing /phyag byed par mi nus pa'i shAkya'i rigs gcig kyang med do//
535b7(mdo sde): thams cad kyis kyang phyag byed pa nyid do//de nas bcom ldan 'das la nye du rnams kyis phyag byed cing na mkha'i las babs nas gdon bshams pa'i mchog gi gung
536a1(mdo sde): la bzhugs//bcom ldan 'das bzhugs nas ny-i du rnams dang 'dus par gyur pa thams rgyud sems gcig tu gnas//de nas sprin chen pa
536a2(mdo sde): las pad+ma'i 'dab ma la chu mi 'chags pa lta bu'i cha re 'beb so//chu drangs kyi me ga can sa la sgra sgrogs shing 'ba'o//'bang bar 'dod pa rnams 'bong //'byung
536a3(mdo sde): par mi 'dod pa rnams mi 'bod//thigs pa nam yang mi ltung//de mthong nas thams cad du yi mtshan pa dang rmad du byung ba skyes//oM maho mtshur che/e mra hA
536a4(mdo sde): rmad du byung zhes brjod par byed do//ston pas 'di kho na ma yin gyi bdag gi nye du dang phrad pa na pad+mo'i 'dab ma chu mi 'chags pa lto bu'i char 'bab shing 'das pa'i dus
536a5(mdo sde): su 'di nges pa'o//'di'i don byung ba ni thams cad sgrol gyi skye ba su bshad//chos snyan pa thos thams cad langs te phyag byas nas song //gcig gis kyang
536a6(mdo sde): rgyal po dang rgyal tshab dang blon po rnams sang bdag gi gnasu bsod snyoms khyer 'ong zhes smra ba song ba de rnams lngas gcig kyang ma byung //skon pas slar nyi ma gnyis
536a7(mdo sde): pa la stong phrag nyi shu'i dge slong 'khor du byas nas grang khyer ser skya'i gzhir bsod snyoms la bzhud//gang zhig 'gron du gnyer ba dang /lhung bzed khyer bsu
536b1(mdo sde): yang med do//bcom ldan 'das sgo drung du 'khod de rnam par brtags pas ji ltar sngon gyi sangs rgyas rnams kyi rigs kyi grong khyer du byon bsod snyoms mdzad pa bzhin du gang rje
536b2(mdo sde): lhar rigs par mi chen po'i khyim du 'gro zhing /yang na go rims bzhin du bsod snyoms spyod do//de nas sangs rgyas gcig gis kyang ji ltar rigs par gshegs pa
536b3(mdo sde): ma mthong bas bdag gis kyang da ni 'di'i rigaso//'di'i sngon gyi sangs rgyas kyi rigs bzhin du bdag gis kyang rigs par bzung bar bya'o//bdag gi nyan thos kyang bdag nyid
536b4(mdo sde): bzhin rjesu slob cing bsod snyoms la rdzogs par byon//'khod pa'i khyim nas bzung nas go rims bzhin du bsod snyoms la spyod do//'phags pa gzhon nu don grub bsod
536b5(mdo sde): snyoms la gsheg so zhes brjod do//nyes thog dang sum thog la sogs pa'i khang bzang rnamasu steng gi sgro chung phye nas mi thams cad blta bar gyur te lha mo sgra gcan 'dzin
536b6(mdo sde): gyi yum yang 'phags pa'i bu/grong khyer 'di nyid du rgyal po chen po'i mthus glaser gyi da li la sogs pa la zhon te de ring nas skra dang kha spu blugs shing ngur smrig
536b7(mdo sde): gi gos gyon nas/snod lag tu khyer te/bsod snyoms la 'gro ba mdzes sam mi mdzes zhes steng gi sgo chung phye nas blta'o//sna tshogs pa'i 'dod chags dang bral
537a1(mdo sde): ba yang dag par 'bar zhing sku lus kyi 'od kyi grong khyer gyi steng thams cad snang bar mdzad de/'dom gang ba'i 'od kun nas bskor zhing rab tu gsal
537a2(mdo sde): ba dpe byad bzang po brgyad cu dang ldan pa skyes bu chen po'i mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis kyis rgyan pas sangs rgyas kyi dpal dpe med par rnam par gsal ba mthong //gtsug
537a3(mdo sde): tor nas bzung nas zhabs kyis mthil gyi bar de srid do//dbu skra g.yas mkhyil 'jam nag snum pa dang //dpral ba dri med nyi ma'i mthil bzhi no//sku dang 'tshams
537a4(mdo sde): pa'i shangs ni mtho ba dang //mi yi seng ge 'od zer gsal bar mdzad//'di lta bu la sogs pa'i mi'i seng gi tshig su bcad pas mngon par bstod//khyed kyi sras
537a5(mdo sde): po bsod snyoms la spyod do//zhes rgyal po la smraso//rgyal po'i sems sdug bsngal bas gos nas bzung ste myur zhing myur bar phyir 'thon ste/bcom ldan 'das
537a6(mdo sde): kyi drung du 'khod nas smos pa/ci btsun pa bdag cag ngo tsha bas ci'i don du bsod snyoms mdzad/dge slong 'di rnams kyi bzo' ba bdag gis ster bar mi shes
537a7(mdo sde): bsams pa yang dag yin nam ci lags/rgyal po chen po'i rigs kyi spyod pa yino//btsun pa bdag cag shAkya'i rigs zhes bya ba'i rigaso//de la rgyal rigs
537b1(mdo sde): gcig kyang bsod snyoms byed pa'i ming tsam yang med do//rgyal po chen po'i rigs zhes bya ba ni khyod kyi rigs 'di yino//bka' stsal pa/rgyal po chen po mi dgyes pa ma
537b2(mdo sde): mdzad cig/slar yang bdag cag gis mar me mdzad dang ko'u Di n+ya dang 'od bsrung zhes bya ba 'di sangs rgyas kyi rigs yino//'di rnams dang gzhan sangs rgyas stong phrag
537b3(mdo sde): du mas kyang bsod snyoms spyod cing 'tsho bar mdzad la/srang gi dbus su 'khod pa nyid do//bag med lhag mar byed pa med//chos la spyod cing legs par spyod//chos la
537b4(mdo sde): spyad na bde ba 'byung //'jig rten 'di dang phyi mar bde//chos kyi rkang pa'i tshig su bcad pa'i di bstan cing bshad//tshigasu btsud pa'i mthar rgyal pos rgyun tu zhugs
537b5(mdo sde): po'i 'bras bu thob//chos spyod pa ni legs por spyod//nyes par spyod pa mi bya zhing //chos spyad pa yis bde ba 'byung //'jig rten 'di dang pha rol tu'o//slar
537b6(mdo sde): yang chos kyi rkang pa'i tshig su bcad pa 'di thos nas lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu thob par gyur to//chos skyong ba'i skyes rabs thob nas phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu
537b7(mdo sde): thob par gyur to//'chi ba'i dusu gdugs dkar po'i 'og tu dpal gyi mal stan gyi steng du gzoms pa nyid no dgra bcom pa thob par gyur to//dgon par gnas
538a1(mdo sde): nas dka' thub spyod pa rgyal po la dgos pa med do//rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu mngon du byas nas/slar yang bcom ldan 'das kyi lhung bzod bzung
538a2(mdo sde): ste/'khor dang bcas pa khyang bzangs chen po'i steng du spyan drangs nas gya nim pa'i bza' ba dang bcas pa rnams drangaso//gdugs tshod zin pa'i mthar sgra gcan 'dzin
538a3(mdo sde): gyi ma gtogs pa'i btsun mo 'khor dang bcas pa thams cid 'ongs nas bcom ldan 'das la phyag byaso//gzhan yang des 'khor gyi mi rnams la 'phags pa'i bu
538a4(mdo sde): la phyag gyis zhes brjod nas/gal te kho mo la yon tan yodun 'phags pa'i bu rang nyid kyi gaun su 'byon//byon pa nyid na de la phyag byedo zhes brjod nas ma 'ongaso//
538a5(mdo sde): rgyal pos lhung bzed bzung nas bcom ldan 'das nyan thos mchog gnyis dang bcas pa rgyal po'i bu mo'i khang bzongasu gshegs tau/rgyal po'i bu mo rang nyid ji
538a6(mdo sde): ltar mos pa'i phyag byed cing gzhan dang 'grel pa cung zad kyang ma byed ces nas gdan bshams pa mchog gi gung la bzhug so//de myur du 'ongs nas byin pa bzung
538a7(mdo sde): ste/zhabs kyi steng du mgo bo bzhag nas ji ltar 'dod pa'i phyag byaso//rgyal po dang rgyal po'i bu mos bcom ldan 'das la dga' ba mang pos yon tan la sogs pa/
538b1(mdo sde): yon tan dang ldan par brjod nas/btsun pa/bdag gi bu mos nyid kyis gos ngur smrig ljon pa thos nas/de nas bzung ste deng gi bar du gos ngur smrig gyon no//ljid/
538b2(mdo sde): kyis gdugs tshod lan cig gsol ba thos nas bu mos kyang bza' ba lan cig zoso//nyin gyis mal stan chen po spangs pa thos nas/nyal khri chung ba la nyalo//
538b3(mdo sde): kyis me tog gi phreng ba dang spos la sogs pa la sred pa med pa thos nas/me tog gi phreng ba dang spos la sogs pa la chags pa med pa skyeso//rang gi nye du rnams bdag
538b4(mdo sde): gis gso'o zhes 'phrin bskur nas/gnyen gcig la yang lta ba mi 'dug/bcom ldan 'das 'di lta bu'i yon tan dang ldan pa ni bdag gi bu mo yino zhes gsol
538b5(mdo sde): to//rgyal po chen po ya mtshan mi che'o//'di da lta khyed bsrung bar byed pa'i rgyal po'i bu mo ye shes yongasu ma smin par rang gis bsrung //sngar bsrung ba med cing ri la
538b6(mdo sde): sogs pa la 'gro ba na/ye shes yongasu ma rdzogs par rang gis bsrungaso zhes bsrungs nas/mi 'am ci zla ba'i skyes rabs gsungs te/gdan las bzhengs nas
538b7(mdo sde): gshegaso//nyi ma gnyis pa la rgyal bu gzhonu dga' bo rgyal por dbang bskur ba dang /khang pa gsar pa'i nang du zhugs te bkra shis pa'i bag ma blangs nas nye bar
539a1(mdo sde): gnas so//de'i khyim du gshegs nas gzhon nu lhung bzed zung zhig ces rab tu dbyung bar dgongs nas bkra shis brjod do//gdan la bzhengs
539a2(mdo sde): nas gshegs so//ljongs kyi dge ba'i bu mos 'gro ba mthong //'phags pa'i bu myur du shog ces brjod nas blta'o//des kyang bcom ldan 'das kyis lhung
539a3(mdo sde): bzad de bzung bar ma nus nas gtsug lag khang nyid du gsheg so//bcom ldan 'das de la 'dod pa med pa nyid kyang rab tu 'byung ba byed do//'di ltar bcom ldan 'das
539a4(mdo sde): grong khyer ser skyar gshegs shas nyi ma gsum pa la dga' bo rab tu byung bar byaso//nyi ma bdun pa la sgra can 'dzin gyi mas/gzhonu rgyan gyis brgyan nas/bcam
539a5(mdo sde): ldan 'das kyi so drung du bta ngo //bu stong phrag nyi shu'i dge slong 'khor dang bcas pa 'di rnams ltos/gser gyi kha dog can gyi tshangs pa'i gzugs kyi mdog can/dge
539a6(mdo sde): spyi 'di ni khyed kyi yab bo//'di la gter chen po yod cing de 'thon pa nas bzung nas gter mthong ba med do//song la nor slongs shig/bdag khyed kyi bu gzhonu yin//
539a7(mdo sde): rgyal por dbang bskur ba thob nas 'khor lo sgyur ba la dbang byed par 'gyuraro//bdag la nor gyi don du nor rtsal du gsol//yab kyi nor bu bdag yin//zhes gsol
539b1(mdo sde): tsog ces smras pa dang /gzhonu bcom ldan 'das dang nye bar song ste/yab kyi drung du dga' ba skyeso//sems spro bar gyur to//dge sbyong de khyod kyi grib ma ni de'o zhes
539b2(mdo sde): brjod nas/gzhan yang rang gi rigs pas brjod cing 'khod do//bcom ldan 'das gdugs tshod kyi mthar rje su yi rang ba mdzod naso gdon la bzhengs te gshegs so//
539b3(mdo sde): gzhon nus bdag la dge slong nor stsal du gsol/bdag la dge slong nor stsal du gsol/bcom ldan 'das kyi rje su 'brang nas/bcom ldan 'das kyis gzhon nu
539b4(mdo sde): phyir log la/nga'i rje su ma 'gro zhes pa dang /rje su 'brang ba rnams kyang bcom ldan 'das dang 'grogs nas byon te/ldog par ma nus nas/gzhon nu/bcom
539b5(mdo sde): ljon 'das dang lhan cig kun dga' ra ba nyid du phyin//de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis bsams pa/'di yab kyi nor 'dod cing 'jig rten pa'i nor ni 'tshe ba dang bcu
539b6(mdo sde): pa yin/da ni gzhan nu la byang chub snying po des theb pa'i 'phags pa'i nor rnam pa bdun byino//'jig rten las 'das pa'i nor gyi bdag po byed par 'gyur bar dgongs
539b7(mdo sde): nas/tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu bos te/de'i phyir na shA ri'i bu khyod kyis gzhonu sgra gtson 'dzin rab tu phyung zhes brjod nas rab tu byung ba byas so//slar yang rgyal po
540a1(mdo sde): gzho nu'i sdug bsngal tshor skyes te bsran par mya nus nas/bcom ldan 'das kyi gnasu phyin te/btsun pa 'phags pa ma dang pa yis rje sum
540a2(mdo sde): gnang ba'i bu rab tu 'byung bar byed pa ma leg so zhes dam pa bslangaso//bcom ldan 'das kyis de la dam pa byin no//slar yang nyid ma gnyis pa la rgyal po'i gnasu
540a3(mdo sde): gdugs tshod gsol nas phyogs gcig tu 'khod//rgyal pos btsun pa nyid dka' ba spyod pa'i dusu lha gcig bdag gi drung du nye bar 'ongs nas khyed kyi bu dus las 'das
540a4(mdo sde): zhes smra so//de'i tshig la yid ches pa med cing /bdag gi sras byang chub ma thob pa du dus las 'da' bar mi byed//de'i tshig bdag gis bkago zhes brjod do//
540a5(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/da lta ji ltar khyod yid tshos par byed/sngar rus pa mthong nas khyed kyi bu shi'o zhes zer ba la yid ches par ma byaso//'di'i
540a6(mdo sde): don 'byung ba ni chos skyong ba chen po'i skyes rab su bshad//gtam gyi mthar rgyal pos phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu la gnas//de ltar bcom ldan 'das kyi yab 'bras
540a7(mdo sde): bu gsum la so sor gonas nas dge slong gi dge 'dun 'khor du bya'o//slar yang rgyal po'i khab du gshegs nas/bsil ba'i tshal du bzhugaso//de'i tshe khyim bdag
540b1(mdo sde): mgon med zas sbyin gyis shing rta lnga brgya'i nor khyer nas rgyal po'i khab du rang nyid dga' ba'i grogs kyi khang par song ste//des sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das byon no zhes pa
540b2(mdo sde): thos nas shin tu sdu bar lha'i mthus sgo phye ste/ston pa'i drung du nye bar song nas chos thos te/rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu thob par gyur to//nyi ma gnyis pa la sangs
540b3(mdo sde): rgyas la sogs pa'i dge 'dun la sbyin po chen po phulo//gnyen yod du gshegs pa'i phyir du ston pa'i drung du dam bcas bslangs nas bar gyi lam dpag tshad bzhi bcu rtsa
540b4(mdo sde): lnga'i gan su 'bum phrag re re'i nor byin nas dpag tshad re re'i gtsug lag khang byaso//rgyal byed tshal bye ba phrag bco brgyad kyi dbyig gIs nyos nas las kha gsar pa
540b5(mdo sde): byed cing dbus su skyibs bcu pa'i dri'i rlung khang byed//de la bskur ba rnams la gnas brtan chen po brgyad cu'i bzhugs gnas//tshig thog dang nyis thog dang khang pa
540b6(mdo sde): ring po dang /bsti gnas la sogs pa'i bzhugs gnas dang /rdzing bu dang /'chags dang /mtshan mo'i bzhugs gnas dang /nyin mo'i bzhugs gnas//bye ba

541a1(mdo sde): nya ba'i 'phrin gsan nas dge slong gi dge 'dun chen po 'khor du byas te/rgyal po'i khab nas phyir byon te gau rims bzhin du grong khyer gnyen yod
541a2(mdo sde): du na no//glan po chen po yang gtsug lag khang chen po ste gon gyis nas de bzhin go shigs pa rgyal byed tshul du byin de'i nyin mo bu rgyun thams cad kyis bAn+d+han na//smra

541b1(mdo sde): nyid kyi sku lus kyi 'od kyis gser gyi bcud kyi gong bu lta bu dang mtshungs pa dang /nags tshal gyi bar du snang bar mdzad cing mtha' yas pa'i sangs rgyas kyi rol pa sangs rgyas

542a1(mdo sde): bas gtsug lag khang byed pa//mang du thos pa gnas pa yin//de rnams kyi ni bza' dang btung //gos dang mal cha stan dang ni//de rnams sems ni drang pos
542a2(mdo sde): dbul//rab tu drang ba'i sems kyiso//ngos ni de la chos bstan to//sdug bsngal thams cad nyar zhi'i phyir//gang de'i chos ni rtogs pa dang //rten med mya ngan 'das par

542a5(mdo sde): brgyad nyid song ngo //'di la gtsug lag khang chen po 'di nyid la bye ba phrag lnga bcu rtsa bzhi'i nor yongasu btangango //slar yang 'das pa'i bcom ldan 'das rnam par
542a6(mdo sde): gzigs kyi dus su tshong dpon kun gyi grogs zhes bya bas gser gyi glang po'i rkang pa'i rmig rje lta bu'i sa gzhi nyes nas/gnas 'di nyid du dpag tshad gcig gi dge 'dun gyi
542a7(mdo sde): kun dga' ra ba byas//bcom ldan 'das gtsug tor can gyi dus su dpal 'phel zhes bya ba'i tshong dpon gyi bus gser gyi sder ma rgyun mi 'chad pas nyos pa'i
542b1(mdo sde): sa bzhi'i gnas de nyid du rgyung grags bcu gnyis kyi tshad tsam gyi dge 'dun gyi kun dga' ra ba bya'o//bcom ldan 'das thams cad skyob kyi dusu tshong dpon bkra shis zhes bya bas
542b2(mdo sde): gser gyi sa gzhi gser gyi rkang pa'i rjes lta bu'i sa gzhi nyos nas gnas de nyid du dpag tshad phyed kyi dge 'dun gyi kun dga' ra ba byas//bcom ldan 'das log pa dang sel
542b3(mdo sde): gyi dus su tshong dben 'pho ba med pa zhes bya bas gser gyi ba gu lta bu rgyun mi 'chi de po'i sro gzhi nyis nas granas de nyid du rgyung grags bzhi'i tshad kyi dge 'dun gyi kun dgarar
542b4(mdo sde): babyas//bcom ldan 'das gser thub kyi dus tshong dpon drag po zhes bya bas gser gyi rus spol rgyun mi 'chad pa lta bu'i sa gzhi nyos nas gnas de nyid du rgyang grags
542b5(mdo sde): gnyis kyi tshad kyi kun dga' ra ba byaso//bcom ldan 'das 'od bsrung gi dus su tshong dpon bkra shi sa bzang po zhes bya bas gser gyi pha gu rgyun mi 'chad pa lta bus sa gzhi
542b6(mdo sde): nyos nas gnas de nyid du rgyang grogs gcig gi tshad kyi kun dga' ra ba byas//slar yang bdag cag gi bcom ldan 'das kyi dus tshong dpon mig na med zas sbyin gyi sa bye ba phrag
542b7(mdo sde): bco brgyad kyi dbyeg gis gser gyi 'dra men du byas pa rgyuni mi 'chad pa lta bus sa gzhi nyos nas gnas de nyid rgyang grags phyed kyi kun dga' ra ba byaso//gnas 'di sangs
543a1(mdo sde): rgyas thams cad kyis ma spangs pa'i gnas yin no//'di ltar byang chub chen po'i snying po'i drung du thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes thob pa ji srid pa nas yongs
543a2(mdo sde): sra mya ngan las 'das pa'i mthar thugs de srid du gang dang gang gi gnas su bcom ldan 'das bdag bzhugs pa 'di ni nye ba'i gleng gzhi zhes bya ba'o//de'i
543a3(mdo sde): lus kyis skyes rabs thams cad du bsngags par mdzad do//skyes rlabs kyi gleng gzhi bshad pa rdzogs so////paN+Di ta Anan+da shI'i zhal snga nas dang /
543a4(mdo sde): mar du thos pa'i lo ts+tsha ba shAkya'i dge slong nyi ma rgyal mtshan dpal bzang pos/skad gnyis smra ba rnams kyi gdan sa gtsug lag khang chen po dpal thar pa gling du bsgyur
543a5(mdo sde): cing zhus te gtan la phab pa'o////sa'i steng du nyi zla ltar gyur cig//rgya gar skad du/AT+Ta nA Ti ya sU tra/bod skad du/lcang lo can gyi pho bra
543a6(mdo sde): gi mdo/'phags pa dkon mchog gsum la gus pas phyag 'tshal lo//'di skad bdag gis thos pa'i dus gcig na/bcom ldan 'das rgyal po'i khab bya rgod
543a7(mdo sde): phung po'i ri la bzhugs so//de nas rgyal po chen po bzhi po gnod sbyin mang po'i sde dang /dri za mang po'i sde dang /grul bum gyi sde mang po dang /klu'i sde mang po rnaMs
543b1(mdo sde): phyogs bzhi ba srung zhing gnas so//phyogs bzhir tshan tshan du gnas so//phyogs bzhi skyob cing gnas so//mtshan mo 'ongs te/kha dog sna tshogs pa can gyis bya rgod phung po'i ri

544a3(mdo sde): po'i rgyu gang lags/btsun pa bcom ldan 'das kyis srog gcod pa spong ba'i chos bstan pa dang /mi byin par len pa spong ba'i chos bsten pa dang /'dod pa lag
544a4(mdo sde): par spyod pa spyong ba'i chos bstan pa dang /brdzun du sgru ba spong ba'i chos bstan pa dang /myos par 'gyur ba'i chang gis btung ba spong ba'i chos bstun pa mdzad la/gnod

545a1(mdo sde): smras ni dang la dang ldan//ma rgyud sa phyag 'tshalo//sdug pasngal kun pa ma mdzad pa/spya nad na stan mdzad//dang yang 'jug rtenadur
545a2(mdo sde): gyur pa//ji lta ba bzhin gzigs gyur pa'i//de rnams la ni pho ma med//'jigs pa med pa chen po'o//gang zhig gau ta ma phyag byed pa//lha dang mi la phan pa yin//rig pa
545a3(mdo sde): dang ni zhabasu ldan//'jigs pa med pa chen po ste//nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor chen po ni//gang zhig tu ni nub cing 'cha ro//gang du nyi ma nub gyur pa//de ni mtshan mor
545a4(mdo sde): 'gyur ba yin//gang du nyi ma shar gyur pa//de ni nyin mo zhes brjod do//gting ni zab pa'i rgya mtsho yi//de ni chu'i bcud bzang ngo //de ltar der ni skyes gyur pa'i//rgya
545a5(mdo sde): mtsho'i chu'i bcud bzhin no//'dir ni shar gyi phyogs kyi ni//skye bo rnams la 'di brjod do//de'i phyogs ni kuni skyong ba'o//rgyal po chen po grabs tshon ldan//dri za rnams
545a6(mdo sde): kyi bdag po ste//ming ni rgyal po yul 'khor skyong //dri za 'khor dang bcas pa ni//gru dang gar gyos dga' bar byed//de'i bu ni mang po rnams//ming ni gcig tu thos pa
545a7(mdo sde): stedabang po zhes bya stobs dang ldan//de ni dgu bcu rtsa gcig/de yang sangs rgyas mthong ba dang //nyi ma'i mtshon gyi sangs rgyas ni//'jigs dang bral ba chen po la//
545b1(mdo sde): zag ring nas ni phyag bgyi'o//skyes bu cang mkhyen khyed phyag 'tshal//skyes bu mchog khyod phyag 'tsha'o//dge ba rtag tu gsungs pa la//mi ma yin rnams khyod phyag 'tshal//

545b3(mdo sde): 'tshulo//gang yang yi dgas brjod byed pa//phye ma rgyab kyi sha can dang //srog gcod pa la chags pa dang //skye bo ma lus 'joms pa'o//'dir ni lho yi phyogs gnas

546a2(mdo sde): dkyil 'khor chen po ni//gang nas gung du shar gyur pa//der ni nyin mor 'gyur ba ste//nyin mo zhes ni brjod pa yin//gang du nyi ma nub gyur pa//de ni mtshan mor brjod

546b3(mdo sde): dka' spyod med par 'bras smin zhing //mi rnams yongasu longs spyod do//spun med ma grugs shin tu dag/dri bzang 'bras ni 'bras bur ldan//'bras kyi'o ma la 'tshad
546b4(mdo sde): cing //de bzhin bcos nas langs spyod do//ba lang rlung gcig la zhan nas//yul dang phyogs 'gro bar byed//rkang pa gcig pa'i phyag zhon nas//yul dang phyogs
546b5(mdo sde): su 'gro bar byed//bud med kyi ni bzhin pa dang //zhon nas yul dang phyogasu 'gro//skyes pa'i gzhon pa lo zhon nas//yul dang phyogasu 'gro bar byed//gzhon nu

550a1(mdo sde): gnod sbyin rnams dang /gnod sbyin chen po rnams dang /sde dpon rnams dang /sde dpon chen po rnams gang zhan/dbang po zla ba chu zla dang /b+hu
550a2(mdo sde): ra dwA dza skye dgu'i bdag/tsan dan dang 'od mchog dang //mgul pa mdzes dang mgul nges dang //skye dgu'i bla mar gyur pa dang //lha las byung ba'i khaM li ba//dri zla

550a7(mdo sde): 'dis tshe 'phrog par byed pa dang /gnod sbyin 'di 'tshe bar byed pa dang /gnod sbyin 'dis rnam par 'tho 'tsham par byed pa dang /gnod sbyin 'di gnod par
550b1(mdo sde): byed pa dang /gnod sbyin 'di rnam par gnod par byed pa dang /gnod sbyin 'dis ni mi gtong bar byed do//drang srong chen po 'dis ni lhung lo can gyi pho brang gis bsrung cig/
550b2(mdo sde): dge slong dang dge slong ma dang /dge bsnyen dang /dge bsnyen ma rnams la bsrung ba dang /sba po dang /'tsho ba med pa dang /bde ba dang legs par gnaso//drang srong
550b3(mdo sde): chen po da ni bdag cag rnams 'gro bar bgyi'o//bdag cag rnams ni bya ba meng ba dang byed pa mang bas so//bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/rgyal po chen po
550b4(mdo sde): khyed rnams da ni 'gro bar gyis shig/de nas rgyal po chen po bzhi po rnams langs nas/bcom ldan 'das la phyag byas te bskor ba byas nas der mi snang bar gyur to//
550b5(mdo sde): gonod sbyin de rnams kyang langs nas gang su dag gis/bcom ldan 'das la phyag byas te bskor ba byas nas de nyid du mi snang bar gyur to//gang su dag gis bcom ldan
550b6(mdo sde): 'das lo bsnun gsol ste bsnyun gsol nas/snying po dang snying po med pa ji ltar zhos zhus pa de rnams de nyid du mi srang bar gyur to//gang su dag gis bcom ldan 'das ga le ba
550b7(mdo sde): der thal mo sbyar nas de nyid du mi snang bar gyur to//gang la la zhag gis ming dang rigs rnam par dpyad nas de nyid du mi snang bar gyur to//gang la la zhig cing mi skye bar gyur
551a1(mdo sde): tade nyid du mi snang bar gyur to//ljang lo can gyi pha brang gi mdo las sgrubs rab mchog dang pa la//de nas yad bcom ldan 'das kyis de
551a2(mdo sde): mtshan ma 'das nas/dge slong rnams thos nas/dge slong dag 'da' mtshan mi rgyal po chen po bzhi pa rnams dang /gnad sbyin gyi sna dpon chen po rnams dang/
551a3(mdo sde): zla'i sde mang pa dang /grul dum gyi sde mang po dang /klu'i sde mang po dang /phyogs bzhi bsrung zhing gnaso//phyogs bzhir tshon chan du gan so//phyogs bzhi skyong
551a4(mdo sde): zhing gnas/mtshan mo 'ongs te kha dag sna tshogs pa can gyis bya rgod phung po'i ri 'ba' zhig snang bar byas te/bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der song ste song nas ngal
551a5(mdo sde): phyag byas nas phyogs gcig tu 'khod do//dge slong dag dang /gnod sbyin de rnams gang la la zhig gis nga la phyug byas nas phyogs gcig tu 'khod//gang su dag
551a6(mdo sde): gos ngol bsnun gsol to//bskrun gsol nas/ji ltar sring po dang snying po med pa'i gtam 'dri zhing phyogs go cig tu 'khod do//gang su dag nis nga la thal mo sbyar
551a7(mdo sde): nas phyogs gcig tu 'khod//gang su dag gis ming dang rigs dpyod cing phyogs gcig tu 'khod//gang su dag cang mi smra bar phyogs gcig tu 'khod//phyogs gcig tu
551b1(mdo sde): du rgyu na na sa sa smra du/ na na na ma sa dan /
551b2(mdo sde): smin du na pa gang sa btsun pa hrI m+be na sa sa da / sbyin skye na pasbyin rnam ldan 'dus ma ma da
552a1(mdo sde): bskong ba la mi dgu' bar gyur pa dang /brdzun du sgru ba stong ba la mi dga' bar gyur pa dang /myos par 'gyur ba'i chang gi btung ba spong ba la mi dga' bar/
552a2(mdo sde): gyur paso//de rnams la mi dga' zhing mi 'dod par gyur to//btsun po bcom ldan 'das nyan thos ji snyed yod pa rnams 'brog dgon pa'i lam du zhugs nas nyal ba dang
552a3(mdo sde): 'dug pa dang brten to//sgra med cing dbyangs med par dpon par gnas shing 'du 'dzi'i 'tshe ba med do//so sor dge sbyong rnams 'thun cing gnaso//de na gnod sbyin ma rungs
552a4(mdo sde): rnams kyi gnas yod do//gang zhig pocom ldan 'das kyi gsung rab la ma dad par gyur te/de rnams dad par bya ba'i phyir btsun pa bcom ldan 'das la bslab por bya ste/
552a5(mdo sde): lcang lo can gyi pho brang gis bsrung du gsol//dge slong ngam dge slong ma 'am/dge bsnyen nam dge bsnyen ma rnams la bsrung ba dang /sba ba dang /'tshe ba med pa
552a6(mdo sde): dang /bde ba legs par gnas//dge slong rnams la bdag gis cang mi gsung ba'i tshul gyis gnang ba byin no//de nas rgyal po chen po rnam thos kyis bus gnang ba byin
552a7(mdo sde): pa shes te/de'i tshe 'di ltar lcang lo can gyi pho brang gis bsrungs cag ces gsol to//spyan ldan dpal dang ldan pa yi//rnam par gzigs la phyag 'tshalo//saMm+ba
552b1(mdo sde): can+da rnams la brtse ba yi//gtsug tor can la phyag 'tsha'o//mgon med rnams la gdung ba yi//thams cad skyob la phyag 'tshalo//bdud kyi sde rnams 'joms pa yi//'khor ba
552b2(mdo sde): 'jig la phyag 'tshalo//bram ze dpal dang ldan pa yi//gser thub la ni phyag 'chilo//sems can rnam grol mdzad pa yi//'od bsrung la ni phyag 'tshalo//shAkya'i sras
552b3(mdo sde): nidapral dang ldan//nyi ma'i rgyud la phyag 'tshalo//sdug bsngal kun las grol mdzad pa//gang zhig chos ni rab ston mdzad//gang yang 'jig rten par gyur pa//ji lta
552b4(mdo sde): ba bzhin gzigs gyur pa'i//dri rnams lnga ni phra ma med//'jigs pa med pa chen po ni/gang zhig gau tam phyag byed pa//lha dang mi la phan pa yin//rig pa dang ni zhab su ldan//
552b5(mdo sde): 'jigs pa med pa chen po ste//nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor chen po ni//gang zhig tu ni nub cing 'char//gong du nyi ma nub gyur pa//der ni mtshan mor 'gyur ba yin//gang
552b6(mdo sde): nyi ma shar gyur pa'i//der ni nyin mo zhes brjod do//bting ni zab pa'i rgya mtsho yi//de yi chu yi bcud bai zong //de ltar der ni skyes gyur pa'i//rgya mtsho'i chu'i bcud
552b7(mdo sde): bzhin//'dir ni shar gyi phyogs kyi ni//skye bo rnams la 'dir brjod//de'i phyogs ni yongs spyong ba'i//rgyal po chen po grags chen ldan//dri za rnams kyi bdag po ste//
553a1(mdo sde): ming ni rgyal po yul 'khor skyong //dri thu 'a khor dang bcas pa ni//glu dang kar gyis dga' bar byed//de'i bu ni mang po rdzas//ming ni gcig tu mos pa ste//
553a2(mdo sde): dbang po zhes bya stobs dang ldan//de ni dgu bcu rtsa gcig/de yang sangs rgyas mthong ba dang //nyi ma'i gnyon gyi sangs rgyas ni//'jigs dang bral ba chen po la//tha
553a3(mdo sde): ring nas ni phyug bgyi'o//skyes bu cang mkhyen khyed phyag 'tshal//skyes bu mchog khyod phyag 'tshalo//dge ba rtag tu gsung ba la//mi ma yin rnams khyed phyag 'tshal//
553a4(mdo sde): ga ts+tsha 'di ni nyan por//de phyi dri ltar 'di brjod do//rtul za gau tom phyug gyis shi//rgyal bgau t+ta ma phyag 'gyira'o//rig pa da ni zhab su ldan//rgyal byugro tam
553a5(mdo sde): 'tshalo//gang yang yi dgas brjod byed pa//phra ma rgyub kyi sha can dang //srog gcod po la chags pa dang //skyes bu ma lus 'joms pa'o//'dor ni lho'i phyod sa
553a6(mdo sde): gnas pa'i//skye bo rnams la 'di skad brjod//de yi gnas ni yongs skyong ba/rgyal ngo chen po glags ldan pa//grul bum rnams kyi bdag po ste//ming ni 'phags skyes pa
553a7(mdo sde): zhes bya//grul bum 'khor dang bcas pa ni//glu dang kar gyis dga' bar byed//de yi bu ni mang po rnams//ming ni gcig tu thos pa ste//dbang po zhes bya skyibs
553b1(mdo sde): dang rdzun//de ni dgu bcu rtsa gcig/de yang sbyangs rgyas mthong ba dang //nyi ma'i rgyud kyi sangs rgyus ni//'jigs dang bral ba chen po la//thag ring nas ni phyag bgyi'o//skyes bu cang
553b2(mdo sde): mkhyen khyed phyag 'tshal//skyes bu mchog khyod phyag 'tshalo//dge ba rtag tu gsung ba lo//mi ma yin rnams khyed phyag 'tshal//rtag tu 'di ni nyan pa'o//de phyir de ltar
553b3(mdo sde): 'di brjod do//rgyal ba gau ta mo phyag gyis cig/rgyal ba gau ta mA phyag bgyi //rig pa dang ni zhabasu ldan//sangs rgyas gau tA mra phyag 'tshalo//nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor chen po ni//
553b4(mdo sde): gang nas gang du shar gyur pa//der ni nyin mor 'gyur ba ste//nyon mor zhus ni brjod pa yin//gang du nyi ma nub gyur pa//de ni mtshan mor brjod par byed//gting ni zab pa'i rgyu
553b5(mdo sde): mtsho yi//de'i chu yi bcud bzang //de ltar der ni skyes gyur pa'i//rgya mtsho'i chu'i bcud bzhi no//'dir ni nub kyi phyogs kyi ni//skye bo rnams la 'di brjod do//de'i phyogs
553b6(mdo sde): ni kun skyong ba'i//rgyal po chen po grags chen ldan+do//klu rnams kyi ni bdag po ste//'di yi ming ni mig mi bzung //klu yi 'khor dang bcas pa ni//glu dang gar gyis dga'
553b7(mdo sde): bar byed//de yi bu ni mang po rnams//ming ni gcig tu thos pa ste//dbang po zhes bya sgribs dang ldan//de ni dgu bcu rtsa gcig/de yang sangs rgyas mthong ba dang //nyi
554a1(mdo sde): ma'i gnyen gyi sangs rgyas ni//'jigs dang bral ba chen po la//thag ring nas ni phyag bgyid do//skyes bu cang mkhyen khyed phyag 'tshal//skyes bu mchog
554a2(mdo sde): khyod phyag 'tshalo//dge ba rtag tu gsungs pa la//mi ma yin rnams khyed phyag 'tshal//rtag tu 'di ni nyan pa'o//de phyir da ltar 'di brjod de//rgyal ba gau ta ma phyag
554a3(mdo sde): gyis shig/rgyal ba gau ta ma phyag bgyidado//rig pa dang ni zhubasu ldan//sangs rgyas gau ta ma phyag 'tshalo//gang zhig byad phyogs sgra mi snyan//lhun po lta na sdug r-i dga'//
554a4(mdo sde): der skyes pa yi mi rnams ni//bdag gir yongasu dazung ba med//de rnams sa bon 'debs pa med//rmo ba yang ni med pa yin//dka' spyad med par 'bras smin nas//mi
554a5(mdo sde): rnams yongasu longs spyod do//spun med ma grugs shin tu dag/dri bzang 'bras ni 'bras bur ldan//'bras kyi 'o ma la 'tshed cing //de bzhin btsos nas longs spyod//
554a6(mdo sde): ba lang rkang gcig la zhon nas//yul dang phyogasu 'gro bar byed//rkang pa gcig po'i phyugs zhon nas//yul dang phyogasu 'gro bar byed//bud med kyi ni bzhon po la//
554a7(mdo sde): zhon nas yul dang phyogasu 'gro/skyes pa'i bzhon pa la zhan nas//yul dang phyog su 'gro bar byed//gzhanu ma'i bzhon pa la//zhon nas yul dang phyog su 'gro//
554b1(mdo sde): gzhon nu'i bzhon pa la zhon nus//yul dang phyog su 'gro bar byed//bzhon pa de rnams la zhon nas//phyogs kun du ni rjesu 'gro/gtso bo rgyal po khyud med//glang chen bzhin//
554b2(mdo sde): dang nA li bzhan//sku'i bzhin pa la gnas ni sa//khang bya zung dang ni phyogs rnams ni/na pa srog sa min ldan//de'i yang sgrub pa'i grong khyo n+ti//dri med pa
554b3(mdo sde): la gnas pa//lcang lho D+yan dang kun sha'i grong //pha rlom kA sha'i grong dang ni'i grong dang phyu rim gyi//kle sha'i hU~M slong yin//byang gi phyogs na thams cad rgyus
554b4(mdo sde): skye bo'i tshogs pa mang po gnas//dgu bcu rtsa dgu grong mkha' la//rgyal po'i pho brang lcang lo can//slar yang drang srong chen po dang //rgyal po chen po lus dran po//
554b5(mdo sde): cog ldan zhes pa rgyal po chen po'i pho brang //de'i phyir rgyal po chen po rnam thos kyi bu dang lus dran po zhes brjod do//so sor rab tu gsal zhing zla ba dang //de dang dar ni de dang /
554b6(mdo sde): de mdangs dang de'i gzibarji ga dang dpa' zhing stobs dang ldan pa'i rgyal po stobs dang ldan pa'i ming //sa gzhi yang ni bcud ldano//gnas der sprin rnams char 'bebs par
554b7(mdo sde): byed do//der ni b+ha ga la ba tI zhes pa'i rdzing bu'o//gang du gnod sbyin tshogs dang lhan cig tu gnaso//der ni rtag tu shing gi 'bras//sna tshogs bya rnams lhan
555a1(mdo sde): rtag gnas//rmu bya khrung khrung sgra sgrogs shing //khyu byug rnams ni tshan chen glunas//shang shad te'u sgra sgrogs shig/de nas yang nI drar pa
555a2(mdo sde): dang //gong mo nags kyi bya gag rnams//nags kyi rdzing bur gnas pa'o//ne tse ri skegs de sgra 'byin//daN+Da mA nA bya dkar dang //dus kun du ni mdzes par byed//lus/
555a3(mdo sde): ngan rgyal po'i rdzing rtag mdzes//'di ni byang gi phyogs kyi yul//skye bo rnams ni 'di bzhin brjod//de yi phyogs ni yongs skyong ba'i//rgyal po chen po grags dang ldan///
555a4(mdo sde): gnod sbyin rnams kyi bdag po ste//'di yi ming ni lus ngan po//gonod sbyin 'khor dang bcad la ni//glu dong gar gyis dga' bar byed//de yi bu ni mang po rnams//ming
555a5(mdo sde): ni gcag tu thos pa ste//dbang po zhes bya stobs dang ldan//de ni dgu bcu rtsa gcig/de yang sangs rgyas mthong ba dang //nyi ma'i gnyen gyis sangs rgyas ni//'jigs dang
555a6(mdo sde): bral ba chen po la//thag ring nas ni phyag bgyi'o//skyes bu cang mkhyen khyed phyag 'tshal//skyes bu mchog khyod phyag 'tsha'o//dge ba rtag tu gsung bya la//mi ma yin rnams
555a7(mdo sde): khyad phyag 'tshal//rtag tu 'di ni nyan po'o//de phyir de ltar nyan pa'o//do phyir de ltar 'di brjod do//rgyal ba gau ta ma phyag gyis shig/rgyal ba po ta ma phyag gyis bgyid do//
555b1(mdo sde): rig pa dang ni zhabasu ldan//sangs rgyas go tam phyag 'tshalo//'dir ni drang srong chen pos lcang lo tsan+da dang bcas pas bsrungs shig/dge slong dumya dge slong ma 'am/dge bsnyen
555b2(mdo sde): nam dge bsnyen ma rnams bsrungs pa dang /spo ba dang /'tshe ba med pa dang /bde ba dang legs par gnaso//drang srong chen po gang su dag dge slong dang bcas pa 'am//dge
555b3(mdo sde): slong ma dang bcas pa 'am/dge bsnyen dang bcas pa 'am//dge bsnyen ma dang bcas pa rnams dang nga /'dir lhung lo can gyi pho brang gis de bsrung ba dang /yongasu rdzogs pa
555b4(mdo sde): thams cad/yongasu zung shig/de yang mi ma yin rnams//gnod sbyin nam/gnod sbyin mo 'am/gnod sprin gyi bu pho 'am/gnod sbyin gyi bu mo 'am/gnod sbyin gyi blon
555b5(mdo sde): po chen po 'am/gnod sbyin gyi 'khor ram/gnod sbyin gyi g.yog 'khor ram/dri za mo 'am/dri za'i bu pho 'am/dri za'i bu mo 'am/dri za'i blon po chen po 'am/dri za'i
555b6(mdo sde): 'khor ram/dri za'i g.yog 'khor ram/grul buM pho 'am/grul bum mo 'am/grul bum gyi ba pho 'um/grul bum gyi bu mo 'amA/grul bum gyi blon po chen po
555b7(mdo sde): 'am/grul bum gyi 'khor ram/grul bum gyi g.yog 'khor ram/klu pho 'am/klu mo 'am/kla'i bu pho 'am/klu'i bu mo 'am/klu'i blon po chen po 'am/klu'i 'khor
556a1(mdo sde): ram/klu'i g.yog 'khor rnams/rab tu sdang ba'i sems kyis 'gro ba 'am/rjesu 'gro ba 'am/rjesu 'gro ba dang sdod pa dang /lhan cig tu sdod pa dang /
556a2(mdo sde): gnas pa dang lhan cig tu gnas pa dang /nyal ba dang lhan cig tu nyal ba rnams la/drang srong chen po 'di rnams ni mi ma yin rnams zhes bya'o//grong ngam grong rdal lam//
556a3(mdo sde): bkur stir byed pa'am/bsti stang du byed pa rnams/drang srong chen po mi ma yin rnams kyis de thob pa ma yino//rgyal po chen po'i pho brang lcang lo can zhes bya ba gzhi 'am
556a4(mdo sde): gnas sa med do//drang srong chen po mi mau yin rnams kyis gnod sbyin dang lhan cig tu gnas pa'ang mi 'thobo//drang srong chen po gzhan yang mi ma yin rnams kyis bka'
556a5(mdo sde): mnyan par bya'o//drang srong chen po gzhan yang mi ma yin rnams kyis bdag la phan pa rdzogs pa'am/pha rol la smod pa dang /rtsod pa dang /drang srong chen po gzhan
556a6(mdo sde): yang mi ma yin rnams la snod mer rab tu 'bar ba mgo la bkon pa dang /drang srong chen po gzhan yang mi ma yin rnams kyi mgo bo tshal pa bdun du gshegs par bya'o//drang
556a7(mdo sde): srong chen po gzhan yang mi ma yin ni gtum pa dang drag pa dang khro ba'o//de rnams kyi 'di ltar rgyal po chen po la brjod do//rgyal po chen po la brjod par ma nus na skyes
556b1(mdo sde): bu la sogs pa la brjod par byed//rgyal po chen pa'i skyes bu la brjod par ma nus/de'i 'og ma'i skyes bu la brjod par bya'o//drang srong chen po de yang mi ma yin rnams rgyal
556b2(mdo sde): po chen po la 'gal ba smra ba'o//drang srong chen po 'ad b+hU s+t+waM/ma gri d+hA'i yum gyi rgyal po la tshwam non+da b+hung nA/de mthag tu rgya la po l+le brjod par byed //rgyal po la brjod
556b3(mdo sde): par ma nus na rgyal po'i skyes bu la brjod par byed do//skyes bu la brjed par ma nus na/de'i 'og ma'i skyes bu brjod par byed pa bzhino//drang srong chen po yang ma ga tu'i
556b4(mdo sde): rgyal po la chom rkun gyis gnod pa byed par brjod do//dang srong chen po 'di lta bu'i mi ma yin yod pa rnams gtum pa dang drag pa dang khro ba'o//de ma thag tu rgyal po chen
556b5(mdo sde): po rnams la brjod par byed do//rgyal po chen po la brjod par ma nus na rgyal po'i skyes bu la brjod par byedado//skyes bu la brjod par ma nus na de'i 'og mi'i skyes bu la brjod par
556b6(mdo sde): byed do//drang srong chen po mi ma yin rnams rgyal po chen po rnams lnga 'bral ba brjod par byed//drang srong chen po mi ma yin grang zhi ba gnod sbyin nam gnod sbyin mo 'am gnod
556b7(mdo sde): sbyin gyi bu'am/gnod sbyin gyi bu mo'am/gnod sbyin gyi blon po chen po'am/gnod rten gyi 'khor ram/gnod sbyin gyi g.yog 'khor rom/dri za pho 'am/dri za mo'am
557a1(mdo sde): dri za'i bu po dang /dri za'i bu mo dang /dri za'i blon po chen po 'am/dri za'i 'khor ram/dri za'i g.yog 'khor ram/grul bum po 'am/gul
557a2(mdo sde): bum mo 'am/grul bum gyi bu po 'am/grul bum gyi bu mo 'am/grul bum gyi blon po chen po 'am/grul bum gyi 'khor ram/grul bum gyi g.yog 'khor
557a3(mdo sde): ram/klu pho 'am/klu mo 'am/klu'i bu pho 'am/klu'i bu mo 'am/klu'i blon po chen po 'am/klu'i 'khor ram/klu'i g.yog 'khor ram/rab tu sdang ba'i
557a4(mdo sde): sems kyis dge slong ngam/dge slong ma 'am/dge bsnyen nam/dge ba sbyin ma rnams 'gro ba 'am/rdza su 'gro ba 'am/rje su 'gro ba dang /sdod pa dang /lhan
557a5(mdo sde): cig tu sdod pa dang /nyal ba dang /lhan cig tu nyal ba dang /'di rnams ni gnod sbyin rnams dang /gnod sbyin chen po rnams dang //sde dpon rnams dang /
557a6(mdo sde): sde dpon chen po rnams la gsol bar byed pa dang /nga ro sgrogs par byed pa dang /sgra tshor sgrogs par byed pa'o//'dir gnod sbyin gyis bzung nas/gnod
557a7(mdo sde): sbyin 'das tshe 'phrog par byed pa dang /gnod sbyin ni 'tshe bar byed pa dang /gnod sbyin 'di rnam par 'tho 'tshams par byed pa dang /gnod sbyin 'di gnod par
557b1(mdo sde): byed pa dang /gnod sbyin 'di rnam par gnod par byed pa dang /gnod sbyin 'dis mi gtod par byed do//gnod sbyin rnams dang /gnod sbyin chen po rnams dang /sde dpon
557b2(mdo sde): rnams dang /sde dpon chen po rnams gang zhe na/dbang po zla ba chu zla dang //b+ha ra d+yA dza skye dgu'i bdag/tsan+dano dang ni 'drod mchog dang //mgul pa mdzes dang 'gul nges
557b3(mdo sde): dang //skye dgu'i bla mar gyur pa dang //lha las byung ba'i kha lo ba//dri za sna tshigasngo sde dang ni//mi rgyal rgyal ba'i khyu mchog dang //de bzhin ri dang gang can dang //
557b4(mdo sde): gang ba smin drug phug dang ni//'tshe ba dang ni btang bzung dang //sna tshogs bshes gnyen gnya' shing 'dzin//sa skyongs rab tu rtogs pa dang //ngo che mig dang khang pa dang //
557b5(mdo sde): lnga len gi tum po Al pa ka/srid sgrub yid bzang bzhin bzang dang //zho sdong nor du nor bu spyod//de bzhin dbang phyug dang bcaso//'di rnams ni gnod sbyin rnams dang
557b6(mdo sde): gnod sbyin chen po rnams dang /sde dben rnams dang /sde dpon chen po rnams la gsol bar byed pa dang /nga ro sgrogs par byed pa dang /sgra cher sgrogs par byed pa'o/
557b7(mdo sde): 'dir gnod sbyin gyis bzung nas/gnod sbyin 'dis tshe 'phrog par byed pa dang /gnod sbyin no 'tshe bar byed pa dang //gnod sbyin 'dis rnam par tho 'tshams par byed
558a1(mdo sde): ba dang /gnod sbyin 'di gnod par byed pa dang /gnod sbyin 'di rnam par gnod par byed pa dang /gnod sbyin mi gtong byed do//drang srong chen po 'dis
558a2(mdo sde): ni lcang lo can gyi pho brang gis bsrungs cig/dge slong dang /dge slong ma dang /dge bsnyen dang /dge bsnyun ma dang /dge bsnyen ma rnams la bsrungs pa dang /sgra
558a3(mdo sde): ba dang /'tshe ba med pa dang /bde ba dang legs par gnaso//drang srong chen po de na bdag cag rnams 'gro bar bgyi'o//bdag cag rnams ni bya ba mang ba dang //byed
558a4(mdo sde): pa mang bas so//dge slong dag bdag gis da ni rgyal po chen po rnams la 'gro ba'i gnang ba byin no//de nas rgyal po chen po bzhi po rnams langs nas/bdag la phyag
558a5(mdo sde): byas te/bskor ba byas nas de nyid du mi snang bar gyur to//dge slong dag gnod sbyin rnams kyis kyang langs nas bdag la phyag byas bskor ba byas nas de nyid du mi snang bar
558a6(mdo sde): gyur to//gang su dog gis bdag la bsnyun gsol to/bsnyun gsol nas/snying po dang snying po med pa ji ltar zhes zhus po de rnams de nyid du mi snang bar gyur to//
558a7(mdo sde): gang su dag gis bdag ga la ba der thal mo sbyar nas 'dud pa byas te mi snang bar gyur to//gang la la zhig gis ming dang rigs pa rnam par dpyad nas de nyid du mi
558b1(mdo sde): sdang bar gyur to//gang la la zhig cang mi smra bar gyur to//de nyid du mi snang bar gyur to//dge slong dag kha don du zung la lcang lo can gyi pho brang gis bsrungs cig/dge slong
558b2(mdo sde): dag chongs la lcang lo can gyi pho brang gis bsrungs cig/dge slong dag kha don dang bcas pas lcang le can gyi pho brang gis bsrungs cig/dge slong ngam/dge slong ma 'am/
558b3(mdo sde): dge bsnyen nam/dge bsnyen me rnams la bsrungs pa dang /sba ba dang /'tshe ba med pa dang /bde ba dang legs par gnaso//bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces
558b4(mdo sde): bka' stsal pa dang /dge slong de rnams bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do//skabs rabs mchog gnyis pa ste////lcang lo can gyi pho brang
558b5(mdo sde): gis mdo rdzogaso////paN+Di ta Anan+da shrI'i zhal snga nas/mang du thos pa'i lo ts+tsha ba shAkya'i dge slong nyi ma rgyal mtshan dpal bzang pos/skad gnyis smra ba
558b6(mdo sde): rnams kyis gdan sa gtsug lag khang chen po dpal thar pa gling du bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa'o//sa'i steng du nyi zla ltar gyur cig/rgya kar
558b7(mdo sde): skad du/ma hA sa ma ya sA hA/bod skad du/'dus pa chen po'i mdo//'phags pa dkon mchog gsum la gus pas pag 'tsha lo//'di skad bdag gis thos pi rjes
559a1(mdo sde): gcig na/bcom ldan 'das shAkya yul ser skya'i gzhi'i tshal chen po na dge slong gi dge 'dun chen po lnga brgya ste/de thams cad kyang dgra bcom pa rnams
559a2(mdo sde): dang lhan cig tu bzhug so//'jig rten gyi khams bcu'i lha rnams de ma thag tu 'dus te/bcom ldan 'das dang dge slong gi dge 'dun rnams blta ba'i phyiraro//de nas gnas
559a3(mdo sde): gtsang ma ris kyi lha'i ris bzhi po rnams kyis 'di skad ces gsol to//'dir yang bcom ldan 'das kyis shAkya'i yul ser skya'i gzhi'i tshal chen po na dge slong gi dge 'dun
559a4(mdo sde): chen po lnga brgya s+ho/de thams cad kyang dgra bcom pa rnams dang lhan cig tu bzhugaso//'jig rten gyi khams bcu'i lha rnams de ma thag tu 'dus te/bcom ldan 'das kyi
559a5(mdo sde): dge slong gi dge 'dun rnams blta ba'i phyir//gang dag de bzhin du bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der de dag song ste song nas/bcom ldan 'das kyi thad du tshig su bcad pa so sor/
559a6(mdo sde): brjod par bya'o//de nas lha de rnams kyi 'di lta ste skyes bu stobs dang ldan pa'i lag pa bskum pa las brkyang ba tsam dang brkyang ba las bskum pa de bzhin du gnas gtsang ma'
559a7(mdo sde): lha rnams mi snang bar gyur te/bcom ldan 'das kyi thad du snang bar gyur to//de nas lha rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la phyag byas nas phyogs gcig tu 'khod//phyogs
559b1(mdo sde): gcig tu 'khod nas yang lha de rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das kyis zad du tshig su bcad pa 'di rnams gsol to//'dus pa chen po'i tshal 'di ru//lha yi tshogs rnams 'dus pa
559b2(mdo sde): ste//chos 'di'i phyir du bdag 'ongs pa//dge 'dun mi pham 'dus pa blta//de nas lha bzhan rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das kyi thadu tshig su bcad pa 'di gsol to//dag
559b3(mdo sde): 'dun sems rnams dul ba dang //rang gi sems ni drang por byas//kha lo sgyur ba'i drang por 'dzin//de bzhin mkhas pas dbang po bsrung //de nas lha gzhan rnams kyis
559b4(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das kyi thadu tshig su bcad pa 'di gsol to//khyim gyi 'ching ba bton pa dang //dbang po nas ni sems 'gro zhing //dag cing dri med der 'gro ba//mig ldan glang
559b5(mdo sde): po dul ba bzhin//de nas lha gzhan rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das kyi tha du tshig su bcad pa 'dri gsol to//gang zhig sangs rgyas skyabs 'gro ba//de ni ngan srong 'gro mo 'gyur
559b6(mdo sde): mi yi lus ni spangs na su//lha'i lus ni yongs rdzogs 'gyur//de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong rnams bos te/de ma thag tu dge slong dag 'jig rten gyi khams bcu
559b7(mdo sde): lha rnams 'dus te de bzhin gshegs pa dge slong gi dge 'dun dang bcas pa blta ba'i phyir//dge slong dag gang de rnamasu gyur pa 'das pa'i dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs
560a1(mdo sde): pa'i sangs rgyas de rnams bcom ldan 'das de tsam du gyur pa de bzhin du lha rnams 'dus par gyur to//'di lta ste bdag kyang dge slong dag de bzhin
560a2(mdo sde): 'dus par gyur to//'di lta ste/bdag kyang 'di skad ces smra ste/dge slong dag lha'i tshogs rnams kyi ming brjod par bya ste/dge slong dag rab tu gsal bar byed pa zhes
560a3(mdo sde): bya ba'i lha'i tshogs dang /dge slong dag lha'i tshogs ston par byed pa zhes bya'o//de thos nas legs par yid lo zung cig dang ngas bshad par bya'o//de ltar btsun
560a4(mdo sde): pa bcom ldan 'das la dge slong de rnams kyis so sor zhus nas//bcom ldan 'das kyis 'di skad ces bka' stsal te//tshigasu bcad pa so sor bshad//gang du
560a5(mdo sde): sa gzhi mthong gyur nas//ri yi phug tu gang gnas pa//de ru mnyam par 'jog par byed//sa gzhir seng ge 'jigs med bzhin//ba spu tsam yang g.yo ba med//sen
560a6(mdo sde): ni dag cing dkar ba dang //chu ni rab tu dngas pa bzhin//lnga brgya po yis legs shes shing //ser skya'i tshal gnas mang po rnams//de nas dge slong ston pas bos//
560a7(mdo sde): bstan pa la dga' nyan thos rnams//lha'i tshegs rnams 'ongs nas ni//dge slong rnams kyis de shes bya//lus ni gdung bar ma byed par//sangs rgyas bstan pa thos
560b1(mdo sde): pas so//de rnams ye shes snang bar 'gyur//mi ma yin rnams mthong 'gyur ba//gang zhig gis ni brgya mthong zhing //ston dang bdun cu mthong ba yin//brgya dang stong phrag gcig
560b2(mdo sde): dang ni//mi ma yin rnams mthong bar 'gyur//gang zhig gis ni mthan med mthong //phyogs kun gang por 'gyur ba mthong //de rnams kyis ni rtogs pa dang //spyan ldan rnam
560b3(mdo sde): par dpyad nas ni//de phyir ston pa yis ni bos//bstan la dga' ba'i nyan thos kyis//lha yi tshegs rnams 'ongs nas ni//dge slong rnams kyis de shes bya//gang zhig la
560b4(mdo sde): ni bdag bshad bya//gau rims bzhin du mnyan par gyis//stong phrag bdun gyi gnod sbyin rnams//ser skya'i sa la gnas pa ni//rdzu 'phrul ldan zhing 'od dang ldan//kha dog
560b5(mdo sde): dang ni grags par ldan//chos gtam bya phyir 'dir 'ongs te//zhi bas dge slong tshal du'o//stong phrag drug ni gongs can gyi//gnod sbyin kha dog sna tshogs lus//rdzu 'phrul
560b6(mdo sde): ldan zhing 'od dang ldan//kha dog dang ni grags par ldan//chos gtam bya phyir 'di 'angs te//zhi ba dge slong tshal du'o//sna tshugs ba shes gnyen lnga brgyu po//
560b7(mdo sde): gnod sbyin kha dog sna tshogs lus//rdzu 'phrul ldan zhing 'od dang ldan//kho dog dang ni grags par ldan//chos gtam bya phyir 'dir 'ongs te//zhi bas dge slong tshal
561a1(mdo sde): du'o//rgyal khab gnod sbyin chu srin ni//ngos gangs ri la gnas pa yin//stobs ldan 'bum phyug gcig po ni//gnod sbyin rnams kyi 'khor
561a2(mdo sde): gyis bskor//rgyal khab gnod sbyin chu srin ni//zhing nas dge slong tshul du'o//shar phyogs kyi ni rgyal po ni//ming ni yul 'khor bsrungs zhes pa//dri za rnams kyi
561a3(mdo sde): bdag po ste//rgyal po chen po grags tshon ldan//de yi bu'i mang po rnams//ming ni gcig tu thos pa ste//dbang po zhes bya stobs chen po//rdzu 'phrul ldan zhing 'od
561a4(mdo sde): dang ldan//kha dog dang ni grags par ldan//chos gtam bya phyir 'dir 'ongs te//zhi bas dge slong tshul du'o//b+h+yo'i phyogs kyi'ang rgyal po ni//ming ni 'phags skyes
561a5(mdo sde): po zhes bya//grul bum rnams kyi bdag po ste//rgyal po chen po grags chen ldan//de yi bu ni mang po rnams//ming ni gcig tu zos pa ste//dbang po zhes bya stobs
561a6(mdo sde): chen po//rdzu 'phrul ldan zhing 'od dang ldan//kha dog dang ni grags par ldan//chos gtal bya phyir 'dir 'ongs te//zhi bas dge slong tshul du'o//nub kyi phyogs kyi rgyal po
561a7(mdo sde): ni//ming ni mig me bzang zhes grags//klu rnams kyi ni bdag po ste//rgyal po chen po grogs tshon ldan//de'i bu ni mang po rnams//ming ni gcig tu thos pa ste//dbang
561b1(mdo sde): be zhes bya stobs dang ldan//rdzu 'phrul ldan zhing stobs dang ldan//kha dog dang ni grags par ldan//chos gtam pa phyir 'dir 'ongs te//zhi bas dge slong tshal du'o//zhi pas dge
561b2(mdo sde): slong tshal du'o//byang gi phyogs kyi rgyal po ni//de ming lus ngan po zhes grags//gnod sbyin rnams kyi bdag po ste//rgyal po chen po grags chen ldan//de yi bu ni mang po
561b3(mdo sde): rnams//ming ni gaucig tu thos pa ste//dbang po zhes bya stobs chen po//rdzu 'phrul ldan zhong 'od dang ldan//kha tog dang ni grags par ldan//chos gtam bya phyir 'dir 'ongs
561b4(mdo sde): te/zhi bas dge slong tshal du'o//shar phyogs na ni yul 'khor skyong //lho phyogs na ni 'phags skyes po//nub phyogs na ni mig mi bzang //byang phyogs na ni lus ngan po//de
561b5(mdo sde): rnams rgyal po chen po bzhi//phyogs rnams bzhi po kun du'o//gzi brjid 'bar bas 'khod na ni//ser skya'i gzhi'i tshal du'o//de rnams sgyu ma rtsed mo bsam//drung ldan
561b6(mdo sde): rnams ni na mkhar 'khod//sgyu ma sU DeN+ya bai Da N+ya//bir+ya ts+yai bir+ya Do bcas//tsan dan dang ni 'dod mchog dang //mgul pa mdzesA dang mgul nges dang //skye dgu'i bla mar
561b7(mdo sde): gyur pa dang //lha las byung ba'i kha lo ba//dri za sna tshogs sde dang ni//mi rgyal rgyal ba'i khyu mchog dang //mdun du rtse mo lnga de bzhin//g.yer ma dang ni nyi zor dang //de dang
562a1(mdo sde): gzhan gyi rgyal po rnams//rgyal po dri za dang bcas dang //chos gtam bya phyir 'dir 'ongs nas//zhi bas dge sbyong tshal du'o//de nas gzhan yang na mkha'
562a2(mdo sde): klu/yangs pa nan du lhan cig nas//la ba rta yi mchog dang ni//rab 'gro gnyen dang lhan cig pa//ya mun dang yul 'khor skyong //klu'i sngun dang grags ldan dang //
562a3(mdo sde): si bsrung zang po chen b+h+rUM rnams//de yang nags kyi tshul dun//gang zhig k+Sha la myur du len//sku dang bya dang rnam dag mig/nA mkha' las 'dis chel der sgrub//
562a4(mdo sde): 'dab bzad ces de'i ming //'jigs med byin pas klu'i rmyi la//mkha' ldong du zad pa rtogs pas//phan tshun du ni mi brjod cing //klu khyung sangs rgyus skyabs 'grod //
562a5(mdo sde): rdo rje lag gis rgyal ba dang //lha ma yin no rgya mtshor gnas//spun rnams de yi gnas dang ni//gzi brjid ldan zhing grags dang ldan//nag po mig+ho spyan 'jigs byed
562a6(mdo sde): sngun//l+h+wa ma yin rnams khro byed dang //zag bzang dang ni thag bzang rig/mtshan 'joms na mo ci dang bcas//stobs kyi bu ni brgya bo rnams//thams cad rnam par
562a7(mdo sde): snang mdzad ming //stobs kyi sngo na go bgos pa//sgra gcan bzang po spun du 'gro//btsun pa de ni dus nas ni// bas dge slong tshal du//rgyu dang lha dang sa dang ni//med /
562b1(mdo sde): rgyu yang de d+d+ho///nAHrmu ts+tshan+d+ha nA//ba dang ni chags par ldan//byams dang skang rje'i tshogs can dang //lhan grags ldan mdun dun//rnyog sa na 'dzin
562b2(mdo sde): rnams //sa cing kha dge skyes s+ho//rdzu 'phrul sngon mang 'ad dade na//kha sh+tha d+hA ni sems par na/ sa di s+yA/
562b3(mdo sde): dge slong che la duH//khyab 'jug ste dang lhan cig //byid tha dad 'angs pa dang //zla ba de yi 'khor gyi lha//zla ba'i mdun byas 'khor dang na//nyi ma'i 'khor g+hi lha rnams
562b4(mdo sde): dang /nyi ma'i mdun sa 'khor dang ni//rgyu ltar de yi 'khor dang yang //mdun byas pa la hA kra dang //sa dngos yi ge tsa ng+ge dang //brgya byin yang yang sbyin pa dang //ga
562b5(mdo sde): bcu'i 'jig rten tshogs rnams dang //thams cad kha dog sna tshogs lus//rdzu 'phrul ldan zhing 'od dang ldan//kha dog dang ni grags par ldan//chos gtim bya phyir 'a
562b6(mdo sde): 'ongs te//zhe bas dge slong tshal dun//de nas nyer spyod lha dang ni//rlu dang ma yi na mo na//ldan snang bar byed pa dang //um+b+ha'i mId+b+ha bA de bzhin du/tshul
562b7(mdo sde): bcas chos dang ni//oMd+hiH dang du mi rnams//bzong yin mdzes pa'i mdun dang ni//mdun dang gnas pa dum da//phyogs 'acu'i 'jig rten tshigs de na/
563a1(mdo sde): cad kha dog sna tshogs lus//rdzu 'phrul ldan zhing 'od dang ldan//kha dog dang ni grags par ldan//chos gratAm bya phyir 'dir 'ongs te//zhi bas dge
563a2(mdo sde): tshal du'o//'dus dang 'dus pa chen po ni//me dang mi yi mchog dang ni//rol po'i go 'phang mdun du dang //yid mchog dang ni gro 'phong rtse//de nas lha yi mchod 'os dang /
563a3(mdo sde): gang yang dmar po'i gos gyon dang //pha rol pha rol son chen dang //grags chen lha yi mdun gnas dang //phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten tshogs dang ni//thams cad kha dog
563a4(mdo sde): sna tshogs lus//rdzu 'phrul ldan zhing 'od dang ldan//kha dog dang ni grags par ldan//chos gtam bya phyir 'dir 'ongs te//zhi bas dge slong tshal du'o//dkar dang drod dang
563a5(mdo sde): dmar po dang //sngon bzhugs skyugs po lhan cig dang //dkar po 'dzin pa la sogs dang //mkhas pa'i lha ni sngon du'o//rtag tu glang chen myos 'phang ba//'dres pa grags
563a6(mdo sde): dang ldan pa dang //prad+d+hA na no mang po mdun du dang //gang zhig phyogs ni mdzes pa dang //phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten tshogs rnams dang //thams cad kha dog sna tshogs lus//
563a7(mdo sde): rdzu 'phrul ldan zhing 'od dang ldan//kha dog dang ni grags par ldan//chos gtam bya phyir 'dir 'ongs te//zhi bas dge slong tshal du'o//dge ba dga' ldan 'thab bral dang //
563b1(mdo sde): byugs ldan shring dang ldan pa dang //'byung ba gnas dang gtso bo dang //'od dang bsam pa zhes bya dang //'phrul dga' ba ni sngun du dang //de nus gzhan 'phrul dbang byed spun//
563b2(mdo sde): phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten tshegs dang ni//thams cad kha dog sna tshogs lus//rdzu 'phrul ldan zhing 'od dang ldan//chos gautam bya phyir 'dir 'ongs te//zhi bas dge slong che la
563b3(mdo sde): du'o//sna tshogs drug po'i sde pa ni//thams cad kha dog sna tshogs lus//ming ni grogs dang ldan pa sngon//gang gzhan 'dra ba lhan cig tu//ma lus rigs ni brjod pa dang //
563b4(mdo sde): zug med tshogs ni pha rol rgal//glang chen tshogs ni blta ba dang //zla ba bzhud pa gsum ldan dang //tshangs bzang mchog ni thob pa dang //rdzu 'phrul ldan pa'i bu dang ni//
563b5(mdo sde): de yi dga' ba'i gzhon nu ni//de rnams zhi bas tshul du'o//tshangs pa'i 'jig rten stong du ni//tshangs pa chen po nye bar 'khod//'od dang ldan par skye ba dang //grags
563b6(mdo sde): ldan sna tshogs lus dang ni//dbang phyug bcu po sngon du dang //so so dbang du gyur pa dang //de'i dbus dang sngon du dang //'phrog ma 'khor dang bcas pa'o//de rnams thams
563b7(mdo sde): cad 'ongs gyur nas//dbang po lha dang tshangs bcas 'ongs//bdud kyi sde rnams 'ongs nas ni//gau ta ma thugs ni blta ba dang //'di ni zung cig chings shig brjod//chags pa
564a1(mdo sde): glang po bcings pa bzhin//'khor dang bcas pas bskor nas ni//gang du'ang gtang ba ma yin//de la 'di ni bde chen dang //gau ta ma sde la gnod mi nus//
564a2(mdo sde): lag pa thal mo rdebs pa dang //'jigs par byed pa'i cho sgrogs//ji ltar rlung gi sprin rnams dang //mun nags glog dang bcas pa ni//de ma thag tu 'jigs dang bral//
564a3(mdo sde): bsam pa khro ba med par gnas//lha de rnams thams cad dang tshangs pas bcom ldan 'das la phyag byas te bskor ba byas nas de nyid du mi snang bar gyur to//bdud kyi sde de
564a4(mdo sde): rnams kyang cang mi smra ba'i tshul gyis song //ston pas nyan thos bstan la dga' ba rnams bos te/de yang 'jigs po med byed dang //dag pa'i sangs rgyas bstan pa la//
564a5(mdo sde): 'jigs med 'dod chags bral ba ni//de yi ba spu'ang g.yo ba med//g.yul ni kun las rgyal ba dang //'jigs pa 'das shing grags par ldan//lha dang lhan cig
564a6(mdo sde): brjod pa dang //nyan thos rnams ni de gnaso//bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang /dge slong de rnams bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par
564a7(mdo sde): bstod do//'dus pa chen po'i mdo rdzogaso////paN+Di ta a nan+da shrI'o zhal snga nas mang du thos pa'i lo ts+tsha ba shAkya'i dge slong nyi ma rgyal mtshan dpal bzang//
564b1(mdo sde): pos skad/nyes smra ba rnams kyi gdan sa gtsug lag khang chen po dpal thar pa gling du sgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa'o////sa'i spyang du nya ma dang zla ba ltar gyur cig/
564b2(mdo sde): tshig 'dir yod kun sngar 'gyur dang mtshungs///rgyu gur skad du/mi tr-I sU tra/bod skad du/byams pa'i mdo//'phags pa dkonam tshig gsum la gus pas phyag
564b3(mdo sde): 'tshalo//ston pa dus gcig na ser skye'i gzhi dang /n+ya gro d+ha'i kun dga' ra bA dang //chu klung ro hi na'i 'gro ma na bzhugaso//de nas tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bus 'ongs pa'i
564b4(mdo sde): rkyal ba de'i phyir bcom ldan 'das la zhus pa/khyed kyi rjes bsten blo bstan ni//ci 'dri'o sangs rgyasu 'gyur bar//spyan ldan yongasu rgyas par ni//bdag ni rab tu nyan par
564b5(mdo sde): 'dod//gnas brtan zhus pa gsan nas ni//bcom ldan 'das kyis 'di skad gsungs//bsod nams phung po mi nyung ba'i//grags pa chen po mi pham pa'i//yon tan
564b6(mdo sde): thams cad brjod mi nus//mdor sdus nas ni legs bshad pa//phyogs gcig tsam ni bstan par bya//shA ri'i bu nyon nga yi tshig/'di ni bskal pa bzang po ste//skye ba
564b7(mdo sde): bye ba'i lo ru ni//byams pa zhes pa'i ming nyid kyis//rkang gnyis mchog gi sangs rgyas//ji ltar nga 'angs nas dang por dus lnga 'byung ste//'bras bu'i bar gyi dus dang //bsgrub
565a1(mdo sde): pa'i bar gyi dus dang //lung gi bar gyi dus dang //rtags tsam gyi bar gyi dus dang //sku gdung gi bar gyi duso//de la 'bras bu'i bar gyi dus ni//sangs rgyas
565a2(mdo sde): yangasu mya ngan las 'das nas//lo stong phrag gcig gi nang du rtogs pa skyed par nus//de song zhing song ba'i du su//phyir mi 'ong ba rnams dang //lan cig phyir 'ong ba dang //
565a3(mdo sde): rgyun tu zhugs pa'o//de rnams yod pa na 'bras bu'i bar gyi dus med ces brjod par mi bya'o//lag ma na rgyun tu zhugs pa ste/de 'das 'bras bu'i bar gyi dus nub pa zhes
565a4(mdo sde): bya'o/'di ni 'bras bu'i bar gyi dus nub pa zhes bya ba yino//bsgrub pa'i bar gyi dus zhes bya ba ni/zhi gnas dang lhag mthong gi lam gyi 'bras bu bslab par mi nus par//
565a5(mdo sde): pham pa bzhi po bsrung bar nus pa tsam//song zhing song ba'i dusu pham pa bzhi po de nyid bsrung ba tsa mo//pham pa bzhi po bsrung bar byed pa ni/dge slong rnams skyong phrag
565a6(mdo sde): gcig gi nang na brgya tsam yod na yang bsgrub pa'i bar gyi dus nub pa zhes mi bya'o//brgya'i nang na dge slong gcig tsam yod pa las sdom pa zhig pa dang /sha ba na bsgrub
565a7(mdo sde): pa'i bar gyi dus nub pa zhes bya'o//'di ni bsgrub pa'i bar gyi dus nub pa zhes bya'o//lung gi bar gyi dus zhes bya ba ni//sangs rgyas kyi gsung rab sde snod gsum po'i don
565b1(mdo sde): mgo zhing sgyu tsam klog pa dang /pa ta yod pa'i bar ni lung gi bar gyi dus yongasu rdzogs pa zhes bya'o//skyong zhing song ba'i dus su bcod pa'i dus kyi rgyal po rnams chos ma yin pa byung
565b2(mdo sde): par 'gyur//blon po la sogs pa rnams kyang chos ma yin pa byed par 'gyur te/de nas yul 'khor rnams dang /ljongs rnams kyang de bzhi no//de rnams kyis chos mi yin
565b3(mdo sde): pa'i rgyu yis lha rnams char legs par mi 'beb so//'bru rnams legs par mi sbyin no//de rnams kyi 'bru ma smin pas dge slong gi dge 'dun la bza' ba stor mi nuso//dge
565b4(mdo sde): slong rnams kyis kha zas ma rnyed pas slob ma dang yang slob ma rnams 'dzin par mi nuso//song zhing song ba'i dus lung gi dus dman pa'o//dang po ni rab tu byed pa chen po nyams par
565b5(mdo sde): 'gyuraro//nga nub nas ya ma kaM gi tshig su bcad pa dang /bzhi dang /gang zag dang gdags pa dang //sku gdung gi gtam dang /rnam 'byung dang /chos bsdu ba nub par gyur
565b6(mdo sde): pa'o//chos mngon sde snod nub nas/mdo sde'i sde snod nub par 'gyur//de nas a ga phyi ma'i sde pa nub par 'gyuraro//aM ga phye ma'i sde pa nub nas/yang dag par ldan pa'i
565b7(mdo sde): sde pa nub par 'gyur//bar ma'i sde pa dang ring po'i sde pa nub par 'gyuraro//ring po'i sde pa nub nas 'dul ba dang bcas pa'i skyes rabs gnaso//'dul ba'i sde snod la yang
566a1(mdo sde): ngo tsha dang ldan pa tsam 'dzino//song zhing song ba'i du su skyes pa'i rabs tsam yang 'dzin par mi nuso//dang po thams cad sgrol gyi skyes pa'i rabs nub par
566a2(mdo sde): 'gyur//tha mar lo ma med pa'i skyes pa'i rabs nub par 'gyur//skyes rab pa rnams nub nas 'dul ba'i sde snod 'ba' shig 'dzin//song zhing song ba'i dus su/mi gang
566a3(mdo sde): zhig gis sangs rgyas kyi gsung rab kyi tshigasu bcad pa gcig tsam dar byed na/lung gi bar gyi dus nub pa medado//gang zhig rgyal po chos la dad pa'i dusu glang po che'i
566a4(mdo sde): rgyab tu gser gyi za ma tog gcig gzhag ste/nor stong phrag gcig de ru bcug nas sangs rgyas kyis gsungs pa'i tshig su bcad pa gcig gang gis shes pa des nor
566a5(mdo sde): stong phrag de lod ces grong khyer gyi dbu su rol mo'i sgra lan gsum sgrags nas de skad brjod do//de len par mi nus pa na nor stong phrag de rgyal po'i mdzod du yang 'jogo//
566a6(mdo sde): de'i dus ni lung gi bar gyi dus nub pa'i du su 'gyuraro//'di ni lung gi bar gyi dus nub pa'i dus zhes bya ba yino//song zhing song ba'i dus su//chos gos 'dzin pa dang /
566a7(mdo sde): lhung bzed 'dzin pa dang /ga cer bu pa'i dge sbyong dang 'dra bar chag tshang ku ba'i snod/slong ba'i snod dang /lag pa'i rtse mo la 'phyang ba'i tshul dang 'dra ba dang /'dra ba'i
566b1(mdo sde): nang du khyer nas 'gro ba'o//song zhing song ba'i dusu gos ngur smrig gis bdag la ci byed/cung zad cho su byas pa'i dum bu lag pa 'am/mgrin pa 'am/rna ba rnams 'am/skra rnam
566b2(mdo sde): la bgo ba so//bag ma len pa dang /so nA ma dang /tshong la sogs pa byas nas/'tshe ba'i phyir du spyod cing 'gro bar byed do//de'i tshe yon ster cing dge 'dun gyi ched du do thams
566b3(mdo sde): cad ster bar byed/de'i tshe ngas kun dga'o dge 'dun gyi yon gyi 'bras bu ni grangs med par ba shod//song zhing song ba'i dus su/'di ci bdag gi don du/ngur smrig gi dum bu
566b4(mdo sde): togs nas dgon pa 'am nags chel du sbyar bar byed do//de rnams kyi dus su rtags tsam 'dzin pa'i bar gyi dus nub par 'gyuraro//'di ni rtags tsam 'dzin pa'i bar gyi dus
